SA11sanssr_pu:60_1: tad yathā / kaścit puruṣaḥ pañcabuddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamān lokadhātūn abhikramitukāmaḥ syāt /
SA11sanssr_pu:60_2: sa paśuratham abhiruhya mārgaṃ pratipadyate sa cireṇa dīrgheṇādhvanā yojanaśataṃ gacchet /
SA11sanssr_pu:60_3: sa tatra mahatyā vātamaṇḍalyā paścāt khalu punar aśītiṃ yojanasahasrāṇi pratyākṛṣya pratyudāvartyeti /
SA11sanssr_pu:60_4: tat kiṃ śaknuyāt sa puruṣas tān lokadhātūn paśurathenātikramitum /
SA11sanssr_pu:60_5: yāvad annabhilāpyānabhilāpyair api kalpair ekam api lokadhātum atikramitum /
SA11sanssr_pu:60_6: āha / no hīdaṃ bhagavan / bhagavān āha / evam eva mañjuśrīḥ yaḥ kaścid bodhicittam utpādya mahāyānaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:60_7: na dhārayati / na paṭhati / śrāvakayānīyān sevate / taiś ca sārddhaṃ saṃstavaṃ karoti /
SA11sanssr_pu:60_8: śrāvakayānaṃ ca paṭhati svādhyāyati mīmāṃsate paribudhyate 'rthāṃś ca pāṭhayati yāvad bodhayati /
SA11sanssr_pu:60_9: sa tena dhanvaprajño bhavati so 'nnuttarajñānamārgāt pratyākṛṣyate pratyudāvarttyate /
SA11sanssr_pu:60_10: yad api tasya bodhisatvasya bodhibhāvanātaḥ prajñendriyaṃ prajñācakṣuḥ tad api tasya dhanvīkriyate pratihanyate /
SA11sanssr_pu:61_0: tad evam eṣā śūnyatānadhimuktir mahāyānānabhiratiś cāsaṃpūrṇādhimukticittacaryasyāpi prāyo na saṃdṛśyate /
SA11sanssr_pu:61_4: athaitan neyārthaṃ / kasmād anye bodhicittotpādakā asyāṃ bhūmau neṣyante /
SA11sanssr_pu:61_5: na cātrecchayā kiñcid viśeṣacihnaṃ nītārthaṃ karttuṃ labhyate /
SA11sanssr_pu:62_7: āha / kathaṃ bhagavan satvā aparityaktā bhavanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:62_10: yathā na te tathāgataśāsane pravrajitā yeṣāṃ nāsti tyāga iti /
SA11sanssr_pu:62_11: evam ihānyabodhicittanindā draṣṭavyā na tu bodhicittam anyathā notpadyatae eva /
SA11sanssr_pu:63_1_0: iha kulaputra bodhisatvo gotrasthaḥ sann annutpāditabodhicittaḥ tathāgatena vā tathāgataśrāvakeṇa vā saṃcodyamānaḥ saṃvedyamānaḥ
SA11sanssr_pu:63_1_1: samādāpyamāno 'nnuttarāyāṃ samyaksambodhau bodhicittam utpādayatīdaṃ prathamaṃ kāraṇaṃ bodhicittotpādāya /
SA11sanssr_pu:63_2: saṃbodher vā bodhicittasya vā varṇaṃ bhāṣyamāṇaṃ śrutvānnuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittam utpādayatīdaṃ dvitīyaṃ kāraṇaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:63_3: sa satvā ... naśaraṇān advīpān dṛṣṭvā kāruṇyacittam upasthāpya yāvad annuttarāyāṃ samyaksambodhau cittam utpādayatīdaṃ tṛtīyaṃ kāraṇaṃ bodhicittotpādāya /
SA11sanssr_pu:63_4: sa tathāgatasya sarvākāraparipūrṇatāṃ dṛṣṭvā prītim utpādya annuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittam utpādayatīdaṃ caturthaṃ kāraṇam iti /
SA11sanssr_pu:63_5: tac ca bodhicittaṃ dvividhaṃ bodhipraṇidhicittaṃ ca bodhiprasthāna cittaṃ ca /
SA11sanssr_pu:63_7: durlabhāḥ kulaputra te satvāḥ sarvaloke ye 'nnuttarasyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittaṃ praṇidadhati /
SA11sanssr_pu:63_8: tato 'pi durlabhatamās te satvā ye 'nnuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃprasthitā iti /
SA11sanssr_pu:63_9: tatra bodhipraṇidhicittaṃ / mayā buddhena bhavitavyam iti cittaṃ praṇidhānād utpannaṃ bhavati /
SA11sanssr_pu:63_11: kaḥ punar vādaḥ kiñcid eva kuśalaṃ kṛtvā /
SA11sanssr_pu:63_13: ghoṣadatto nāma tathāgato yatra nakṣatrarājena tathāgatena prathamaṃ bodhicittam utpāditaṃ tāmbūlapatraṃ dattvā gopālakabhūtena /
SA11sanssr_pu:63_14: evaṃ vidyutpradīpo nāma tathāgato yatra yaśasā tathāgatena prathamaṃ bodhicittam utpāditaṃ daśikāṃ dattvā tantravāyabhūtena /
SA11sanssr_pu:63_15: evam anantaprabho nāma tathāgato yatrārciṣmatā tathāgatena prathamaṃ bodhicittam utpāditaṃ tṛṇapradīpaṃ dattvā nagarāvalambakabhūtena /
SA11sanssr_pu:63_16: evaṃ dṛḍhavikramo nāma tathāgato yatra duṣpradharṣeṇa tathāgatena prathamaṃ bodhicittam utpāditaṃ dattakāṣṭhaṃ dattvā kāṣṭhahārakabhūtenety ādi /
SA11sanssr_pu:64_3: tad yathāpi nāma kulaputra cittam api vajraratnaṃ sarvaprativiśiṣṭaṃ suvarṇālaṃkāram abhibhavati /
SA11sanssr_pu:64_6: evam eva kulaputrāśayapratipattibhinnam api sarvajñatācittotpādavajraratnaṃ sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhaguṇasuvarṇālaṃkāram abhibhavati bodhisattvanāma ca na vijahāti /
SA11sanssr_pu:64_8: itaś ca vināpi caryayā bodhicittam upakārakam iti jñātavyaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:64_10: yasmāc ca tvaṃ mahārāja bahukṛtyo bahukaraṇīyaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:64_11: asahaḥ sarveṇa sarvaḥ sarvathā sarvaṃ sarvadā dānapāramitāyāṃ śikṣituṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:64_13: tasmāt tarhi tvaṃ mahārāja evam eva samyaksambodhichandaṃ śraddhāṃ tra .
SA11sanssr_pu:64_14: .. praṇidhiṃ ca gacchann api tiṣṭhann api niṣaṇṇo 'pi śayāno 'pi jāgrad api bhuñjāno 'pi /

SA11sanssr_pu:64_15_1: cātītānāgatapratyutpannāni sarvakuśalamūlāny abhisaṃkṣipya tulayitvā piṇḍayitvānumodasvāgrayā anumodanayā yāvad ākāśasamatayā
SA11sanssr_pu:64_17_0: tataḥ sarvasatvānāṃ yāvat sarvajñātapratilambhāya sarvabuddhadharmaparipūraṇāya dine dine traikālyam annuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau
SA11sanssr_pu:64_17_1: pariṇāmaya evaṃ khalu tvaṃ mahārāja pratipannaḥ san rājyaṃ kārayiṣyasi rājyakṛtyāni ca na hāyayiṣyasi bodhisaṃbhārāṃś ca
SA11sanssr_pu:65_0: atraiva cāsya vipāka uktaḥ / sa khalu punas tvaṃ mahārāja tasya samyaksaṃbodhicittakuśalamūlakarmaṇo vipākenānnekaśatakṛtvo deveṣūpapanno 'bhūḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:65_2: sarvāsu ca devamanuṣyopapattiṣv ādhipatyam eva kārayasi /
SA11sanssr_pu:65_3: na ca tāvat tava mahārāja tasya samyaksaṃbodhicittasya kuśalakarmaṇa ūnatvaṃ vāpūrṇatvaṃ vā prajñāyate /
SA11sanssr_pu:65_4_0: api ca mahārāja ekam api samyaksaṃbodhicittaṃ sarvasattvottāraṇārambaṇatvāt sarvasatvāmocanārambaṇatvāt sarvasatvasamāśvāsanārambaṇatvāt
SA11sanssr_pu:65_5: kaḥ punar vādo ya evaṃ bahulīkarotīti /
SA11sanssr_pu:66_1: tatra pūrvāvadāne paṭhyate / evaṃ tāvat praṇidhibodhicittaṃ veditavyaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:66_2: idaṃ tu vaktavyaṃ kim abhūmipraviṣṭhasyāpi bodhisatvasamvarādhikāro 'sti na veti /
SA11sanssr_pu:66_5: na ca kañcit satkārāṃ kasyacit sakāśāt pratikāṃkṣaty anyatra mayaivaiṣāṃ sarvasatvānāṃ sarvopakaraṇabāhulyam upanāmayitavyam iti /
SA11sanssr_pu:66_6: tathā cāha / pramuditāyāṃ bodhisatvabhūmau suvyavasthito bhavaty acalanayoge .
SA11sanssr_pu:66_7: .. ti / punaś coktaṃ / tathāgatavaṃśaniyato bhavati saṃbodhiparāyaṇa iti /
SA11sanssr_pu:66_8: ākāśagarbhasūtre tv āha / śrāvakayānam evāsya na bhavati prāg eva mahāyānam iti /
SA11sanssr_pu:66_10: pramuditāyāṃ tu paṭhyate / ātmasaṃjñāpagamāc cāsyātmasneho na bhavati /
SA11sanssr_pu:67_0: evam ādi sūtreṣu bhūmipraviṣṭasyāpi śikṣāprajñaptir dṛśyate /
SA11sanssr_pu:67_1: yatra vāsāmānyena bodhisatvam adhikṛtyopadeśas tatrābhyāsayogyatayā pratiṣedhavākyena vādikarmikabodhisatvena na śikṣitavyaṃ bhaved etat /
SA11sanssr_pu:68_2: na cātra śithilena bhavitavyaṃ na ca śeṣāsu na samudāgacchati /
SA11sanssr_pu:68_4: ayaṃ ca saṃvaraḥ strīṇām api mṛdukleśānāṃ bodhyabhilāṣacittānāṃ labhyate /
SA11sanssr_pu:68_6: caturbhiḥ śāriputra dharmaiḥ samanvāgatāḥ bodhisatvāḥ satyavādino bhavantīty ārabhyāha /
SA11sanssr_pu:68_7: iha śāriputra kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vānnuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittam utpādyārabdhavīryo viharati kuśaladharmaparyeṣaṇāyety ārabhya sarva upadeśaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:69_1: evaṃ hy asya śikṣātikrame tīvram apatrāpyaṃ guruvisaṃvādanabhayaṃ cotpadyate /
SA11sanssr_pu:69_2: tatra cānnābhogataḥ premagauravasiddhir ity eṣa sāmānyasaṃvaradharmaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:69_3: ata eva bodhisatvāḥ tathāgatānāṃ purataḥ śikṣāṇām anyatamaśikṣāniṣpattikāmāḥ samādānaṃ kurvanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:69_4: tasya ca kalyāṇamitrasyābhāve daśadigavasthitabuddhabodhisatvābhimukhībhāvabhāvanayā saṃvaro grāhyaḥ saṃvaram ātmabalaṃ ca tulayitvā /
SA11sanssr_pu:69_5: anyathā tu sarvabuddhabodhisatvāḥ sadevakaś ca loko visaṃvāditaḥ syāt /
SA11sanssr_pu:69_6: saddharmasmṛtyupasthānasūtre hi kiñcin mātraṃ cintayitvāpy adadataḥ pretagatir uktā pratijñātaṃ cādadato narakagatiḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:69_7: kiṃ punar annuttaram artham akhilasya jagataḥ pratijñāyāsaṃpādayataḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:69_11: tatra kulaputra katamat satyaṃ yad bodhisatvo 'nnuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittam utpādya tac cittaṃ jīvitahetor api na parityajati na satveṣu vipratipadyate /
SA11sanssr_pu:70_0: yat punar bodhisatvo 'nnuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittam utpādya paścāt tac cittaṃ parityajati satveṣu vipratipadyate 'yaṃ bodhisatvasya pratikṛṣṭo mṛṣāvāda iti /
SA11sanssr_pu:70_2: syād yathāpi nāma sāgaramate rājā vā rājamātro vā sarvaṃ nāgarakaṃ janaṃ śvo bhaktenopanimantryopekṣako bhaven nānnapānaṃ samudānayet satyaṃ sarvajanakāyaṃ visaṃvādayet /
SA11sanssr_pu:70_4_0: evam eva sāgaramate yo bodhisatvaḥ sarvasatvān āśvāsyātīrṇatāraṇāyāmuktamocanāyānnāśvastāśvāsanāya yāvan na bāhuśrutye 'bhiyogaṃ
SA11sanssr_pu:70_6: evaṃ ca taṃ pūrvabuddhadarśinyo devatā uccagghanti vivādayanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:70_7: durlabhās te yajñasvāmino ye mahāyajñaṃ pratijñāyottārayanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:70_8: tasmāt tarhi sāgaramate na sā bodhisatvena vāg bhāṣitavyā yayā sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokaṃ visaṃvādayet /

SA11sanssr_pu:106_4_0: kaḥ punar vādo bāhyeṣu vastuṣu yad uta dhanadhānyajātarūparajataratnābharaṇahayagajarathavāhanagrāmanagaranigamajanapadarāṣṭrarājadhānīpattanadāsīdāsakarmakarapauruṣeyaputraduhitṛparivāreṣu /
SA11sanssr_pu:106_5: api tu khalu punar yasya yasya yena yena yad yat kāryaṃ bhaviṣyati tasmai tasmai satvāya tat tad deyaṃ saṃvidyamānaṃ dāsyāmi /
SA11sanssr_pu:106_7: annapekṣo dāsyāmi satvānugrahāya satvakāruṇyena satvānukampayā teṣām eva satvānāṃ saṃgrahāya /
SA11sanssr_pu:106_8: yathā me 'mī satvāḥ saṃgṛhītā bodhiprāptasya dharmajānakāḥ syur iti /
SA11sanssr_pu:107_0_0: tad yathāpi nāma kulaputra bhaiṣajyavṛkṣasya mūlato vā hriyamāṇasya gaṇḍataḥ śākhātaḥ tvaktaḥ patrato vā hriyamāṇasya puṣpataḥ
SA11sanssr_pu:107_0_1: phalataḥ sārato vā hriyamāṇasya naivaṃ bhavati vikalpo /
SA11sanssr_pu:107_1: mūlato me hriyate yāvat sārato me hriyatae iti /
SA11sanssr_pu:108_0: api tu khalu punar avikalpa eva hīnamadhyotkṛṣṭānāṃ satvānāṃ vyādhīn apanayati /
SA11sanssr_pu:108_1_0: evam eva kulaputra bodhisatvena mahāsatvenāsmiṃś cāturmahābhautike ātmabhāve bhaiṣajyasaṃjñotpādayitavyā yeṣāṃ yeṣāṃ satvānāṃ
SA11sanssr_pu:108_1_1: yena yenārthaḥ tat tad eva me harantu hastaṃ hastārthinaḥ pādaṃ pādārthina iti pūrvavat /
SA11sanssr_pu:109_1: ayam eva mayā kāyaḥ sarvasatvānāṃ kiṃkaraṇīyeṣu kṣapayitavyaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:109_2_0: tad yathāpi nāmemāni bāhyāni catvāri mahābhūtāni pṛthivīdhātur abdhātus tejodhātur vāyudhātuś ca nānāsukhair nānāparyāyair
SA11sanssr_pu:109_2_1: nānārambaṇair nānopakaraṇair nānāparibhogaiḥ satvānāṃ nānopabhogaṃ gacchanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:109_3: evam evāham imaṃ kāyaṃ caturmahābhūtasamucchrayaṃ nānāsukhair nānāparyāyair nānārambaṇair nānopakaraṇair nānāparibhogair vistareṇa sarvasatvānām upabhogyaṃ kariṣyāmīti /
SA11sanssr_pu:109_4: sa imam arthavaśaṃ saṃpaśyan kāyaduṣkhatāṃ ca pratyavekṣate kāyaduṣkhatayā ca na parikhidyate satvāvekṣayeti /
SA11sanssr_pu:111_0_0: iti hi bodhisatva ātmānaṃ sarvasatveṣu niryātayan sarvakuśalamūlopakāritvena sarvasatvānāṃ kuśalamūlaiḥ samanvāharan pradīpasamam
SA11sanssr_pu:111_0_1: ātmānaṃ sarvasatveṣūpanayan sukhasamam ātmānaṃ sarvasatveṣv adhitiṣṭhan /
SA11sanssr_pu:111_1: dharmakukṣisamam ātmānaṃ sarvajagati saṃdhārayan ālokasamam ātmānaṃ sarvasatveṣv anugacchan jagatpratiṣṭhāpanasamam ātmānaṃ saṃpaśyan /
SA11sanssr_pu:111_3_0: mitrasamam ātmānaṃ sarvasatveṣu niyojayamāno 'nnuttarasukhamārgasamam ātmānaṃ sarvasatveṣu saṃdarśayamānaḥ annuttarasukhopadhānasamam
SA11sanssr_pu:111_3_1: ātmānaṃ sarvasatveṣu pariśodhamānaḥ sūryasamam ātmānaṃ sarvajagati samīkurvāṇaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:111_5: yathākāmakaraṇīyavaśyam ātmānaṃ sarvaloke saṃpaśyann agracaityā bhaviṣyāmaḥ .
SA11sanssr_pu:111_10: sarvajagato dānapatim ātmānam adhimucyamānaḥ sarvalokajñānasamam ātmānaṃ kurvāṇaḥ bodhisatvacaryāprayuktam ātmānaṃ saṃjanayamānaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:111_14: pratipattau cātmānaṃ sthāpayamāno bodhisatvatyāgacittatāṃ manasi kurvāṇa udyānabhūtam ātmānaṃ sarvasatveṣu saṃpaśyan /
SA11sanssr_pu:111_15: dharmaratibhūtam ātmānaṃ sarvalokeṣv ādarśayamānaḥ saumanasyadātāram ātmānaṃ sarvasatvānām adhitiṣṭhan /
SA11sanssr_pu:111_16: annantaprītisaṃjananam ātmānaṃ sarvajagato niryātayamānaḥ sarvaśukladharmāya dvārabhūtam ātmānaṃ sarvaloke saṃdhārayamānaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:112_0_0: iti hi bodhisatva ātmānam upasthāyakatvāya dadānaḥ yācanakeṣu nīcamanasikāracitto bhūmyāstaraṇādhiṣṭhānacetā dharaṇisamasarvaduṣkhasahanamanasikārapravṛttaḥ
SA11sanssr_pu:112_0_1: sarvasatvopasthānāklāntamānasaprayukto bālajanaduṣkṛtasthiraḥ sthāvarādhivāsanajātyaḥ asthitaḥ kuśalamūlābhiyuktaḥ aprayuktasarvalokadhātūpasthānaḥ
SA11sanssr_pu:112_0_2: karṇo nāsā saṃparityajan yācanakebhya upasaṃkrāntebhyo bodhisatvacaryopāttatathāgatakulakulīnasaṃbhūtacittaḥ sarvabodhisatvānusmaraṇavihāraprasṛto
SA11sanssr_pu:112_1: .. tyavekṣamāṇaḥ svaśarīrānadhyavasitasantānaḥ aniketasarvabuddhadharmānusmṛtivihāry asārāc charīrāt sārādānābhiprāya iti hi bodhisatvo jihvāṃ yācitaḥ samāno ma .
SA11sanssr_pu:112_2: .. vātā premaṇīyayā maitryopacāravitatayā bhadre siṃhāsane rājārhe niṣādya taṃ yācanakam abhibhāṣate dṛṣṭaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:112_4: .. citto buddhavaṃśasaṃbhūtacitto 'lulitasantānacitto mahāsthāmabalādhāno 'nnadhyavasitaśarīracitto 'nnabhiniviṣṭavacanacitto jānumaṇḍalapraṣṭhitakāyo bhūtvā svakān mukhāj jihvā .
SA11sanssr_pu:112_5: .. yācanakasya sarvaśarīram adhīnaṃ kṛtvā vācaṃ pramuñcan snigdhāṃ mṛdvīṃ premaṇīyāṃ maitryopacārāṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:112_6: gṛhāṇa tvaṃ mama jihvāṃ yathā kāmakaraṇīyāṃ kuru /
SA11sanssr_pu:112_7_0: tathā kuru yathā tvaṃ prīto bhavasi prītamānasa ātmanā pramudito hṛṣṭaḥ prītisaumanasyajāta iti sa śiraḥ parityajan sarvadharmāgraśiraḥ
SA11sanssr_pu:112_8_0: .. gacchan sarvajagadagryaśiraḥ annupamajñānam abhilaṣan sarvadikchiraḥ prāptuṃ jñānarājam adhimucyamāno 'nnuttarasarvadharmaiśvaryaśīrṣatāṃ
SA11sanssr_pu:112_9_0: iti hi bodhisatvo hastapādān parityajan yācanakebhyaḥ śraddhāhastaprayuktenānugrahacāritreṇa bodhisatvasiṃhavikramatyāgapratatapāṇinā
SA11sanssr_pu:112_9_3: sarvabodhisatvasaṃvarṇitaikatyāganiryāṇa iti hi bodhisatvaḥ svaśarīram ākṣipya rudhiram anuprayacchan yācanakebhyaḥ praharṣitabodhicitto /
SA11sanssr_pu:112_10_1: 'nivarttyayā prītiprasrabdhyā svaśarīrānapekṣacittaḥ svaśarīrād rudhiram anuprayacchan jñānāyatanamahāyānaprasṛtacetā mahāyānāvinaṣṭamanā
SA11sanssr_pu:112_10_2: iṣṭamanās tuṣṭamanāḥ prītamanāḥ muditamanā maitrymanāḥ sukhamanāḥ prasannamanāḥ pramuditaprītisaumanasyajāto majjāmāṃsaṃ
SA11sanssr_pu:112_12: gṛhṇantu bhavanto mama śarīrān majjāmāṃsaṃ yathā kāmakaruṇāyā tulyaprītivivarddhanena tyāgacittena /
SA11sanssr_pu:112_14_0: sarvabodhisatvasamatopāttair mahādānārambhair manasākāṅkṣitaiḥ sarvayācakair annanutāpyacittair dānavastubhiḥ apratyavekṣitena
SA11sanssr_pu:112_17_1: bodhisatvaḥ svahṛdayaṃ parityajan yācanakebhyo dānavaśaśikṣitacittaḥ pāramitāniṣpādanacittaḥ sarvabodhisatvadānānuddhatasupratiṣṭhitacittaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:112_20_0: sarvajagatparipācananidānaṃ mahāpraṇidhānaṃ pratipadyamāno bodhisatvacaryāyāṃ saṃvasamānaḥ sarvajñatāsaṃbhāraṃ saṃbharamāṇaḥ
SA11sanssr_pu:112_20_1: praṇidhim ariñcan so 'tra yakṛdbukkāphupphuṣaṃ yācakebhyaḥ parityajan yācanakābhiprasannayā dṛṣṭyā prasannaprītyākārair netrair
SA11sanssr_pu:112_20_2: bodhisatvaniryātena premṇāvyutthitamanasikāreṇa tyāgenāsārāt kāyāt supratyavekṣitena sārādānacittena śmaśānaparyantena kāyānusmṛtimanasikāreṇa
SA11sanssr_pu:112_21: śarīrānityatayāpaviddhaśarīreṇa parabhaktacetanena evaṃ dharmamanasikāraprayukto bodhisatvas tān yācanakān animiṣaṃ prekṣamāṇa evaṃ cittam utpādayati /
SA11sanssr_pu:112_22: yadi cāham etadyācanakasya etaccharīrād antraṃ yakṛdbukkāphuṣphuṣaṃ dadyāṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:112_23: yadi vā na dadyāṃ / āyuḥkṣayaparyante naiṣo nityaḥ śmaśānaparyavasāna iti /
SA11sanssr_pu:112_24_0: sa evaṃ manasikārasaṃtoṣitena santānenaivaṃ dharmajñānenāśayena kalyāṇamitrasaṃjñādhiṣṭhitena yācanakadarśanenāsārāt kāyāt
SA11sanssr_pu:112_24_1: sāram ādātukāmo dharmakāmatayā svamāṃsān nakhaṃ parityajann eva tatkuśalamūlaṃ pariṇāmayatīty ātmabhāvotsargaṃ kṛtvā /
SA11sanssr_pu:113_1_0: iti hi bodhisatvo nānādakṣiṇīyapratigrāhakeṣv anyānyapudgaladigāgateṣv aprameyakṛpaṇavanīpakeṣu bodhisatvaśravāgateṣu bodhisatvaśabdaṃ
SA11sanssr_pu:113_4: mayaiva tatra diśaṃ gatvā yūyaṃ pratimānayitavyā abhaviṣyata yena yuṣmākam āgamanaklamo na syāt /
SA11sanssr_pu:113_5: evaṃ samṛddhapraṇipātena kṣamayati sarvayācanakān kṣamayitvā snāpayitvā viśrāmitaśarīrān kṛtvā tebhyo yadṛcchayopakaraṇaṃ pratipādayati /
SA11sanssr_pu:113_6: yad idaṃ maṇirathān jambudvīpakalyāṇakanyāratnaparipūrṇān yad idaṃ suvarṇarathān janapadaviśuddhakanyāratnaparipūrṇān /
SA11sanssr_pu:113_9: tathātraiva deśitaṃ maṇirathān vā dadānaḥ sarvaratnajālasaṃchannān ājāneyahastyupetān /
SA11sanssr_pu:113_10_0: savāhanān / candanarathān dadāno ratnacakrarathyaprayuktān ratnasiṃhāsanapratiṣṭhitān yāvan nānāratnachatrasaṃchannavyūhān
SA11sanssr_pu:114_0_0: punar atraivāha / ātmānaṃ ca sarvasatvānāṃ niryātayann upasthānaṃ vā sarvabuddhānām upādadāno rājyaṃ vā parityajan paṭabhedakaṃ
SA11sanssr_pu:114_0_1: vā nagararājadhānīṃ sarvālaṃkārabhūṣitāṃ yathārhaṃ vā yācanakeṣu sarvaparivāraṃ parityajan putraduhitṛbhāryāṃ vā dadāno yācanakebhyaḥ
SA11sanssr_pu:114_2_0: evaṃ pānadānaṃ rasadānam api bodhisatvo dadāno vividhān kalyāṇān udārān viśuddhān avikalāṃs tiktāṃl lavaṇān kaṭakān kaṣāyān
SA11sanssr_pu:114_2_1: nānārasāgropetān susnigdhān vividharasavidhinopetān dhātukṣobhaṇasamatāsthāpanān cittaśarīrabalopastambhanān prītiprasādaprāmodyakalpatājananān /
SA11sanssr_pu:114_4: evaṃ vastradānaṃ puṣpadānaṃ gandhadānaṃ vilepanadānaṃ mālyadānaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:114_6_0: glānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārān bodhisatvo 'nuprayacchan yāvan nānābhājanāni vividhasaṃbhārāṇy annekakāṃsyapātrīr aprameyasaṃbhāropacitā
SA11sanssr_pu:114_6_1: hiraṇyasuvarṇarūpyacūrṇaparipūrṇās tāni buddhebhyo bhagavadbhyo dadāno 'cintyadakṣiṇīyādhimuktacetā bodhisatvaratnebhyo vā
SA11sanssr_pu:114_10: guruśuśrūṣopasthānacittatayā ācāryagurudakṣiṇīyebhyo vā dadānas tatra tatra gurusaṃbhārāvavādaśikṣaṇaprayuktaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:115_0: iti hi bodhisatvo hastyājāneyān dadānaḥ saptāṅgasupratiṣṭhitān /
SA11sanssr_pu:115_1_0: ṣaṣṭihāyanān ṣaḍgantropetān padmavarṇān mukhaviśuddhān suvarṇālaṃkārān hemajālapraticchannaśarīrān nānāratnavicitrālaṃkārajālaśuṇḍaprakṣiptavyūhān
SA11sanssr_pu:115_4: sa tān dadānaḥ parityajan gauraveṇa gurujanebhyaḥ kalyāṇamitramātāpitṛbhyaḥ kṛpaṇavanīpakayācanakebhyaḥ sarvajagatpratigrāhakabhyo muktacittayā dadāno /
SA11sanssr_pu:115_5_1: pariśodhayamāno yāvad iti hi bodhisatva āsanadānaṃ dadānaḥ parityajan rājabhadrāsanāni vaiḍūryapādakāni siṃhapratiṣṭhitāni
SA11sanssr_pu:115_7: evaṃ yāvad iti hi bodhisatvaś chatrāṇi dadānaḥ parityajan mahāratnavyūhapratimaṇḍitāni ratnadaṇḍāni kiṅkiṇījālasaṃchannāni /
SA11sanssr_pu:115_9_0: tādṛśānāṃ chatrāṇām annekakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrālaṃkārāṇāṃ tadatiriktāni cāsaṃkhyeyakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrālaṃkārāṇy annapekṣacitto
SA11sanssr_pu:115_9_1: dadānaḥ parityajann avasṛjann anuprayacchan saṃmukhībhūtebhyo vā satvasārebhyo nirvṛtānāṃ vā tathāgatānāṃ caityālaṃkārāya /
SA11sanssr_pu:115_10_0: dharmaparyeṣṭaye bodhisatvakalyāṇamitrebhyo vābhijātabodhisatvadharmabhāṇakebhyo vā mātāpitṛbhyāṃ vā saṃgharatne vā sarvabuddhaśāsane
SA11sanssr_pu:115_10_1: vā yāvat sarvapratigrāhakebhyaḥ sa evaṃ tatkuśalamūlaṃ pariṇāmayati /
SA11sanssr_pu:116_0: yathā tāvat prathamāyām eva pariṇāmanāyāṃ sarvakuśalamūlaprastāveṣūpadiṣṭaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:116_2: katham etāni kuśalamūlāni sarvajagadupajīvyāny upakāribhūtāni bhaveyur viśuddhadharmaparyavasānāni yena sarvasatvānām etaiḥ kuśalamūlair narakāpāyapratiprasrabdhir bhavati /
SA11sanssr_pu:116_4: sa tāni kuśalamūlāni pariṇāmayann evaṃ tatkuśalamūlaṃ pariṇāmayati /
SA11sanssr_pu:116_5: anenāhaṃ kuśalamūlena sarvasatvānāṃ nayanaṃ bhaveyaṃ sarvaduṣkhaskandhavinivarttanāya /
SA11sanssr_pu:117_4: maitracittaḥ premacittaḥ anugrahacitto hitacittaḥ sukhacittaḥ pariṇāmayati /
SA11sanssr_pu:117_5: tac caivaṃ pariṇāmayati / idaṃ mama kuśalamūlaṃ sarvasatvānāṃ gativiśuddhaye saṃvarteta /
SA11sanssr_pu:118_0: anena me kuśalamūlena te sarvasatvāḥ sarvabuddhān ārāgayeyur ārāgayitvā ca mā virāgayeyuḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:118_1: teṣu ca buddheṣu bhagavatsu prasādam abhedyaṃ pratilabheran /
SA11sanssr_pu:118_2: teṣāṃ ca tathāgatānām arhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānām antike dharmadeśanāṃ śṛṇuyuḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:118_9_0: mahatsu ca kuśalamūleṣv ātmānaṃ pratiṣṭhāpayeyur atyantaṃ ca dāridryaṃ vinivarttayeyuḥ sapta dhanapratilambhāṃś ca paripūrayeyuḥ
SA11sanssr_pu:118_17: yena ca sukhopadhānena sarvabuddhāḥ samanvāgatās tatsukhopadhānapratilabdhāḥ sarvasatvā bhaveyur iti /
SA11sanssr_pu:119_5: sarvasatvāḥ sarvarasāgrajihvā bhavantu rasanimittā grahītāraḥ sarvabuddhadharmacittanaprayuktāḥ avipannayānā agrayānā uttamayānāḥ śīghrayānā mahāyānāḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:122_4: sarvasatvā bodhisatvapariṇāmanāvāsitā bhavantu sarvasatvāḥ sarvaśukladharmavāsitā bhavantu sarvākuśaladharmaprahīṇāḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:122_12: sarvasatvā annantālokā bhavantu sarvabuddhadharmeṣu sarvasatvā apratihatāvabhāsā bhavantu sarvadharmadhātvekaspharaṇāḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:124_0: sarvasatvā apramāṇabhājanā bhavantv ākāśadhātuvipulāḥ smṛtīndriyopetāḥ sarvalaukikalokottarabhāṣasaṃgrahaṇād grahaṇasmṛtyasaṃpramūḍhāḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:124_10: anena kuśalamūlena sarvasatvāḥ kalyāṇamitrātyāgacittānutsṛṣṭā bhavantu kṛtajñāḥ kṛtānupālanatayā /
SA11sanssr_pu:125_1: mā bhūt tan mama kuśalamūlaṃ dharmajñānakauśalyaṃ vā yan na sarvasattvopajīvyaṃ syād iti /
SA11sanssr_pu:126_1: kuśalānāṃ ca cittacaitasikānānām anusmṛtir anusmṛtya ca bodhipariṇāmanā /
SA11sanssr_pu:126_2: idam atītakauśalyaṃ / yo 'nnāgatānāṃ kuśalamūlānāṃ nidhyaptibodher āmukhīkarmasamanvāhāraḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:126_3: ye me utpatsyante kuśalāś cittotpādās tān annuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmiṣyāmīti idam annāgatakauśalyaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:127_0: tad evaṃ caitasikenābhyāsena sarvatyāgādhimuktiṃ paripūrye tyāgacittavegāpannena kāyaprayogeṇotsṛṣṭasarvaparigrahaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:127_1: sarvaparigrahamūlād bhavaduṣkhād vimukto mukta ity ucyate /
SA11sanssr_pu:127_2: annuttarāṃś cāprameyāsaṃkhyeyān kalpān nānākārānantān laukikalokottarān sukhasaṃpatpravarṣān anubhavati /
SA11sanssr_pu:127_3: tena cātmabhāvādinā [doubtful] vaḍiṣāmiṣeneva svayam annabhigatopabhogenāpy ākṛṣya parān api tārayati /
SA11sanssr_pu:128_0: ata evoktaṃ ratnameghe / dānaṃ hi bodhisatvasya bodhir iti //
SA11sanssr_pu:132_0: evam eṣām ātmabhāvādīnām utsṛṣṭānām api rakṣā kāryā / kuto / yasmāt //
SA11sanssr_pu:133_0: paribhogāya satvā nāmātmabhāvādi dīyate / arakṣite kuto bhogaḥ / kiṃ dattaṃ yan na bhujyate //

SA11sanssr_pu:147_0: atha khalu sa māṇavakaḥ sadāpraruditaṃ bodhisatvaṃ mahāsatvam etad avocat /
SA11sanssr_pu:147_1: na mama kulaputra puruṣeṇa kṛtyam api tu khalu punaḥ pitur me yajño yaṣṭavyaḥ /

SA11sanssr_pu:148_1: lābhā me sulabdhāḥ pariniṣpannaṃ cātmānaṃ jāne prajñāpāramitopāyakauśalyeṣu /
SA11sanssr_pu:148_2: yan mayātmanaḥ krāyako labdho hṛdaysya rudhirasya cāsthimajjāyāś ca /
SA11sanssr_pu:149_0: sa hṛṣṭacittaḥ kalyacittaḥ pramuditacittas taṃ māṇavakam etad avocat /
SA11sanssr_pu:149_1: dāsyāmi māṇavaka yena te ita ātmabhāvād arthaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:149_2_0: yāvat sadāprarudito bodhisatvo mahāsatvas tīkṣṇaṃ śastraṃ gṛhītvā dakṣiṇaṃ bāhuṃ viddhvā lohitaṃ nisrāvayati sma dakṣiṇaṃ
SA11sanssr_pu:149_2_1: coruṃ viddhvā nirmāṃsaṃ ca kṛtvāsthi bhettuṃ kuḍyamūlam upasaṃkrāmati /
SA11sanssr_pu:150_0: atha khalv anyatarā śreṣṭhidārikopariprāsādatalagatādrākṣīt sadāpraruditaṃ bodhisatvaṃ yāvat sā śreṣṭhidārikā yena sadāprarudito bodhisatvas tenopasaṃkramyaitad avocat /

SA11sanssr_pu:150_2: yāvat sā dārikā pūjāprayojanaṃ śrutvā punar āha /
SA11sanssr_pu:150_3: kā punas te kulaputra tato guṇajātir niṣpatsyate /
SA11sanssr_pu:150_4: sa tām etad avocat / sa dārike kulaputro mama prajñāpāramitām upāyakauśalyaṃ copadekṣayti /
SA11sanssr_pu:150_5: tatra vayaṃ śikṣiṣyāmas tatra vayaṃ śikṣamāṇāḥ sarvasatvānāṃ pratiśaraṇaṃ bhaviṣyāmaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:151_0: atha khalu sā śreṣṭhidārikā sadāpraruditaṃ bodhisatvam etad avocat /
SA11sanssr_pu:151_1: āścaryaṃ kulaputra / yāvad udārāḥ praṇītāś cāmī tvayā dharmāḥ parikīrttitāḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:151_2: ekaikasyāpi kulaputraivaṃrūpasya dharmasyārthāya gaṅgānadīvālikopamān api kalpān evam ātmabhāvāḥ parityaktavyā bhaveyuḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:151_3: tathodārāḥ praṇītāś cāmī tvayā dharmāḥ parikīrttitāḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:151_4: api tu khalu kulaputra yena yena kṛtyaṃ tat te dāsyāmi suvarṇaṃ vā maṇiṃ vā muktāṃ vā vaiḍūryaṃ vā yāvad yena tvaṃ taṃ dharmodgataṃ bodhisatvaṃ satkariṣyasi /
SA11sanssr_pu:151_5: yāvad vistareṇa tayā dārikayā pañcaśataparivārayā sārddhaṃ tasya dharmodgatasya saṃkramaṇaṃ kartavyaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:152_0: atha khalu dharmodgato bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ utthāyāsanāt svakaṃ gṛhaṃ prāvikṣat /

SA11sanssr_pu:152_6_0: yad vayaṃ dharmodgatasya bodhisatvasya mahāsatvasya dharmāsanaṃ prajñāpayiṣyāmo yatrāsau kulaputro niṣadya dharmaṃ deśayiṣyati
SA11sanssr_pu:152_6_1: taṃ ca pṛthivīpradeśaṃ siktaṃ saṃmṛṣṭaṃ ca kariṣyāmo nānāpuṣpābhikīrṇaṃ iti cintayām āsa /

SA11sanssr_pu:155_0: atha khalu sadāprarudito bodhisatvo mahāsatva iti pratisaṃkhyāya tīkṣṇaṃ śastraṃ gṛhītvā svakāyaṃ samantato viddhvā taṃ pṛthivīpradeśaṃ svarudhireṇa sarvam asiñcat /

SA11sanssr_pu:159_3_0: punar aparaṃ kulaputra ye te dharmabhāṇakā eṣām evaṃrūpāṇāṃ sūtrāntānāṃ deśayitāraḥ pratipattisārāś ca teṣām api dharmabhāṇakānāṃ
SA11sanssr_pu:159_3_1: yat sevanaṃ bhajanaṃ paryupāsanam utthānam upasthānaṃ gauravaṃ citrīkāraḥ śuśrūṣā ārakṣā parigrahaś cīvarapiṇḍapātraśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkāradānaṃ

SA11sanssr_pu:161_1: tasya yā nivāraṇā parirakṣā ekāgrībhāvo damaḥ śama upaśamo vinayo 'yam ucyate saddharmaparigrahaḥ /

SA11sanssr_pu:163_1: kalyāṇamitralakṣaṇaṃ ca / tad etena saddharmaparigraheṇa vinā /
SA11sanssr_pu:163_2: na rakṣā / na śuddhir na vṛddhis [doubtful] tataś ca so 'pi na bodhisatva ity avaśyakāryaḥ saddharmaparigrahaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:164_1: yāny apīmāni bhagavan gaṅgānadīvālikāsamāni bodhisatvapraṇidhānāni tāny ekasmin mahāpraṇidhāne upanikṣiptāny antargatāny anupratiṣṭhāni yad uta saddharmaparigrahe /

SA11sanssr_pu:165_2: evam eva devi mārasya pāpīyasaḥ parītto 'pi saddharmaparigraho vedhanīyo bhavati śokāvahaḥ paridevakaraś ca bhavati /
SA11sanssr_pu:165_3: nāhaṃ devi anyam ekam api dharmaṃ kuśalaṃ samanupaśyāmi mārasya pāpīyasa evaṃ vedhanīyaṃ śokāvahaṃ paridevakaraṃ ca /
SA11sanssr_pu:166_0: punar āha / syād yathāpi nāma devi sumeruḥ parvatarājaḥ sarvān kulaparvatān abhibhavann abhirocate ca samabhirocate coccatvena vipulatvena ca /
SA11sanssr_pu:166_1_0: evam eva devi mahāyānikasya kāyajīvitanirapekṣasya na ca gṛhītacittasya saddharmaparigraho navayānasaṃprasthitānām api kāyajīvitasāpekṣāṇāṃ
SA11sanssr_pu:166_1_1: mahāyānikānāṃ sarvān kuśalān dharmān abhibhavatīty ādi /
SA11sanssr_pu:167_1: parigṛhīto bhavatī jinebhir devebhi nāgebhi ca kinnarebhiḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:169_0: sa śūnyakṣetreṣu na jātu jāyate sarvatra jātau ca jinaṃ sa paśyati /

SA11sanssr_pu:170_0: jātismaro bhavati mahātmadharmā pravrajyalābhī bhavate punaḥ punaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:172_0: lābhī ca bhotī vidudhāraṇīye na naśyate kalpaśatebhi yacchubham /
SA11sanssr_pu:173_0: śakro 'tha brahmā tatha lokapālo manuṣyarājā bhuvi cakravarttī /
SA11sanssr_pu:173_1: sukhena saukhyena sa bodhi budhyate saddharmadhāritva tathāgatānām /

SA11sanssr_pu:175_0: na tasya saṃmuhyati bodhi cittaṃ na coddhuraḥ pāramitā carīṣu /
SA11sanssr_pu:175_1: asaṃgṛhītaḥ kuśalaḥ śatebhiḥ saddharmadhāritva tathāgatānām iti /
SA11sanssr_pu:179_1: rakṣādayas tu vācyāḥ / tatrātmabhāve kā rakṣā yad annarthavivarjanaṃ /

SA11sanssr_pu:183_0: ākrośaparibhāṣāṃś ca duruktavacanāni ca / kṣāntyā tān marṣayiṣyāmaḥ saddharmapratisaṃgrahāt //

SA11sanssr_pu:185_0: evaṃvidhe mahāghore bhikṣurājānakṣobhaṇe / vilopakāle satvānāṃ saddharmaṃ dhārayāmahe //
SA11sanssr_pu:187_0: maitrīṃ teṣu kariṣyāmo ye dharmeṣv apratiṣṭhitāḥ / kāruṇyaṃ ca kariṣyāmo dhārayanta imaṃ nayam //
SA11sanssr_pu:188_0: dṛṣṭvā duḥśīlasatvāṃś ca icchālobhapratiṣṭhitān / aśrupātaṃ kariṣyāmo gatiḥ kāndhasya bhāvitā //
SA11sanssr_pu:189_0: sahasaiva ca taṃ dṛṣṭvā saddharmapratibādhakaṃ / dūrato maitram eṣyāmo mā no ruṣyeta eva hi //
SA11sanssr_pu:190_0: rakṣiṣyāmo yathāśaktyā vācākarmasu saṃvṛtāḥ / sahasainān na vakṣyāmaḥ svapāpe 'smin pratiṣṭhitān //
SA11sanssr_pu:191_0: dānais tathāpi satkāraiḥ paripācyeha tān narān / paścaināṃś codayiṣyāmo bhūtam āpāyagocarān //
SA11sanssr_pu:192_0: gṛhisaṃbhavasaṃtyaktāḥ prāntāraṇyasugocarāḥ / mṛgabhūtā bhaviṣyāmo 'lpārthā alpakṛtyakāḥ // pe //
SA11sanssr_pu:193_0: dāntāḥ śāntāś ca muktāś ca grāme 'sminn avatīrya ca /
SA11sanssr_pu:194_0: sudūram api yāsyāmo dharmakāmān niśamya ca / dharmārāmaratiprāptā arthaṃ karttāsma dehinām //
SA11sanssr_pu:195_0: saṃmukhaṃ tatra saṃdṛśya satvānāṃ skhalitaṃ pṛthu /
SA11sanssr_pu:196_0: asatkṛtāḥ satkṛtā vā merukalpāḥ prabhūya ca / annupaliptā lokena bhesyāmo lokanāyakāḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:197_0: bhikṣūṇāṃ bhinnavṛttānāṃ parivādaṃ niśamya ca / karmasvakā bhavisyāmo maiṣāṃ karma vipacyatām //
SA11sanssr_pu:198_0: badhakān yojayiṣyanti dharmeṣv eṣu hi vartatāṃ / ete dharmā na cāsmākaṃ saṃvidyante kathañcana //
SA11sanssr_pu:199_0: asmākaṃ śramaṇānāṃ hi na ca śrāmaṇakā guṇāḥ / bhūtāṃ codana saṃśrutya idaṃ sūtraṃ pratikṣipan //
SA11sanssr_pu:200_1: codanāṃ bhūtataḥ śrutvā saddharmaṃ te kṣipanti tam /
SA11sanssr_pu:201_1: ceṣṭiṣyante tathā teṣāṃ kaścid dharmam imaṃ śṛṇot /
SA11sanssr_pu:203_0: tasmin kāle vayaṃ kaṣṭe tyaktvā kāyaṃ sajīvitaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:205_0: ācāragocararakṣī asaṃsṛṣṭaḥ śucir bhavet / varjayet saṃstavaṃ nityaṃ rājaputrebhi rājabhiḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:206_0: ye cāpi rājñāṃ puruṣāḥ kuryāt te hi na saṃstavaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:207_0: adhimānīn na seveta [doubtful] vinayec cāgame sthitān /
SA11sanssr_pu:208_0: bhikṣuṇīṃ varjayen nityaṃ hāsyasaṃlāpagocarāṃ / upāsikāś ca varjeyā prakaṭam annavasthitāḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:209_0: strīpaṇḍakāś ca ye satvāḥ saṃstavaṃ tair vivarjayet /
SA11sanssr_pu:209_1: kuleṣu cāpi vadhukāḥ kumāryaś ca vivarjayet /
SA11sanssr_pu:210_0: na tāḥ saṃmodayej jātu kauśalyaṃ sādhu pṛcchitṛṃ [doubtful] /
SA11sanssr_pu:211_0: strīpoṣakāś ca ye satvā varjayet tehi saṃstavaṃ / naṭair jhallakamallebhir ye cānye tādṛśā janāḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:212_0: vāramukhyān na seveta ye cānye bhogavṛttinaḥ / pratisaṃmodanaṃ tebhiḥ sarvaśaḥ parivarjayet //
SA11sanssr_pu:213_0: yadā ca dharmaṃ deśeyā mātṛgrāmasya paṇḍito /
SA11sanssr_pu:213_1: na caikaḥ praviśet tatra nāpi hāsyasthito bhaved iti /
SA11sanssr_pu:214_0: ayaṃ cāparo 'nnartho bhaved yad idaṃ mārakarmoktaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:214_1: māraḥ pāpīyāṃs tasya bodhisatvasyāciraṃ yānasaṃprasthitasyāntike balavattaram udyogam āpatsyate /
SA11sanssr_pu:214_2_0: atraivāha / punar aparam ānanda yasmin samaye bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yogam āpadyate tasmin samaye mārāḥ
SA11sanssr_pu:214_2_1: pāpīyāṃso bodhisatvasya viheṭhanam upasaṃharanti bhayaṃ saṃjanayanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:214_4: apy eva nāmāyaṃ bodhisatvo mahāsatvo 'vanīyeta vā romaharṣo vāsya bhaved iti /
SA11sanssr_pu:214_6: punar aparam anyavijñānasaṃjñino likhiṣyanti yāvat paryavāpsyanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:214_7: na vayam atrāsvādaṃ labhāmahe ity utthāyāsanāt prakramiṣyanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:214_8: evaṃ vijṛmbhamāṇā uccagghanto yāvat paryavāpsyantīti mārakarma /
SA11sanssr_pu:214_11: evaṃ coramanasikārāḥ / evaṃ cīvarādimanasikārāḥ / punar aparaṃ dharmabhāṇakaś chandiko bhaviṣyati imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ lekhayituṃ yāvad vācayitu.
SA11sanssr_pu:214_13: evaṃ viparyayāt / dharmabhāṇakaś ca deśāntaraṃ gantukāmo bhaviṣyati dhārmaśravaṇikāś ca neti neyaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:214_14: evaṃ dharmabhāṇako maheccho bhaviṣyati dhārmaśravaṇiko 'lpeccha iti neyaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:214_15: saṃkṣepād dharmabhāṇakadhārmaśravaṇikayor yā kācid vidhuratā sarvaṃ tan mārakarmety uktaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:216_0: āryasāgaramatisūtre 'py āha / punar aparaṃ bhagavan bodhisatva āraṇyako bhavati prāntaśayyāsanābhirato 'lpecchuḥ saṃtuṣṭaḥ pravivikto 'saṃsṛṣṭo gṛhasthapravrajitaiḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:216_1_0: so 'lpārthatayālpakṛtyatayā ca sukhaṃ viharati na ca bāhaśrutyaparyeṣṭāv abhiyukto bhavati na satvaparipākāya na ca dharmaśravaṇe
SA11sanssr_pu:216_1_1: vā dharmasāṃkathhye vārthaviniścayakathāyāṃ vā vartamānāyāṃ saṃkramitavyaṃ manyate /
SA11sanssr_pu:216_4: tasyāraṇyavāsena caikārāmaratitayā ca kleśā na samudācaranti /
SA11sanssr_pu:216_7: sa tatra nātmārthāya pratipanno bhavati na parārthāya /
SA11sanssr_pu:216_8: ayaṃ bhagavan bodhisatvasyāraṇyavāsapratisaṃyuktaḥ saptamo mārāṅkuśa iti /
SA11sanssr_pu:217_0: punar aparaṃ bhagavan bodhisatvaḥ kalyāṇamitrapratirūpakāṇi pāpamitrāṇi sevate bhajate paryupāste /
SA11sanssr_pu:217_1: ye hy enaṃ saṃgrahavastubhyo vicchandya puṇyasaṃbhārāt saddharmaparigrahād vicchandya praviveke niyojayanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:218_0: yasmiṃś ca samaye bodhisatvo vivekavāsena mahāyāne 'bhyudgacchet tasmin samaye taṃ bodhisatvaṃ vaiyāvṛtyapalibodhe niyojayanti vaiyāvṛtyaṃ bodhisatvenāvaśyaṃ karaṇīyaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:219_0: yasmiṃś ca samaye bodhisatvo vaiyāvṛtye saṃniyojayitavyas tasmin samaye viveke niyojayanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:219_1: evaṃ cainaṃ vadanti / ārabdhavīryasya bodhisatvasya bodhir na kusīdasya /
SA11sanssr_pu:219_2: sacet tvam aṣṭābhir navabhir vā kalpair annuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ nābhisaṃbhotsyase /
SA11sanssr_pu:219_3: na bhūyaḥ śakyasy annuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃboddhum /
SA11sanssr_pu:219_4: tatra bhagavan / bodhisatvo 'tyārabdhena vīryeṇa sthānaṃ khalu punar etad vidyate yan nirvāṇaphalaṃ prāpnuyād /
SA11sanssr_pu:219_5: ayaṃ bhagavan / bodhisatvasya kalyāṇamitrapratirūpakeṇa daśamo mārāṅkuśaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:220_0: ye 'pi tato 'nye bodhisatvayānīyāḥ pudgalā mārāṅkuśāviddhāḥ pratyaveteṣu dharmeṣu caranti taiḥ sārddhaṃ ratiṃ vindati /
SA11sanssr_pu:220_1: tathā hi tadanuvarttakā bhavanti sa hīnasevī viśeṣam annadhigato hīnagatiṃ gacchati yad uta dhanvagatiṃ jaḍaiḍamūkagatiṃ yāvad ekādaśo mārāṅkuśa iti /
SA11sanssr_pu:221_0: yena caivaṃ saṃtatyārabdhavīryasya nirvedāt sarvathā bodhisatvabhāva eva bhavaty ata eva ratnameghe 'bhihitaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:221_2: tathā cārabhate yathā na kāyakhedaṃ saṃjanayati /
SA11sanssr_pu:221_3: na cittakhed.am / idam ucyate bodhisatvasya sāṃtatyavīryam iti /
SA11sanssr_pu:221_4: kīdṛśaṃ tad vīryaṃ / yena khedo bhavati / yad idam alpabalasya gurukarmārambho 'tivelāyāṃ vāparipakvādhimukter vā duṣkarakarmārambhas tad yathā svamāṃsadānādiḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:221_6: anyathā hi teṣām eva satvānāṃ bodhisatvakhedena bodhicittavījanāśān mahataḥ phalarāśer nāśaḥ syāt /
SA11sanssr_pu:222_2: nāpy akāla ity ātmabhāvatyāgacittam eva notpādyābhyāsānārambhād dhi na kadācid dadyāt /
SA11sanssr_pu:222_3: tasmād evaṃ smṛtim upāsthāpya bodhicittaparipācanavirodhibhyo mohāt svārthaghātibhyaḥ piśitāśanebhyaḥ karmakāribhyaś cātmabhāvo rakṣitavyaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:225_1: kathaṃ ca kulaputrātra bodhisatvo mārakarmaparihāropāyakuśalo bhavati /
SA11sanssr_pu:225_3: apratirūpadeśavāsaṃ lokāyatamantrasevanabhāvanāṃ lābhasatkārapūjopasthānabahumānaṃ sarveṇa sarvaṃ parivarjayati /
SA11sanssr_pu:225_4: ye cānye upakleśā bodhipakṣyamārgāntarāyikās tān sarveṇa sarvaṃ parivarjayati /
SA11sanssr_pu:226_7: tena ca kulaputraitāni sthānāni parivarjayatā na teṣāṃ pudgalānām antike duṣṭacittam utpādayitavyaṃ na pratighacittaṃ nāvamanyanācittam utpādayitavyam /
SA11sanssr_pu:226_9: uktaṃ hi bhagavatā dhātuśaḥ satvāḥ kāmādidhātuṃ āsravanti jāyante saṃsyandante saṃsargāc ca vinaśyanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:227_0: bodhicittasaṃpramoṣo 'py annarthaḥ tasya ca hetur ukto ratnakūṭe /
SA11sanssr_pu:227_1: caturbhiḥ kāśyapa dharmaiḥ samanvāgatasya bodhisatvasya bodhicittaṃ muhyati /
SA11sanssr_pu:227_2: katamaiś caturbhiḥ / ācāryagurudakṣiṇīyavisaṃvādanatayā pareṣām akaukṛtye kaukṛtyopasaṃharaṇatayā /
SA11sanssr_pu:227_3: mahāyānasaṃprasthitānāṃ ca satvānām avarṇāyaśo 'kīrtyalokaniścāraṇatayā māyāśāṭhyena ca param upacarati nādhyāyāśayeneti asya vivarjanam atroktaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:227_4: caturbhiḥ kāśyapa dharmaiḥ samanvāgatasya bodhisatvasya sarvāsu jātiṣu jātamātrasya bodhicittam āmukhībhavati /
SA11sanssr_pu:227_6: katamaiś caturbhiḥ / yad uta jīvitahetor api saṃprajānan mṛṣāvādaṃ na prabhāṣate /
SA11sanssr_pu:227_7: antaśo hāsyaprekṣikayāpi / adhyāśayena ca sarvasatvānām antike tiṣṭhaty apagatamāyāśāṭhyatayā sarvabodhisatveṣu ca śāstṛsaṃjñām utpādayati /
SA11sanssr_pu:227_9: yāṃś ca satvān paripācayati tān sarvān annuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau samādāpayati /
SA11sanssr_pu:228_0: siṃhaparipṛcchāyām apy āha / na jātu dharmadānasya antarāyaṃ karoti yaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:230_0: tathātraiva / bodhicittaṃ na riñcati tena sarvāsu jātiṣu /
SA11sanssr_pu:230_1: svapnāntare 'pi taccittaṃ kiṃ punar yadi jāgrataḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:231_0: āha / yeṣu viratisthāneṣu grāmeṣu nagareṣu vā / samādāyeti bodhāya tena cittaṃ na riñcati //
SA11sanssr_pu:232_1: caturbhir dharmaiḥ samanvāgato bodhisatvaḥ praṇidhānān na calati /
SA11sanssr_pu:233_0: nihatamānaś ca bhavatīrṣyamātsaryaparivarjakaś ca bhavati parasaṃpadaṃ ca dṛṣṭvā āttamanā bhavatīti /
SA11sanssr_pu:233_1: idam eva pātrabodhicittasya sphuṭataram asaṃpramoṣakāraṇaṃ yat tatraiva ratnakūṭe 'bhihitam /
SA11sanssr_pu:234_1: ārocayāmi prativedayāmi vo yathā yathā bahulu vitarkayen naraḥ tathā tathā bhavati tannimnacittaḥ tehī vitarkehi tanniśritehīti /
SA11sanssr_pu:235_0: avasādo 'py annartha etadvarjanaṃ ca ratnameghe dṛṣṭaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:235_3: idaṃ ca me vīryaṃ parīttaṃ ca kusīdo 'haṃ bodhiś cādīptaśiraścailopamena bahūn kalpān /
SA11sanssr_pu:235_5: tan nāham utsahae īdṛśaṃ bhāram udvoḍhuṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:236_1: ye 'pi te 'bhisaṃbuddhās tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā ye cābhisaṃbuddhyante ye vābhisaṃbhotsyante 'pīdṛśenaiva nayena īdṛśyā pratipadā /
SA11sanssr_pu:236_4: aham api tathā tathā ghaṭiṣye tathā tathā vyāyaṃsye sarvasatvasādhāraṇena vīryeṇa sarvasatvārambaṇena vīryeṇa yathāham annuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyae iti /
SA11sanssr_pu:237_1: aparipāciteṣu satveṣu viśvāso bodhisatvasya skhalitaṃ abhājanībhūteṣu satveṣūdārabuddhadharmasaṃprakāśanāt bodhisatvasya skhalitaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:238_0: udārādhimuktikeṣu satveṣu hīnayānasaṃprakāśanād bodhisatvasya skhalitam iti /
SA11sanssr_pu:238_1: samyaksmṛtyupasthiteṣu śīlavatsu kalyāṇadharmeṣu prativimānanā duḥśīlapāpadharmasaṃgrahā bodhisatvasya skhalitam iti /
SA11sanssr_pu:239_0: annadhimuktir apy annarthaḥ / yathoktaṃ rāṣṭrapālasūtre / yasya adhimukti na vidyati buddhadharmagaṇe ca na tasya dhimuktiḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:239_1: śikṣavrateṣu na tasya dhimuktiḥ pāpamates tirapāyamukhasya /
SA11sanssr_pu:240_0: sa itaś cyuto manujeṣu karmavaśād abudho hi vimūḍhaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:240_1: narakeṣv atha tiryagatīṣu pretagatīṣu ca vindati duṣkham /
SA11sanssr_pu:241_2: tatra tathāgata eva sākṣīti kṛtvā na pratikṣipati /
SA11sanssr_pu:241_3: tathāgata eva janīte / nāhaṃ jāne / annantā buddhabodhir nānādhimuktikatayā tathāgatānāṃ satveṣu dharmadeśanā pravarttatae iti /
SA11sanssr_pu:242_2: tathāgatapūjāyāṃ ca vaiyāvṛtyam upadiṣṭaṃ tatra yā vṛttiḥ sā ratnarāśisūtrād āgatā /
SA11sanssr_pu:242_3: tatra vaiyāvṛtyakareṇa bhikṣuṇā sarvabhikṣusaṃghasya cittam abhirādhayitavyaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:242_4: tatra ye bhikṣava āraṇyakāḥ prāntaśayyāsanikās teṣāṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:242_5: vaiyāvṛtyakareṇa bhikṣuṇā sarveṇa sarvaṃ na karmasamutthānaṃ dātavyaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:242_6: yadi punar āraṇyakasya bhikṣoḥ saṃghaparyāpannaṃ śaikṣakaṃ karma prāpnuyāt /
SA11sanssr_pu:242_8_0: anyataro vā bhikṣur adhyeṣyo na punaḥ sa āraṇyako bhikṣur utpīḍayitavyas tatra yo bhikṣuḥ piṇḍacāriko bhavati tasya tena
SA11sanssr_pu:242_9: tatra kāśyapa yo bhikṣur yogācārī bhavati /
SA11sanssr_pu:242_10: tasya tena vaiyāvṛtyakareṇa bhikṣuṇānulomikāny upakaraṇāny upasaṃhartavyāni glānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārāś ca /
SA11sanssr_pu:242_11: yasmiṃś ca pradeśe sa yogācārī bhikṣuḥ prativasati tasmin pradeśe na uccaśabdaḥ kartavyaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:242_14: praṇītāni ca saṃpriyāṇi yogācārabhūmyanukūlāni khādanīyabhojanīyāny upanāmayitavyāni /
SA11sanssr_pu:243_0: ye bhikṣavo bāhuśrutye 'bhiyuktā bhavanti teṣām utsāho dātavyaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:243_5: sāṃkathyamaṇḍalaṃ viśodhayitavyaṃ yāvat sādhukārabahulena cāsya bhavitavyaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:244_1: kiyat parīttam api kāryaṃ saṃghamatena kartavyaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:244_2: na svamatena yāvan na sāṃghikaś cāturdiśasāṃghikena saṃsṛṣṭaḥ kartavyaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:244_4: yadi cāturdiśe saṃghe vaikalyaṃ bhavet sāṃghikaś ca lābha utsado bhavet tena vaiyāvṛtyakareṇa bhikṣuṇā bhikṣusaṃgham ekamānasaṃ kṛtvā /
SA11sanssr_pu:244_6: evaṃ stūpe 'pi pralugne 'yam eva vidhir dāyakān dānapatīn vā samādāpya pratisaṃskartavya ity ājñā /
SA11sanssr_pu:244_7: yadi punaḥ kāśyapa kiyad bahur api staupiko lābho bhavet /
SA11sanssr_pu:244_8: sa vaiyākṛtyakareṇa na saṃghena cāturdiśasaṃghe upanāmayitavyaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:244_9: tat kasmād dhetoḥ / yā staupikā antaśa ekadaśāpi śrāddhaiḥ prasādabahulair niryātitā bhavati /
SA11sanssr_pu:244_11: kaḥ punar vādo ratnaṃ vā ratnasaṃmataṃ vā yac ca stūpe cīvaraṃ niryātitaṃ bhavati /
SA11sanssr_pu:244_12: tat tatraiva tathāgatacaitye vātātapavṛṣṭibhiḥ parikṣayaṃ gacchatu /
SA11sanssr_pu:244_13: na punaḥ staupikaṃ cīvaraṃ hiraṇyamūlyena parivartayitavyaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:244_14_0: na hi staupikasya kaścid argho nāpi stūpasya kenacid vaikalyaṃ yo hi kaścit kāśyapa vaiyāvṛtyakaro bhikṣū ruṣṭacittaḥ śīlavatāṃ
SA11sanssr_pu:244_14_1: dakṣiṇīyānām [doubtful] aiśvaryād ājñaptiṃ dadāti sa tenākuśalena karmaṇā narakagāmī bhavatīti /
SA11sanssr_pu:244_15: yadi manuṣyalokam āgacchati dāso bhavati parakarmakaro lābhī ca bhavati khaṭacapeṭapracaṇḍaprahārāṇāṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:244_16: pe / daṇḍakarmabhayatarjitaṃ bhikṣuṃ karoty akālapreṣaṇam akālajñaptiṃ dadāti /
SA11sanssr_pu:244_17: sa tenākuśalena karmaṇā bahuśaṅkur nāma pratyekanarakas tatrāsyopapattir bhavati /
SA11sanssr_pu:244_19: ādīptaḥ / pradīptaḥ saṃprajvalitaḥ / pe / yojanaśatavistārapramāṇā jihvā bhavati /
SA11sanssr_pu:244_20: tasya tatra jihvendriye bahūni śaṅkuśatasahasrāṇi ādīptāni ayomayāni nikhātāni bhavanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:244_21: yo hi kaścit kāśyapa vaiyavṛtyakaro bhikṣur āgatāgataṃ sāṃghikaṃ lābhaṃ sannidhiṃ karoti na kālānukālaṃ dadāti /
SA11sanssr_pu:244_23: keṣāñcin na dadāti / sa tenākuśalamūlena jaṅghā nāma gūthamṛtikāpretayonis tatrāsyopapattir bhavati /
SA11sanssr_pu:244_25: sa udvaśyamānas tadbhojanam animiṣābhyāṃ netrābhyāṃ paśyamānaḥ kṣutpipāsāparigato duṣkhāṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:244_26: vedanāṃ vetti na ca varṣasahasreṇāpi tasya bhojanasya lābhī bhavati /
SA11sanssr_pu:244_27: yad api kadācit karhicid bhojanaṃ labdhaṃ bhavati tad uccāraṃ bhavati pūyaśoṇitaṃ veti /
SA11sanssr_pu:245_1: yāṃs tvaṃ saṃgharakṣita satvān adrākṣīḥ kuḍyākārāṃs te bhikṣava āsan /
SA11sanssr_pu:245_4: yāṃs tvaṃ saṃgharakṣita satvān adrākṣīḥ stambhākārāṃs te bhikṣava āsan /
SA11sanssr_pu:245_7: yāṃs tvaṃ satvān adrākṣīr vṛkṣākārān patrākārān phalākārān te 'pi bhikṣava āsan /
SA11sanssr_pu:245_9: paphalāni paudgalikaparibhogena paribhuktāni tena te vṛkṣapatrapuṣpaphalākārāḥ saṃvṛttāḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:245_10: yāṃs tvaṃ satvān adrākṣī rajjvākārān saṃmārjanyākārāṃs te bhikṣava āsan /
SA11sanssr_pu:245_11: taiḥ sāṃghikā rajjusammārjanyaḥ paudgalikaparibhogena paribhuktās tena rajjvākārāḥ sammārjanyākārāś ca saṃvṛttāḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:245_12: yaṃ tvaṃ satvam adrākṣīs taṭṭākāraṃ sa śrāmaṇeraka āsīt /
SA11sanssr_pu:245_13: sa taṭṭukaṃ nirmādayati / āgantukāś ca bhikṣavo 'bhyāgatāḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:245_14: tair asau dṛṣṭaś ca pṛṣṭaś ca śrāmaṇeraka kim ayaṃ saṃghasya pānakaṃ bhaviṣyati /
SA11sanssr_pu:245_16: kiṃ na paśyatha taṭṭukaṃ nirmāditaṃ pītaṃ pānakam iti /
SA11sanssr_pu:245_17: te vṛttā veleti nairāśyam āpannā hīnadīnavadanāḥ prakrāntāḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:245_18: sa tasya karmaṇo vipākena taṭṭukākāraḥ saṃvṛttāḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:246_0: yaṃ tvam satvam adrākṣīr udūkhalākāraṃ so 'pi bhikṣur āsīt /
SA11sanssr_pu:246_3: sa tenoktaḥ śrāmaṇeraka dadasva me khalistākaṃ kuṭṭayitveti /
SA11sanssr_pu:246_4: sa kathayati / sthavira tiṣṭha tāvan muhūrtaṃ vyagro 'smi paścāt kuṭṭayitvā dāsyāmīti /
SA11sanssr_pu:246_5: sa saṃjātāmarṣaḥ kathayati / śrāmaṇeraka yadi mama kalpate udūkhalaṃ spraṣṭuṃ tvām evāham udūkhale prakṣipya kuṭṭayeyaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:246_6: prāg eva khalistokam iti / sa śrāmaṇeraḥ saṃlakṣayati / tīvraparyavasthānaparyavasthito 'yaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:246_7: yady aham asmai prativacanaṃ dāsyāmi bhūyasyā mātrayā prakopam āpatsyatīti tūṣṇīm avasthitaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:246_10: sa kathayati / jāne tvāṃ kāśyapasya samyaksaṃbuddhasya pravrajitaṃ śrāmaṇerakaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:246_11: aham api bhikṣuḥ sthaviraḥ / śrāmaṇerakaḥ kathayati / yady apy evaṃ tathāpi tu yan mayā pravrajitena karaṇīyaṃ tat kṛtaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:246_14: atyayam atyayato deśaya / apy eva nāma etat karmaparikṣayaṃ tanutvaṃ paryādānaṃ gacched iti /
SA11sanssr_pu:246_15: tenātyayam atyayato na deśitaṃ tena karmaṇodūkhalākāraḥ saṃvṛttaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:247_2: te bhaiṣajyāni kvāthayanto bhikṣubhir apriyam uktāḥ taiś cittaṃ pradūṣya sthālyo bhinnāḥ tena sthālyākārāḥ saṃvṛttāḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:247_3: yaṃ tvaṃ satvam adrākṣīr madhye chinnaṃ tantunā dhāryamāṇaṃ so 'pi bhikṣur āsīl lābhī grāhikaḥ tena mātsaryābhibhūtena lābhaḥ saṃparivartitaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:247_5: yas tu haimantikaḥ sa vārṣikaḥ pariṇāmitaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:247_6: tasya karmaṇo vipākena madhye chinnas tantunā dhāryamāṇo gacchati /
SA11sanssr_pu:250_3: yābhir mūlāpattibhiḥ kṣatriyo mūrddhābhiṣiktaḥ sarvāṇi pūrvāvaropitāni kuśalamūlāni jhāṣayati /
SA11sanssr_pu:250_5: katamāḥ pañca / yaḥ kulaputra mūrddhābhiṣiktaṃ staupikaṃ vastv apaharati sāṃghikaṃ vā cāturdiśasāṃghikaṃ vā niryātitaṃ vā /
SA11sanssr_pu:251_0: yaḥ punar dharmaṃ pratikṣipati śrāvakaniryāṇabhāṣitaṃ vā pratyekabuddhaniryāṇabhāṣitaṃ vā mahāyānaniryāṇabhāṣitaṃ vā pratikṣipati pratiṣedhayatīyaṃ dvitīyā mūlāpattiḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:252_0: yaḥ punar mām uddiśya śirastuṇḍamuṇḍakāṣāyavastraprāvṛtaḥ śikṣādhārī vā śikṣādhārī vā tasya duḥśīlasya vā śīlavato vā kāṣāyāṇi vastrāṇy apaharati apaharāyati /
SA11sanssr_pu:252_1: gṛhasthaṃ vā karoti kāye daṇḍaiḥ praharati cārake vā prakṣipati jīvitena vā viyojayatīyaṃ tṛtīyā mūlāpattiḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:253_0_0: yaḥ punaḥ kṣatriyaḥ saṃcintya mātaraṃ jīvitād vyaparopayati pitaram arhantaṃ bhagavacchrāvakaṃ vā jīvitād vyaparopayati samagraṃ
SA11sanssr_pu:253_0_1: vā saṃghaṃ bhinatti tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya saṃcintya duṣṭacitto rudhiram utpādayati /
SA11sanssr_pu:254_0: ebhiḥ pañcabhir ānantaryair karmabhir anyatarānyataraṃ karmotpādayatīyaṃ caturthī mūlāpattiḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:255_1: daśākuśalān karmapathān samādāya vartate 'nyāṃś ca bahūn satvān daśasv akuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu samādāpayati vinayati niveśayati pratiṣṭhāpayatīyaṃ pañcamī mūlāpattiḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:256_0: yaḥ punar grāmabhedaṃ janapadabhedaṃ nagarabhedaṃ rāṣṭrabhedaṃ karotīyaṃ mūlāpattiḥ // pe //
SA11sanssr_pu:257_0: ādikarmiṇāṃ mahāyānasaṃprasthitānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṝṇāṃ vāṣṭau mūlāpattayo /
SA11sanssr_pu:257_1: yābhir mūlāpattibhiḥ skhalitā ādikarmikā mahāyānasaṃprasthitāḥ sarvāṇi pūrvāvaropitāni kuśalamūlāni jhāṣayanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:257_2: vastupatitāḥ parājitā devamanuṣyamahāyānamukhād apāyagāmino bhavanti ciraṃ ca saṃsāre sīdanti kalyāṇamitravirahitāḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:257_3: katamā aṣṭau / ye satvāḥ pūrvaduścaritahetunāsmin kliṣṭe pañcakaṣāye loke upapannās tae itvarakuśalamūlāḥ kalyāṇamitraṃ saṃniḥśrityedaṃ paramaṃ gambhīraṃ mahāyānaṃ śṛṇvanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:257_4: te ca parīttabuddhayo 'pi kulaputrā annuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittam utpādayanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:257_5: teṣāṃ ādikarmikā ye ca bodhisatvā idaṃ paramagambhīraṃ śūnyatāpratisaṃyuktaṃ sūtrāntaṃ śṛṇvanti uddiśanti paṭhanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:257_6: te yathāśrutaṃ yathāparyavāptaṃ pareṣāṃ pūrvabuddhisadṛśānāṃ svarthaṃ suvyañjanaṃ vistareṇāgrataḥ smārayanti prakāśayanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:257_7: te hy akṛtaśamā bālāḥ pṛthagjanāḥ śṛṇvanta uttrasyanti saṃtrasyanti saṃtrāsam āpadyante /
SA11sanssr_pu:257_8: te saṃtrāsena vivarttayanty annuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheś cittaṃ śrāvakayāne cittaṃ praṇidadhati /
SA11sanssr_pu:258_0: yayā mūlāpattyā sa kulaputraḥ sarvaṃ pūrvāvaropitaṃ kuśalamūlaṃ jhāṣayati /
SA11sanssr_pu:258_3: tasmād bodhisatvena mahāsatvena parapudgalānām āśayānuśayaṃ prathamaṃ jñātvā yathāśayānāṃ satvānām anupūrveṇa dharmadeśanā kartavyā /
SA11sanssr_pu:259_0: punar aparam ādikarmiko bodhisatvaḥ kasyacid eva vakṣyati //
SA11sanssr_pu:260_0: na tvaṃ śakyasi ṣaṭpāramitāsu caryāṃ cartuṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:260_1: na tvaṃ śakyasy annuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃboddhuṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:260_2: śīghraṃ tvaṃ śrāvakayāne pratyekabuddhayāne vā cittam utpādaya /
SA11sanssr_pu:260_4: yāvad yathāpūrvoktam iyam ādikarmikasya bodhisatvasya dvidyā mūlāpattiḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:261_0: punar aparam ādikarmiko bodhisatvaḥ kasyacid evaṃ vakṣyati /
SA11sanssr_pu:261_2: śīlena surakṣitena śīghraṃ tvam annuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittam utpādayasva /
SA11sanssr_pu:261_3: mahāyānaṃ paṭha / yat te kiñcit kāyavāṅmanobhiḥ kleśapratyayād akuśalaṃ karma samudānītaṃ tena pāṭhena śuddhir bhavaty avipākaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:261_4: yāvad yathāpūrvoktam ayam ādikarmikasya bodhisatvasya tṛtīyā mūlāpattiḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:262_0: punar aparaṃ kulaputra keṣāñcid ādikarmiko bodhisatva evaṃ vakṣyati /
SA11sanssr_pu:262_2: mā śṛṇuta mā paṭhata mā pareṣām upadiśata /
SA11sanssr_pu:262_3: gopayata śrāvakayānakathāṃ / na yūyaṃ tasmāt mahat phalaṃ prāpsyatha /
SA11sanssr_pu:262_4: na yūyaṃ tato nidānāc chaktāḥ kleśāntaṃ kartuṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:262_5: śraddadhata mahāyānakathāṃ / śṛṇuta mahāyānaṃ paṭhata mahāyānaṃ pareṣāṃ copadiśata /
SA11sanssr_pu:263_0: yadi te tasya vacanakāriṇo bhavantīdṛśaṃ dṛṣṭigatam upagṛhṇīyuḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:263_1: ubhayor api mūlāpatir bhavatīyam ādikarmikasya bodhisatvasya caturthī mūlāpattiḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:264_0: punar aparam ādikarmikā bodhisatvā dvijihvikā bhavanti anyathā nidarśayanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:264_1: idaṃ ca mahāyānaṃ kīrtiśabdaślokārthaṃ lābhasatkārahetoḥ paṭhanti svādhyāyanti dhārayanti vācayanti deśayanti pareṣāṃ ca śrutamātram upadiśanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:264_2_0: evaṃ ca vakṣyanti / vayaṃ mahāyānikā nānye / te pareṣām īrṣyāyanti lābhasatkārahetor yatas te labhante upabhogaparibhogān
SA11sanssr_pu:264_2_1: parebhyas tatpratyayāt te prakupyanti teṣāṃ cāvarṇaṃ niścārayanti kutsanti paṃsayanti vijugupsanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:264_4: atas te īrṣyahetunā cottarimanuṣyadharmair ātmānaṃ vijñapayanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:264_5: tatas te tena vastunā patitāḥ parājitā mahāyānasukhād etāṃ mahāgurukām āpattim āpadyante yayāpāyagāmino bhavanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:264_6: yathā kaścit puruṣo ratnadvīpaṃ gacched gantuṃ nāvā samudram avatarate sa mahāsamudre svayam eva tāṃ nāvaṃ bhindyāt tatraiva maraṇaṃ nigacched /
SA11sanssr_pu:264_7: evam eva ye ādikarmikā bodhisatvā mahāguṇasāgaram avatartukāmā īrṣyāhetos tad vadanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:264_8: tatpratyayāt te śraddhānāvaṃ bhittvā prajñājīvitena viyogaṃ prāpnuvanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:264_9: evaṃ te bālā ādikarmikā bodhisatvā īrṣyāhetor annṛtapratyayā mahāgurukām āpattim āpadyante /
SA11sanssr_pu:265_0_0: punar aparaṃ kulaputra bhaviṣyanty annāgate 'dhvani gṛhasthapravrajitā ādikarmikā bodhisatvā ye te gambhīrāḥ śūnyatāpratisaṃyuktāḥ
SA11sanssr_pu:265_0_1: sūtrāntādhāraṇīkṣāntisamādhibhūmisvalaṃkṛtamahāvidvatpuruṣāṇāṃ kṛtaśramāṇāṃ bodhisatvānāṃ gocarās tān mahāyānasūtrāntān dhārayanti
SA11sanssr_pu:265_0_2: paṭhanti svādhyāyanti pareṣāṃ ca vistareṇa vācayitvā prakāśayanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:265_1: ahaṃ cemān dharmān svabuddhyā buddhvaivaṃ ca punar ahaṃ kāruṇyahetos tavopadiśāmi /
SA11sanssr_pu:265_2: tvayā vā punas tathā bhāvayitavyaṃ yathā tvam atra gambhīreṣu dharmeṣu pratyakṣo bhaviṣyasi /
SA11sanssr_pu:265_3: evaṃ te jñānadarśanaṃ bhaviṣyati yathā mama /
SA11sanssr_pu:265_4: etarhi na punar eva dadāti paṭhitamātreṇāham imān evaṃrūpān dharmān gambhīragambhīrān upadiśāmi na sākṣātkriyayā /
SA11sanssr_pu:266_1: tatpratyayāt sarvatryadhvagatānām arhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ bodhisatvānām āryapudgalānāṃ ca purataḥ sāparādhiko bhavati /
SA11sanssr_pu:267_0: tad yathā kaścit puruṣo mahāṭavīṃ prasthitaḥ kṣuttarṣaprapīḍitaḥ sa tatra mahāphalavṛkṣe pratiṣṭhitaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:267_1: āhārārthaṃ sa udāraphalavṛkṣam apahāya gandhasaṃpannaṃ rasasaṃpannam annāsvādya viṣavṛkṣam abhiruhya viṣaphalāni bhuñjīta bhuktvā ca kālaṃ kuryāt /
SA11sanssr_pu:267_3_0: ye durlabhaṃ manuṣyalābhaṃ labdhvā kalyāṇamitraṃ sanniśritya mahāyānam avatartukāmā lābhasatkārayaśohetor ātmānam upadarśayanti
SA11sanssr_pu:267_3_1: parān paṃsayanti evaṃrūpāṃ mahāgurukām āpattim āpadyante yayā gurukayāpattyā sarvavijñānāṃ paramajugupsitā bhavanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:267_4: apāyagāminas tathārūpāś ca pudgalā na sevanīyāḥ sarvakṣatriyabrāhmaṇaviṭśūdrāṇāṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:267_5: yaś ca tān sevate sa sātisāro bhavati sarvavijñānāṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:268_0: punar aparaṃ kulaputra bhaviṣyanty annāgate 'dhvani kṣatriyāṇāṃ purohitacaṇḍālā amātyacaṇḍālā bhaṭacaṇḍālā mūrkhāḥ paṇḍitamānino mahādhanā mahābhogāḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:268_1: bahuvidheṣu dānamayapuṇyakriyāvastuṣu saṃdṛśyante te tyāgamadamattā mānamadadarpeṇa kṣatriyaṃ vibhedayanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:268_2: śramaṇān kṣatriyaiḥ / te kṣatriyān niśritya śramaṇān daṇḍāpayanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:268_3: arthaṃ daṇḍena muṣanti / tenopadraveṇa te bhikṣavaḥ paudgalikaṃ vā sāṃghikaṃ vā cāturdiśasāṃghikaṃ vā staupikaṃ vā śramaṇair apahṛtya teṣāṃ prāhṛtaṃ pradāpyante /
SA11sanssr_pu:268_6: ye kṣatriyacaṇḍālāḥ śramaṇaiḥ sārddhaṃ praduṣyanti tathārūpaṃ ca te dharmaṃ prajñapayiṣyanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:268_9: mahākaruṇānetrīprajñāpāramitaśikṣopāyakauśalyaśikṣāḥ yāś cāpareṣu sūtreṣu śikṣā upadiṣṭās tā apahāya /
SA11sanssr_pu:268_10: tathārūpāṃ dharmayuktiṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ viheṭhanārthapūrvakaṃ kriyākāraṃ prajñapayanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:268_14: tena ca hetunā bhikṣūṇām apy upaśāntāḥ kleśā nopaśamyanti na tanūbhavanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:268_15: tatkāle punas te bhikṣava āśayavipannā bhavanti śīlavipannāś ca bhavanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:268_16: ācāravipannā bhavanti dṛṣṭivipannā bhavanti taddhetoḥ śaithilikā bhavanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:268_17: bāhulikā bhavanti / aśramaṇāḥ śramaṇapratijñāḥ / abrahmacāriṇo brahmacāripratijñāḥ śaṅkhasvarasamācārāḥ praṣṭavyadharmadeśakāḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:268_18: te bhūyasyā mātrayā saparicārasya kṣatriyasya satkṛtā bhavanti mānitāḥ pūjitā bhavanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:268_19: te ca prahāṇābhiyuktānāṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ gṛhastheṣv avarṇaṃ niścārayanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:268_20: sa ca kṣatriyaḥ saparivāraḥ prahāṇābhiyuktānāṃ bhikṣūṇām antike praduṣyati avadhyāyati /
SA11sanssr_pu:268_21: yas tatra prahāṇikānāṃ bhikṣūṇām upabhogaparibhogas taṃ svādhyāyābhiratānāṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ niryātayanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:271_1: yadi te bodhisatvā ākāśagarbhasya bodhisatvasya nāma śrutvā darśanam asyākāṅkṣeran /
SA11sanssr_pu:271_3_0: yadi te ākāśagarbhaṃ bodhisatvaṃ namaḥkuryuḥ nāma cāsya parikīrttayeyus teṣāṃ sa kulaputro yathā bhāgyatayā svarūpeṇāgratas
SA11sanssr_pu:271_3_1: tiṣṭhati brāhmaṇarūpeṇa yāvad dārikārūpeṇa purataḥ sthāsyati /
SA11sanssr_pu:271_4: tasyādikarmikasya bodhisatvasya yathā samutthitās tā āpattīḥ pratideśayati /
SA11sanssr_pu:272_0: yadi teṣāṃ saṃmukhaṃ darśanaṃ na dadāti /
SA11sanssr_pu:272_1: yas tam abhiyācati / tenādikarmikeṇa bodhisatvena sāparādhena paścime yāme utthāyāsanāt prāṅmukhena sthitvā dhūpaṃ dhūpayitavyaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:272_3: evaṃ ca vaktavyaṃ / aruṇa aruṇa mahākṛpa mahābhāga mahoditas tvaṃ jambudvīpe māṃ karuṇayāchādayasva /
SA11sanssr_pu:272_4: śīghram ākāśagarbhaṃ mahākāruṇikaṃ mama vacanena bodhaya /

SA11sanssr_pu:301_8: tasyaivaṃ bhayaviklavavadanasya karacaraṇasarvāṅgapratyaṅgapravilīyamānasya sa pradeśaḥ śvabhraprapāto nāma prādurbhavati /

SA11sanssr_pu:304_0: kāmamithyācāram adhikṛtyāha / eṣa sa pāpakartā tasmāc chastrasaṅkaṭān muktaḥ kathamapy aṅgārakarṣūr laṅghayitvā karmaṇā bhrāmitaḥ pradeśam anyaṃ prapadyate /
SA11sanssr_pu:304_1: vitathadarśanaṃ nāma tatra karmakṛtāṃ striyaṃ paśyati yā tena pūrvaṃ naṣṭasmṛtinā dṛṣṭā /

SA11sanssr_pu:304_5: tābhir asau gṛhyate / gṛhītvā cauṣṭhāt prabhṛti tathā bhujyate yathāsya sarṣapaphalamātrapramāṇam api nāvaśiṣṭaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:304_6: tasmiñ śarīre bhavati / punar api saṃbhavati / punar api bhujyate / sa kaṭukāṃ kharāṃ vedanām anubhavaṃs tasmād rāgāgner na nivartate /
SA11sanssr_pu:304_7: yena tā striyas tena bhūyaḥ saḥ saṃdhāvati /
SA11sanssr_pu:304_8: na cāsya tatpīḍā tathā bādhate yathā rāgāgniḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:304_9: atha tā striyo bhūyo vajramayāyomayaprajvalitagātrās taṃ manuṣyam ādāya jvālāmālākulasarvaśarīrās taṃ nārakeyaṃ siktāmuṣṭivad bhindanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:305_1: strīvidheyā narā ye tu kutas teṣāṃ bhavet sukham /
SA11sanssr_pu:306_0: yāvat / strī vināśo vināśānām iha loke paratra ca /
SA11sanssr_pu:306_1: tasmāt striyo vivarjyāḥ syur yadīcchet sukham ātmana iti /
SA11sanssr_pu:307_0: mṛṣāvādam adhikatyāha / sa tair yamapuruṣair gṛhyate gṛhītvā ca tanmukhaṃ vidārayanti tasmāj jihvām apakarṣayanti /

SA11sanssr_pu:307_2: tasya mṛṣāvādasya balena tasyāś ca sahanirgamanakāle te yamapuruṣā bhūmāv ānāhayanti pradīptāyomayyāṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:307_3: karmakṛtaṃ ca halasahasraṃ prādurbhavati pradīptāgrasaṃyuktaṃ balavadbhir balīvardais tad asyāntargataṃ jihvāyāṃ vahati /
SA11sanssr_pu:308_0: sā ca jihvā tathā sukumārā yathā devānām akṣi //
SA11sanssr_pu:309_0: yāvat sa vedanātas tanati krandati vikrośati na cāsya tadduḥkhaṃ kaścid apanayatīti vistaraḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:309_1: tasyaivaṃ pracaṇḍām vedanām anubhavato 'nnekāni varṣaśatasahasrāṇi sā ca jihvā kṛṣyate /
SA11sanssr_pu:309_2: sā kathañcit tasya nārakasya mukhe praviśati /
SA11sanssr_pu:309_3: sa bhayavihvalavadano yena vā tena vā niḥpalāyate 'ṅgārakarṣūṣu dahyamāno nimajjan /
SA11sanssr_pu:309_4: tasyaivaṃ duḥkhārttasyāśaraṇasyāparāyaṇasya punar api yamapuruṣāḥ prādurbhavanti mudgarāsipāṇayaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:309_5: te taṃ puruṣaṃ mastakāt prabhṛti yāvat pādau cūrṇayantīty ādi /
SA11sanssr_pu:310_0: paiśunyavipākas tu yathaiva mṛṣāvādasya trīṇi yojanaśatāni jihveti viśeṣas tu /
SA11sanssr_pu:310_1: tāṃ yamapuruṣā nistriṃśān ādāya pradīptadhārān jihvāṃ nikṛntanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:310_3: paramakaṭukāṃ vedanāṃ prativedayate sa krandati vikrośaty avyaktākṣaraṃ jihvāvirahita ity ādi /
SA11sanssr_pu:311_0: pāruṣyavipākam āha / te tāṃ jihvām āsyaṃ vidārya gṛhṇanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:311_1: gṛhītvā niśitadhāraiḥ śastraiś chittvā tasya bhūya eva khādanīyārthena mukhe prakṣipanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:311_2: sa ca jighansārditaḥ kṣutkṣāmavadanaḥ svarudhiralālāparisrutāṃ tām eva svajihvāṃ bhakṣayati /
SA11sanssr_pu:311_3: sā ca jihvā chinnā punar api saṃjāyate karmavaśāt /
SA11sanssr_pu:311_4: atha sa bhūmau vedanārttaḥ parivartate viceṣṭate krandate /
SA11sanssr_pu:311_5: tasyaivaṃ vedanārttasya parivṛttanayanatārakasya duṣkhārttasya dīnasyāsahāyasyaikākinaḥ svakṛtam upabhuñjānasya yamapuruṣā anuśāsanīgāthāṃ bhāṣante /
SA11sanssr_pu:312_0: jihvādhanor vinirmuktas tīkṣṇo vāg viśikhas tvayā /
SA11sanssr_pu:312_1: pāruṣyam iti yad dṛṣṭaṃ tasyaitat phalam āgatam /
SA11sanssr_pu:315_0: tasya tat prajvalitaṃ tāmradravalohitaṃ jihvāṃ dahati /
SA11sanssr_pu:315_2: kaṇṭhaṃ dagdhvā hṛdayaṃ dahati hṛdayaṃ dagdhvāntrāṇi dahati /
SA11sanssr_pu:316_0: yamapuruṣā gāthām āhuḥ / pūrvottarābaddhapadaṃ nirarthakam asaṃgatam /
SA11sanssr_pu:316_1: abaddhaṃ yat tvayā proktaṃ tasyaitat phalam āgataṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:317_0: yā na [doubtful] satyavatī nityaṃ na cādhyayanatatparā /
SA11sanssr_pu:317_1: na sā jihvā budhair dṛṣṭā kevalaṃ māṃsakhaṇḍikā /
SA11sanssr_pu:318_0: abhidhyāvipākam āha / atha paśyati riktaṃ tuccham asārakaṃ karmakṛtaṃ bahudraviṇaṃ paraparigṛhītaṃ tasya karmacoditavyāmohitasyaivaṃ bhavati /
SA11sanssr_pu:318_1: mamedaṃ syād iti / tataḥ sa nārakas tenaiva dhāvati yena tad dravyaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:318_2: tasyābhidhyākhyamānasasyākuśalasyāsevitabhāvitabahulīkṛtasya tatphalaṃ yad asau narake viparītaṃ paśyati /
SA11sanssr_pu:318_3: tasyaivaṃ paśyato 'bhidhyābahulasya haste śastraṃ prādurbhavati sa tena dhāvati /
SA11sanssr_pu:318_4: teṣām apy anyeṣāṃ nārakāṇāṃ haste śastrāṇi prādurbhavanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:318_5: sa taiḥ saha śastreṇa yudhyate yāvat tathā kartyate yathā sarṣapaphalamātram api na bhavati māṃsam asya śarīre tathāsthikaṅkālāvaśeṣaḥ kriyate /
SA11sanssr_pu:319_0: pareṣāṃ sampa ... mama syād iti cintitaṃ / tasyābhidhyāsamutthasya viṣasya phalam āgatam iti //
SA11sanssr_pu:320_0: vyāpādaphalam āha / karmamayāḥ siṃhavyāghrasarpāḥ krodhābhibhūtāḥ puratas tiṣṭhante /
SA11sanssr_pu:320_1: etebhyo bhayabhīto yena vā tena vā niḥpalāyate /
SA11sanssr_pu:320_2: sa kathaṃ śaknoti palāyitum aśubhasya karmaṇaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:320_3: sa tair gṛhyate / gṛhītvā ca pūrvaṃ tāvan mastakād bhujyate yāvat pārśvataḥ sarpair viṣadaṃṣṭraiḥ saṃdaśya saṃdaśya bhakṣyate /
SA11sanssr_pu:320_5: pādāv api vahninā dāhyete sa yamapuruṣair dūrād iṣubhir vidhyatae iti vistaraḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:321_2: ekādaśabhir arcciskandhaiḥ kṣutpipāsāgninā ca sukhanirgatena nirantaraṃ dahyatae iti /
SA11sanssr_pu:322_0: kāmamūlāś ca sarvānarthā iti tebhya evodvejitavyaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:322_3: yena aśramaṇena śramaṇapratijñena mātṛgrāmasya nṛttagītasyābharaṇānāṃ vā śabdaṃ śrutvāyoniśena manaḥkāreṇākṣiptabuddhinā tac chrutvā hasitalaḍitakrīḍitāny aśucim uktaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:323_0: tatra te nārakā ayovarṣeṇa sarvāṅgapratyaṅgaśaś cūrṇyante 'ṅgāravarṣeṇa ca pacyante dahyantae ity ādi /
SA11sanssr_pu:323_1: evaṃ paurāṇakāmāsvādanasmaraṇāt padumo nāma narakaḥ paṭhyate svapnāntabhūtasmaraṇāc ca /
SA11sanssr_pu:323_3: te droṇiṣv ayomayair muṣalair hanyantae iti vistaraḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:324_0: evam apsarasaḥ prārthanayā brahmacaryapariṇāmanān mahāpadumo nāma naraka uktaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:324_2: tasyāṃ nadyāṃ yāny asthīni te pāṣāṇāḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:324_3: yac chevālaṃ te keśāḥ / yaḥ paṅkas tan māṃsaṃ / yā āpaḥ tat kathitaṃ tāmraṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:324_4: ye matsyās te nārakā ity ādi /
SA11sanssr_pu:325_0: evaṃ puruṣasya puruṣeṇa saha maithunavipratipatteḥ aprameyā akāraṇā viśeṣāḥ paṭhyante /
SA11sanssr_pu:325_1: evaṃ śiśubhiḥ saha vipratipatteḥ kṣāranadyām uhyamānān dārakān paśyati /
SA11sanssr_pu:325_2: te taṃ vilapanti / sa tāṃ nadīm avagāhate / teṣu bālakeṣu tīvrasnehapratibandhaśokaduṣkhavegāt /
SA11sanssr_pu:325_3: evaṃ govaḍavājaiḍakādiṣu prakṛtisāvadyaḥ kāmamithyācāraḥ kharataravipākaḥ paṭhyate /
SA11sanssr_pu:325_4: tāsām eva govaḍavādīnāṃ taptāyomayīnāṃ akuśalanirmitānāṃ yonimārgeṇa sa tiryakkāmasevī praviśati /
SA11sanssr_pu:325_5: sa tāsām udare pradīptāṅgāranikaraparipūrṇe svidyate pacyate bahūni varṣaśatasahasrāṇīti vistareṇa draṣṭavyaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:326_0: evam anyanāśitāsv api bhikṣuṇīṣu vipratipannānāṃ mahānarakapātanāḥ paṭhyante /
SA11sanssr_pu:326_2: evaṃ prasahyānītāsv api parastrīṣu labdhāsu ca kanyāsu /
SA11sanssr_pu:326_3: evam upavāsasthāsu evaṃ gurūṇāṃ patnīṣu jñātiśabdamānitāsu ca vipratipatteḥ tīvrāś cāparimāṇāś ca mahānarakapātanāḥ paṭhyante /
SA11sanssr_pu:327_1: iha brāhmaṇa ekatyo brahmacāriṇam ātmānaṃ pratijāṇīte /
SA11sanssr_pu:327_2: sa nehaiva mātṛgrāmeṇa sārddhaṃ dvayaṃ samāpadyate 'pi tu mātṛgrāmaṃ cakṣuṣā rūpaṃ nidhyāyan paśyati /
SA11sanssr_pu:327_3: sa tadā svādayati adhyavasyati adhyavasāya tiṣṭhati /
SA11sanssr_pu:327_4: ayam ucyate brāhmaṇa brahmacārī saṃyukto maithunena dharmeṇa na visaṃyuktaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:328_0: evaṃ mātṛgrāmeṇa sārddhaṃ saṃkrīḍataḥ saṃkilikilāyamānasya āsvādayataḥ apariśuddhaṃ brahmacaryam uktaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:328_2: evaṃ tiraḥkuḍyagatasya tiroduṣyagatasya vā mātṛgrāmasya nṛttagītādiśabdam āsvādayato maithunasaṃyogam ity uktam /
SA11sanssr_pu:329_0: evaṃ devādisthāneṣu brahmacaryapariṇāmanāt saṃyukto maithunena dharmeṇa na visaṃyukta iti //
SA11sanssr_pu:330_0: yataś caite kāmā evaṃ smaraṇaprārthanāviṣayam api gatā evam annarthakarās tenaiva kāmāpavādakasūtre 'bhihitam /
SA11sanssr_pu:330_2: sabhayaś caiṣa mārgaḥ sapratibhayaḥ sakaṇṭakaḥ sagahanaḥ unmārgaḥ kumārgo vedanāpathaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:330_4: na tvam evaṃ cintayasi / kasmāt alpāsvādāḥ kāmā uktā bhagavatā /
SA11sanssr_pu:330_6: ādīnavo 'tra bhūyān / rogo bhikṣavaḥ kāmā gaṇḍaḥ śalyamadyamadyamūlam āmiṣavaḍisaṃ mṛtyur anityāḥ kāmās tucchāḥ mṛṣāmoṣadharmiṇaḥ svapnopamāḥ kāmāḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:331_0: yathā mṛgāṇāṃ bandhanāya kūṭaṃ dvijānāṃ bandhanāya jālaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:332_0: kāmaparyeṣaṇāṃ carato dīrgharātraṃ siṃhānāṃ mukhe parivartitasyānto na prajñāyate /
SA11sanssr_pu:332_1: yāvad goghātakānāṃ gavāsanānāṃ mukhe parivartitasyānto na prajñāyate /
SA11sanssr_pu:332_2: yāvan maṇḍūkānāṃ satāṃ sarpāṇāṃ mukhe parivartitasyānto na prajñāyate /
SA11sanssr_pu:332_3: dīrgharātraṃ kāmān pratisevamānānāṃ corā iti kṛtvā gṛhītānāṃ śiraśchinnānām anto na prajñāyate /
SA11sanssr_pu:332_4: pāradārikāḥ pāripanthikā grāmaghātakā janapadaghātakā yāvad granthimocakā iti kṛtvā gṛhītānāṃ śiraśchinnānām anto na prajñāyate /
SA11sanssr_pu:332_5: duṣkhaṃ tīvraṃ kharaṃ kaṭukam anubhūtaṃ rudhiraṃ prasyanditaṃ pragharitaṃ yac caturṣu mahāsamudreṣūdakāt prabhūtataraṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:333_0_0: kāyo hy ayaṃ bahvādīnavaḥ / asthisaṃghātaḥ snāyusaṃbaddho māṃsenānuliptaḥ carmaṇā paryavanaddhaḥ chavyā praticchannaḥ chidravicchidraḥ
SA11sanssr_pu:334_1: tad yathā cakṣūrogaḥ śrotrarogo yāvad arśāṃsi piṭako bhagandaraḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:335_3: indriyāṇāṃ pāripākaḥ paribhedaḥ saṃskārāṇāṃ purāṇībhāvo jarjarībhāvaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:335_4: yāvan nārhasy evam udgharantaṃ pragharantaṃ jugupsanīyaṃ kāyaṃ pratiṣevituṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:336_0: kā tava bhikṣo kāmāśāntiḥ / kaś ca tvāṃ pralobhayati / kathaṃ ca tvaṃ prāhito mūrchito 'dhyavasito 'dhyavasānam āpannaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:336_3: tvaṃ ca kāmān pratisevya vinipātagato bhaviṣyasi /
SA11sanssr_pu:338_1: tena kāmamithyācārāt prativiratena bhavitavyaṃ svadārasaṃtuṣṭena paradārānabhilāṣiṇāraktanetraprekṣiṇā nirviṇṇamanasā /
SA11sanssr_pu:338_8: tathāhaṃ kariṣyāmi yathā saṃkalpair api kāmān na paribhokṣye /
SA11sanssr_pu:338_9: kaḥ punar vādo dvīndriyasamāpattyā vānaṅgavijñaptyā veti /
SA11sanssr_pu:339_0: punar atraivāha / bodhisatvena svabhāryāyā antike tisraḥ saṃjñā utpādayitavyāḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:340_0: yāvad aparās tisraḥ / śīlāntarāyasaṃjñā dhyānāntarāyasaṃjñā prajñāntarāyasaṃjñā //
SA11sanssr_pu:341_0: aparās tisraḥ / corasaṃjñā badhakasaṃjñā narakapālasaṃjñā iti //
SA11sanssr_pu:342_1_0: atha candrottarādārikā samanantaraṃ pradhāvantaṃ taṃ mahāntaṃ janakāyaṃ dṛṣṭvā tasyāṃ velāyāṃ vihāyasāntarīkṣe tālamātram
SA11sanssr_pu:342_1_1: abhyudgamya sthitvā ca taṃ mahāntaṃ janakāyaṃ gāthābhir adhyabhāṣata /
SA11sanssr_pu:343_0: kāyaṃ mamekṣadhvam imaṃ manojñaṃ suvarṇavarṇaṃ jvalanaprakāśam /
SA11sanssr_pu:343_1: na raktacittasya hi mānuṣasya prajñāyate śobhanakaṃ śarīram /
SA11sanssr_pu:344_0: ye etv agnikarṣūpamasaṃpradīptān tyajanti kāmān viṣayeṣv agṛddhāḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:344_1: ṣaḍindriyaiḥ saṃvarasaṃvṛtāś ca ye brahmacaryaṃ ca caranti śubham /
SA11sanssr_pu:345_0: dṛṣṭvā ca dārān hi parasya ye vai kurvanti mātābhaginīti saṃjñāṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:345_1: prāsādikās te hi sudarśanīyā bhavanti nityaṃ paramaṃ manojñāḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:346_0: sphuṭām imāṃ vettha purīṃ samantād yo romakūpān mama cātigandhaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:346_1: na rāgacittena mayārjito 'yam phalaṃ tu dānasya damasya cedam /
SA11sanssr_pu:347_0: na me samutpadyati rāgacittaṃ mā vītarāgāsu janīṣva rāgaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:347_1: sākṣī mamāyaṃ purato munīndraḥ satyaṃ yathā vedmi na jātu mithyā /
SA11sanssr_pu:348_2: bhrātā svasā cāpi pitā babhūva ko rāgacittaṃ janayej jananyāṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:350_2: na nirvṛtiṃ yānti ca raktacittā rāgo hi tasmāt parivarjanīyaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:351_2: kumbhāṇḍayakṣā asurāḥ piśācā bhavanti ye rāgaparīttacittāḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:352_0: kāṇāś ca khañjāś ca vijihvakāś ca /
SA11sanssr_pu:352_2: bhavanti nānāvidhadoṣabhājāś caranti ye kāmacarīṃ jaghanyām /
SA11sanssr_pu:353_2: brahmāṇa īśā [doubtful] vaśavarttinaś ca tad brahmacaryaṃ vipulaṃ caritvā /
SA11sanssr_pu:355_0: kṣitīśvarāś caiva bhavanty udagrāḥ suśreṣṭhino vai gṛhapatyamātyāḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:355_1: sukhasaumanasyena ca yānti vṛddhiṃ ye brahmacaryaṃ vipulaṃ caranti /
SA11sanssr_pu:356_0: kabhallitāpān atha dhūmagārān bandhāṃs tathā tāḍanatarjjanāṃś ca /
SA11sanssr_pu:359_0: avidyāpidhitā bālās tamaḥskandhane āvṛtāḥ / strīṣu saktās tathā mūḍhā amedhya iva vāyasāḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:360_0: mārasya gocaro hy eṣa prasthitā yena durgatiḥ / āsvādasaṃjñino gṛddhā mīṭasthāne yathā krimiḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:361_0: kīṭakumbho yathā citro yatra yatraiva dṛśyate / pūrṇo mūtrapurīṣeṇa dṛtir vā vātapūritā //
SA11sanssr_pu:362_1: daurgandhyaṃ sravate kāyād bālānāṃ tad yathā madhu /
SA11sanssr_pu:363_1: gaṇḍabhūto hy ayaṃ kāyaḥ kutsito hy āmagandhikaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:364_0: nānāprāṇibhiḥ saṃpūrṇo mukhagaṇḍo yathā bhavet / evam eva hy ayaṃ kāyo viṣṭhādyaśucibhājanam //
SA11sanssr_pu:365_0: antyāntrākulaṃ hy udaraṃ sayakṛtphupphuṣākulam / vṛkkau vilohitaṃ pittaṃ mastaluṅgāsthimajjakam //
SA11sanssr_pu:366_0: aśītiṃ krimikulasahasrāṇi yāni tiṣṭhanti antare / aha bālā na paśyanti mohajālena āvṛtāḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:367_0: navavraṇamukhaiḥ prasravanty aśuciṃ pūtigandhikam / bālā nimittaṃ gṛhṇanti vacane darśane 'pi ca //
SA11sanssr_pu:368_0: uktāḥ paścān na jānanti yo deśaḥ sarvakutsitaḥ / uccāragocarā bālāḥ kheṭasiṅghāṇabhojinaḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:369_0: jugupsanīye rajyante vraṇaṃ dṛṣṭveva makṣikāḥ / kakṣāsv āgharate svedo gandho vāyati kutsitaḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:370_0: kurvanti duṣkṛtaṃ karma yena gacchanti durgatim / hīnān kāmān niṣevanto hīnān dharmān niṣevya ca //
SA11sanssr_pu:371_0: gatvā avīciṃ duṣprajñāḥ duṣkhāṃ vindanti vedanāṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:371_1: uccāra iva durgandhāḥ striyo buddhaiḥ prakīrtitāḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:372_0: tasmād dhīnasya hīnābhiḥ strībhir bhavati saṅgatiḥ / uccārabhastrāṃ yo gṛhyabālāvāsaṃ nigacchati //
SA11sanssr_pu:373_0: yādṛśaṃ kurute karma tādṛśaṃ labhate phalam //
SA11sanssr_pu:374_0_0: tathātraivāha / tad evaṃrūpair duṣkhaparyeṣitair bhogaiḥ svajīvikārtham upasaṃhṛtair na prabhavanti śramaṇabrāhmaṇebhyo dānaṃ
SA11sanssr_pu:374_0_1: dātuṃ kṛpaṇavanīpakayācakebhyo 'vaśīkṛtāḥ strībhiḥ strīnirjitāḥ strīnigṛhītāḥ strīdāsāḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:374_1: tenaiva strīpremṇā tasyā eva poṣaṇāya na śaknuvanti dānaṃ dātuṃ śīlaṃ ca samādātuṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:374_2: sa tatra raktaḥ samānaḥ strīparibhāṣitāni sahate tarjanāvalokananirbhartsanām api sahate /
SA11sanssr_pu:374_3: sa mātṛgrāmeṇa tarjitaḥ puruṣaḥ saṃsīdati viṣīdati sukhaṃ cāsyā avalokayati /
SA11sanssr_pu:374_5: ayaṃ mahārāja kāmalolupasya puruṣasyoccārasukhaparamasyāśucau ratasyāsaṃprajanyācāriṇo doṣaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:375_0: śrutvedṛśaṃ tu saṃvegaṃ na teṣāṃ bhavati nirvṛtiḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:375_1: bhūyaḥ kurvanti saṃsargaṃ strībhiḥ sārddhaṃ pramoditāḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:377_1: strīgataṃ cāsya tac cittaṃ viḍālasyeva mūṣike /
SA11sanssr_pu:378_0: muhūrtaṃ bhavati saṃvegaḥ śrutvātha jinabhāṣitaṃ / punaḥ kupyati rāgo 'sya viṣahālāhalaṃ yathā //
SA11sanssr_pu:379_0: sūkarasyeva uttrāso muhūrtam anuvarttate / dṛṣṭvā vai atha uccāraṃ gṛddhatāṃ janayaty asau //
SA11sanssr_pu:380_0: evaṃ sukhārthino bālāḥ prahāya jinaśāsanaṃ / hīnān kāmān niṣevante yena gacchanti durgatiṃ //
SA11sanssr_pu:381_0: raktāḥ pramattāḥ kāmeṣu kṛtvā karma supāpakam / śīlavattāṃ visaṃvādya paścād gacchanti durgatim //
SA11sanssr_pu:383_0: labdhvā kṣaṇaṃ hi sa prajño dharmaṃ śrutvā ca īdṛśam /
SA11sanssr_pu:383_1: sarvān kāmān vivarjyeha pravrajyāṃ niṣkramed budha /
SA11sanssr_pu:385_0: yaḥ kaścin mañjuśrīḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā jāmbūdvīpakān sarvasatvāñ jīvitād vyaparopya sarvasvaṃ haret /
SA11sanssr_pu:385_1_0: yo vānyo mañjuśrīḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā bodhisatvasyaikakuśalacittasyāntarāyaṃ kuryād antaśas tiryagyonigatasyāpy ekālopadānasahagatasya
SA11sanssr_pu:385_1_1: kuśalamūlasyāntarāyaṃ kuryād ayaṃ tato 'saṃkhyeyataraṃ pāpaṃ prasavati /
SA11sanssr_pu:385_2: tat kasya hetoḥ / buddhotpādasaṃjanakānāṃ sakuśalamūlānām antarāyaḥ sthito bhavati /
SA11sanssr_pu:385_3: yaḥ kaścin mañjuśrīḥ parakuleṣu bodhisatvasyerṣyāmātsaryaṃ kuryāt tasya tasmin samaye tato nidānaṃ [doubtful] trīṇi bhayāni pratikāṅkṣitavyāni /
SA11sanssr_pu:385_4: katamāni trīṇi / narakopapattibhayaṃ jātyandhabhayaṃ pratyantajanmopapattibhayaṃ ceti /
SA11sanssr_pu:387_0: yas tasya kuryāt puruṣo 'priyaṃ vā bhūtaṃ hy abhūtaṃ ca vaded avarṇaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:387_1: paruṣaṃ vadet kruddhamanāpi yas taṃ kṣobhaṃ ca kuryāt punar asya yo 'pi /
SA11sanssr_pu:388_0: ātmabhāvena mahatā narakeṣu sa durmatiḥ / utpadyate vipannātmā duṣkhāṃ sa vetti vedanāṃ //

SA11sanssr_pu:398_4: evam eva mañjuśrīr bodhisatvo 'nyena karmaṇā na śakyo vinipātayitum anyatra bodhisatvāpavādād eveti /
SA11sanssr_pu:400_0: yaḥ kaścin mañjuśrīḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā daśasu dikṣu sarvalokadhātuṣu sarvasatvāndhakāreṣu bandhane kruddhaḥ praveśayet /

SA11sanssr_pu:402_0: atraivoktaṃ / yaḥ kaścin mañjuśrīḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā gaṅgānadīvālikāsamān stūpān vinipātayed daheta vā /
SA11sanssr_pu:402_1: yaś cānyaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā mahāyānādhimuktasya bodhisatvasya vyāpādakhilakrodhacittam utpādya krośayet paribhāṣayed ayaṃ tato 'saṃkhyeyataraṃ pāpaṃ prasavati /
SA11sanssr_pu:402_2: tat kasmād dhetoḥ / bodhisatvaniryātā hi buddhā bhagavanto buddhaniryātāś ca stūpāḥ sarvasukhopadhānāni ca sarvadevanikāyāś ca /
SA11sanssr_pu:402_5: sarvabuddhān annuttarayā pūjayā pūjayitukāmena bodhisatvāḥ pūjayitavyāḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:404_0: yas tv eṣāṃ kurute rakṣāṃ dhārmikīṃ dharmavādināṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:404_1: hitvā sudurgatīḥ sarvāḥ śakro bhavati devarāṭ /

SA11sanssr_pu:406_0: śreṣṭhī gṛhapatiś cāpi bhavaty āḍhyo mahādhanaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:407_0: atha katamaṃ bodhisatvam adhikṛtyeyaṃ kārāpakāracintā / pṛthagjanam eva //
SA11sanssr_pu:408_1_0: yaḥ kaścin mañjuśrīḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā sarvalokadhāturajaupamānāṃ satvānāṃ divase divase divyaṃ śatarasam āhāraṃ
SA11sanssr_pu:408_1_1: dadyād divyāni ca vastrāṇy evaṃ dadaṅ gaṅgānadīvālikāsamān kalpasamudrān dānaṃ dadyāt /
SA11sanssr_pu:408_2_0: yaś cānyaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā ekasyopāsakasyānnanyaśāstur daśakuśalakarmapathasamanvāgatasyaikadivasam ekam āhāraṃ
SA11sanssr_pu:408_2_1: dadyād buddhasyāyaṃ bhagavataḥ śikṣāyāṃ śikṣita iti samāropaṃ kṛtvā /
SA11sanssr_pu:409_0_0: yaḥ kaścin mañjuśrīḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā sarvalokadhāturajaupamānāṃ daśakuśalakarmapathasamanvāgatānāṃ upāsakānāṃ
SA11sanssr_pu:409_0_1: divase divase divyaṃ śatarasam āhāraṃ dadyād divyāni ca vastrāṇy evaṃ dadaṅ gaṅgānadīvālikāsamān kalpān dadyāt /
SA11sanssr_pu:409_1: yaś cānyaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā ekasya bhikṣor ekadivasam āhāraṃ dadyād /
SA11sanssr_pu:410_1: sacen mañjuśrīr daśasu dikṣu sarvalokadhātuṣu sarvasatvā utpāṭitākṣā bhaveyuḥ parikalpam upādāya /
SA11sanssr_pu:410_2: atha kaścid eva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā teṣāṃ sarvasatvānāṃ maitracittas tāny akṣīṇi janayet parikalpam upādāya /
SA11sanssr_pu:410_3: yo vānyo mañjuśrīḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā mahāyānādhimuktaṃ bodhisatvaṃ prasannacittaḥ paśyed /
SA11sanssr_pu:411_0: yaḥ kaścin mañjuśrīḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā daśasu dikṣu sarvasatvān bandhanāgārapraviviṣṭān bandhanāgārān mocayitvā cakravartisukhe sthāpayed brahmatvasukhe vā /
SA11sanssr_pu:411_1: yo vānyo mañjuśrīḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā mahāyānādhimuktasya prasannacitto darśanābhilāṣī bhaved varṇaṃ cāsyodāhared /
SA11sanssr_pu:412_1: yaḥ punar bhadanta bhagavan kṣatriyakalyāṇo vāmātyakalyāṇo vā bhaṭṭakalyāṇo vā śramaṇakalyāṇo vā brāhmaṇakalyāṇo vā paraṃ rakṣaty ātmānaṃ rakṣati paralokaṃ rakṣati /
SA11sanssr_pu:412_2: bhagavacchāsane pātrabhūtam apātrabhūtaṃ vā yāvan muṇḍaṃ kāṣāyakhaṇḍaprāvṛtaṃ parirakṣati śroṣyati pūjayiṣyati śrāvakakathāṃ evaṃ pratyekabuddhakathāṃ śroṣyati pūjayiṣyati /
SA11sanssr_pu:412_3_0: mahāyānakathāṃ ca mahāyānasaṃprasthitān pudgalān śīlavato guṇāḍhyān yuktamuktapratibhānān taiḥ sārddhaṃ ramati krīḍati paripṛcchati
SA11sanssr_pu:415_0: tad yathāpi nāma kulaputra kaścit puruṣa utpadyate /
SA11sanssr_pu:415_1_0: yaḥ sarvaṃ jambūdvīpaṃ saptaratnaparipūrṇaṃ kṛtvā tiṣṭhatāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ dānaṃ dadyāt tathaiva madhyāhnasamaye tathaiva
SA11sanssr_pu:415_1_1: sāyāhnasamaye dānaṃ dadyād anena paryāyeṇa varṣaśatasahasram evaṃrūpaṃ dānaṃ dadyāt /
SA11sanssr_pu:415_2: tat kiṃ manyase kulaputrāpi nu sa puruṣo bahu puṇyaṃ prasavet /
SA11sanssr_pu:417_0: bahu bhadanta bhagavan sa puruṣaḥ puṇyaskandhaṃ prasaved aprameyam asaṃkhyeyaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:417_1: na tasya puṇyaskandhasya kenacic chakyaṃ pramāṇam udgrahītuṃ anyatra tathāgatena /
SA11sanssr_pu:419_0: yas tu kulaputra kṣatriyakalyāṇo vā yāvad yathā pūrvoktaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:419_2: yāvad vipulataram apramāṇataram asaṃkhyeyataraṃ puṇyaskandhaṃ prasavati /
SA11sanssr_pu:419_3: yo mama paścimāyāṃ pañcaśatyāṃ vartamānāyāṃ saddharmanetrī rakṣati sa rakṣaty ātmānaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:419_4: rakṣati parāṃś ca rakṣati paralokaṃ rakṣati mama śāsanaṃ śrāvakān pātrabhūtān apātrabhūtān vā yāvan muṇḍān kāṣāyavastraprāvṛtān api rakṣati /
SA11sanssr_pu:419_5: na viheṭhayati / yāvat svakaṃ rāṣṭraṃ pararāṣṭraṃ ca vardhayati /
SA11sanssr_pu:419_6: apāyān kṣapayati / surālayaṃ ca prāpayati ciraṃ cāyuḥ pālayati /
SA11sanssr_pu:419_9: sarvāpāyāñ jahāti / na ciraṃ saṃsāre saṃsarati / nityaṃ kalyāṇamitrair buddhaiś ca bhagavadbhir bodhisatvaiś ca mahāsatvaiś ca sārddhaṃ samavadhānagato bhavati /
SA11sanssr_pu:419_10: satataṃ kalyāṇamitrāvirahito na cireṇa yathābhiprāyeṣu buddhakṣetreṣv annuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyate /
SA11sanssr_pu:420_1: yāvat piśācendrāḥ saparivārā utthāyāsanād yena bhagavān tenāñjaliṃ praṇamyaivam āhuḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:420_2: ye te bhadanta bhagavan etarhy annāgate 'dhvani yāvat paścimāyāṃ pañcaśatyāṃ kṣatriyakalyāṇā bhavanti yāvad gahapatikalyāṇāḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:420_4: pe / vayam api sarve saparivārās taṃ kṣatriyakalyāṇaṃ yāvad gahapatikalyāṇaṃ daśabhir ākārai rakṣiṣyāmaḥ paripālayiṣyāmo vardhayiṣyāmaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:421_0: katamair daśabhiḥ / āyuś cāsya vardhayiṣyāmaḥ āyurantarāyaṃ ca dharmeṇa nivārayiṣyāmaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:421_1: ārogyaṃ ca parivāraṃ ca dhanaskandhaṃ ca upabhogaparibhogaṃ caiśvaryaṃ ca yaśaḥ kalyāṇamitrāṇi prajñāsampadaṃ ca vardhāpayiṣyāmaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:423_0: avalokanāsūtre 'pi / saṃbodhau cittam utpādya hitārthaṃ sarvaprāṇināṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:424_1: yas tv eṣāṃ buddhaputrāṇāṃ naraḥ kurvīta apriyaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:424_2: devān manuṣyān varjitvā narakaṃ tasya gocaraṃ /

SA11sanssr_pu:427_1: āvaraṇaṃ mañjuśrīr ucyate rāga āvaraṇaṃ dveṣa āvaraṇaṃ moha āvaraṇaṃ dānam āvaraṇaṃ śīlakṣāntivīryadhyānaprajñā āvaraṇaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:427_2: pe / tat kasya hetoḥ bālapṛthagjanā mañjuśrīr dānaṃ dadānā matsariṇām antike 'prasādaṃ kurvanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:427_7: te teṣāṃ doṣaṃ śrutvā bahujanasyāprasādaṃ kurvanti /

SA11sanssr_pu:427_10: vayaṃ kṣāntivādinaḥ / ime punar anye vyāpannacittāḥ /
