SA11sanssr_pu:427_15: te tena vīryārambheṇātmānam utkarṣayanti paraṃ ca paṃsayanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:427_16: tān ahaṃ bālān iti vadāmi / te dhyānaṃ samāpadyamānās tatra dhyānasamāpattau spṛhām utpādayanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:427_17: teṣām evaṃ bhavati / vayaṃ samādhivihāriṇa / ime 'nye bhikṣavo vikṣiptacittā viharanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:428_3: īryayā codayati / dūrībhavati bodhiḥ / īryāpathena codayati dūrībhavati bodhiḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:428_4: saced bodhisatvasyāntike hīnasaṃjñām utpādayati ātmani codārasaṃjñāṃ kṣiṇoty ātmānaṃ karmāvaraṇaṃ ca gṛhṇāti /
SA11sanssr_pu:428_5: iha bodhisatvena bodhisatvam avavadatānuśāsatā vā śāstṛsaṃjñām upasthāpyāvavaditavyo 'nuśāsitavyaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:428_8: na devaputra bodhisatvaḥ kvacid eva kuśalamūlāni samucchinatti /
SA11sanssr_pu:428_10: annutpāditabodhicitte 'pi tāvad bodhir bhavye satve 'vamanyanā pratiṣiddhā /
SA11sanssr_pu:429_0: yathoktaṃ śūraṅgamasamādhisūtre / tatra dṛḍhamate katamad annutpāditabodhicittavyākaraṇaṃ //
SA11sanssr_pu:430_0: iha dṛḍhamate sa pudgalaḥ pāñcagatike saṃsāre upapanno bhavati /
SA11sanssr_pu:430_1: yadi vā nirayeṣu yadi vā tiryagyonau yadi vā yamaloke yadi vā deveṣu yadi vā manuṣyeṣu /
SA11sanssr_pu:430_4: ayaṃ puruṣapudgalo yāvad iyadbhiḥ kalpakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrair annuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittam utpādayiṣyati /
SA11sanssr_pu:431_0: iyadbhiś ca asaṃkhyeyakalpaśatasahasrair bodhim abhisaṃbhotsyate // pe //
SA11sanssr_pu:432_1: atha khalv āyuṣmān mahākāśyapo bhagavantam etad avocat /
SA11sanssr_pu:432_3: tat kasya hetoḥ / na hy asmākam etaj jñānaṃ pravarttate /
SA11sanssr_pu:432_5: katamasya na saṃvidyante / tato vayaṃ bhagavann ajānānās tathārūpeṣu hīnasaṃjñām utpādayema /
SA11sanssr_pu:433_0: bhagavān āha / sādhu sādhu kāśyapa subhāṣitā te iyaṃ vāk /
SA11sanssr_pu:433_1: idaṃ ca mayā kāśyapārthavaśaṃ sampaśyamānena yuṣmākam evaṃ dharmo deśito /
SA11sanssr_pu:433_3: yac chīghraṃ kṣaṇyati hi bhikṣavaḥ pudgalaḥ pudgalaṃ pravicinvan /
SA11sanssr_pu:433_4: ahaṃ vā pudgalaṃ pramiṇuyāṃ yo vā syān mādṛśaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:433_5: etena kāśyapa nirdeśena bodhisatvena vā śrāvakeṇa vā sarvasatvānām antike śāstṛsaṃjñotpādayitavyā /
SA11sanssr_pu:433_6: mātra kaścid bodhisatvayānikaḥ pudgalo bhavet tena tatrātmā rakṣitavya iti /
SA11sanssr_pu:433_7: yasya tu niyatam eva bodhiprāpticihnam asti tatra sutarām avamanyanā rakṣitavyā /
SA11sanssr_pu:434_1: iṣṭāmayān mṛttikasaṃcitān vā prītāś ca kurvanti jinasya stūpān /
SA11sanssr_pu:434_2: uddiśya vā pāṃśukarāśayo 'pi aṭavīṣu durgeṣu ca kārayanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:435_0: siktāmayā vā puna kūṭa kṛtvā ye kecid uddiśya jināna stūpān /
SA11sanssr_pu:437_0: ye citrabhittīṣu karonti vigrahaṃ / paripūrṇagātrāṃś chatapuṇyalakṣaṇān //
SA11sanssr_pu:438_0: likhet svayaṃ cāpi likhāpayed vā / te sarvi bodhāya abhūṣi lābhinaḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:439_0: ye cāpi kecit tarhi śikṣamāṇāḥ / krīḍāratiṃ cāpi vinodayantaḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:440_0: nakhena kāṣṭhena kṛtāsi vigrahān / bhittīṣu puruṣātha kumārakā vā //
SA11sanssr_pu:441_0: sarve ca te bodhi abhūṣi lābhinaḥ // pe //
SA11sanssr_pu:442_2: sugatānam uddiśyatha pūjanārthaṃ gītaṃ ca gītaṃ madhuraṃ manojñaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:442_3: sarve ca te buddha abhūṣi loke /
SA11sanssr_pu:445_0: tad yathā vāḍiśikena mahaty udakasarasi matsyākarṣaṇārthaṃ sāmiṣaṃ vaḍiśaṃ prakṣiptaṃ bhavet samanantaraprakṣiptaṃ ca matsyena nigīrṇaṃ bhavet /
SA11sanssr_pu:445_1: kiṃ cāpi sa matsya udakasarasi bhramaty atha ca punar vaddha eva sa vaktavyo dṛḍhena sūtreṇa sthalagatadaṇḍasunibaddhena /
SA11sanssr_pu:445_2: yat sa vāḍiśika āgatya tena sūtralāghavena jānāti /
SA11sanssr_pu:445_3: gṛhīto matsya iti / tam enaṃ sūtrād gṛhītvā sthalagataṃ karoti yathākāmakaraṇāya paribhogāya /
SA11sanssr_pu:445_4: evam eva ye satvā buddheṣu bhagavatsu cittaṃ prasādya kuśalamūlam avaropayanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:445_6_0: kiṃ cāpi te satvā duṣkṛtena karmāvaraṇenākṣaṇeṣūpapannā bhavanty atha ca buddhā bhagavantas tān satvān bauddhena jñānena
SA11sanssr_pu:445_6_1: saṃgrahavastusūtreṇa gṛhītvā saṃsārodakasarasa uddhṛtya nirvāṇasthale sthāpayantīti /
SA11sanssr_pu:446_3: yathā meghena dramiḍena mahābodhisatvenāpi satā navaka āryasudhanaḥ sarvaśarīreṇa praṇipatya vanditaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:446_6: katham ekatra vandya vandakatvaṃ na virudhyate /
SA11sanssr_pu:446_9: kiṃ ca buddhānām apy evam iṣyate /
SA11sanssr_pu:447_2: yo hi kaścin mañjuśrīs tathāgatabhāṣitadharme kasmiṃścic chobhanasaṃjñāṃ karoti /
SA11sanssr_pu:447_6: saṃgho 'pavādito bhavati / ya evaṃ vadatīdaṃ yuktam idam ayuktam iti sa saddharmaṃ pratikṣipati /
SA11sanssr_pu:447_7: na mayā pṛthak kaścid dharmaḥ śrāvakayānasaṃprayuktaḥ pratyekabuddhayānasaṃprayukto mahāyānasaṃprayukto deśitaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:447_8: tat te mohapuruṣā imaṃ mama dharmaṃ nānākariṣyanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:447_9: idaṃ śrāvakāṇāṃ deśitam idaṃ pratyekabuddhānām idaṃ bodhisatvānām iti /
SA11sanssr_pu:447_11: iyaṃ bodhisatvasya śikṣā / iyaṃ bodhisatvasyāśikṣeti saddharmaṃ pratikṣipati /
SA11sanssr_pu:447_12: dharmabhāṇakasyāsti pratibhānaṃ nāsti pratibhānam iti saddharmaṃ pratikṣipati /
SA11sanssr_pu:447_14: apagate buddhotpāde nāsti dhāraṇīpratilambha iti dharmaṃ pratikṣipati /

SA11sanssr_pu:551_1: tāvat piṇḍāya carati yāvad asya kāryasya prāptir bhavati /
SA11sanssr_pu:551_2: anyatra yeṣu sthāneṣu caṇḍā vā kukkurās taruṇavatsā vā gāvaḥ prakṛtiduḥśīlā vā tiryagyonigatā /
SA11sanssr_pu:551_3: viheṭhanābhiprāyā vā strīpuruṣadārakadārikā jugupsitāni vā sthānāni /
SA11sanssr_pu:552_0: anenaitad darśitaṃ bhavati yad dṛṣṭe 'pi bādhākara evaṃvidhe / tad avarjayata āpattir bhavatīti //
SA11sanssr_pu:553_0: atha yad evamādy annarthavarjanam uktaṃ kenaital labhyate sarvaniṣphalasyandavarjanāt /
SA11sanssr_pu:553_1: phalam atra parārthaṃ / tadarthaṃ yaḥ syando na saṃvartate /
SA11sanssr_pu:553_4: na hastalolupo bhavati na pādalolupaḥ hastapādasaṃyata iti /
SA11sanssr_pu:554_0: tathā daśadharmakasūtre 'pi deśitaṃ hastavikṣepaḥ pādavikṣepo 'dhāvanaṃ paridhāvanaṃ laṅghanaṃ plavanam idam ucyate kāyadauṣṭhulyam iti /
SA11sanssr_pu:555_0: āryadharmasaṃgītisūtre tu yathā bodhisatvānāṃ parārthād anyat karma na kalpate /
SA11sanssr_pu:555_1_0: tathā spaṣṭam eva paridīpitaṃ yat kiñcid bhagavan bodhisatvānāṃ kāyakarma yat kiñcid vākkarma yat kiñcin manaḥkarma tat sarvaṃ
SA11sanssr_pu:555_3: sa mayā pratipattiḥ pratipattavyayā sarvasatvānāṃ hitāvahā sukhāvahā ca /
SA11sanssr_pu:556_0: āyataneṣu śūnyagrāmavat pratyavekṣaṇā pratipattiḥ / na cāyatanaparityāgaṃ spṛhayatīti //
SA11sanssr_pu:557_1: tad yathāpi nāma chidrān mārutaḥ praviśati /
SA11sanssr_pu:557_2: evam eva yato yata eva cittasya chidraṃ bhavati tatas tata eva māro 'vatāraṃ labhate /
SA11sanssr_pu:557_4: tatreyam achidracittatā yad idaṃ sarvākārajñatāyāḥ śūnyatāyāḥ paripūrir iti /
SA11sanssr_pu:558_2: abhyastā vā / sarvabhāvaśūnyatā / eṣā ca ratnacūḍasūtre vistareṇākhyātā /
SA11sanssr_pu:559_1: pāpakānām akuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ prahāṇāya chandaṃ janayatīty atra prastāve yāni cānyāni punaḥ kānicid anyāny api cittavikṣepakarāṇi yāni samādhiskandhasya vipakṣāya saṃvartante /
SA11sanssr_pu:559_3: yāvad ime ucyante pāpakā akuśalā dharmā iti /
SA11sanssr_pu:563_3: sati satvārthe yad aṅgam annupayogi tad dṛḍhatarasmṛtyapekṣāniścalamādhyachandaparāpattīkṛtaṃ sarvadhīraceṣṭāsmṛtiḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:563_8: yaḥ śrotā vaktavyaḥ sa yāvanmātreṇa dhvaninārthaṃ jānāti /
SA11sanssr_pu:564_3: avajñāpratipakṣaḥ / ayaṃ cādaraḥ śamathamāhātmyaṃ jñātvā tātparyeṇa jāyate /
SA11sanssr_pu:564_4: kas tāvad ayaṃ śamo nāma / ya āryākṣayamatisūtre śamatha uktaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:565_0: tatra katamā śamathākṣayatā / yā cittasya śāntir upaśāntir avikṣepakendriyasaṃyamaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:565_1_0: annuddhatatā / annunnahanatā acapalatā acañcalatā saumyatā guptatā karmaṇyatā ājāneyatā ekāgratā ekārāmatā saṃgaṇikāvarjanatā
SA11sanssr_pu:565_2: yāvad īryāpathaguptiḥ kālajñatā samayajñatā mātrajñatā muktijñatā /
SA11sanssr_pu:566_0: kiṃ punar asya śamasya māhātmyaṃ yathābhūtajñānajananaśaktiḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:566_1: yasmāt samāhito yathābhūtaṃ prajānātīty avadan muniḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:567_2: evaṃ cāsya bhavati / idaṃ mayā samādhimukhaṃ sarvadharmayathābhūtadarśanaṃ ca sarvasatvānāṃ niṣpādayitavyaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:567_3: sa tayā mahākaruṇayā saṃcodyamāno 'dhiśīlam adhicittam adhiprajñaṃ ca śikṣāṃ paripūryāṃ caturāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyate /
SA11sanssr_pu:567_5: idaṃ śamathamāhātmyam ātmanaḥ pareṣāṃ cānnantāpāyādiduḥkhasamatikramānantalaukikalokottarasukhasaṃpatprakarṣapāraprāptyātmakam avagamya tadabhilāṣeṇātāpo bhāvayitavyaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:567_8: tenāpi smṛtir upatiṣṭhati / upasthitasmṛtir niṣphalaṃ varjayati /
SA11sanssr_pu:567_9: yaś ca niṣphalaṃ varjayati tasyānnarthā na saṃbhavanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:567_10: tasmād ātmabhāvaṃ rakṣitukāmena smṛtimūlam anviṣya nityam upasthitasmṛtinā bhavitavyaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:569_0: atraiva ca pravrajitabodhisatvam adhikṛtyoktaṃ smṛtisaṃprajanyasyāvikṣepa iti //
SA11sanssr_pu:570_1: yayā smṛtyā sarvakleśānāṃ prādurbhāvo na bhavati /
SA11sanssr_pu:570_2: yayā smṛtyā sarvamārakarmaṇām avatāraṃ na dadāti /
SA11sanssr_pu:570_3: yayā smṛtyā utpathe vā kumārge vā na patati /
SA11sanssr_pu:570_4: yayā smṛtyā dauvārikabhūtayā sarveṣām akuśalānāṃ cittacaitasikānāṃ dharmāṇām avakāśaṃ dadātīyam ucyate samyaksmṛtir iti /
SA11sanssr_pu:571_1: caraṃś carāmīti prajāṃsti / sthitaḥ sthito 'smīti prajānāti /
SA11sanssr_pu:571_4: yathā yathā cāsyaḥ [doubtful] kāyaḥ sthito bhavati tathā tathaiva prajānāti /
SA11sanssr_pu:573_0: so 'tikrāman vā pratikrāman vā saṃprajānaṃś cārī bhavati /
SA11sanssr_pu:573_2: aśite pīte khādite nidrāklamaprativinodane āgate gate sthite niṣaṇṇe supte jāgarite bhāṣite tuṣṇībhāve pratisaṃlayane saṃprajānaṃś cārī bhavatīti /
SA11sanssr_pu:576_0: ato 'vagamyate ye kecit samādhihetavaḥ prayogās te śīlāntargatā iti /
SA11sanssr_pu:576_2: tathā śīlārthināpi samādhau yatnaḥ kāryaḥ tatraiva sūtre vacanāt /
SA11sanssr_pu:578_0: etābhyāṃ ca śīlasamādhibhyām anyonyasaṃvardhanakarābhyāṃ cittakarmapariniṣpattiḥ etāvatī ceyaṃ bodhisatvaśikṣā yad uta cittaparikarma /
SA11sanssr_pu:579_0: uktaṃ hy āryaratnameghe / cittapūrvaṅgamāś ca sarvadharmāḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:579_2: api tu cittena nīyate lokaḥ cittaṃ cittaṃ na paśyati /
SA11sanssr_pu:579_3: cittena cīyate karma śubhaṃ vā yadi vāśubham /
SA11sanssr_pu:581_0: sa evaṃ vyupaparīkṣamāṇaś citte sūpasthitasmṛtir viharati na cittasya vaśaṃ gacchati /
SA11sanssr_pu:581_1: ap tu cittam evāsya vaśaṃ gacchati /
SA11sanssr_pu:582_1_0: mativikramo bodhisatva āha / yo 'yaṃ dharmo dharma ity ucyate nāyaṃ dharmo deśastho na pradeśastho 'nyatra svacittādhīno
SA11sanssr_pu:582_1_1: dharmaḥ tasmān mayā svacittaṃ svārādhitaṃ svadhiṣṭhitaṃ susamārabdhaṃ sunigṛhītaṃ kartavyaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:582_2: tat kasya hetoḥ / yatra cittaṃ tatra guṇadoṣāḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:582_4: tatra bodhisatvo doṣebhyaś cittaṃ nivārya guṇeṣu pravartayati /
SA11sanssr_pu:583_0: tad ucyate / cittādhīno dharmo dharmādhīnā bodhir iti //
SA11sanssr_pu:584_0: ayaṃ bhagavan dharmaṃ samādānaḥ sukhābhisaṃbodhāya saṃvartatae iti //
SA11sanssr_pu:587_0: tathātraiva māyādevyadarśanākulībhūte āryasudhane ratnanetrāyā nagaradevatāyās taddarśanārtham iyam anuśāsanī /
SA11sanssr_pu:587_8: cittanagaravivaraṇaprayuktena te kulaputra bhavitavyaṃ ādhyātmikabāhyavastu sarvajagatsaṃprāpaṇatayā /
SA11sanssr_pu:587_10: yāvad evaṃ cittanagaraviśuddhyabhiyuktena kulaputra bodhisatvena śakyaṃ sarvakuśalamūlasamārjanam anuprāptuṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:587_11: tat kasya hetoḥ / tathā hi tasya bodhisatvasyaivaṃ cittanagarapariśuddhaysa sarvāvaraṇāni purato na saṃtiṣṭhante /
SA11sanssr_pu:588_0: śamāc ca na calec cittaṃ bāhyaceṣṭānivartanāt //
SA11sanssr_pu:589_0: asaṃprajanyaparatantrasya muṣitasmṛteś ca cittaṃ calati samīhitād ālambanād anyatra nīyamānatvāt /
SA11sanssr_pu:589_1: yadā tu smṛtisaṃprajanyena bāhyāś ceṣṭā nivartitā bhavanti tadā tadvaśatvād ekasminn ālambane nibaddhaṃ yāvad iṣyate tāvat tiṣṭhati /
SA11sanssr_pu:589_3: adyatve 'pi ca satvārthakṣamo bhavaty eva prasādakaratvāt /
SA11sanssr_pu:590_0: sarvatrācapalamandamitasnigdhābhibhāṣaṇāt / āvarjayej janaṃ bhavyam ādeyaś cāpi jāyate //
SA11sanssr_pu:591_0: etad eva ca bodhisatvasya kṛtyam yad uta satvāvarjanaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:591_2: tathā tathā bhagavan bodhisatvena pratipattavyaṃ yat sahadarśanenaiva satvāḥ prasīdeyuḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:591_3: tat kasmād dhetoḥ / na bhagavan bodhisatvasyānyat karaṇīyam asty anyatra satvāvarjanāt /
SA11sanssr_pu:591_4: satvaparipāka eveyaṃ bhagavan bodhisatvasya dharmasaṃgītir iti /
SA11sanssr_pu:592_0: evaṃ punar akriyamāṇe ko doṣa ity āha /
SA11sanssr_pu:592_1: annādeyaṃ tu taṃ lokaḥ paribhūya jināṅkuraṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:594_0: yena cāsya paribhava evam annartho ratnameghe jinenoktas tena saṃkṣepasaṃvaraḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:594_1: yenāprasādaḥ satvānāṃ tad yatnena vivarjayed iti /
SA11sanssr_pu:595_1: yāvad iha bodhisatvo nāsthāne viharati nākāle /
SA11sanssr_pu:595_2: nākālabhāṇī bhavati nākālajño bhavati nādeśajño bhavati /
SA11sanssr_pu:595_3: yato nidānam asyāntike satvā aprasādaṃ prativedayeyuḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:595_4: sa sarvasatvānurakṣayā / ātmanaś ca bodhisaṃbhāraparipūraṇārthaṃ saṃpanneryāpatho bhavati mṛdubhāṇī mandabhāṇī /
SA11sanssr_pu:596_1: yaḥ satvān rakṣati sa śīlaṃ rakṣatīti /
SA11sanssr_pu:596_2: anayā kanīyena mātṛgrāmeṇa saha raho'vasthādiṣu lokarakṣā ca kṛtā syāt /
SA11sanssr_pu:596_3: evaṃ bhogyeṣu jalasthaleṣu mūtrapurīṣaśleṣmapūyādīnāṃ kutsitānāṃ rahasy arahasi cotsargaṃ na kuryād devamanuṣyacittarakṣārthaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:597_0: saddharmasmṛtyupasthāne ca raha utsiṣṭaṃ kṛtvānnutsiṣṭāhāreṣv adadataḥ pretagatiḥ paṭhyate //
SA11sanssr_pu:598_1: na purato dantakāṣṭhaṃ khāditavyaṃ na purataḥ kheṭe nikṣiptavya iti /
SA11sanssr_pu:598_2: eṣa ca gauravalajjāvidhiḥ sarvadraṣṭavyo na brahmacāriṣv eva /
SA11sanssr_pu:598_3: atra tu sūtre brahmacāryadhikāraḥ teṣu gurutarāpattibhayasaṃdarśanārthaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:600_0: na cāyaṃ vidhiḥ prādeśikaḥ / tathā brahmaparipṛcchāyām apy uktaṃ na ca vadhasadṛśena bodhisatvena bhavitavyam iti /
SA11sanssr_pu:600_1: tathā prātimokṣād api lokāprasādakaram anveṣya varjanīyaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:601_0: mukhapūraṃ na bhuñjīta saśabdaṃ prasṛtānanaḥ / pralambapādaṃ nāsīta na bāhuṃ mardayet samam //
SA11sanssr_pu:602_0: evaṃ svayam apy utprekṣya dṛṣṭvā śrutvā ca lokāprasādaṃ rakṣeta /
SA11sanssr_pu:602_1: aprasādakaravacanavarjanaṃ tu na sukaram iti smaraṇabodhanārtham upadarśyate /
SA11sanssr_pu:602_3_0: nāvalīnavacano bhavati / na vyavakīrṇavacanaḥ / nāvasyandanavacanaḥ / nojjvālanavacanaḥ / na rāgānunītavacanaḥ / na prākṛtavacanaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:602_4: na cañcalavacanaḥ / na capalavacanaḥ / na raṭaraṅgavacanaḥ / na mukhasākṣyavaropaṇavacano bhavatīti /
SA11sanssr_pu:603_1: na khalu punaḥ kulaputra bodhisatvasya vāg raktā vā duṣṭā vā mūḍhā vā kliṣṭā vā /
SA11sanssr_pu:603_3: parapakṣanigrahavacanā vā / ātmavarṇānunayavacanā vā / paravarṇapratighavacanā vā / pratijñottāraṇavacanā vā / ābhimānikavyākaraṇavacanā veti /
SA11sanssr_pu:604_1: yeyaṃ vāgamanojñā svasantānaparasantānavināśanī tathārūpāṃ vācaṃ prahāya /
SA11sanssr_pu:604_2_0: yeyaṃ vāk snigdhā mṛdvī manojñā madhurā priyakaraṇī manāpakaraṇī [doubtful] hitakaraṇī karṇasukhā hṛdayaṃgamā premaṇī varṇaviṣpaṣṭā
SA11sanssr_pu:604_2_1: vijñeyā śravaṇīyā aniśritā bahujanakāntā bahujanapriyā bahujanamanāpā [doubtful] vijñapraśastā sarvasatvahitasukhāvahā manotplāvakarī
SA11sanssr_pu:604_2_2: manaḥprahlādanakarī svaparasantānapramodanakarī rāgadveṣamohasarvakleśāpraśāmanī tathārūpāṃ vācaṃ niścārayati /
SA11sanssr_pu:604_3: yāvad itihāsapūrvakam api vacanaṃ parihārya pariharatīti /
SA11sanssr_pu:605_0: āryagaganagañjasūtre tūktaṃ / guruvacanānavamardanatayā / paravacanānācchindanatayā cādeyagrāhyavacano bhavatīti /
SA11sanssr_pu:606_1: gaganagañjo bodhisatva āha / na bodhisatvenaiṣā vāg bhāṣitavyā yayāparo vyāpadyeta /
SA11sanssr_pu:606_2: na sā vāg bhāṣitavyā yayāparaṃ tāpayet /
SA11sanssr_pu:606_3: na bodhisatvena sā vāg bhāṣitavyā yat paro jānīyāt /
SA11sanssr_pu:606_4: na sā vāg bhāṣitavyā yayārthā nirarthā /
SA11sanssr_pu:606_5: na bodhisatvena sā vāg bhāṣitavyā yayā na vidyām utpādayet /
SA11sanssr_pu:606_6: na sā vāg bhāṣitavyā yā satvānāṃ na hṛdayaṃgamā na paurī na karṇasukhā na sā vāg bhāṣitavyeti /
SA11sanssr_pu:607_1: apara eka dharmo mahāyānasaṃgrahāya saṃvartate svaskhalitapratyavekṣaṇatayā sarvasatvānurakṣeti /
SA11sanssr_pu:608_0: eṣā rakṣātmabhāvasya / yathāparair na nāśyeta / yathā na parān na nāśayet / asya tu granthavistarasyāyaṃ piṇḍārtho bodhisatvena manasā nityaṃ dhārayitavyaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:609_0: suniścalaṃ suprasannaṃ dhīraṃ sādaragauravaṃ / salajjaṃ sabhayaṃ śāntaṃ parārādhanatatparam //
SA11sanssr_pu:610_0: ātmasatvavaśaṃ nityam annavadyeṣu vastuṣu / nirmāṇam iva nirmānaṃ dhārayāmy eṣa mānasam / iti //
SA11sanssr_pu:611_0: kim etāvatī ātmabhāvarakṣā / na hi / kiṃ tarhi bhaiṣajyavasanādibhiḥ saha /
SA11sanssr_pu:611_1: tatra dvividhaṃ bhaiṣajyaṃ / satatabhaiṣajyaṃ glānapratyayabhaiṣajyaṃ ca /
SA11sanssr_pu:611_3: tasmāt piṇḍapātrād ekaṃ pratyaṃśaṃ sabrahmacāriṇāṃ sthāpayati /
SA11sanssr_pu:611_4: dvitīyaṃ duṣkhitānāṃ tṛtīyaṃ vinipatitānāṃ caturtham ātmanā paribhuṅkte /
SA11sanssr_pu:611_7: yāpanāyai / tathā paribhuṅkte yathā nātisaṃlikhito bhavati /
SA11sanssr_pu:611_8: nātigurukāyaḥ / tat kasya hetoḥ / atisaṃlikhito hi kuśalapakṣaparāṅmukho bhavati /
SA11sanssr_pu:611_10: tena taṃ piṇḍapātaṃ paribhujya kuśalapakṣābhimukhena bhavitavyam ity ādi /
SA11sanssr_pu:612_0: āryaratnarāśāv apy uktaṃ / tena grāmaṃ vā nagaraṃ vā nigamaṃ vā piṇḍāya caratā dharmasaṃnāhaṃ saṃnahya piṇḍāya cartavyaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:612_4: evaṃ manāpāmanāpeṣu [doubtful] śabdagandharasaspraṣṭavyeṣu vijñapteṣu nānunetavyaṃ na pratihantavyaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:612_6: dāntājāneyacittena pūrvadharmamanasikāram annutsṛjatā nāmiṣaprakṣiptayā santatyā piṇḍāya cartavyaṃ sāvadānacāriṇā ca bhavitavyaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:612_7: yataś ca piṇḍapāto labhyate tatrānunayo na kartavyaḥ yataś ca na labhyate tatra pratighāto notpādayitavyaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:612_8: daśakulapraveśe na caikādaśāt kulād bhikṣā na labhyate /
SA11sanssr_pu:612_9: tathāpi na paritaptavyaṃ evaṃ ca cittam utpādayitavyam /
SA11sanssr_pu:612_10: evaṃ bahukṛtyā hy ete śramaṇabrāhmaṇagṛhapatayo na tair avaśyaṃ mama dātavyaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:612_11: idaṃ tāvad āścaryaṃ yan mām ete samanvāharanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:612_12: kaḥ punar vādo yad bhikṣāṃ dāsyanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:613_0: ye cāsya satvāś cakṣuṣu ābhāsam āgacchanti strīpuruṣadārakadārikāḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:613_2: tathāhaṃ kariṣyāmi yathā ye me satvāś cakṣuṣā ābhāsam āgacchanti piṇḍapātaṃ vā dāsyanti tān sugatigāminaḥ kariṣyāmi /
SA11sanssr_pu:613_3: tādṛśaṃ yogam āpatsye / tena lūhaṃ vā praṇītaṃ vā piṇḍapāta saṃgṛhya samantāc caturdiśaṃ vyavalokayitavyaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:613_6: yadi daridraṃ satvaṃ paśyati tena tatpiṇḍapātāt saṃvibhāgaḥ kartavyaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:613_7: atha na kañcit satvaṃ daridraṃ paśyati /
SA11sanssr_pu:613_9: santy annābhāsagatāḥ satvā ye mama cakṣuṣu ābhāsaṃ nāgacchanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:613_10: teṣām itaḥ piṇḍapātād agraṃ pratyaṃśaṃ niryātayāmi /
SA11sanssr_pu:613_11_0: dattādānāḥ paribhuñjatāṃ / tena tat piṇḍapātaṃ gṛhītvā tad araṇyāyatanam abhiruhya dhautapāṇinā śobhanasamācāreṇa śramaṇacāritrakalpasamatvāgatenādhiṣṭhānādhiṣṭhitena
SA11sanssr_pu:614_4: bodhiprāptaś ca punar dharmeṇa saṃgrahaṃ kariṣyāmi /
SA11sanssr_pu:614_5: yadi punar asya lūhaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ bhavati tenaivaṃ cittam utpādayitavyaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:614_6: lūhāhāratayā me laghuḥ kāyo bhaviṣyati prahāṇakṣama uccāraprasrāvaniṣyandanaś ca me parītto bhaviṣyati /
SA11sanssr_pu:614_10: yadā punar asya prabhūtaḥ piṇḍapāto bhavati tatrāpi mātrābhojinā bhavitavyaṃ utsarjanadharmiṇā ca /
SA11sanssr_pu:614_11: tataḥ piṇḍapātād anyatarāyāṃ śilāyām avatīryaivaṃ cittam utpādayitavyaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:614_12: ye kecin mṛgapakṣisaṃgā āmiṣabhojanenārthikās te dattādānāḥ paribhuñjatām iti /
SA11sanssr_pu:615_0: punar āha / tena sarveṇa rasasaṃjñā notpādayitavyā // pe //
SA11sanssr_pu:616_1: cittakāyacaukṣeṇa / na bhojanacaukṣeṇa / tat kasmād dhetoḥ / kiyatpraṇītam api bhojanaṃ bhuktaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:616_5: puruṣo me piṇḍapātaṃ dadti na strīḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:616_6: strī me piṇḍapātaṃ dadāti na puruṣaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:616_7: dārako me piṇḍapātaṃ dadāti na dārikā /
SA11sanssr_pu:616_8: dārikā me piṇḍapātaṃ dadāti na dārakaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:616_11: capalaṃ labhe 'haṃ na kṛcchreṇa praviṣṭamātraṃ ca māṃ samanvāhareyuḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:616_14: na hīnadaridrabhojanaṃ labhe 'haṃ pratyudgaccheyur māṃ strīpuruṣadārakadārikāḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:617_0: prāyeṇa hi satvā rasagṛddhā bhojanahetoḥ pāpāni karmāṇi kṛtvā narakeṣūpapadyante /
SA11sanssr_pu:617_1: ye ye punaḥ saṃtuṣṭā agṛddhā alulopā rasapratiprasrabdhā jihvendriyasaṃtuṣṭāḥ kiyallūhenāpi bhojanena jñāpayanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:617_5: evaṃ kāśyapa piṇḍacārikeṇa bhikṣuṇā rasatṛṣṇāṃ vinivartayitvā nidhyaptacittena suparipakvān kulmāṣān paribhuñjatā na paritaptavyam /
SA11sanssr_pu:617_6: tat kasmād dhetoḥ / kāyasaṃdhāraṇārthaṃ mārgasaṃdhāraṇārthaṃ mayā bhojanaṃ paribhoktavyaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:618_0: yadi punaḥ kāśyapa piṇḍacāriko bhikṣur meghākulavṛṣṭikālasamaye vartamāne na śaknuyāt piṇḍāyāvatartuṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:618_1: tena maitryāhārasaṃnaddhena dharmacintāmanasikārapratiṣṭhitena dvirātraṃ trirātraṃ vā bhaktacchadacchinnena evaṃ saṃjñotpādayitavyā /
SA11sanssr_pu:618_2: santi yāmalaukikāḥ pretā duṣkarakarmakāriṇo ye varṣaśatena kheṭapiṇḍam apy āhāraṃ na pratilabhante /
SA11sanssr_pu:618_3: tan mayā dharmayoniśaś cintāpratiṣṭhitena kāyadaurbalyaṃ vā cittadaurbalyaṃ vā notpādayitavyaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:619_0: yatra kule piṇḍapātaṃ śuciṃ kārayet tatra kule āsane niṣadya dhārmī kathā kartavyā /
SA11sanssr_pu:619_1: yāvan na sa piṇḍapātaḥ śucīkrṭo bhavet tena piṇḍapātaṃ gṛhītvā utthāyāsanāt prakramitavyaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:619_2: piṇḍacārikeṇa kāśyapa bhikṣuṇā nāvabhāsakareṇa bhavitavyaṃ na lapanā na kuhanā kartavyā /
SA11sanssr_pu:620_0: tatra katamo 'vabhāsaḥ / yat pareṣām evaṃ vācaṃ bhāṣate /
SA11sanssr_pu:620_1: lūho me piṇḍapāto rukṣo me piṇḍapāta āsīn na ca me yāvadarthaṃ bhuktaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:620_5: iyam ucyate cittakuhanā / sarvam etat piṇḍacārikeṇa bhikṣuṇā na kartavyaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:620_6: upekṣakabhūtena / yat pātre patitaṃ lūhaṃ vā praṇītaṃ vā śubhaṃ vāśubhaṃ vā tat paribhoktavyam aparitapyamānenāśayaśuddhena dharmanidhyaptibahulena /
SA11sanssr_pu:620_7: kāyajāpanārtham āryamārgasyopastambhārthaṃ sa piṇḍapātaḥ paribhoktavya iti /
SA11sanssr_pu:621_1: yasyāś cāntike piṇḍapātaṃ paribhujya na śaknoty ātmanaḥ parasya cārthaṃ paripūrayitum anujānāmy ahaṃ tasya piṇḍacārikasya bodhisatvasya nimantraṇam iti /
SA11sanssr_pu:623_0: tathā hy uktaṃ / māṃsaṃ sarvam abhakṣyaṃ kṛpātmāno bodhisatvasyeti vadāmi // pe //
SA11sanssr_pu:624_0: svājanyād vyabhicārāc ca śukraśoṇitasaṃbhavāt / udvejanīyaṃ bhūtānāṃ yogī māṃsaṃ vivarjayet //
SA11sanssr_pu:625_0: māṃsāni ca palāṇḍūṃś ca madyāni vividhāni ca / gṛñjanaṃ laśunaṃ caiva yogī nityaṃ vivarjayet //
SA11sanssr_pu:626_0: mrakṣaṇaṃ varjayet tailaṃ śalyaviddheṣu na svapet /
SA11sanssr_pu:626_1: chidrāchidreṣu satvānāṃ yac ca sthānaṃ mahābhayam /
SA11sanssr_pu:627_0: lābhārthaṃ hanyate prāṇī māṃsārthaṃ dīyate dhanaṃ / ubhau tau pāpakarmāṇau pacyete rauravādiṣu //
SA11sanssr_pu:629_0: yo 'tikramya muner vākyaṃ māṃsaṃ bhakṣeta durmatiḥ / lokadvayavināśārthaṃ dīkṣitaḥ śākyaśāsane //
SA11sanssr_pu:630_0: te yānti paramaṃ ghoraṃ narakaṃ pāpakaṝiṇaḥ / rauravādiṣu raudreṣu pacyante māṃsakhādakāḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:631_0: trikoṭikṣuddhaṃ māṃsaṃ vai akalpitam ayācitaṃ / acoditaṃ ca naivāsti tasmān māṃsaṃ na bhakṣyayet //
SA11sanssr_pu:632_0: māṃsaṃ na bhakṣyayed yogī mayā buddhaiś ca garhitaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:634_0: durgandhaḥ kutsanīyaś ca utmattaś cāpi jāyate / caṇḍālapukkasakule ḍombeṣu ca punaḥ punaḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:635_0: ḍākinījātiyonau ca māṃsāde jāyate kule / ṛkṣamārjarayonau ca jāyate 'sau narādhamaḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:636_0: hastikakṣye mahāmeghe nirvāṇāṅgulimālike / laṅkāvatārasūtre ca mayā māṃsaṃ vigarhitaṃ //
SA11sanssr_pu:637_0: buddhaiś ca bodhisatvaiś ca śrāvakaiś ca vigarhitaṃ / khādate yadi nirlajja unmatto jāyate sadā //
SA11sanssr_pu:638_0: brāhmaṇeṣu ca jāyante atha vā yogināṃ kule / prajñāvān dhanavāṃś caiva māṃsādyānāṃ vivarjanāt //
SA11sanssr_pu:639_0: dṛṣṭaśrutaviśaṅkābhiḥ sarvaṃ māṃsaṃ vivarjayet / tārkikā nāvabudhyante kravyādakulasaṃbhavāḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:640_0: yathaiṣa rāgo mokṣasya antarāyakaro bhavet / tathaiva māṃsamadyādi antarāyakaraṃ bhavet //
SA11sanssr_pu:641_0: vakṣanty annāgate kāle māṃsādā mohavādinaḥ / kalpikaṃ niravadyaṃ ca māṃsaṃ buddhānuvarṇitaṃ //
SA11sanssr_pu:642_0: bheṣajyam iva āhāraṃ putramāṃsopamaṃ punaḥ / mātrayā pratikūlaṃ ca yogī piṇḍaṃ samācaret //
SA11sanssr_pu:643_0: maitrīvihāriṇā nityaṃ sarvathā garhitaṃ mayā / siṃhavyāghramṛgādyaiś ca saha ekatra saṃbhavet //
SA11sanssr_pu:644_0: tasmān na bhakṣayen māṃsam udvejajanakaṃ nṛṇāṃ / mokṣadharmaniruddhatvād āryāṇām eṣa vai dhvajaḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:644_1: yat tu jñānavatīparivarte māṃsabhakṣaṇaṃ paṭhyate tan mahārthasādhakatvān nirdoṣam //
SA11sanssr_pu:645_0: evaṃ hi tathoktaṃ / eṣo 'kariṣyad yadi bhikṣu kālaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:646_0: na ca mahākaruṇābhiyuktam / tena asmin na maitrī śaṅkāpi nāstīty adoṣaḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:647_0: yady apy āryaratnameghe 'bhihitaṃ / śmāśānikena nirāmiṣeṇa bhavitavyam iti //
SA11sanssr_pu:648_1: vinaye 'pi yad anujñātaṃ tat tu trikoṭipariśuddhabhakṣaṇe na prahāṇāntarāya iti /
SA11sanssr_pu:649_1: tatra tatra deśanā pāṭhe śikṣāpadānām ānupūrvīṃ bandhan niśreṇīpadavinyāsayogena /
SA11sanssr_pu:649_2: trikoṭiṃ baddhvā / tatra uddiṣya krṭāni pratiṣiddhāni tato 'ntaśaḥ prakṛtimṛtāny api pratiṣiddhānīti /
SA11sanssr_pu:650_0: uktaṃ satatabhaiṣajyaṃ / glānapratyayabhaiṣajyaṃ tat sevyam eva //
SA11sanssr_pu:651_0: śrāvakavinaye 'pi tāvad ātmārthaṃ brahmacaryavāsārthaṃ pātracīvaram api vikrīya /
SA11sanssr_pu:651_1: kāyasaṃdhāraṇam uktaṃ / kiṃ punar aparimitajanaparitrāṇahetor bodhisatvaśarīrasya durlabhā cedṛśī kṣaṇapratilābhotsavasampad /
SA11sanssr_pu:651_2: iti tatpradarśanārthaṃ ca bhagavatā tatra svayaṃ bhaiṣajyopayogaḥ pradarśitaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:652_0: uktaṃ cāryaratnameghasūtre / tair yadā pracāritaṃ bhavati tadā satyāṃ velāyām asatyāṃ vā teṣām imāny evaṃrūpāṇi kāyopastambhanāny upakaraṇāni na labhyante 'bhyavahartuṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:652_1: yad uta sarpir vā tailaṃ vā mūlaraso vā gaṇḍaraso vā phalaraso vā /
SA11sanssr_pu:652_2: na cānyān abhyavaharato dṛṣṭvā pratighacittam utpādayati /
SA11sanssr_pu:652_3: yadi punaḥ khalu paścādbhaktiko bodhisatvo vā glāno bhavati /
SA11sanssr_pu:652_4: yathārūpeṇāsya glānyena jīvitāntarāyo bhavati kuśalapakṣāntarāyo vā tena niṣkaukṛtyena bhūtvā nirvicikitsakena bhaiṣajyacittam upasthāpya pratinisevyānīti /
SA11sanssr_pu:653_1: hrīrapatrāpyakāpair niḥ... [doubtful] pracchādanārthaṃ tu śramaṇaliṅgasaṃdarśanārtham imāni ca kāṣāyāṇi devamānuṣāsurasya lokasya caityam iti /
SA11sanssr_pu:653_4: na rāgaraktāni / upaśamānukūlāny etāni / na saṃkleśasaṃdhukṣaṇānukūlāni /
SA11sanssr_pu:653_7: etāni ca kāṣāyāṇy āryamārgasaṃbhārānukūlānīti kṛtvā tathā kariṣyāmo yathā naikakṣaṇam api sakaṣāyāḥ kāye kāṣāyāṇi dhārayiṣyāma iti /
SA11sanssr_pu:654_1: ye punas te kāśyapa vaidaryā asaṃyatā itaḥ śramaṇaguṇadharmād uddhurāḥ kāye kāṣāyāṇi vastrāṇi dhārayanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:654_4: tatra kāśyapa pratyekanarake śramaṇarūpapratirūpeṇa tāḥ kāraṇāḥ kāryante ādīptacailā ādīptaśīrṣā ādīptapātrā ādīptāsanā ādīptaśayanāḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:654_5: yaḥ kaścit tatra teṣām upabhogaparibhogaḥ sa sarva ādīptaḥ saṃprajvalita ekajvālībhūtaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:654_6: tatra taiḥ śramaṇavarṇarūpeṇa duṣkhāṃ vedanām anubhavantīti /
SA11sanssr_pu:655_0: āryaratnameghe 'py uktaṃ / yadi bhaved abhyavakāśiko bodhisatvo glānakāyo 'pratibalakāyas tena vihārakṣitenaivaṃ cittam utpādayitavyaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:655_2: tathāhaṃ kariṣyāmi yathā vihārasya eva kleśānāṃ prahāṇāya ghaṭiṣyāmi /
SA11sanssr_pu:655_3: tatra ca vihāre na gṛddhim utpādayāmi nādhyavasānaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:655_4: evaṃ cāsya bhavati / kartavyo dānapatīnām anugraho nāsmābhir ātmambharibhir bhavitavyam iti /
SA11sanssr_pu:656_0: punar atraivāha / te śayyāṃ kalpayanto dakṣiṇena pārśvena śayyāṃ kalpayanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:656_1: pādasyopari pādam ādhāya cīvaraiḥ asaṃvṛtakāyāḥ smṛtāḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:656_4: na pārśvasukham anytra yāvad evaiṣāṃ mahābhūtānāṃ sthitaye jāpanāyai /
SA11sanssr_pu:656_5: ity anayā diśā sarvaparibhogāḥ satvārtham adhiṣṭhātavyāḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:659_1: atha tasyām eva parṣadi yogācārāṇāṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ dve śate imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ śrutvā prarudite /
SA11sanssr_pu:659_2: evaṃ ca vācam abhāṣanta / kālaṃ vayaṃ bhagavan kariṣyāmo /
SA11sanssr_pu:659_3: na punar aprāptaphalā ekapiṇḍapātam api śraddhādeyasya paribhokṣyāmaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:660_0: bhagavān āha / sādhu sādhu kulaputrā evaṃrūpair lajjābhiḥ kaukṛtyasaṃpannaiḥ paralokāvadyabhayadarśibhir idaṃ pravacanaṃ śobhate /
SA11sanssr_pu:662_1: katamayor dvayoḥ / yuktasya muktasya ca / yadi bhikṣavo bhikṣur yukto yogācāro mama śikṣāyāṃ pratipannaḥ sarvasaṃskāreṣv anityadarśī /
SA11sanssr_pu:662_2: sarvasaṃskāraduḥkhaviditaḥ sarvadharmeṣv annātmādhimuktiḥ śāntanirvāṇābhikāṅkṣī sumerumātrair ālopaiḥ śraddhādeyaṃ bhuñjīta /
SA11sanssr_pu:662_4: yeṣāṃ ca dāyakānāṃ dānapatīnāṃ sakāśāc chraddhādeyaṃ paribhuktaṃ tatas teṣāṃ dāyakadānapatīnāṃ maharddhikaḥ puṇyavipāko bhavati /
SA11sanssr_pu:662_5: mahādyutikaḥ / tat kasmād dhetoḥ / agram idam aupadhikānāṃ puṇyakriyāvastūnāṃ yeyaṃ maitracittasamāpattiḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:662_6_0: tatra kāśyapa yo bhikṣur dāyakasya dānapater antikāc cīvarapiṇḍapātaṃ paribhujyāpramāṇaṃ cetaḥsamādhiṃ samāpadyate 'pramāṇas
SA11sanssr_pu:662_7: syāt kāśyapa trisāhasramahāsāhasrāyāṃ lokadhātau mahāsamudrāṇāṃ kṣayo na tv eva tasya puṇyaniṣyandanasya kaścit kṣaya iti /
SA11sanssr_pu:663_0: tad evaṃ piṇḍapātagamanaārambhe bhojanārambhe vā triṣu sthāneṣu smṛtir upasthāpyā dāyakānugrahe /
SA11sanssr_pu:664_0: tathāgatājñāsaṃpādane tu sarvakāryeṣu smṛtiḥ kāryā / ādiśabdān mantrair api rakṣā kāryā //
SA11sanssr_pu:665_0: tatrāpi tāvad imāṃ trisamayarājoktāṃ vidyāṃ maṇḍalasamayārtham uccārayet /
SA11sanssr_pu:667_0: athavā tathāgatahṛdayam aṣṭasahastraṃ japet salaukikalokottaramaṇḍalapraviṣṭo bhavati /
SA11sanssr_pu:669_2: anenādikarmikā api satveṣv anantaṃ buddhakṛtyaṃ kurvanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:669_3: ayam eva paramāṃ rakṣāṃ mārādibhyaḥ sarvaduṣṭebhyaḥ karoti /
SA11sanssr_pu:669_4: hastatāḍena bhasmanā sarṣapair udakena dṛṣṭyā manasā vā sīmābandhaṃ karoti /
SA11sanssr_pu:670_1: vanakusumāni vā caitye pratimāyāṃ saddharmapustake vā samāhito nivedayet //
SA11sanssr_pu:671_1: buddhabodhisatvālambanena sarvasatvārthābhilāṣiṇā ca cittena bhadracarividhipūrvakaṃ ca japtavyaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:671_6: na mañcārohaḥ kartavyaḥ / na madyaṃ pātavyaṃ / adhimukticaryā śikṣāpadeṣv acalasya nirvicikitsasya duḥśīlapūrvasyāpi sidhyati /
SA11sanssr_pu:672_0: tathā cātraivoktaṃ / bodhicittaṃ dṛḍhaṃ yasya niḥsaṃgā ca matir bhavet /
SA11sanssr_pu:672_1: vicikitsā naiva kartavyā tasyedaṃ sidhyati dhruvam /
SA11sanssr_pu:673_0: bodhicittadṛḍhatā cātra pṛthagjanacalacittatāyā niyamārtham uktā na tu bhūmipraviṣṭam adhikṛtya //
SA11sanssr_pu:674_0: yasmād atroktaṃ / pratyuddhāratām avabhāsatāṃ ca pratilabdhukāmena /
SA11sanssr_pu:674_3: tathā kuto mamālpapuṇyasya siddhir iti nīcacittapratiṣedhaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:674_4: na cātikrāntadurgater utsāhormibahulasyopacitāprameyapuṇyaskandhasya bhūmipraviṣṭasyāyaṃ pūrvokto doṣaḥ saṃbhavati /
SA11sanssr_pu:674_5: atra ca mantrāṇām ajñānān nādhikākṣarapāṭhe doṣo 'sti /
SA11sanssr_pu:674_6_0: nāpi nyūnatādoṣaḥ / nāpi vidhibhraṃsadoṣaḥ / kiṃtu śraddhāvegaṃ bodhicittavegaṃ sarvotsargavegaṃ ca pramāṇīkṛtyāvicārataḥ
SA11sanssr_pu:674_6_1: pravartitavyam avaśyaṃ buddhabodhisatvam ihaiva yatheṣṭasiddhiś ca bhavati /
SA11sanssr_pu:675_2: cala / vajra / śāntana / phalana / cara / māraṇa / vajraḍālaphaṭa / lalitaśikhara samantavajriṇi /
SA11sanssr_pu:675_3: jvala / namo 'stu te agrograśāsānānāṃ raṇa haṃ phula sphāṭa vajrottame svāhā /
SA11sanssr_pu:676_1: devanāgādayo na prasahante / bhojanapānaśayanāsanavasanapūjopakaraṇāni cābhimantritena jalena dṛṣṭyā manasā vā rakṣeta /
SA11sanssr_pu:678_0: namaḥ samantavajrāṇāṃ trāṭa / amogha caṇḍamahāroṣaṇa sphāṭaya hūṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:678_1: bhrāmaya hūṃ / trāṭa hūṃ / māṃ / oṃ balaṃ dade tejomālini svāhā /
SA11sanssr_pu:679_0: anena prathamaṃ piṇḍam aṣṭābhimantritaṃ bhuñjīta bhaiṣajyarājatāṃ buddhabodhisatvānām anusmṛtya //
SA11sanssr_pu:682_0: ya imāṃ vidyāṃ sakṛc chṛṇoti sa sapta varṣāṇy ahinā na daśyate /

SA11sanssr_pu:686_0_0: tad yathā / parākramasi / udayam asi / vairam asi arkam asi / markam asi / vanam asi / antarddhānam asi / pathe me rakṣa /

SA11sanssr_pu:695_1: atha vitṛṣṇo 'nyāsakto vā satvakāryam anusmṛtya bhuṅkte na kliṣṭām āpattim āpadyate /
