SA11sanssr_pu:697_0: na caikāntasvāmyarthaparasya dāsasya vyādhyādiviklavamateḥ svāminam annanujñāpyāpi bhuñjānasya kaścid doṣaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:697_1: nāpy evaṃ kurvāṇasya bodhisatvasyāntike kasyacid viditavṛttāntasyāpy aprasādo yujyate mātsaryatyāgacittāparijñānāt /
SA11sanssr_pu:698_0: na cātra nyāye kaścit saṃdeho yuktaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:698_1: sarvotsargo hi pūrvam eva bhagavatkaṇṭhoktyā pratipāditaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:698_3: tasya spaṣṭāvabodhārtham ayaṃ nyāyo 'bhiyukto na tu svārthāpekṣayeti /
SA11sanssr_pu:701_0: bhogapuṇyarakṣā saptamaḥ paricchedaḥ evaṃ tāvad ātmabhāvarakṣā veditavyā /
SA11sanssr_pu:701_1: bhogarakṣā tu vaktavyā / tatra sukṛtārambhiṇā bhāvyaṃ mātrajñena ca sarvata iti śikṣāpadād asya bhogarakṣā na duṣkarā /
SA11sanssr_pu:703_0: tenedaṃ siddhaṃ bhavati / yad idaṃ / alpādhamabhogenāpi kāryasiddhau satyāṃ svayam anyair vā bahūttamabhoganāśanopekṣā na kāryeti /
SA11sanssr_pu:704_3: adhikasatvārthaśaktes tulyaśakter vā bodhisatvasyādhikatulyakuśalāntarāyakarau tyāgātyāgau na kāryāv iti siddhaṃ bhavatīti /
SA11sanssr_pu:705_1: yas tu khalu punaḥ śāriputrābhiniṣkrāntagṛhāvāso bodhisatvo bodhyaṅgair abhiyuktas tena kathaṃ dānaṃ dātavyaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:706_1: yaś ca śāriputra gṛhī bodhisatvo gaṅgānadīvālikāsamāni buddhakṣetrāṇi saptaratnapratipūrṇāni kṛtvā tathāgatebhyo 'rhadbhyaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhebhyo dānaṃ dadyād /
SA11sanssr_pu:706_2: yaś ca śāriputra pravrajyāparyāpanno bodhisatva ekāṃ catuṣpadikāṃ gāthāṃ prakāśayed ayam eva tato bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavati /
SA11sanssr_pu:707_0: yasya khalu punaḥ śāriputra pātrāgataḥ pātraparyāpanno lābho bhaved dhārmiko dharmalabdhaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:707_2: sacet punaḥ kaścid evāgatya pātraṃ vā cīvaraṃ vā yāceta /
SA11sanssr_pu:707_4: yathā parityaktaṃ dātavyaṃ / sacet punas tasyonaṃ cīvaraṃ bhaved yan niśritya brahmacaryavāsaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:707_5: tan na parityaktavyaṃ / tat kasya hetoḥ / avisarjanīyaṃ tricīvaram uktaṃ tathāgatena /
SA11sanssr_pu:707_6: sacet punaḥ śāriputra bodhisatvaḥ tricīvaraṃ parityajya yācanakaguruko bhaven na tenālpecchatā āsevitā bhavet /
SA11sanssr_pu:707_7: yas tu khalu punaḥ śāriputrābhiniṣkrāntagṛhāvāso bodhisatvas tena dharma āsevitavyaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:708_0: anyathā hy ekasaṃgrahārthaṃ mahataḥ satvarāśes tasya ca satvasya bodhisatvāśayaparikarmāntarāyān mahato 'rthasya hāniḥ kṛtā syād /
SA11sanssr_pu:709_1: yo 'yaṃ vidhir ātmany uktaḥ so 'nyasminn api bodhisatve pratipādya iti kuto gamyate /
SA11sanssr_pu:710_2: āha / saṃsārabhayabhītena mañjuśrīr bodhisatvena buddhamāhātmyaṃ pratisartavyaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:711_0: tathā ca dharmasaṅgītau sārthavāho bodhisatva āha /
SA11sanssr_pu:711_1: yo bhagavan bodhisatvaḥ sarvasatvānāṃ prathamataraṃ bodhim icchati nātmanaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:712_1: kiṃ tu satvārthahānibhayād ayogye satve subharaṃ nāropayati /
SA11sanssr_pu:712_2: yatra tu satvārthahāniṃ na paśyati tatra svayaṃ kṛtam anyena vā jagad dhitam ācaritam iti ko viśeṣo /
SA11sanssr_pu:712_3: yad ayam aparabodhisatvakuśalasiddhaye na svakuśalam utsṛjati /
SA11sanssr_pu:712_6: atha tadduṣkhena me bādhā nāstīty upekṣate /
SA11sanssr_pu:713_0: yathā ca ratnakūṭasūtre / catvāra ime kāśyapa bodhisatvapratirūpakā ity ārabhyoktaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:714_0: tasmād ugraparipṛcchāvidhinā pūrvavad ātmā garhaṇīyaḥ eṣā tu bodhisatvaśikṣā yathāryanirārambheṇa dharmasaṅgītisūtre nirdiṣṭā /
SA11sanssr_pu:714_4: āha / yan maitrīṃ ca mahākaruṇāṃ ca na tyajanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:714_6: āha / yat kāyajīvitaṃ ca sarvakuśalamūlaṃ ca sarvasatvānāṃ niryātayanti na ca pratikāraṃ kāṅkṣanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:714_8: yat pūrvataraṃ satvānāṃ bodhim icchanti nātmana iti /
SA11sanssr_pu:715_3: yena dātur mahādakṣiṇīye mahārthadānān mahāpuṇyasāgaravistaro dṛśyate /
SA11sanssr_pu:715_4: anyathā tu kevalam eva vighātino maraṇaṃ syāt /
SA11sanssr_pu:716_1: ya eṣa te mahārāja varṣaśatasahasreṇa parivyayo 'tra praviṣṭaḥ sa sarvaḥ piṇḍīkṛtyaikasya bhikṣor yātrā bhaved evaṃ pratyekaṃ sarvabhikṣūṇāṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:716_2: yaś coddeśasvādhyāyābhiyukto bodhisatvaḥ sagauravo dharmakamaḥ śraddhādeyam āhāraṃ parigṛhyaivaṃ cittam utpādayet /
SA11sanssr_pu:716_4: asya kuśalasyaiṣa deyadharmaparityāgaḥ śatatamīm api kalāṃ nopaitīti /
SA11sanssr_pu:717_0: tad gṛhasukhapaliśuddham adhikṛtyoktaṃ / na tu pūrvoktavidhinā kaścid doṣaḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:718_0: ukto samāsatā bhogarakṣā / puṇyarakṣā vācyā / tatra svārthavipākavaitṛṣṇyāc chubhaṃ saṃrakṣitaṃ bhavet /
SA11sanssr_pu:719_2: na svargahetoḥ / na śakratvahetoḥ / na bhogahetoḥ / naiśvaryahetoḥ / na rūpahetor na varṇahetor na yaśohetoḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:722_0: sa evaṃrūpeṇa śīlaskandhena samanvāgato bodhisatvo daśabhir dharmair na hīyate /
SA11sanssr_pu:722_1: katamair daśabhiḥ / yad uta na cakravartirājyāt parihīyate /
SA11sanssr_pu:722_2: tatra ca bhavaty apramatto bodhipratikāṅkṣī buddhadarśanam abhikāṅkṣate /
SA11sanssr_pu:722_3: evaṃ brahmatvād buddhadarśanābhedyapratilambhād dharmaśravaṇān na parihīyate /
SA11sanssr_pu:723_0: evaṃ śīlaskandhapratiṣṭhito bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ sadā namaḥkṛto bhavati devaiḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:723_3: sadā pūjito bhavati gandharvaiḥ sadāpacāyitaś ca bhavati nāgendrāsurendraiḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:723_7: śāstṛsaṃmataś ca bhavati sadevakasya lokasyānukampakaś ca bhavati sarvasatvānāṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:724_0: catasro gatīr na gacchati / katamāś catasro / yad utākṣaṇagatiṃ na gacchaty anyatra satvaparipākāt /
SA11sanssr_pu:725_0: evaṃ pūrvotsṛṣṭasyāpi puṇyasya kleśavaśāt punar upādīyamānasya rakṣā kāryā /
SA11sanssr_pu:725_1: puṇyadānād api yat puṇyaṃ tato 'pi na vipākaḥ prārthanīyo 'nyatra parārthāt /
SA11sanssr_pu:726_0: yathoktam ugraparipṛcchāyāṃ / dattvā ca na vipratisāracittam utpādayitavyam iti //
SA11sanssr_pu:727_0: pṛṣṭhadaurbalyād daurbalyaṃ / vipratisārāt pāpavat puṇyasyāpi kṣayaḥ syād ity abhiprāyaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:727_1: na ca kṛtvā prakāśayed / annekaparyāyeṇa hi bhagavatā prachannakalyāṇatā /
SA11sanssr_pu:727_2: vivṛtapāpatā varṇitā / tatra vivṛtasay kṣayo gamyate /
SA11sanssr_pu:727_3: pāpasya daurmanasyenaiva puṇyasya saumanasyenāpattiḥ satvārthaṃ nirāmiṣacittasya prakāśayataḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:728_0: yathā ratnameghe vaidyadṛṣṭāntena ātmotkarṣo nirdoṣa uktaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:728_1: punaḥ puṇyarakṣā kāmo lābhasatkārabhītaḥ syād unnatiṃ varjayet sadā /
SA11sanssr_pu:728_2: bodhisatvo prasannaḥ syād dharme vimatim utsṛjet /
SA11sanssr_pu:729_0: idaṃ ca ratnakūṭe 'bhihitaṃ / caturbhiḥ kāśyapa dharmaiḥ samanvāgatasya bodhisatvasyotpannotpannāḥ kuśalā dharmāḥ parihīyante /
SA11sanssr_pu:729_1: yaiḥ caturbhir muktāḥ na vardhante kuśaladharmaiḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:730_1: paśyadhvaṃ bhikṣava etaṃ bhikṣuṃ keśanakhastūpe sarvāṅgena praṇipatya cittam abhiprasādayantam /
SA11sanssr_pu:730_2: evaṃ bhadanta / anena bhikṣavo bhikṣuṇā yāvatī bhūmir ākrāntādharaśītiyojanasahasrāṇi yāvat kāñcanacakraṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:730_3: atrāntare yāvantyā vālikās tāvanty anena bhikṣuṇā cakravartirājyasahasrāṇi paribhoktavyāni /
SA11sanssr_pu:730_4: yāvad athāyuṣmān upālir yena bhagavān tenāñjaliṃ praṇamya bhagavantam idam avocat /
SA11sanssr_pu:730_5: yad uktaṃ bhagavatāsya bhikṣor evaṃ mahānti kuśalamūlāni /
SA11sanssr_pu:730_6: kutremāni bhagavan kuśalamūlāni tanutvaṃ parikṣayaṃ paryādānaṃ gacchanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:730_7: nāham upāle evaṃ kṣatiṃ copahatiṃ ca samanupaśyāmi /
SA11sanssr_pu:730_9: atropāle imāni mahānti kuśalamūlāni tanutvaṃ parikṣayaṃ paryādānaṃ gacchanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:730_10: tasmāt tarhy upāle evaṃ śikṣitavyaṃ yad dagdhasthūṇāyām api cittaṃ na pradūṣayiṣyāmaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:731_1: pratighaḥ pratigha iti kalpaśatopacitaṃ kuśalamūlaṃ pratihanti tenocyate pratigha iti /
SA11sanssr_pu:732_0: āryagaṇḍavyūhasūtre ca samantasatvaparitrāṇy ojasaḥ striyā rātridevatayā pūrvāvadānaṃ kathayantyābhihitaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:732_2: varṇād api balād api parihīyante smeti /
SA11sanssr_pu:732_3: atra ca na kadācid unnatiḥ kāryeti pradarśanārthaṃ sadety ucyate /
SA11sanssr_pu:733_1: yathoktaṃ āryaratnameghe / iha kulaputra bodhisatvaḥ sumerumātram api ratnarāśiṃ labhamānaḥ pratigṛhṇāti /
SA11sanssr_pu:733_3: tat kasya hetoḥ / tasyaivaṃ bhavati / ete satvā matsariṇo lubdhā lobhābhibhūtāḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:733_4: taddhetoḥ tatpratyayaṃ tannidānaṃ mahāvāriskandhāvaṣṭabdā iva saṃsārasāgare unmajjanimajjanaṃ kurvanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:733_5: tad eṣāṃ bhaviṣyati dīrgharātram arthāya hitāya sukhāya /
SA11sanssr_pu:733_7: na lobhacittam utpādayati / anyatra sarvasatvasādhāraṇāṃ buddhadharmasaṃgheṣu kārāṃ karoti /
SA11sanssr_pu:733_8: yathā duṣkhitānāṃ ca sarvasatvānām upajīvyaṃ karoti /
SA11sanssr_pu:734_0: tathātraivoktaṃ / tena ca dānena nonnato bhavatīti //
SA11sanssr_pu:735_0: punar atraivāha / yadi punar asya taddhetos tatpratyayaṃ tannidānaṃ kīrtiśabdaśloko bhavati tatra nonnāmajāto bhavati na mānajāto na madajātaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:735_1: evaṃ cāsya bhavati / na cireṇa kālena yasya cāyaṃ kīrtiślokaśabdaḥ samutthito yaiś ca samutthāpito yaś ca kīrtiśabdaślokas trayam apy etat sarveṇa sarvaṃ na bhaviṣyati /
SA11sanssr_pu:735_2: tatra kaḥ paṇḍitajātīyo 'nityeṣu na ca sthiteṣu dharmeṣv adhruveṣv annāśvāsikeṣv anunayacittam utpādayed unnato bhaven mānadarpito vā /
SA11sanssr_pu:735_3: evaṃ hi bodhisatvo lābhasatkārakīrtiśabdaślokeṣu sūpasthitasmṛtir viharatīti /
SA11sanssr_pu:736_0: punar āha / caṇḍālakumāropamāś ca loke viharanti nīcanīcena manasā /
SA11sanssr_pu:736_1: mānamadadarpādhigatāś ca bhavanti paiśunyasaṃjñāyāḥ satatasamitaṃ pratyupasthitatvād iti /
SA11sanssr_pu:737_0: punar apy uktaṃ / iha kulaputrābhiniṣkrāntagṛhavāsaḥ pravrajito bodhisatvo mṛtakasadṛśo 'haṃ mitrāmātyajñātisālohitānām iti nihatamāno bhavati /
SA11sanssr_pu:737_1: vairūpyaṃ me 'bhyudgataṃ vivarṇāni ca me vāsāṃsi prāvṛtāny anyaś ca me ākalpaḥ saṃvṛtta iti nihatamāno bhavati /
SA11sanssr_pu:737_2: muṇḍaḥ pātrapāṇiḥ kulāt kulam upasaṃkramāmi bhikṣāhetor bhikṣānidānam iti nihatamāno bhavati /
SA11sanssr_pu:737_3: nīcanīcena cittena caṇḍālakumārasadṛśena piṇḍāya carāmīti nihatamāno bhavati /
SA11sanssr_pu:737_4: paiṇḍiliko 'smi saṃvṛtaḥ / parapratibaddhā ca me jīviketi nihatamāno bhavati /
SA11sanssr_pu:737_6: ārādhanīyā me ācāryagurudakṣiṇīyā iti nihatamāno bhavati /
SA11sanssr_pu:737_8: yad uta tena tenācāragocarasamudācāreṇeti nihatamāno bhavati /
SA11sanssr_pu:737_10: kruddhānāṃ vyāpannacittānāṃ satvānāṃ madhye kṣāntibahulo vihariṣyāmīti nihatamāno bhavatīti /
SA11sanssr_pu:738_4: na kāyamaṇḍanayogānuyuktaḥ / sa kiyad dhīnānām api satvānāṃ rūpavikalānām apy avanamati praṇamati dharmagrāhyatām upādāyeti /
SA11sanssr_pu:739_0: punar atraivoktaṃ / syād yathāpi nāma bhagavan yadā mahāsāgaraḥ pratisaṃtiṣṭhate tadā nimne pṛthivīpradeśe saṃtiṣṭhate /
SA11sanssr_pu:739_1: tasya nimnatvād alpakṛcchreṇa sarvanadyaś ca sarvapraśravaṇāni ca prapatanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:739_2: evam eva bhagavan nirmānasya gurudakṣiṇīyagauravasya bodhisatvasyālpakṛcchreṇa tāni gambhīrāṇi dharmasukhāni śrotendriyasyābhāsam āgacchanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:739_3_0: smṛtau cāvatiṣṭhante / tasmāt tarhi bhagavan yo bodhisatvo mānonnato bhavati mānastabdhaḥ na ca gurudakṣiṇīyebhyo 'vanamati
SA11sanssr_pu:739_3_1: na praṇamati veditavyaṃ bhagavan mārāṅkuśāviddho vatāyaṃ bodhisatva iti /
SA11sanssr_pu:740_2: katamāni daśa / yad idaṃ gurudakṣiṇīyācāryamātāpitṛśramaṇabrāhmaṇasamyaggatasamyakpratipanneṣv agauravatā mārakarma /
SA11sanssr_pu:740_3: dharmabhāṇakānāṃ viśiṣṭadharmādhigatānām udāradharmadeśakānāṃ mahāyānasamārūḍhānāṃ nirvāṇapathavidhijñānāṃ dhāraṇīsūtrāntarājapratilabdhānāṃ nāvanamati /
SA11sanssr_pu:740_4: garvitastabdhaś ca bhavati / dharmabhāṇake na gauravam utpādayati /
SA11sanssr_pu:740_6: mārakarma dharmaśravaṇasāṃkathye ca niṣaṇṇae udāradharmavege samutpanne dharmabhāṇakasya sādhukāraṃ na prayacchati mā kaścid asmin praśaṃsatīti mārakarma /
SA11sanssr_pu:741_1: parāṃś ca na gṛhṇāti / ātmajñatāṃ ca nāvatarati / cittanidhyaptiṃ notpādayati /
SA11sanssr_pu:742_0: adhimānaṃ cotpādyājānann abudhyamāno varṇārhāṇāṃ pudgalānāṃ varṇaṃ praticchādayati /
SA11sanssr_pu:742_1: avarṇaṃ bhāṣate / na ca parasya guṇavarṇenāttamanā bhavati /
SA11sanssr_pu:743_0: jānāti ca / ayaṃ dharmo 'yaṃ vinayo bhūtam idaṃ buddhavacanam iti /
SA11sanssr_pu:744_1: paropasthānaṃ so 'bhiyāti / abhinandati / vṛddhasthavirāṇāṃ ciracaritabrahmacaryāṇāṃ na pratyupatiṣṭhate na ca pratyudgacchati /
SA11sanssr_pu:745_1: na smitamukhaḥ / na khila madhuravacanaḥ / sadā kaṭhinacittaś chidrānveṣī /
SA11sanssr_pu:747_1: na sevate / na bhajate / na paryupāste / na paripraśnayati / na paripṛcchati / kiṃ kuśalaṃ kim akuśalaṃ kiṃ karaṇīyaṃ kiṃ kṛtaṃ dīrgharātram arthāya hitāya sukhāya bhavati /
SA11sanssr_pu:748_1: pūrvakuśalamūlaṃ kṣapayati / navaṃ notthāpayati / anirdeśaṃ nirdiśati / vigraham ārabhate vivādabahulaś ca bhavati /
SA11sanssr_pu:748_2: sa evaṃ dharmavihārī sthānam etad vidyate yasmin mithyā mahāprapātaṃ patet /
SA11sanssr_pu:748_3: atha ca punar bodhicittabalādhīnād aiśvaryaṃ pratilabhate /
SA11sanssr_pu:749_1: yāni parivarjya bodhisatvā daśa jñānakarmāṇi pratilabhante /
SA11sanssr_pu:750_1: apāyabhūmiṃ / gatim akṣaṇeṣu / daridratāṃ / nīcakulopapattim / jātyandhyadaurbalyam athālpasthāmatāṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:752_1: satvakṣetraṃ bodhisatvasya buddhakṣetraṃ yataś ca buddhakṣetrād buddhadharmāṇāṃ lābhāgamo bhavati /
SA11sanssr_pu:752_3: evaṃ cāsya bhavati / sarvaṃ sucaritaṃ duścaritaṃ ca satvān niśritya pravartate /
SA11sanssr_pu:753_1: iha bho jinaputrāḥ prathamacittotpādiko bodhisatvaḥ ādita eva sarvasatvānām antike daśaprakāraṃ cittam utpādayati /
SA11sanssr_pu:753_2: katamad daśaprakāraṃ / tad yathā / hitacittatāṃ sukhacittatāṃ dāyācittatāṃ snigdhacittatāṃ priyacittatāṃ anugrahacittatāṃ ārakṣācittatāṃ samacittatāṃ ācāryacittatāṃ śāstṛcittatāṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:754_2: parāṃś ca sarvasatvaśiṣyatvābhyupagame pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīty āśvāsaṃ pratilabhate /
SA11sanssr_pu:758_1: lokaprasādānurakṣārthaṃ tv āsanapādaprakhyālanakarma kurvatāpi cetasā strīṣu vākṣaṇaprāpteṣu vā vinipatiteṣu bodhisatvena premagauravābhyāsaḥ kāryaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:759_0: uktaṃ hi gaṇḍavyūhe tasya samanantaraniṣaṇṇasya tasmin mahāsiṃhāsane sarvaḥ sa janakāyo 'bhimukhaḥ prāñjalisthito 'bhūt /
SA11sanssr_pu:760_0_0: sa khalu sarvadharmanirnādacchatramaṇḍalanirghoṣo rājā teṣāṃ yācanakānāṃ saha darśanenāttamanaskataro rājñānena ca trisāhasracakravartirājyapratilābhenāsīmāprāptakalpaparyavasānena /
SA11sanssr_pu:760_3: teṣāṃ samavadhānena mahatī prītir adhyavasānam utpatet taddarśanāvitṛptatayā /
SA11sanssr_pu:760_4: evam eva kulaputra rājñaḥ sarvadharmanirnādacchatramaṇḍalanirghoṣasya teṣāṃ yācanakānāṃ saha darśanena mahāprītivegāḥ saṃjātāḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:760_5_0: cittatuṣṭisukham avakrāntaṃ mahāṃś cittodagratāvegaḥ prādurbhūto yāvat teṣu sarvayācanakeṣu ekaputrakasaṃjñā mātāpitṛsaṃjñā
SA11sanssr_pu:760_5_1: dakṣiṇīyasaṃjñā kalyāṇamitrasaṃjñā varṇasaṃjñā durlabhasaṃjñā duṣkarakārakasaṃjñā bahukarasaṃjñā paramopakārisaṃjñā bodhimārgopastambhasaṃjñā
SA11sanssr_pu:761_0: evam anyagatabhāve satvānām agratogamanopasthānādiprasaṅge sarvotsargaṃ smaret /
SA11sanssr_pu:761_1: eṣām evāyam ātmīyaḥ kāyaḥ / yatheṣṭam atra vartantām / pṛthivīśodhanopalepanādiṣv iva svasukhārtham iti /
SA11sanssr_pu:761_2: athavā svāmyaprasādabhīteneva tatprasādārthineva tadājñāsaṃpādanā manasi kartavyā /
SA11sanssr_pu:762_0: yathoktaṃ bhikṣuprakīrṇake / bhagavān āha / mā bhāya bhikṣu mā bhāya bhikṣu /
SA11sanssr_pu:762_1: ahaṃ te bhikṣūpasthāsyaṃ / āhara bhikṣu cīvarāṇi yāvat te dhopāmi /
SA11sanssr_pu:762_2: evam ukte āyuṣmān ānando bhagavantam etad avocat /
SA11sanssr_pu:762_4: itāni cīvarāṇi dhovatu / ahaṃ bhagavan dhoviṣyaṃ / bhagavān āha / tena hy ānanda tvam etasya bhikṣusya cīvarāṇi dhova /
SA11sanssr_pu:762_6: atha khalv āyuṣmān ānando tasya glānasya bhikṣusya cīvarāṇi dhovati /
SA11sanssr_pu:763_0: atha khalv āyuṣmān ānandas taṃ glānaṃ bhikṣuṃ sādhu ca suṣṭhu cānuparigṛhya bahirdhā haritvā snāpayet /
SA11sanssr_pu:763_1: bhagavān udakam āsiñcatīti / āha ca/ yān ārādhya mahat tvaṃ virādhya kaṣṭāṃ vipattim āpnoti /
SA11sanssr_pu:763_2: prāṇaparityāgair api teṣāṃ nanu toṣaṇaṃ nyāyyaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:764_0: ete te vai satvāḥ prasādya yān siddham āgatā bahavaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:765_0: ete cintāmaṇayo bhadraghaṭā dhenavaś ca kāmadughāḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:765_1: guruvac ca devateva ca tasmād ārādhanīyās te /
SA11sanssr_pu:766_0: kiṃ ca niśchadmabandhūnām aprameyopakāriṇām / satvārādhanam utsṛjya niṣkṛtiḥ kā parā bhavet //
SA11sanssr_pu:767_0: śirasā dhārayām āsa purā nātho yathepsitam / jaṭāsvadhyuṣitān satvān bhūtvā yatnena niścalaḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:768_0: bhindanti dehaṃ praviśanty avīcīm yeṣāṃ kṛte tatra kṛte kṛtaṃ syāt //
SA11sanssr_pu:769_0: mahāpakāriṣv api tena sarvaṃ kalyāṇam evācaraṇīyam eṣu //
SA11sanssr_pu:770_0: svayaṃ mama svāmina eva tāvad yad artham ātmany api nirvyapekṣāḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:770_1: ahaṃ kathaṃ svāmiṣu teṣu teṣu karomi mānaṃ na tu dāsabhāvam /
SA11sanssr_pu:771_0: yeṣāṃ sukhe yānti mudaṃ munīndrāḥ yeṣāṃ vyathāyāṃ praviśanti manyum /
SA11sanssr_pu:772_2: satvavyathāyām api tadvad eva na prītyupāyo 'sti mahākṛpāṇām /
SA11sanssr_pu:773_2: tad adya pāpaṃ pratideśayāmi yatkheditās te munayaḥ kṣamantām /
SA11sanssr_pu:774_0: ārādhanāyādya tathāgatānāṃ sarvātmanā dāsyam upaimi loke /
SA11sanssr_pu:774_1: kurvantu me mūrdhni padaṃ janaughāḥ nighnantu vā tuṣyatu lokanāthāḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:775_0: ātmīkṛtaṃ sarvam idaṃ jagat taiḥ kṛpātmabhir naiva hi saṃśayo 'tra /
SA11sanssr_pu:776_0: tathāgatārādhanam etad eva svārthasya saṃsādhanam etad eva /
SA11sanssr_pu:776_1: lokasya duṣkhāpaham etad eva tasmān mamāstu vratam etad eva /
SA11sanssr_pu:777_0: yathaiko rājapuruṣaḥ pramathnāti mahājanaṃ / vikaroti na śaknoti dīrghadarśī mahājanaḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:778_0: yasmān naiva sa ekākī tasya rājabalaṃ balaṃ / tathā na durbalaṃ kaṃcid aparāddhaṃ vimānayet //
SA11sanssr_pu:779_0: yasmān narakapālāś ca kṛpāvantaś ca tadbalaṃ / tasmād ārādhayet satvān bhṛtyaś caṇḍanṛpaṃ yathā //
SA11sanssr_pu:780_0: kupitaḥ kiṃ nṛpaḥ kuryād yena syān narakavyathā / yatsatvadaurmanasyena kṛtena hy anubhūyate //
SA11sanssr_pu:781_0: tuṣṭaḥ kiṃ nṛpatir dadyād yad buddhatvasamaṃ bhavet / yat satvasaumanasyena kṛtena hy anubhūyate //
SA11sanssr_pu:782_1: ihaiva saubhāgyayaśaḥ sausthityaṃ kiṃ na paśyasi /
SA11sanssr_pu:783_0: prāsādikatvam ārogyam prāmodyaṃ cirajīvitaṃ / cakravartisukhaṃ sphītaṃ kṣamī prāpnoti saṃsaran //
SA11sanssr_pu:784_0: maitrāśayaś ca yat pūjyaḥ satvamāhātmyam eva tat /
SA11sanssr_pu:784_1: buddhaprasādād yat puṇyaṃ buddhamāhātmyam eva tat /
SA11sanssr_pu:785_0: ata eva hi candrapradīpasūtre maitrībhāvaphalam udbhāvitam /
SA11sanssr_pu:787_1: yathoktaṃ ratnameghe / kathaṃ ca kulaputra bodhisatvo 'yoniśomanaḥkārāpagato bhavati /
SA11sanssr_pu:787_2: iha bodhisatva ekākī rahogataḥ pravivekasthito naivaṃ cittam utpādayati /
SA11sanssr_pu:787_3: ahaṃ asaṃkīrṇavihārī / ahaṃ pravivekasthitaḥ / ahaṃ pratipannas tāthāgate dharmavinaye /
SA11sanssr_pu:787_4: ye tv anye śramaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā sarve te saṃkīrṇavihāriṇaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:789_0: punar atraivoktam / iha bodhisatvo vīryam ārabhamāṇo na tan mahad vīryam āsvādayati /
SA11sanssr_pu:789_2: na parān paṃsayati / tasyaivaṃ bhavati / ko hi nāma saprajñajātīyaḥ svakarmābhiyuktaḥ parāṃś codayet /
SA11sanssr_pu:791_0: eṣa tu puṇyarakṣāyāḥ saṃkṣepo yad bodhipariṇāmanā //
SA11sanssr_pu:792_1: na hi bodhipariṇāmitasya kuśalamūlasyāntarā kaścit parikṣayo yāvad bodhimaṇḍaniṣadanāt /
SA11sanssr_pu:792_2: tad yathāpi nāma bhadanta śāradvatīputra mahāsamudrapatitasyodakabindor nāntarāsti kṣayo yāvan na kalpaparyavasāna /
SA11sanssr_pu:795_2: śuddhir adhunā vaktavyā / kim artham / śodhitasyātmabhāvasya bhogaḥ pathyo bhaviṣyati /
SA11sanssr_pu:796_1: yāni ca tāni mahānagareṣu mahāśmaśānāni bhavanty annekaprāṇiśatasahasrākīrṇāni /
SA11sanssr_pu:796_2: tatrāpi sa bodhisatvo mahāsatvo mahāntam ātmabhāvaṃ mṛtaṃ kālagatam upadarśayati /
SA11sanssr_pu:796_3: tatra te tiryagyonigatāḥ satvā yāvad arthaṃ māṃsaṃ paribhujyāyuḥparyante mṛtāḥ kālagatāḥ sugatau svargaloke deveṣūpapadyante /
SA11sanssr_pu:796_4: sa caiva teṣāṃ hetur bhavati yāvat parinirvāṇāya /
SA11sanssr_pu:796_7: ye me mṛtasya kālagatasya māṃsaṃ paribhuñjīran /
SA11sanssr_pu:796_8: sa eva teṣāṃ hetur bhavet svargotpattaye yāvat parinirvāṇāya tasya śīlavataḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:797_0: punar atraivoktaṃ / sa dharmakāyaprabhāvito darśanenāpi satvānām arthaṃ karoti /
SA11sanssr_pu:797_2_0: tad yathāpi nāma śāntamate jīvakena vaidyarājena sarvabhaiṣajyāni samudānīya bhaiṣajyatarusaṃhātam ayaṃ dārikārūpaṃ kṛtaṃ
SA11sanssr_pu:797_3: sāgacchati gacchati tiṣṭhati niṣīdati śayyāṃ ca kalpayati /
SA11sanssr_pu:797_4: tatra ye āgacchanty āturā mahātmāno rājāno vā rājamātrā vā śreṣṭhigṛhapatyamātyakoṭṭarājāno vā /
SA11sanssr_pu:797_5: tān sa jīvako vaidyarājas tayā bhaiṣajyadārikayā sārddhaṃ saṃyojayati /
SA11sanssr_pu:797_6: teṣāṃ samanantarasaṃyogam āpannānāṃ sarvavyādhayaḥ prasrabhyante 'rāgāś ca bhavanti sukhino nirvikārāḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:797_7: paśya śāntamate jīvakasya vaidyarājasya laukikavyādhicikitsājñānaṃ yady anyeṣāṃ vaidyānāṃ saṃvidyate /
SA11sanssr_pu:797_8: evam eva śāntamate tasya dharmakāyaprabhāvitasya bodhisatvasya yāvantaḥ satvāḥ strīpuruṣadārakadārikā rāgadoṣamohasaṃtaptāḥ kāyaṃ spṛśanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:797_9: teṣāṃ saṃspṛṣṭamātrāṇāṃ sarvakleśāḥ prasrabhyante vigatasaṃtāpaṃ ca kāyaṃ saṃjānanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:798_0: yad idaṃ tasyaiva bodhisatvasya pūrvapraṇidhānasupariśuddhatvāt / etadartham ātmabhāvaḥ śodhyaḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:799_0: kiṃ ca aśodhane doṣam āha /tṛṇachannaṃ yathā śasyaṃ rogaiḥ sīdati naidhate /
SA11sanssr_pu:799_1: buddhāṅkuras tathā vṛddhiṃ kleśachanno na gacchati /
SA11sanssr_pu:801_0: ātmabhāvasya kā śuddhiḥ / pāpakleśaviśodhanaṃ / saṃbuddhoktyarthasāreṇa / yatnābhāve tv apāyagaḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:802_1: caturbhir maitreya dharmaiḥ samanvāgato bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ kṛtopacitaṃ pāpam abhibhavati /
SA11sanssr_pu:802_2: katamaiś caturbhiḥ / yad uta / vidūṣaṇāsamudācāreṇa pratipakṣasamudācāreṇa /
SA11sanssr_pu:803_0: tatra vidūṣaṇāsamudācāro 'kuśalaṃ karmādhyacārati tatra tatraiva ca vipratisārabahulī bhavati //
SA11sanssr_pu:804_0: tatra pratipakṣasamudācāraḥ kṛtvāpy akuśalaṃ karma kuśale karmaṇy atyarthābhiyogaṃ gataḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:806_2: ebhir maitreya caturbhir dharmaiḥ samanvāgato bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ kṛtopacitaṃ pāpam abhibhavatīti /
SA11sanssr_pu:807_0: tatra kathaṃ vidūṣaṇāsamudācāro bhāvayitavyaḥ / yathā suvarṇaprabhāsottamasūtre 'bhihitaṃ //
SA11sanssr_pu:808_0: samanvāharantu māṃ buddhāḥ kṛpākāruṇyacetasaḥ / ye ca daśadiśi loke tiṣṭhanti dvipadottamāḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:809_0: yac ca me pāpakaṃ karma kṛtaṃ pūrvaṃ sudāruṇaṃ / tat sarvaṃ deśayiṣyāmi sthito daśabalāgrataḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:810_0: mātāpitṝn ajānatā buddhānām aprajānatā / kuśalaṃ cāprajānatā yat tu pāpaṃ kṛtaṃ mayā //
SA11sanssr_pu:811_0: aiśvaryamadamattena kulabhogamadena ca / tāruṇyamadamattena yat tu pāpaṃ kṛtaṃ mayā //
SA11sanssr_pu:812_0: duścintitaṃ duruktaṃ ca duṣkṛtenāpi karmaṇā / annādīnavadarśinā yat tu pāpaṃ kṛtaṃ mayā //
SA11sanssr_pu:814_0: krīḍārativaśāc caiva śokarogavaśena vā / atṛptadhanadoṣeṇa yat tu pāpaṃ kṛtaṃ mayā //
SA11sanssr_pu:815_0: annāryajanasaṃsargair īrṣyāmātsaryahetunā / śāṭhyadāridryadoṣeṇa yat tu pāpaṃ kṛtaṃ mayā //
SA11sanssr_pu:816_0: vyasanāgamakāle 'smin kāmānāṃ bhayahetunā / annaiśvaryagatenāpi yat tu pāpaṃ kṛtaṃ mayā //
SA11sanssr_pu:817_0: calacittavaśenaiva kāmakrodhavaśena vā / kṣutpipāsārditenāpi yat tu pāpaṃ kṛtaṃ mayā //
SA11sanssr_pu:818_0: pānārthaṃ bhojanārthaṃ ca vastrārthaṃ strīṣu hetunā /
SA11sanssr_pu:818_1: vicitraiḥ kleśasaṃtāpair yat tu pāpaṃ kṛtaṃ mayā /
SA11sanssr_pu:819_0: kāyavāṅmanasāṃ pāpaṃ tridhā duścaritaṃ cittaṃ / yat kṛtam īdṛśai rūpais tat sarvaṃ deśayāmy aham //
SA11sanssr_pu:820_0: yat tu buddheṣu dharmeṣu śrāvakeṣu tathaiva ca /
SA11sanssr_pu:820_1: agauravaṃ kṛtaṃ syād dhi tat sarvaṃ deśayāmy aham /
SA11sanssr_pu:821_0: yat tu pratyekabuddheṣu bodhisatveṣu vā punaḥ /agauravaṃ kṛtaṃ syād dhi tat srvaṃ deśayāmy aham //
SA11sanssr_pu:822_0: saddharmabhāṇakeṣv eva anyeṣu guṇavatsu vā / agauravaṃ kṛtaṃ syād dhi tat sarvaṃ deśayāmy aham //
SA11sanssr_pu:823_0: saddharmaḥ pratikṣiptaḥ syād ajñānaṃ tena me sadā /
SA11sanssr_pu:823_1: mātāpitṛṣv agauravaṃ tat sarvaṃ deśayāmy aham /
SA11sanssr_pu:824_0: mūrkhatvena bālatvena mānadarpāvṛtena ca / rāgadveṣeṇa mohena tat sarvaṃ deśayāmy aham //
SA11sanssr_pu:825_0: vyavalokayantu māṃ buddhāḥ samanvāhṛtacetasaḥ / atyayaṃ pratigṛhṇantu kāruṇyārpitacetasaḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:826_0: yat tu pāpaṃ kṛtaṃ pūrvaṃ mayā kalpaśateṣu ca / tasyārthaṃ śokacitto 'haṃ krpaṇīyo bhayārditaḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:827_0: bhavāmi pāpakarmāṇāṃ satataṃ dīnamānasaḥ / yatra yatra cariṣyāmi na cāsti me balaṃ kvacit //
SA11sanssr_pu:828_0: sarve kāruṇikā buddhāḥ sarve bhayaharā jage / atyayaṃ pratigṛhṇantu mocayantu ca māṃ bhayāt //
SA11sanssr_pu:829_0: kleśakarmaphalaṃ mahyaṃ pravāhayantu tathāgatāḥ / snāpayantu ca māṃ buddhāḥ kāruṇyasaritodakaiḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:830_0: sarvaṃ pāpaṃ deśayāmi yat tu pūrvaṃ kṛtaṃ mayā / yac ca etarhi me pāpaṃ tat sarvaṃ deśayāmy aham //
SA11sanssr_pu:831_0: āyatyāṃ saṃvaram āpadye sarvaduṣkṛtakarmaṇām / na chādayāmi tat pāpaṃ yad bhaven mama duṣkṛtam //
SA11sanssr_pu:832_0: trividhaṃ kāyikaṃ karma vacasā ca caturvidham / manasā triprakāreṇa tat sarvaṃ deśayāmy aham //
SA11sanssr_pu:833_0: kāyakṛtaṃ vācakṛtaṃ manasā ca vicintitaṃ / kṛtaṃ daśavidhaṃ karma tat sarvaṃ deśayāmy aham //
SA11sanssr_pu:834_0: yac ca me pāpakaṃ karma anniṣṭaphaladāyakaṃ / tat sarvaṃ deśayiṣyāmi buddhānāṃ purataḥ sthitaḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:835_0: bhavagatisaṃkaṭe bālabuddhinā pāpaṃ yan me kṛtaṃ sudāruṇam /
SA11sanssr_pu:835_1: daśabalam agrataḥ sthitaḥ tat sarvaṃ pāpaṃ pratideśayāmi /
SA11sanssr_pu:835_2: deśayāmi ca tat pāpaṃ yan mayā saṃcitaṃ janmasaṃkaṭe vividhaiḥ kāyapracārasaṃkaṭair bhavasaṃkaṭalokasaṃkaṭe cāpalacalacittasaṃkaṭe mūrkhabālakṛtakleśasaṃkaṭe /
SA11sanssr_pu:835_3: pāpamitrāgamasaṃkaṭe ca / bhayasaṃkaṭarāgasaṃkaṭe doṣamohatamasaṃkaṭair api kṣaṇasaṃkaṭe kālasaṃkaṭe puṇyopārjanasaṃkaṭair api /
SA11sanssr_pu:836_0: viśeṣatas tu bodhisatvāpattīnāṃ gurvīṇāṃ laghvīnāṃ deśanāryopāliparipṛcchāyām uktā /
SA11sanssr_pu:837_0: sāmānyatas tu tatroktaṃ / saced upāle mahāyānasaṃprasthito bodhisatvo mahāsatvo gaṅgānadīvālikopamā rāgapratisaṃyuktā āpattīr āpadyeta /
SA11sanssr_pu:837_1: yāṃ caikato dveṣasaṃprayuktām āpattim āpadyeta bodhisatvayānaṃ pramāṇīkṛtya /
SA11sanssr_pu:838_0: iyaṃ tābhyo gurutarā āpattir yeyaṃ dveṣasaṃyuktā /
SA11sanssr_pu:838_1: tat kasya hetoḥ / yo 'yaṃ dveṣa upāle satvaparityāgāya saṃvartate /
SA11sanssr_pu:838_4: na tatra bodhisatvasya chalaṃ na bhayaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:839_0: tasmāt tarhi tvām upāle yāḥ kāścana rāgapratisaṃyuktā āpattayaḥ sarvas tā annāpattaya iti vadāmi /
SA11sanssr_pu:840_0: yasmād annantaram āha / tatropāle ye 'nnupāyakuśalā bodhisatvās te rāgapratisaṃyuktābhya āpattibhyo bibhyati /
SA11sanssr_pu:840_1: ye punar upāyakuśalā bodhisatvās te dveṣasaṃprayuktābhya āpattibhyo bibhyati na rāgapratisaṃyuktābhya iti /
SA11sanssr_pu:841_0: ke punar upāyakuśalāḥ / ye prajñākṛpābhyāṃ satvatyāgān nivāryante /
SA11sanssr_pu:841_3: kevalayā ca kṛpayā kleśabalād acireṇa kṛpāhāniḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:842_1: tad yathā kulaputra maṃtravidyādharaḥ puruṣo rājñā pañcapāśakena bandhanena baddhaḥ syāt /
SA11sanssr_pu:842_2: sa yadā kāṅkṣeta prakramaṇāya tadaikamantravidyābalena sarvabandhanāni chittvā prakramet /
SA11sanssr_pu:842_3: evam eva kulaputropāyakuśalo bodhisatvaḥ pañcabhiḥ kāmaguṇai ratiṃ vindati taiś cākīrṇo viharati /
SA11sanssr_pu:842_4: yadā ca punar ākāṅkṣate tadā prajñābalādhīnena ekena ca sarvajñatācittena sarvakāmaguṇān prabhujya cyuto brahmalokae upapadyatae iti /
SA11sanssr_pu:843_0: dveṣe 'pi kiṃ naivam iṣyate / prakṛtimahāsāvadyatvāt / kṛpāvaikalye copāyasyaivāsaṃbhavāt //
SA11sanssr_pu:844_0: parārthasiddhiṃ vā svārthād gurutarām adhimucyamānaḥ kopaparavattayāpi param anuśāsyānutāpapūrvakam āyatyāṃ saṃvaram utpadyate /
SA11sanssr_pu:844_4: yady api tasya satvasya taddhitaṃ tathāpi bodhisatvakṛpāhānyā mahataḥ satvārthānubandhasya hāniḥ syāt /
SA11sanssr_pu:845_0: āryasatyake parivartte 'pi putradṛṣṭāntaḥ karuṇādhiṣṭhita eva veditavyaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:845_1: yaś ca tatrāpi kṛpāpratiṣedhaḥ sa lokārthapāṇḍityena lokāvarjanārthaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:845_2: nivāryamāṇaś ca yadi hitakāme bodhisatve pratighaṃ labheta sa bodhisatvaḥ syād ubhayor annarthaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:848_0: satyaṃ dṛṣṭā / yena paraduṣkhaṃ svaduṣkhatayā nābhyastaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:849_1: tad yathāpi nāmānanda kaścid eva puruṣo 'dhastāt pādatalam ādāya yāvan murddhany ādīpto bhavet /
SA11sanssr_pu:849_2: saṃprajvalita ekajvalībhutas taṃ kaścid eva puruṣa upasaṃkramya evaṃ vaded /
SA11sanssr_pu:849_3: ehi tvāṃ bhoḥ puruṣa nirvāpitenātmabhāvena pañcabhiḥ kāmaguṇaiḥ samarpitaḥ samanvaṅgībhūtaḥ krīḍasva ramasva paricārayasveti /
SA11sanssr_pu:849_4: tat kiṃ manyase ānanda / api tu sa puruṣo 'nirvāpitenātmabhāvena pañcabhiḥ kāmaguṇaiḥ krīḍeta ramet paricaret /
SA11sanssr_pu:851_2: bhagavān āha / krīḍetānanda sa puruṣo ramet paricaret parikalpam upādāyāparinirvāpitenātmabhāvena pañcabhiḥ kāmaguṇaiḥ samarpitaḥ samanvaṅgībhūto /
SA11sanssr_pu:851_3: na tv evaṃ tathāgatasya pūrvaṃ bodhisatvacaryāṃ caramāṇasya satvān tribhir apāyair duṣkhitān dṛṣṭvā daridrān abhūt saumanasyaṃ vā cittaprasādo veti vistaraḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:852_1: paśyator mātāpitror na svasaukhyasaṃgo dṛṣṭaḥ svānurūpakṛpāvaśāt /
SA11sanssr_pu:852_2: pracchannas tarhi sasvāmikāsu nisvāmikāsu bāhuladharmadhvajarakṣitāsu kāmamithyācāro na syāt /
SA11sanssr_pu:853_1: pūjyā ca mātṛbhaginyādivat / evaṃ tarhi bhikṣor apy evam āpannaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:854_0: tathā hy uktam āryākṣayamatisūtre / kālākāle punar anenopekṣā karaṇīyeti //
SA11sanssr_pu:855_0: atha tato 'py adhikaṃ satvārthaṃ paśyet / śikṣāṃ nikṣipet //
SA11sanssr_pu:856_0: upāyakauśalyasūtre jyotirmāṇavakaṃ dvācatvāriṃśadvarṣasahasrabrahmacāriṇam adhikṛtya saptame pade sthitasya kāruṇyam utpadyeta /
SA11sanssr_pu:856_1: kiṃ cāpy aham idaṃ vrataṃ khaṇḍayitvā nirayaparāyaṇaḥ syāṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:856_2: tathāpy utsahe 'haṃ nairayikaṃ duṣkhaṃ prativedayitum atha ceyaṃ strī sukhitā bhavatu /
SA11sanssr_pu:856_3: mā kālaṃ karotu / iti hi kulaputra jyotirmāṇavakaḥ paścānmukho nivartya tāṃ striyaṃ dakṣiṇena pāṇinā gṛhītvaivam āha /
SA11sanssr_pu:857_0: so 'haṃ kulaputra mahākāruṇyacittotpādenetvareṇa kāmopasaṃhitena daśakalpasahasrāṇi paścānmukham akārṣam /
SA11sanssr_pu:857_1: paśya kulaputra yad anyeṣāṃ nirayasaṃvartanīyaṃ karma /
SA11sanssr_pu:858_0: punar atraivāha / yadi bodhisatva ekasya satvasya kuśalamūlaṃ saṃjanayet tathārūpāṃ cāpattim āpadyeta yathārūpayāpattyāpannayā kalpaśatasahasraṃ niraye pacyeta /
SA11sanssr_pu:858_1: utsoḍhavyam eva bhagavan bodhisatvenāpattim āpattuṃ tac ca nairayikaṃ duṣkhaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:858_2: na tv eva tasyaikasay satvasya kuśalaṃ parityaktum iti /
SA11sanssr_pu:859_0: punar atraivāha / iha kulaputropāyakuśalo bodhisatvo yadā kadācit kasmiṃścit pāpamitravaśenāpattim āpadyeta /
SA11sanssr_pu:859_1: sa itaḥ pratisaṃśikṣate / na mayaibhiḥ skandhaiḥ parinirvāpayitavyaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:859_5: yathā yathā saṃsariṣyāmi tathā tathā satvān paripācayiṣyāmi /
SA11sanssr_pu:859_6: api tv etāṃ cāpattiṃ yathādharmaṃ pratikariṣyāmi /
SA11sanssr_pu:859_7: āyatyāṃ saṃvaram āpatsye / sacet kulaputra pravrajito bodhisatvaḥ parikalpam ādāya sarvāś catasro mūlāpattīr atikramed anena copāyakauśalyena vinodayed /
SA11sanssr_pu:861_0: śrāvakavinaye 'pi mūlāpattisthānae eva kāruṇyān mṛgādimokṣaṇe 'nnāpattir uktaiva //
SA11sanssr_pu:862_0: ayaṃ ca rāge guṇo yad bodhisatve rāgam utpādya sugatir labhyate / na tu krodhena //
SA11sanssr_pu:863_3: priyaṃkarasya praṇidheḥ punaḥ punar yā istri prekṣeta sarāgacittā /
SA11sanssr_pu:863_4: sā istribhāvaṃ parivarjayitvā puruṣo bhavet yādṛg udārasatvaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:864_2: tenaiva śūreṣu janitva rāgaṃ gacchanti svargaṃ puruṣatvam eva ca /
SA11sanssr_pu:865_0: bhaiṣajyarājeṣu mahāyaśeṣu / ko bodhisatveṣu janayeta dveṣam /
SA11sanssr_pu:865_2: kiṃ vā punar yaḥ tān satkareyā /
SA11sanssr_pu:866_0: evam anyasmin satvārthopāye sati rāgajāpattir annāpattir uktā //
SA11sanssr_pu:867_0: upāyakauśalyasūtre ca gaṇikāvat kṛtārtho bodhisatvo nirapekṣas taṃ satvaṃ tyajatīti vistareṇoktam /
SA11sanssr_pu:868_0: alabdhabhūmeś ca ṣaṭpāramitāsu caritavata iyaṃ cintā / netarasyety āstāṃ prāsaṅgikam //
SA11sanssr_pu:869_4: tatra śāriputra prathamā āpattir daśavarge ṛjukena deśayitavyā /
SA11sanssr_pu:869_7: duṣṭacittāpattir ekapudgalasya dvayor vā śāriputra tāṃ gurvīṃ daśayet /
SA11sanssr_pu:869_8_0: pañcānantaryasamanvāgatāpattir bodhisatvena stryāpattir dārikāpattir hastāpattiḥ stūpāpattiḥ saṃghāpattis tathānyāś cāpattayo
SA11sanssr_pu:869_8_1: bodhisatvena na pañcatriṃśatāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatām antike rātriṃdivaṃ ekākinā gurvyo deśayitavyāḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:870_0: tatreyaṃ deśanā / aham evaṃnāmā buddhaṃ śaraṇaṃ gacchāmi /
SA11sanssr_pu:871_1_0: namo vajrapramardine / namo ratnārciṣe / namo nāgeśvararājāya / namo vīrasenāya / namo vīranandine / namo ratnaśriye / namo
SA11sanssr_pu:871_1_1: ratnacandraprabhāya / namo 'moghadarśine / namo ratnacandrāya / namo nirmalāya / namo vimalāya / namaḥ śūradattāya / namo
SA11sanssr_pu:871_1_2: brahmaṇe / namo brahmadattāya / namo varuṇāya / namo varuṇadevāya / namo bhadraśriye / namaś chandanaśriye / namo 'nnantaujase /
SA11sanssr_pu:871_1_3: namaḥ prabhāsaśriye / namo 'śokaśriye / namo nārāyaṇāya / namaḥ kusumaśriye / namo brahmajyotirvikrīḍitābhijñāya tathāgatāya /
SA11sanssr_pu:871_2: namo dhanaśriye / namaḥ smṛtiśriye / namaḥ suparikīrtitanāmadheyaśriye /
SA11sanssr_pu:871_3: nama indraketudhvajarājāya / namaḥ suvikrāntaśriye / namo vicitrasaṃkramāya / namo vikrāntagāmine / namaḥ samantāvabhāsavyūhaśriye /
SA11sanssr_pu:871_4: namo ratnapadmavikrāmiṇe / namo ratnapadmasupratiṣṭhitaśailendrarājāya tathāgatāyārhate samyaksaṃbuddhāya /
SA11sanssr_pu:872_0: evaṃpramukhā yāvantaḥ sarvalokadhātuṣu tathāgatārhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhās tiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:872_1_0: te māṃ samanvāharantu buddhā bhagavanto yan mayāsyāṃ jātau anyāsu vā jātiṣv annavarāgre jātisaṃsāre saṃsaratā [doubtful]
SA11sanssr_pu:872_1_1: pāpakaṃ karma kṛtaṃ syāt kāritaṃ vā kriyamāṇaṃ vānumoditaṃ bhavet /
SA11sanssr_pu:872_2: staupikaṃ vā sāṅghikaṃ vā dravyam apahṛtaṃ syāt hāritaṃ vā hriyamāṇaṃ vānumoditaṃ bhavet /
SA11sanssr_pu:872_3: pañcānantaryāṇi kṛtāni syuḥ kāritāni vā kriyamāṇāni vānumoditāni bhaveyuḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:872_4_0: daśākuśalān karmapathān samādāya vartitaṃ syāt pare vā samādāpitāḥ syur vartamānā vānumoditā bhaveyur yena karmāvaraṇenāvṛto
SA11sanssr_pu:872_4_1: 'haṃ nirayaṃ vā gaccheyaṃ tiryagyoniṃ vā yamaviṣayaṃ vā gaccheyaṃ pratyantajanapadeṣu mleccheṣu vā pratyājāyeyaṃ dīrghāyuṣkeṣu
SA11sanssr_pu:872_4_2: deveṣūpapadyeyam indriyavikalatāṃ vādhigaccheyaṃ mithyādṛṣṭiṃ vopagṛhṇīyāṃ buddhotpādaṃ vā virāgayeyaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:872_5_0: tat sarvaṃ karmāvaraṇaṃ teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ jñānabhūtānāṃ cakṣurbhūtānāṃ sākṣibhūtānāṃ pramāṇabhūtānāṃ jānatāṃ paśyatām
SA11sanssr_pu:872_5_1: agrataḥ pratideśayāmi āviṣkaromi na praticchādayāmy āyatyāṃ saṃvaram āpadye /
SA11sanssr_pu:872_6_0: samanvāharantu māṃ te buddhā bhagavanto yan mayāsyāṃ jātāv anyāsu vā jātiṣv annavarāgre vā jātisaṃsāre saṃsaratā dānaṃ dattaṃ
SA11sanssr_pu:872_6_1: bhaved antaśas tiryagyonigatāyāpy ālopaḥ śīlaṃ vā rakṣitaṃ bhaved yac ca me brahmacaryavāsakuśalamūlaṃ yac ca me satvaparipākakuśalamūlaṃ
SA11sanssr_pu:872_6_2: yac ca me bodhicittakuśalamūlaṃ yac ca me 'nnuttarajñānakuśalamūlaṃ tat sarvam aikadhyaṃ piṇḍayitvā tulayitvābhisaṃkṣipyānnutt
SA11sanssr_pu:872_6_3: arāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau uttarottarayā pariṇāmanayā yathā pariṇāmitam atītair buddhair bhagavadbhir yathā pariṇāmayiṣyanty
SA11sanssr_pu:872_6_4: annāgatā buddhā bhagavanto yathā pariṇamanty etarhi daśasu dikṣu pratyutpannā buddhā bhagavantaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:872_7: tathāham api pariṇāmayāmi / sarvaṃ puṇyam anumodayāmi / sarvān buddhān adhyeṣayāmi / bhavatu me jñānam annuttaram /
SA11sanssr_pu:872_8: ye cābhyatītās tathāpi ca ye annāgatā ye cāpi tiṣṭhanti narottamā jināḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:872_9: annantavarṇān guṇasāgaropamān upaimi sarvān śaraṇaṃ kṛtāñjaliḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:872_10: ye bodhisatvāḥ karuṇabalair upetā vicarati loke satvahitāya śūrāḥ trāyantu te māṃ sadapāpakāriṇaṃ [doubtful] /
SA11sanssr_pu:873_0: iti hi śāriputra bodhisatvenemān pañcatriṃśato buddhān pramukhān kṛtvā sarvatathāgatānugatair manasikāraiḥ pāpaśuddhiḥ kāryā /
SA11sanssr_pu:873_1: tasyaivaṃ sarvapāpaviśuddhasya tatra ca buddhā bhagavanto mukhāny upadarśayanti satvavimokṣārtham eva /
SA11sanssr_pu:874_0_0: na śakyaṃ sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhanikāyair āpattikaukṛtyasthānaṃ viśodhayituṃ yad bodhisatvas teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ
SA11sanssr_pu:874_0_1: nāmadheyadhāraṇaparikīrtanena rātriṃdivaṃ triskandhakadharmaparyāyapravartanenāpattikaukṛtyān niḥsarati samādhiṃ ca pratilabhate /
SA11sanssr_pu:876_1: ye te subhūte kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā imān evaṃrūpān sūtrāntān udgrahīṣyanti yāvat paryavāpsyanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:876_3: tat kasya hetoḥ / yāni teṣāṃ satvānāṃ paurvajanmikāni karmāṇi kṛtāny apāyasaṃvartanīyāni /
SA11sanssr_pu:876_4: tāni tayā paribhūtatayā dṛṣṭae eva dharme kṣapayiṣyanti buddhabodhiṃ ca prāpsyantīti /
SA11sanssr_pu:877_1: yaḥ kāśyapa pitā ca syāt pratyekabuddhaś ca taṃ jīvitād vyaparopayed idam agraṃ prāṇātipātānāṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:877_2: idam agram adattādānānāṃ yad uta triratnadravyāpaharaṇatā /
SA11sanssr_pu:877_3: idam agraṃ kāmamithyācārāṇāṃ yad uta mātā syād arhantī ca /
SA11sanssr_pu:877_4: idam agraṃ mṛṣāvādānāṃ yad uta tathāgatasyābhyākhyānaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:877_6: idam agraṃ pāruṣyāṇāṃ yad utāryāṇām avasphaṇḍanaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:877_7: idam agraṃ saṃbhinnapralāpānāṃ yad uta dharmakāmānāṃ vikṣepaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:877_9: idam agram abhidhyānāṃ yad uta samyaggatānāṃ lābhaharaṇacittatā /
SA11sanssr_pu:877_10: idam agraṃ mithyādṛṣṭīnāṃ yad uta gahanatādṛṣṭiḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:877_12: sacet kāśyapa ekasatva ebhir evaṃ mahāsāvadyair daśabhir akuśalaiḥ karmapathaiḥ samanvāgato bhavet /
SA11sanssr_pu:877_13: sa ca tathāgatasya hetupratyayasaṃyuktāṃ dharmadeśanām avataren /
SA11sanssr_pu:877_14_0: nātra kaścid ātmā vā satvo vā jīvo vā pudgalo vā yaḥ karoti pratisaṃvedayate iti hy akṛtām annabhisaṃskārāṃ māyādharmatām
SA11sanssr_pu:877_14_1: asaṃkleśadharmatāṃ prakṛtiprabhāsvaratāṃ sarvadharmāṇām avataraty ādiśuddhān sarvadharmān abhiśraddadhāty adhimucyate /
SA11sanssr_pu:878_1: punar aparaṃ mañjuśrīr yo bodhisatva āpattim annāpattiṃ paśyati /
SA11sanssr_pu:878_2: avinayaṃ vinayaṃ paśyati / saṃkleśaṃ vyavadānaṃ paśyati /
SA11sanssr_pu:880_0: akṣiṇī nimīlya buddhabodhisatvālambanacittaḥ śatākṣaram aṣṭasahasraṃ japet /
SA11sanssr_pu:880_1: nimīlitākṣa eva buddhabodhisatvān paśyati vigatapāpo bhavati /
SA11sanssr_pu:880_2: athavā caityaṃ pradakṣiṇīkurvann aṣṭasahasraṃ japec caityapratimāyāḥ saddharmapustakānāṃ caikatamaṃ puraḥkṛtyāyam eva vidhir iti /
SA11sanssr_pu:881_0: cundādhāraṇīṃ vā tāvaj japed yāvat pāpakṣayanimittāni paśyati svapne /
SA11sanssr_pu:881_1: tad yathā krandanādichardanadadhikṣīrādibhojanāt tu vigatapāpo bhavati /
SA11sanssr_pu:881_2_0: vamanād vā candrasūryadarśanād ākāśagamanāj jvalitānalamahiṣakṛṣṇapuruṣaparājayād bhikṣubhikṣuṇīsaṃghadarśanāt kṣīravṛkṣagajavṛṣagirisiṃhāsanaprāsādanāvarohaṇād
SA11sanssr_pu:882_1: tad yathā puruṣo mīḍhāvaliptaḥ sudhautusnānaṃ kṛtvā gandhair vilipyate /
SA11sanssr_pu:882_2: tasya tad daurgandhyaṃ vāntaṃ vigataṃ syād evaṃ pañcānantaryakāriṇas tat pāpaṃ vigacchati /
SA11sanssr_pu:882_3: yo 'pi daśākuśalakarmapathasamanvāgatas tathāgate śraddhāṃ pratilabhya tathāgatabimbaṃ kārayet tasyāpi tat pāpaṃ na prajñāyate viśeṣato bodhicittasamanvāgatasya /
SA11sanssr_pu:883_1: yaś ca khalu punaḥ siṃhavikrīḍitatathāgataṃ saṃmukhaṃ varṣaṃ vā varṣasahasraṃ vā varṣaśatasahasraṃ vā sarvasukhopadhānair upatiṣṭhed /
SA11sanssr_pu:883_2_0: yaś ca parinirvṛtasya tathāgatasya caitye bodhicittasaṃgṛhīta ekapuṣpam āropayet tathāgatapūjāyai janāñjaliṃ copanāmayej
SA11sanssr_pu:883_2_1: jalena vā siñcayed iṣikāpadaṃ vā dadyān nirmālyaṃ cāpanayed upalepanapradānaṃ vā puṣpapradānaṃ vā dīpapradānaṃ vā kuryād
SA11sanssr_pu:883_3_0: namas tasmai buddhāya bhagavata itimātre 'tra siṃhavikrīḍitakāṅkṣā vā vimatir vā vicikitsā vā yad asau kalpaṃ vā kalpaśataṃ
SA11sanssr_pu:883_3_1: vā kalpasahasraṃ vā durgativinipātaṃ gacchen nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyatae iti /
SA11sanssr_pu:884_3: ye ca bodhisatvasaṃvaraṃ caturthaṃ śataṃ śikṣāpadānāṃ dhārayanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:884_4: ye punar abhiniṣkrāntagṛhāvāsā bhikṣavaḥ pañcāśādhike dve śikṣāpadaśate dhārayanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:884_6: ye ca yathāparigṛhītāc chikṣāsaṃvarād anyatarāc chikṣāpadād bhraṣṭā bhavanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:884_7: sacet te durgatibhayabhītās tasya bhagavato bhaiṣajyaguruvaiḍūryaprabharājasya tathāgatasya nāmadheyaṃ dhārayeyur yathāvibhavataś ca pūjāṃ kuryuḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:885_0: atha bhagavān āyuṣmantam ānandam āmantrayate sma /
SA11sanssr_pu:885_1: śraddadhāsi tvam ānanda / pattīyasi / yad ahaṃ tasya bhagavato bhaiṣajyaguruvaiḍūryaprabharājasya tathāgatasya guṇān varṇayāmi /
SA11sanssr_pu:885_2: atha te kāṅkṣā vā vimatir vā vicikitsā vātra gambhīre buddhagocare /
SA11sanssr_pu:886_1: na me bhadanta bhagavan kāṅkṣā vā vimatir vā vicikitsā vā tathāgatabhāṣiteṣu sūtrānteṣu /
SA11sanssr_pu:886_2: tat kasya hetoḥ / nāsti tathāgatānām apariśuddhakāyavāṅmanaḥsamudācāratā /
SA11sanssr_pu:886_3: imau bhagavan candrasūryāv evaṃ maharddhikāv evaṃ mahānubhāvau pṛthivyāṃ patetāṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:886_5: na tu buddhānāṃ vacanam anyathā bhavet /
SA11sanssr_pu:887_0: kiṃtu bhadanta bhagavan santi satvāḥ śraddhendriyavikalā ye buddhagocaraṃ śrutvā na śraddadhati /
SA11sanssr_pu:887_1: teṣām evaṃ bhavati / katham idaṃ nāmadheyaṃ smaraṇamātreṇa tasya tathāgatasya ettakā guṇānuśaṃsā bhavati /
SA11sanssr_pu:887_2: te na śraddadhati / na pattīyanti / pratikṣipanti / teṣāṃ dīrgharātram annarthāyāhitāyāsukhāya vinipātāya bhaviṣyati /
SA11sanssr_pu:888_0: bhagavān āha / asthānam ānandānnavakāśo yeṣāṃ tasya nāmadheyaṃ nipatet karṇe teṣāṃ durgatyapāyagamanaṃ bhaved iti /
SA11sanssr_pu:888_2: yac ca tvam ānanda śraddadhāsi pattīyasi /
SA11sanssr_pu:888_4: abhūmiś cātra śrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ sthāpayitvā ekajātipratibaddhān bodhisatvān mahāsatvān iti /
SA11sanssr_pu:889_0: atraiva coktaṃ / ye cānye śrāddhāḥ kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vāṣṭāṅgasamanvāgatam upavāsam upavasanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:889_1: ekavārṣikaṃ vā traivārṣikaṃ vā śikṣāpadaṃ dhārayanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:889_3: anena vayaṃ kuśalamūlena paścimāyāṃ diśāyāṃ sukhāvatyāṃ lokadhātau upapadyema yatrāmitābhas tathāgataḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:889_4: yaiḥ śrutaṃ bhaviṣyati tasya bhagavato bhaiṣajyaguruvaiḍūryaprabhavarājasya tathāgatasya nāmadheyaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:889_5: teṣāṃ maraṇakālasamaye 'ṣṭau bodhisatvā ṛddhyāgatya mārgam upadarśayanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:889_8: teṣāṃ tatropapannānāṃ tat pūrvakaṃ kuśalamūlaṃ na kṣīyate /
SA11sanssr_pu:889_10: te tataś cyutā iha manuṣyaloke rājāno bhavanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:889_12: annekāni satvakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi daśa kuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu pratiṣṭhāpayanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:890_0: tatraivoktaṃ / yena ca punar mātṛgrāmeṇa tasya bhagavato bhaiṣajyaguruvaiḍūryaprabharājasya tathāgatasya nāmadheyaṃ śrutaṃ bhaviṣyati /
SA11sanssr_pu:890_1: udgṛhītaṃ vā / sa tasya paścimo mātṛgrāmabhāvaḥ pratikāṅkṣitavya iti /
SA11sanssr_pu:892_0: ya eṣāṃ bodhisatvānāṃ nāmadheyaṃ tu dhārayet / etasya mātṛgrāmasya strībhāvo na bhaviṣyati //
SA11sanssr_pu:895_1: prāṇātipātāt prativirato bhavati bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ sarvasatvānām abhayaṃdadaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:895_3: yat pūrvāntakoṭipañcagaticakrāruḍhena saṃsāranadyudyātena prāṇātipātahetunā kāyavāṅmanasā karmāvaraṇaṃ kleśāvaraṇaṃ dharmāvaraṇaṃ kṛtaṃ vā syāt kāritaṃ vānumoditaṃ syāt /
SA11sanssr_pu:895_4: tat sarvaṃ tena prāṇātipātavairamaṇacakreṇa sarvānarthaṃ mardayati /
SA11sanssr_pu:895_6: sanikāyasabhāge devamanuṣyāṇāṃ priyo bhavati nirātaṅko dīrghāyuṣka iti /
SA11sanssr_pu:896_0: yāvat punar aparaṃ kulaputra yo bodhisatvo yāvajjīvam adattādānāt prativirato bhavati sa sarvasatvānām abhayam dadāti anyatrāsayatnenāsaṃkṣobheṇa svalābhena saṃtuṣṭo viharati /
SA11sanssr_pu:896_1: adhārmikabhogānabhilāṣī sa tena kuśalamūlena yāvad adattādānahetukaṃ karmāvaraṇaṃ mardayati pramardayati yāvad aśeṣam avipākaṃ kurutae iti /
SA11sanssr_pu:897_0: evaṃ daśāpi kuśalāḥ karmapathāḥ svavipakṣākuśalaghātakās tatra paṭhyante //
SA11sanssr_pu:898_1: yathāha / sahiṣyāmy atra bālānām abhūtāṃ paribhāṣaṇāṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:899_0: kṣapayiṣye pāpakaṃ karma yan mayā purime kṛtam / anyeṣu bodhisatveṣu vyāpādo janito mayeti //
SA11sanssr_pu:902_1: ye buddhaṃ śaraṇaṃ yānti na te gacchanti durgatiṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:902_2: prahāya mānuṣān kāyān divyān kāyāṃl labhanti te /
SA11sanssr_pu:903_0: ity evaṃ dharmaṃ saṃghaṃ cādhikṛtya pāpakṣayaḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:905_0: tad yathā kulaputra hāṭakaprabhāsaṃ nāma rasajātaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:905_2: na ca tatra tat palaṃ śakyate tena lohapalasahasreṇa paryādātuṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:905_3: na lohīkartuṃ / evam evaikaḥ sarvajñatācittotpādarasadhātuḥ kuśalamūlapariṇāmanājñānasaṃgṛhītaḥ sarvakarmakleśāvaraṇalohāni paryādāya sarvadharmān sarvajñatāvarṇān karoti /
SA11sanssr_pu:905_4: na ca sarvajñatācittotpādarasadhātuḥ śakyaḥ sarvakarmakleśalohaiḥ saṃkleśayituṃ paryādātuṃ vā /
SA11sanssr_pu:905_5: tad yathā kulaputraikaḥ pradīpo yādṛśe gṛhe vā layane vā praveśyate sa saha praveśito varṣasahasrasaṃcitam api tamondhakāraṃ vidhamayati /
SA11sanssr_pu:905_6_0: avabhāsaṃ ca karoti / evam evaikaḥ sarvajñatācittotpādapradīpo yādṛśe satvāśaye gahane 'vidyātamondhakārānugate praveśyate
SA11sanssr_pu:905_6_1: sa saha praveśito 'nnabhilāpyakalpaśatasahasrasaṃcitam api karmakleśāvaraṇatamondhakāraṃ vidhamati /
SA11sanssr_pu:906_0: tad yathā kulaputra cintāmaṇirājamukuṭānāṃ mahānāgarājñāṃ nāsti paropakramabhayaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:906_1: evam eva bodhicittamahākaruṇācintāmaṇirājamukuṭāvabaddhānāṃ bodhisatvānāṃ nāsti durgatyapāyaparopakramabhayam iti /
SA11sanssr_pu:907_1: ihopāle mahāyānaṃ saṃprasthito bodhisatvaḥ sacet pūrvāhṇakālasamaye āpattim āpadyeta /
SA11sanssr_pu:907_2: madhyāhnakālasamaye sarvajñatācittenāvirahito vihared aparyanta eva bodhisatvasya śīlaskandhaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:907_3: sacen madhyāhnakālasamaye āpattim āpadyate sāyāhnakālasamaye sarvajñatācittenāvirahito bhaved aparyanta eva bodhisatvasya śīlaskandhaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:907_5: evaṃ hy upāle saparihārā śikṣā mahāyānasaṃprasthitānāṃ bodhisatvānāṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:907_6: tatra bodhisatvena nātikaukṛtyaparyutthānam utpādyaṃ nātivipratisāriṇā bhavitavyaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:907_7: sacet punaḥ śrāvakayānīyaḥ pudgalaḥ punaḥ punar āpattim āpadyeta /
SA11sanssr_pu:911_0: tad evam aviratapravṛttāṃ bahusukhāṃ dauḥślyotpattiṃ rakṣann evaṃ ca karmāvaraṇavibandham apanayan kleśaviśodhane prayateta /
SA11sanssr_pu:912_0: tatrādau tāvat kṣameta / akṣamasya hi śrutādau vīryaṃ pratihanyate 'khedasahatvāt /
SA11sanssr_pu:912_2: nāpi kleśaśodhanopāyam / tasmād akhinnaḥ śrutam eṣeta /
SA11sanssr_pu:912_4: saṃśrayeta vanaṃ tataḥ / tatrāpi vikṣepapraśamanānabhiyuktasya cittaṃ na samādhīyatae iti /
SA11sanssr_pu:912_5: samādhānāya yujyeta / samāhitasya ca na kiñcit phalam anyatra kleśaśodhanād iti /
SA11sanssr_pu:914_0: idānīṃ nirdeśa ucyate / tatra kṣāntis trividhā dharmasaṃgītisūtre 'bhihitā /
SA11sanssr_pu:915_0: ata evāha candrapradīpasūtre / sukhe 'nnabhiṣvaṅgaḥ / duṣkhe 'vaimukhyam iti //
SA11sanssr_pu:916_0: ratnameghasūtre 'py uktaṃ / yae ime ādhyātmikāḥ śokaparidevaduṣkhadaurmanasyopāyāsās tān kṣamate 'dhivāsayatīti /
SA11sanssr_pu:917_1: punar aparaṃ gṛhapate gṛhiṇā bodhisatvenānunayapratighāpagatena bhavitavyam aṣṭalokadharmānanuliptena /
SA11sanssr_pu:917_2: tena bhogalābhena vā bhāryāputralābhena vā dhanadhānyavittalābhena vā nonnamitavyaṃ na praharṣitavyaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:917_4: na durmanasā bhavitavyaṃ evaṃ cānena pratyavekṣitavyaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:918_0: api ca / yady asty eva pratīkāro daurmanasyena tatra kim /
SA11sanssr_pu:919_0: līnatvād vā hatotsāho gṛhyate parayāpadā / taccintayā mudhā yānti hrasvam āyur muhur muhuḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:923_0: āryagaṇḍavyūhe 'py uktaṃ / duryodhanaṃ cittaṃ te dārike utpādayitavyaṃ sarvakleśanirghātāya /
SA11sanssr_pu:924_0: na cābhyāsasya duṣkaraṃ nāma kiñcid asti /
SA11sanssr_pu:924_1: tathā hi mūḍhatarāṇām api tāvad bhārahārakakaivartakarṣakādīnāṃ duṣkhābhyāsāt kṣudrataraphale 'pi vastuni saṃrūḍhakiṇāṅkitaṃ cittam avasādena na paribhūyate /
SA11sanssr_pu:924_3: tathā prākṛtā api kiñcid apakāriṣv ātmaduṣkṛtenaiva hateṣu svayaṃ mṛtyuṣu prahartuṃ gāḍhaprahāravedanā api saṃgrāmayanty eva /
SA11sanssr_pu:924_4_0: ki.ṃ punar drāghiṣṭhakālāpakāriṣu duṣkhopāttakuśaladhanalavastainyeṣu narakeṣu nāvadhyaghātakeṣu bhavacārakapālakeṣu niḥsaraṇadvāradiṅnāśakeṣv
SA11sanssr_pu:924_4_1: ānukūlye 'pi dṛḍhataravādhākareṣv annapakṛtavairiṣv annavadhikalpābaddhadṛḍhavaireṣu kleśaśatruṣu prahartum utsāho duṣkhasahanaṃ
SA11sanssr_pu:924_8: mjñā / tathā sarvaduṣkhotpādeṣu sukhasaṃjñā pratyupasthānābhyāsāt sukhasaṃjñaiva pratyupatiṣṭhate /
SA11sanssr_pu:924_9: etan niṣyandaphalaṃ ca sarvadharmasukhākrāntaṃ nāma samādhiṃ pratilabhate /
SA11sanssr_pu:925_0: uktaṃ hi pitāputrasamāgame / asti bhagavan sarvadharmasukhakrānto nāma samādhiḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:925_1: yasya samādheḥ pratilambhād bodhisatvaḥ sarvārambaṇavastuṣu sukhām eva vedanāṃ vedayate /
SA11sanssr_pu:925_2: nāduṣkhāsukhāṃ / tasya nairayikām api kāraṇāṃ kāryamāṇasya sukhasaṃjñaiva pratyupasthitā bhavati /
SA11sanssr_pu:925_3: mānuṣīm api kāraṇāṃ kāryamāṇasya hasteṣv api chidyamāneṣu pādeṣv api karṇeṣv api nāsāsv api sukhasaṃjñaiva pratyupasthitā bhavati /
SA11sanssr_pu:925_4: vetrair api tāḍyamānasyārddhavetrair api kaśābhir api tāḍyamānasya sukhasaṃjñaiva pravartate bandhanāgāreṣv api praks.
SA11sanssr_pu:926_2: naḍacippitikaṃ vā cipyamānasya tailapradyotikaṃ vādīpyamānasya sarpiḥpradyotikaṃ vā dadhipradyotikaṃ vādīpyamānasya sukhasaṃjñaiva pratyupasthitā bhavati /
SA11sanssr_pu:926_3: ulkāmukhaṃ vā hriyamāṇasya siṃhamukhaṃ vā hriyamāṇasya śuṣkavarttikāṃ vā vartyamānasya /
SA11sanssr_pu:927_0: kārṣāpaṇacchedikaṃ vā chidyamānasya piṣṭapācanikaṃ vā pācyamānasya hastibhir vā mardyamānasya sukhasaṃjñaiva pravartate /
SA11sanssr_pu:927_1: akṣiṇyutpāṭhyamāne jīvaśūlikam api kriyamāṇasya sarvaśo vāghātaṃ nirṇīya śirasi vā prapātyamāne sukhasaṃjñaiva pravartate /
SA11sanssr_pu:928_0: tat kasya hetoḥ / tathā hi bodhisatvasya mahāsatvasya dīrgharātraṃ caryāṃ carata etat praṇidhānam abhūt /
SA11sanssr_pu:928_1: ye māṃ bhojayeran / te upaśamaśamasukhasya lābhino bhaveyuḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:928_2: ye māṃ pālayeyuḥ satkuryur gurukuryur mānayeyuḥ pūjayeyuḥ sarve te upaśamasukhasya lābhino bhaveyuḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:928_3: ye 'pi mām ākrośeyur visparśeyus tāḍayeyuḥ śastreṇāchindyur yāvat sarvaśo jīvitād vyaparopayeyuḥ sarve te saṃbodhisukhasya lābhino bhaveyuḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:929_0: sa ebhir manaḥkāraiḥ samanvāgata etena karmaṇā /
SA11sanssr_pu:929_1: ebhiḥ praṇidhibhiḥ samanvāgataḥ sarvasatvānugatāṃ sukhasaṃjñām āsevate nisevate bhāvayati bahulīkaroti /
SA11sanssr_pu:929_2: sa tasya karmaṇo vipākena sarvadharmasukhākrāntaṃ nāma samādhiṃ pratilabhate /
SA11sanssr_pu:929_3: yasmin samaye bodhisatvena sarvadharmasukhākrānto nāma samādhiḥ pratilabdho bhavati tasmin samaye akṣobhyo bhavaty asaṃhāryaḥ sarvamārakarmabhir iti vistaraḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:931_0: yathāha candrapradīpasūtre / sagauravaḥ prītamanāḥ sadā bhavet /
SA11sanssr_pu:932_0: uktaṃ cākṣayamatisūtre / tatra katamā muditā / yāvad dharmānusmaraṇāt prītiḥ prasādaḥ prāmodyaṃ cittasyānnavalīnatānnavamṛdyatāparitarṣaṇā /
SA11sanssr_pu:932_2: cittasya prāmodyaṃ kāyasyaudbilyaṃ buddheḥ saṃpraharṣaṇaṃ manasa utplavaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:932_11: yācitasya dātukāmatā / dadato dattvā ca trimaṇḍalapariśodhitaṃ dānaprāmodyaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:932_12: śīlavatsu sadā prasādaḥ / duḥśīleṣv anugrahaprītiḥ / svaśīlapariśuddhyā sarvadurgandham atikramāśvāsanaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:932_19: śāstṛprema bodhisatveṣu / ātmaprema dharmeṣu / jīvitaprema tathāgateṣu / mātāpitṛprema guruṣu / putraprema satveṣu / buddhaprema ācāryopādhyāyeṣu /
SA11sanssr_pu:932_25: iti hi yā sarvendriyeṣv annavalīnendriyatā iyam ucyate muditety ādi /
SA11sanssr_pu:933_0: atra ca śikṣitān bodhisatvān idaṃ vacanam alaṃkaroti yad uktam āryamahāmeghe /
SA11sanssr_pu:933_1: nirayagaticittanityasamādhānaśīlāś ca nirayagatipriyāś ca nirayagatipattanavaṇijaś ca bhavanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:933_2: nirayalolāś ca bhavanti nirayalobhamatsariṇaś ca nirayāgnicittapraguṇṇāḥ bhavantīti /
SA11sanssr_pu:935_2: annāryair duḥśīlaiḥ satvair mārair mārakāyikābhir vā devatābhir mārādhiṣṭhitair vā māradūtair vā viheṭhyamānaḥ samīryamāṇaḥ kṣobhyamānas tarjyamānas tāḍyamāno na bhidyate tato /
SA11sanssr_pu:935_10: sa evam adhyāśayasaṃpanna eva samānaḥ sarvasatvānām antikād uccaghanāṃ sahate /
SA11sanssr_pu:935_11: unmananāṃ kutsanāṃ sahate sarvasatvānām ākrośaparibhāṣāṃ duruktadurāgatān vacanapathān sahate /
SA11sanssr_pu:935_12: sarvasatvapīḍāṃ sahate / sarvasatvabhārāṃś ca sahate uttārayati vā na ca khidyate /
SA11sanssr_pu:935_13_0: na ca līyate / na saṃlīyate / na viṣīdati / balam upadarśayati / sthāma saṃjanayati / vīryam ārabhate / parākramaṃ parākramate /
SA11sanssr_pu:935_13_1: utsāhaṃ janayati / unmūḍhacittaṃ nigṛhṇāti / sa ākruṣṭo na pratyākrośati /
SA11sanssr_pu:935_14: tāḍito na pratitāḍayati / roṣito na pratiroṣayati / kruddhāya na pratikrudhyati /
SA11sanssr_pu:935_16: ... sacet punar ete satvā yāvanto daśasu dikṣu prabhāvyamānāḥ prabhāvyante te sarve 'siśaktitomarapāliyogena māṃ pṛṣṭhataḥ pṛṣṭhato 'nubadhnīyuḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:935_17_0: yatraiṣa pṛthivīpradeśe sthito vā niṣaṇṇo vā caṅkramyamāṇo vā śayāno vā bodhicittam utpādayiṣyati dānacittaṃ vā yāvat prajñācittaṃ
SA11sanssr_pu:935_17_1: vā śrutakuśalamūlacittaṃ votpādayiṣyati tatrāsya pṛthivīpradeśe śatadhābadarīpattrapramāṇaṃ kāyaṃ chetsyāmo vikariṣyāmo vidhvaṃsayiṣyāmas /
SA11sanssr_pu:935_18_0: te cet sarvasatvā mām ākrośayeyuḥ paribhāṣeran kutsayeyuḥ paṃsayeyur asatyābhir vāgbhiḥ paruṣābhir vāgbhiḥ samuccareyur adhiṣṭhitā
SA11sanssr_pu:935_18_1: annarthakarmāṇaḥ śatadhābadarīpattrapramāṇaṃ mama kāyaṃ chindhyur bhindyur vikareyur vidhvaṃsayeyuḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:935_19: evaṃ mayā na kasyacit satvasyāntike kṣobhacittam utpādayitavyaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:935_20_0: tat kasya hetoḥ / pūrvā koṭiḥ saṃsārasyāpramāṇīkṛtā yatra me 'yam ātmabhāvo narakagatasyāpi tiryagyonigatasyāpi yamalokagatasyāpi
SA11sanssr_pu:935_20_1: manuṣyagatasyāpi kāmāhārapaliguddhasya dharmān aśrutavato viṣamājīvagocarasya nirarthakajīvinaḥ aṅgapratyaṅgasya śatadhā
SA11sanssr_pu:935_20_2: chinno bhinno nikṛtto vividhābhiś ca kāraṇābhiḥ kārito na ca mayā tato nidānam ātmārthaṃ kṛto na parārthaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:935_21: sacet punar punar mamaite sarvasatvā aparāntakoṭiṃ chindyur bhindyur vikireyur vidhvaṃsayeyus tathāpi mayāparityaktaiva sarvajñatā /
SA11sanssr_pu:935_24: tat kasya hetoḥ / sarvā hy eṣā kāyapīḍā kāyavivartanā /
SA11sanssr_pu:935_25: nairayikasya duṣkhasya śatatamīm api kalāṃ nopaiti yāvad upaniṣadam api na kṣamate /
SA11sanssr_pu:935_27: na punar mayā buddhadharmāḥ parityaktavyā na sarvasatvārambaṇā mahākaruṇā /
SA11sanssr_pu:936_2: katamaś ca sa dharmo / yad uta kāyaprema kāyaniketaḥ kāyādhyavasānaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:936_4: evaṃ dharmagaṇanāviṣṭaḥ sāgaramate bodhisatvaḥ sarvasatvapīḍāṃ sahate /
SA11sanssr_pu:937_0: yaḥ kāyasyotsargaḥ kāyaparityāgaḥ kāyānavekṣā / iyam asya dānapāramitā //
SA11sanssr_pu:938_0: yat kāye chidyamāne sarvasatvān maitryā spharati /
SA11sanssr_pu:939_0: yat kāye chidyamāne ya evāsya kāyaṃ chindati teṣām eva pramokṣārthaṃ kṣamate /
SA11sanssr_pu:939_1: na ca cittena kṣaṇyate kṣāntibalaṃ copadarśayatīyam asya kṣāntipāramitā /
SA11sanssr_pu:940_0: yena vīryeṇa taṃ sarvajñatāchandaṃ notsṛjati cittabalādhīnaṃ ca pratigṛhṇāti /
SA11sanssr_pu:940_1: saṃsāram eva cānubadhnāti / kuśalamūlārambham eva cārabhate /
SA11sanssr_pu:941_0: yat kāye vikīryamāṇe tat sarvajñatācittotpādaratnaṃ kartuṃ na saṃmuhyati bodhim evāpekṣate śāntapraśāntam eva pratyavekṣate /
SA11sanssr_pu:942_0: yat kāye chidyamāne kāyasya tṛṇakāṣṭhakuḍyavatpratibhāsopamatāṃ pratyavekṣate māyādharmatāṃ ca kāyasyāvatarati /
SA11sanssr_pu:942_1: bhūtānityatāṃ ca bhūtaduṣkhatāṃ ca bhūtānātmatāṃ ca bhūtaśāntatāṃ ca kāyasyopanidhyāyati /
SA11sanssr_pu:943_5: eṣa eva tāvan mayā satvaḥ pūrvataraṃ bodhimaṇḍe niṣādayitavyaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:944_0: īdṛśānām asmābhiḥ satvānām adāntānām aguptānām annupaśāntānām arthāya saṃnāhāḥ saṃnaddhavyāḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:945_2: sa parigaveṣamāṇo na taṃ dharmam upalabhate /
SA11sanssr_pu:946_0: bhagavatyām apy uktaṃ / evaṃ cittam utpādayati / yena mayā sarvasatvānāṃ vivāda utsārayitavyaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:946_2: lābhā me durlabdhā yo 'haṃ jalpite pratijalpāmi /
SA11sanssr_pu:946_3: yena mayā sarvasatvānāṃ saṃkramabhūtena bhavitavyaṃ so 'haṃ parasya tvam ity api vācaṃ bhāṣe /
SA11sanssr_pu:946_7: parato duruktān durāgatān durbhāṣitān bhāṣyamāṇān vacanapathān śṛṇvatā cittaṃ nāghātayitavyaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:946_8: pareṣām antike na mamaitat sādhu na pratirūpaṃ yo 'haṃ parasya doṣāntaraṃ saṃjanayeyam /
SA11sanssr_pu:946_9: etan na mama pratirūpaṃ yad ahaṃ pareṣāṃ doṣāntaram api saṃśrotavyaṃ manye /
SA11sanssr_pu:946_10_0: tat kasya hetoḥ / na mayāśayo vikopayitavyo yena mayā sarvasatvāḥ sarvasukhopadhānena sukhayitavyāḥ parinirvāpayitavyāś cānnuttarāṃ
SA11sanssr_pu:946_11: na ca mayā pareṣāṃ svaparāddhānām api vyāpattavyaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:946_13: idaṃ tu mayā karaṇīyaṃ / dṛḍhaparākramatayā parākrāntavyaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:946_14: na mayā jīvitāntarāye 'pi kriyamāṇe kṣobhaḥ karaṇīyaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:947_1: ye kruddhāḥ satvās tān āśvāsayati kṣamāpayati /
SA11sanssr_pu:951_0: evaṃ kṣāntipratisthitaḥ śrute vīryam ārabheta / anyathā śrutam evāsya vināśāya saṃpadyate //
SA11sanssr_pu:952_1: kiyadbahū dharmaparyāyuṇeyā [doubtful] śīlaṃ na rakṣeta śrute namanta /
SA11sanssr_pu:952_2: na bāhuśrutyena sa śakyu trāyituṃ duḥśīlayena vrajamāna durgatim /
SA11sanssr_pu:953_1: tathā hi kulaputrāḥ śrutavataḥ prajñāgamo bhavati /
SA11sanssr_pu:954_0: atra ca maharṣer uttarasya jātakaṃ vistareṇa kṛtvāha /
SA11sanssr_pu:954_1: dharmakāmānāṃ hi / vimalatejaḥ / bodhisatvānāṃ mahāsatvānāṃ sagauravāṇāṃ sapratīśānāṃ anyalokadhātusthitā api buddhā bhagavanto mukham upadarśayanti dharmaṃ cānuśrāvayanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:954_2: dharmakāmānāṃ / vimalatejaḥ / bodhisatvānāṃ mahāsatvānāṃ parvatakandaravṛkṣamadhyeṣu dharmanidhānāni nikṣiptāni /
SA11sanssr_pu:954_4: dharmakāmānāṃ vimalatejaḥ bodhisatvānāṃ pūrvabuddhadarśinyo devatā buddhapratibhānam upasaṃharanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:955_0: parikṣīṇāyuṣkāṇāṃ buddhā bhagavanto devatāś cāyurbalaṃ copasaṃharanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:955_1: buddhādhiṣṭhānena devatādhiṣṭhānena ca kāṅkṣāmāṇā varṣasahasram avatiṣṭhante /
SA11sanssr_pu:956_0: yāvat kalpaṃ vā kalpāvaśeṣaṃ vā yāvad vā ākāṅkṣanti dharmagauravajātānāṃ bodhisatvānāṃ buddhā bhagavanto jarām apy apanayanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:956_1: vyādhīn apanayanti / smṛtim upasaṃharati / gatiṃ matiṃ pratibhānaṃ copasaṃharanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:957_1: dharmagauraveṇa / vimalatejaḥ / bodhisatvānāṃ mahāsatvānāṃ sarvopakramabhayāni na bhavanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:957_2: tasmāt tarhi vimalatejaḥ śrutasaṃbhārakauśalyābhiyuktena bodhisatvena bhavitavyam iti /
SA11sanssr_pu:958_2_0: aśītyākārapraveśaṃ śrutaṃ / tad yathā / chandākāram āśayākāram adhyāśayākāraṃ prayogākāraṃ nirmāṇākāram apramāṇākāraṃ kalyāṇamitrākāraṃ
SA11sanssr_pu:958_2_1: gauravākāraṃ pradakṣiṇākāraṃ suvacanākāraṃ paryupāsanākāram avahitaśrotrākāraṃ manaḥkārākāram avikṣepākāram avasthānākāraṃ
SA11sanssr_pu:958_2_2: ratnasaṃjñākāraṃ bhaiṣajyasaṃjñākāraṃ sarvavyādhiśamanākāraṃ smṛtibhajanākāraṃ gatibodhanākāraṃ matirocanākāraṃ buddhipraveśāk
SA11sanssr_pu:958_2_3: āram atṛptabuddhadharmaśravaṇākāraṃ tyāgavṛṃhaṇākāraṃ dāntājāneyākāraṃ bahuśrutasevanākāraṃ satyakṛtyaprītyanubhavanākāraṃ
SA11sanssr_pu:958_2_4: kāyaudbilyākāraṃ cittaprahlādanākāram aparikhedaśravaṇākāraṃ dharmaśravaṇākāraṃ pratipattiśravaṇākāraṃ paradeśanāśravaṇākāraṃ
SA11sanssr_pu:958_2_6: saṃgrahavastuśravaṇākāram upāyakauśalyaśravaṇākāraṃ brahmavihāraśravaṇākāraṃ smṛtisaṃprajanyaśravaṇākāraṃ gauravākāraṃ utpādakauśalyaśravaṇākāram
SA11sanssr_pu:958_2_7: annutpādakauśalyaśravaṇākāram aśubhākāraṃ maitryāḥ śravaṇākāraṃ pratītyasamutpādākāraṃ anityākāraṃ duṣkhākāram annātmākāraṃ
SA11sanssr_pu:958_2_8: śāntākāraṃ śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitākāraṃ annabhisaṃs kārākāraṃ kuśalābhisaṃskārākāraṃ satvādhiṣṭhānākāraṃ avipraṇāśākāraṃ
SA11sanssr_pu:958_2_9: svādhīnākāraṃ svacittārakṣaṇākāraṃ vīryasyāśraṃsanākāraṃ dharmanidhyaptyākāraṃ kleśavipakṣākāraṃ svapakṣaparikarṣaṇākāraṃ
SA11sanssr_pu:958_2_11: āryasaṃmatākāraṃ annāryaprasādanākāraṃ satyadarśanākāraṃ skandhadoṣavivarjanākāraṃ saṃskṛtadoṣaparitulanākāram arthapratiśaraṇākāraṃ
SA11sanssr_pu:958_2_12: dharmapratiśaraṇākāraṃ sarvapāpākaraṇākāraṃ ātmaparahitākāraṃ sukṛtakarmānanutapyanākāraṃ viśeṣagamanākāraṃ sarvabuddhadharmapratilābhākāram
SA11sanssr_pu:959_0: punar atraivāha / yaś ca dharmasaṃbhārayogaḥ sa evāsya jñānasaṃbhāro bhavati /
SA11sanssr_pu:959_1: tatra katamo dharmasaṃbhārayogo yeyam alpārthatālpakṛtyatālpabhāṣatālpapariṣkāratā pūrvarātrāpararātraṃ jāgarikāyogam anuyuktasya śrutārthaparitulanatā /
SA11sanssr_pu:959_2_0: bhūyo bhūyaḥ paryeṣaṇatā / cittasyānnāvilatā / nīvaraṇānāṃ viṣkambhanatā / āpattiṣu niḥśaraṇajñānaṃ / akaukṛtyatā / aparyutthānatā /
SA11sanssr_pu:959_4_0: tanmayavihāritā / aśithilaśīlatānikṣiptadhuratā viśeṣagāmitā saṃgaṇikāvivarjanam ekārāmatāraṇyābhimukhamanaḥkāratā āryavaṃśasantuṣṭiḥ
SA11sanssr_pu:959_4_1: dhutaguṇeṣv acalanatā dharmārāmaratiratatā laukikamantrāsmaraṇatā lokottaradharmaparyeṣṭitā smṛtyapramoṣatā /
SA11sanssr_pu:959_5: arthagatyanugamatā / matyā mārgānulomatā / dhṛtyā saṃvarapratyayair jñānānugamaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:960_3: tad yathā / lokāyataśāstrāṇi daṇḍanītiśāstrāṇi kārkhedaśāstrāṇi vādavidyāśāstrāṇi kumārakrīḍāśāstrāṇi jambhakavidyāśāstrāṇi /
SA11sanssr_pu:961_0: yāny api tad anyāni kānicin mokṣapratikūlāni śāstrāṇi saṃmohāya saṃvartante tāni sarvāṇi bodhisatvayānasaṃprasthitena parivarjayitavyānīti /
SA11sanssr_pu:962_0: evaṃ śrutavatā cittaṃ śodhayitum araṇyam āśrayaṇīyaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:962_1: kathaṃ punar āśayasaṃpannasyāpy ugradattaparipṛcchāyāṃ gṛham anujñātaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:962_2: yatnavato 'py asāmarthyāt / paradārādiṣv api tarhi nāpattiḥ syāt /
SA11sanssr_pu:962_3: na teṣām asāmarthye 'pi prakṛtiduṣṭatvād gṛhāvāsasya ca prajñaptisāvadyatvād iti /
SA11sanssr_pu:966_0: tad evam ugradattaparipṛcchāvidhinā gṛhadoṣān bhāvayitvā śrutavatā cittaṃ śodhayitum araṇyam āśrayaṇīyam iti sthitaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:967_1: na jātu kāmān pratiṣevamāṇaḥ putreṣu dāreṣu janitva tṛṣṇāṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:967_2: gṛhaṃ ca sevitva jugupsanīyam annuttarāṃ prāpsyati so 'grabodhim /
SA11sanssr_pu:968_0: ye kāma varjenti yathāgnikarṣūṃ putreṣu dāreṣu janitva tṛṣṇāṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:968_1: uttasta gehād abhiniṣkramanti na durlabhā teṣv iyam agrabodhiḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:969_0: na kaści buddhaḥ purimeṇa āsīd annāgato bheṣyati yo 'vatiṣṭhate /
SA11sanssr_pu:969_1: yehi sthitair eva agāramadhye prāptā iyaṃ uttama agrabodhiḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:970_0: prahāya rājyaṃ yatha kheṭapiṇḍaṃ vased araṇyeṣu vivekakāmaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:970_1: kleśān prahāya vinihatya mānaṃ budhyanti bodhiṃ virajām asaṃskṛtām /
SA11sanssr_pu:971_0: annehi pānehi ca cīvarehi puṣpehi gandhehi vilepanehi /
SA11sanssr_pu:971_1: nopasthitā bhonti narottamā jinā yatha pravrajitvā caramāṇadharmān /
SA11sanssr_pu:972_0: yaś caiva bodhiṃ pratikāṅkṣamāṇaḥ satvārtha nirviṇṇa kusaṃskṛtātaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:972_1: araṇyābhimukha sapta padāni gacched ayaṃ tataḥ puṇyaviśiṣṭa bhoti /
SA11sanssr_pu:973_0: yadi punar visabhāgasatvānunayāt pariṣatkāmatayā vā lābhādikāmatayā vā vivekapraveśe vilambeta /
SA11sanssr_pu:973_1: tadartham atraivoktaṃ / na vijña bālehi karonti vigrahaṃ satkṛtya bālān parivarjayanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:973_2: mamāntike ceti praduṣṭacittā na bāladharmehi karonti saṃstavam /
SA11sanssr_pu:974_0: na vijña bālāna karoti sevanāṃ viditva bālāna svabhāvasaṃtatim /
SA11sanssr_pu:974_1: kiyacciraṃ bālasusevitā pi puno 'pi te bhonti amitrasannibhāḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:975_0: na vijña bāleṣv iha viśvasanti vijñāya bālāna svabhāvasaṃtatim /
SA11sanssr_pu:975_1: svabhāvabhinnā prakṛtīya bālāḥ kuto 'sti mitraṃ hi pṛthagjanānāṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:976_0: sahadhārmikeno vacanena uktāḥ krodhaṃ ca doṣaṃ ca apratyayaṃ ca /
SA11sanssr_pu:976_1: prāviṣkaronti imi bāladharmā imam artha vijñāya na viśvasanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:977_0: bālā hi bālehi samaṃ samenti yathā amedhyena amedhya sārddham /
SA11sanssr_pu:977_1: vijñaḥ punar vijñajanena sārddhaṃ samenti sarpir yatha sarpimaṇḍe /
SA11sanssr_pu:978_0: tathā ca punar atraivam āha / sūsukhitāḥ sada te naraloke yeṣu priyāpriya nāsti kahiṃcit /
SA11sanssr_pu:978_1: ye ca na kandarake 'bhiramante śrāmaṇakaṃ susukhaṃ anubhonti /
SA11sanssr_pu:979_2: khaḍgasamā vicaranti mu lokaṃ gagane pavana yatheva vrajanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:980_0: syuḥ sukhitā vata te naraloke yeṣu na sajjati mānasa loke /
SA11sanssr_pu:980_1: vāyusamaṃ sada teṣv iha cittaṃ no ca priyāpriya vidyati saṃgo /
SA11sanssr_pu:981_0: apriya ye dukhitehi nivāso ye 'pi priyā dukhitehi viyogo /
SA11sanssr_pu:981_1: anta ubhe api tehi jahitvā te sukhitā naraye rata dharme /
SA11sanssr_pu:982_0: punar atraivoktam / bhavati satatam alpakṛtyayogī pṛthu guṇa doṣata sarvi varjayitvā /
SA11sanssr_pu:982_1: na vivadati kadāci yuktayogī imi guṇa tasya bhavanty araṇyavāse /
SA11sanssr_pu:983_0: sada bhavati niviṇṇa saṃskṛte 'sau na bhavati tasya pṛhā kahiṃci loke /
SA11sanssr_pu:983_1: na ca bhavati vivṛddhir āsravāṇāṃ vanavasato 'sya bhavanti ānuśaṃsāḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:984_0: adhikaraṇa na tasya jātu bhotī sada upaśāntarato vivekacārī /
SA11sanssr_pu:984_1: vacaci manasi kāya saṃvṛtasyo bahuguṇa tasya bhavanty araṇyavāse /
SA11sanssr_pu:985_0: bhavati anukūla tasya mokṣo laghu pratividhyati so 'dhimukti śāntām /
SA11sanssr_pu:985_1: vanicari dhimukti sevate 'sya imi guṇa bhonty araṇyavāsi sarve /
SA11sanssr_pu:986_0: punar āha / vanaṣaṇḍa sevatha vivikta sadā vijahitva grāmanagareṣu ratim /
SA11sanssr_pu:986_1: advitīyakhaḍgasama bhotha sadā na cireṇa lapsyatha samādhivaram /
SA11sanssr_pu:987_0: āryarāṣṭrapālasūtre 'py āha / tyaktvā geham annantadoṣagahanaṃ cintānapekṣāḥ sadā /
SA11sanssr_pu:987_1: te 'raṇye ratim āpnuvanti guṇinaḥ śāntendriyāḥ sūratāḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:988_0: na strīsaṃbhava naiva cāpi puruṣais teṣāṃ kvacid vidyate /
SA11sanssr_pu:989_0: lābhair nāpi ca teṣu harṣa svamano līyanty alābhair na ca /
SA11sanssr_pu:990_1: satvasaṃsargo me na kartavyo na hi mayaikasatvasya kuśalamūlāni saṃjanayitavyānīty ādi /
SA11sanssr_pu:991_0: yadi punaḥ śrutavān imāṃ kṣaṇasaṃpadam āsādya lābhādau saktaḥ cittaṃ na śodhayet sa evaikaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:992_0: uktaṃ hy āryaratnakūṭe / tad yathā kāśyapa kaścid eva puruṣo mahatā udakārṇavenohyamāna udakatṛṣṇayā kālaṃ kuryād /
SA11sanssr_pu:992_1: evam eva kāśyapa ihaike śramaṇabrāhmaṇā bahūn dharmān udgṛhya paryavāpya na rāgatṛṣṇāṃ vinodayanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:992_2: na dveṣatṛṣṇāṃ / na mohatṛṣṇāṃ vinodayanti / te mahatā dharmārṇavenohyamānāḥ kleśatṛṣṇayā kālagatā /
SA11sanssr_pu:994_1: yeṣu ca sthāneṣu nātidūre piṇḍapātagocaro bhavati nātisaṃnikṛṣṭe /
SA11sanssr_pu:994_2_0: yeṣu pānīyāni bhavanty acchāni śucīni nirmalāny alpāyāsāni mukhaparibhogāni yāni ca sthānāni vṛkṣasaṃpannāni bhavanti puṣpasaṃpannāni
SA11sanssr_pu:994_2_1: phalasaṃpannāni pattrasaṃpannāny apagataduṣṭaśvāpadāni guhāsaṃpannāni prāgbhārasaṃpannāni sukhaparisarpyakāṇi śāntāny advitīyāni
SA11sanssr_pu:994_3_0: sa teṣu sthāneṣv āśrito yad anena pūrvapaṭhitaṃ bhavati tat tribhī rātrais trirdivasasya svādhyāyati nātyuccena svareṇa nātinīcena
SA11sanssr_pu:994_3_1: noddhatair indriyair na bahirgatena cittena prasādam upajīvan grantham upadhārayan nimittāny udgṛhṇan middham apakrāman /
SA11sanssr_pu:994_4: saced āraṇyakasya bhikṣo rājā vopasaṃkrāmati rājamātro vānye vā brāhmaṇakṣatriyanaigamajānapadāḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:994_6: evaṃ cānena vaktavyaṃ / niṣīda mahārāja yathā prajñaptae āsane /
SA11sanssr_pu:994_10: tasya te mahārāja lābhāḥ sulabdhā yasya te bhūpradeśe śīlavanto guṇavanto bahuśrutāḥ śramaṇabrāhmaṇāḥ prativasanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:995_0: sacet sthiro bhavati vinītaḥ praśāntendriyaḥ bhavyaś ca bhavati dharmadeśanāyāḥ tato 'sya vicitrā dharmadeśanā upasaṃhartavyā /
SA11sanssr_pu:995_3: sacet saṃvegānukūlāṃ na priyāyate udārodārāṇi tathāgatamāhātmyāni upadeṣṭavyāni /
SA11sanssr_pu:995_4: brāhmaṇakṣatriyanaigamajānapadānām apy upasaṃkrāmatāṃ yathānurūpāḥ kriyā upasaṃhartavyā /
SA11sanssr_pu:995_5: sa evaṃ bahuśrutaḥ san pratibalo bhavati dhārmaśravaṇikānāṃ cittam ārādhayituṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:995_6: te ca satvās tasyāntike prītiṃ ca prasādaṃ ca prāmodyaṃ ca pratilabhantae iti /
SA11sanssr_pu:996_1: punar aparaṃ gṛhapate pravrajitena bodhisatvenāraṇye prativasatā evam upaparīkṣitavyaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:996_4: bahavo 'py atrādāntā avinītā ayuktā annabhiyuktāḥ prativasanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:996_7: api tu khalu punar ahaṃ yasyārthāyāraṇye prativasāmi sa mayārthaḥ paripūrayitavyo yad uta śrāmaṇyārthaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:997_0: punar aparaṃ gṛhapate pravrajitena bodhisatvenāraṇye viharatā evam upaparīkṣitavyaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:997_2: tenaivaṃ mīmāṃsayitavyaṃ / bhayabhīto 'smy aham araṇyam āgataḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:997_3_0: kuto bhayabhītaḥ / saṃgaṇikābhayabhītaḥ / saṃsargabhayabhīto rāgadveṣamohabhayabhīto mānamadamrakṣaparidāhabhayabhīto lobherṣyāmātsaryabhayabhītaḥ
SA11sanssr_pu:997_6_0: skandhamārabhayabhītaḥ / kleśamārabhayabhīto / mṛtyumārabhayabhīto / devaputramārabhayabhītaḥ / anitye nitya iti viparyāsabhayabhīto
SA11sanssr_pu:997_10_0: lābhasatkārabhayabhīto 'kālamantrabhayabhīto 'dṛṣṭe dṛṣṭam iti bhayabhīto 'śrute śrutam iti bhayabhīto 'mate matam iti bhayabhīto
SA11sanssr_pu:997_10_2: sarvabhavagatyupapattibhayabhīto nirayatiryagyonipitṛviṣayabhayabhītaḥ saṃkṣepeṇa sarvebhyo 'kuśalebhyo manasikārebhyo bhayabhī
SA11sanssr_pu:997_10_3: ta ebhyo hy aham evaṃrūpebhyo bhayabhairavebhyo bhīto 'raṇyāvāsam upagataḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:998_0: punar aparaṃ gṛhapate pravrajitena bodhisatvenāraṇyavāsasthitena bhītena vā trastena vā evaṃ śikṣitavyaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:998_1: yāni kānicid bhayāny utpadyante sarvāṇi tāny ātmagrāhata utpadyante /
SA11sanssr_pu:999_0_0: sacet punar aham araṇye prativasan nātmagrāhaṃ parityajeyaṃ nātmābhiniveśaṃ nātmaparigrahaṃ nātmanidānaṃ nātmatṛṣṇāṃ nātmasaṃjñāṃ
SA11sanssr_pu:999_0_1: nātmavādopādānaṃ nātmadṛṣṭiṃ nātmādhiṣṭhānaṃ nātmaparikalpanāṃ nātmarakṣāṃ parityajeyaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:999_2: api tu khalu punar gṛhapate nāsty ātmasaṃjñino 'raṇyavāso /
SA11sanssr_pu:1000_0: araṇyavāso nāma gṛhapate ucyate sarvadharmeṣv asaṃbhavavāsaḥ sarvadharmeṣv asaṃgavāsaḥ // pe //
SA11sanssr_pu:1001_0: tad yathā gṛhapate 'raṇye tṛṇagulmauṣadhivanaḥpatayaḥ prativasanto na bibhyati nottrasyanti na saṃtrasyanti na saṃtrāsam āpadyante /
SA11sanssr_pu:1001_1: evam eva gṛhapate pravrajitena bodhisatvenāraṇye viharatā tṛṇagulmauṣadhivanaḥpatikāṣṭhakuḍyavad ātmapratibhāsavat saṃjñā kāye utpādayitavyā /
SA11sanssr_pu:1001_3: ko 'tra bibheti / ko 'sminn uttrasyati /tena bhayabhītena vā trastena vā evaṃ yoniśaḥ kāya upaparīkṣitavyaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1001_4: nāsty atra kāye ātmā vā satvo vā jīvo vā poṣo vā pudgalo vā manujo vā mānavo vā /
SA11sanssr_pu:1001_5: abhūtaparikalpa eṣa yad uta bhayaṃ nāma /
SA11sanssr_pu:1001_7: tena yathāraṇye tṛṇagulmauṣadhivanaḥpatayaḥ prativasanti amamā aparigrahāḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1001_8: evam evāmamenāparigraheṇāraṇyam eva sarvadharmā iti jñātvā upasampadya vihartavyaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1002_0: punar aparaṃ gṛhapate pravrajitena bodhisatvena buddhānujñāto 'raṇyavāsa iti jñātvāraṇye vastavyaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1003_0: sacet punar gṛhapate pravrajito bodhisatva uddeśasvādhyāyārthaṃ gaṇam avatarati /
SA11sanssr_pu:1003_1_0: tena tatra sagauraveṇa bhavitavyaṃ sapratīsenācāryopādhyāyeṣu sthaviramadhyanavakeṣu bhikṣuṣu pradakṣiṇabhavitavyam annalasena
SA11sanssr_pu:1003_2: evaṃ cānenopaparīkṣitavyaṃ / tathāgato 'py arhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ sadevasya lokasya samārakasya sabrahmakasya saśramaṇabrāhmaṇikāyāḥ prajāyāḥ pūjito dakṣiṇīyaḥ sarvasatvānāṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1003_3: so 'pi tāvan na kasyacit sakāśād upasthānaṃ svīkaroti /
SA11sanssr_pu:1003_5: api tu vayam eva sarvasatvānām upasthāyakā bhaviṣyāmaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1003_6: vayam eva pareṣām upasthānaparicaryāṃ kariṣyāmo na ca punaḥ kasyacit sakāśād upasthānaparicaryāṃ svīkariṣyāmaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1003_7: tat kasya hetoḥ / upasthānagurukasya hi gṛhapate bhikṣor guṇadharmānugraho naśyati /
SA11sanssr_pu:1003_8: yeṣāṃ ca saṃgrahaṃ karoti teṣām evaṃ bhavati /
SA11sanssr_pu:1004_0_0: punar atraivāha / sacet punar gṛhapate āraṇyako bodhisatvo dharmaśravaṇārthika ācāryopādhyāyadarśanārthiko vā glānaparipṛcchako
SA11sanssr_pu:1004_0_1: vā grāmāntikaṃ śayanāsanam āgacchet tena sāyam āgamanāya prakramaṇāya ca cittam utpādayitavyaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1004_1: sacet punar asya parapratibaddha uddeśaḥ svādhyāyo vā tena vihāre prativasatāraṇyapravaṇacittena bhavitavyaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1004_2: eṣa eva tasyāraṇyavāso yat sarvavastuṣv araṇyasaṃjñā dharmaparyeṣṭyā cātṛpteti /
SA11sanssr_pu:1005_1: yadi punar asya tatrāraṇyāyatane viharato 'prāptaphalapṛthagjanasya vyāḍamṛgā āgaccheyuḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1005_2: tena tatra na bhayaṃ na trāsa utpādayitavyaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1005_5: na mayātra bhetavyaṃ / nottrasitavyaṃ / api tu maitrīm utpādayitvā doṣaṃ vivarjayiṣyāmi bhayam apanayiṣyāmi /
SA11sanssr_pu:1005_6: yady evam api kṛtvā te vyāḍamṛgā māṃ jīvitād vyaparopya bhuñjīran /
SA11sanssr_pu:1005_8: lābhā me sulabdhā yasya me 'sārāt kāyāt sāram ādattaṃ bhaviṣyati /
SA11sanssr_pu:1005_9: na punar ime vyāḍamṛgāḥ śakyā mayāmiṣeṇa toṣayituṃ mama māṃsaṃ bhakṣayitvā sukhasparśaṃ vihariṣyanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:1006_0: yadi punas tatrāraṇyāyatane viharato 'manuṣyā upasaṃkramiṣyanti suvarṇā vā durvarṇā vā /
SA11sanssr_pu:1006_2: yadi pūrvabuddhadarśinyo devatā āraṇyakaṃ bhikṣum upasaṃkramya praśnaṃ paripṛccheyuḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1006_3: tatra tenāraṇyakena bhikṣuṇā yathāśakti yathābalaṃ yathādharmādhigamāya tāsāṃ devatānāṃ dharmo deśayitavyaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1006_4: yadi punas tāvaṅ gambhīrān praśnān paripṛccheyur yān sa āraṇyako bhikṣur na śaknuyād visarjayituṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1006_5: tena nirmānena bhūtvā vāg bhāṣitavyāśikṣito na paribhavitavyaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1006_7: bhaviṣyati sa kālaḥ sa samayo yadādhigatān dharmān śrutvā sarvakathāṃ visarjayiṣyāmi /
SA11sanssr_pu:1007_0: tena tatrāraṇyāyatane prativasatā tṛṇagulmauṣadhivanaḥpatīnāṃ nimittaṃ grahītavyaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1007_1: katham ete bhavanti / yathaiṣāṃ bhāvanām asvāmikānām amamānām aparigrahāṇām evaṃ niśceṣṭānāṃ nirvyāpārāṇāṃ bhavaty utpādo bhaṅgaś ca /
SA11sanssr_pu:1007_3: na nirodhayitā / evam evāyaṃ kāyas tṛṇakāṣṭhakuḍyapratibhāsopamo 'svāmiko 'mamo 'parigraho niśceṣṭo nirvyāpāro hetupratyayayuktyā utpadyate /
SA11sanssr_pu:1007_5: na punar atra kaścid dharmaḥ paramārthata utpadyate vā nirudhyate veti /
SA11sanssr_pu:1008_0: punaś coktaṃ / tena tatrāraṇyāyatane viharatā evaṃ cittam utpādayitavyaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1008_1: yady apy aham araṇyam āgata eko 'dvitīyo /
SA11sanssr_pu:1008_2: na me kaścit sahāyo yo māṃ sukṛtaṃ duṣkṛtaṃ vā codayet /
SA11sanssr_pu:1008_3: api tu khalu punaḥ santīme devanāgayakṣā buddhāś ca bhagavanto ye mama cittāśayaṃ jānanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:1008_4: te mama sākṣiṇaḥ / so 'ham ihāraṇyāyatane prativasann akuśalacittasya vaśaṃ gacchāmi /
SA11sanssr_pu:1008_5: yadi punar aham iyaddūram āgata eko 'dvitīyo 'saṃstabdho 'mamo 'parigrahaḥ kāmavitarkaṃ vā vitarkayeyaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1008_6: vyāpaādaṃ vihinsāvitarkaṃ vā vitarkayeyam anyaṃ vākuśalavitarkaṃ vitarkayeyaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1008_8: te ca me devanāgayakṣā visaṃvāditāḥ buddhāś ca bhagavanto 'nnabhirāddhā bhaviṣyantīti /
SA11sanssr_pu:1012_0: tad evam araṇye vasan samādhānāya yujyate //
SA11sanssr_pu:1013_0: uktaṃ hi bhagavatyāṃ / sa teṣām eva satvānām arthāya dhyānapāramitāyāṃ carann avikṣiptacitto bhavati /
SA11sanssr_pu:1013_1: tat kasya hetoḥ / tathā hy asyaivaṃ bhavati / laukikī dhyānopapattir api tāvad vikṣiptacittasya durlabhā /
SA11sanssr_pu:1014_0: punar asyām uktaṃ / punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prathamacittotpādam upādāya dhyānapāramitāyāṃ caran sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktair manasikārair dhyānaṃ samāpadyate /
SA11sanssr_pu:1014_1: sa cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi dṛṣṭvā na nimittagrāhī bhavati nānuvyañjanagrāhī /
SA11sanssr_pu:1014_2: yato 'dhikaraṇam asya cakṣurindriyeṇāsaṃvarasaṃvṛtasya viharato 'bhidhyādaurmanasye anye vā pāpakā akuśalā dharmāś cittam anuprāpnuyuḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1014_4: rakṣati cakṣurindriyam / evaṃ śrotreṇa śabdān śrutvā /
SA11sanssr_pu:1014_5: ghrāṇena gandhān ghrātvā / jihvayā rasān āsvādya / kāyena spraṣṭavyāni spṛṣṭvā /
SA11sanssr_pu:1014_6: manasā dharmān vijñāya na nimittagrāhī bhavati /
SA11sanssr_pu:1014_7: nānuvyañjanagrāhī / yato 'dhikaraṇam asya mana indriyeṇāsaṃvarasaṃvṛtasya pāpakāś cittam anuprāpnuyuḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1014_9: rakṣati mana indriyaṃ / sa gacchann api tiṣṭhann api niṣaṇṇo 'pi śayāno 'pi bhāṣamāṇo 'pi samāhitāvasthām asamāhitāvasthāṃ na vijahāti /
SA11sanssr_pu:1015_3: annunnato 'nnavanataḥ / evaṃ sukhe duṣkhe / stutau nindāyāṃ / yaśasy ayaśasi / jīvite maraṇe ca samo nirvikāro 'nnunnato 'nnavanataḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1015_4: evaṃ śatrau mitre ca / manāpavartini ... / āryeṣv annāryeṣu / śabdeṣu saṃkīrṇeṣv asaṃkīrṇeṣu /
SA11sanssr_pu:1015_6: annunnato 'nnavanataḥ / anurodhavirodhāpagataḥ / tat kasya hetoḥ / tathā hi sa svalakṣaṇaśūnyān asaṃbhūtān aniṣpannān annabhinirvṛttān sarvadharmān paśyatīti vistaraḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1016_0: tatra līne manasi muditā bhāvanayottejanaṃ kuryāt / uddhate tv anityatāmanasikāraiḥ praśamaḥ //
