SA11sanssr_pu:1017_2: labdho 'dhunā sa pravaraḥ kṣaṇo 'dya tyajati pramādaṃ yadi moktukāma /
SA11sanssr_pu:1018_0: tathā / mayopamaṃ vitatham etat svapnopamaṃ ca saṃskṛtam avekṣya na cirād bhaviṣyati viyogaḥ sarvapriyaiḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1018_1: na nityam iha kaścit / udyujya yathā ghaṭata nityaṃ pāramitāsu bhūmiṣu baleṣu /
SA11sanssr_pu:1018_2: mā jātu sraṃsaya vīryaṃ yāvan na budhyathā pravarabodhim /
SA11sanssr_pu:1019_0: āryalalitavistare 'py uktaṃ / jvalitaṃ tribhuvaṃ jaravyādhidukhair maraṇāgnipradīptam anātham idam /
SA11sanssr_pu:1019_1: bhavaniḥśaraṇe sada mūḍha jagad bhramati bhramaro yathā kumbhagataḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1020_0: adhruvaṃ tribhuvaṃ śaradabhranibhaṃ naṭaraṅgasamā jagi janmacyutiḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1020_1: girinadyasamaṃ laghuśīghrajavaṃ vrajatāyu jage yatha vidyu nabhe /
SA11sanssr_pu:1021_1: parivarttiṣu pañcagatiṣv abudhā yatha kumbhakarasya hi cakra bhramī /
SA11sanssr_pu:1022_1: pariṣiktam idaṃ kalipāśa jagat mṛgalubdhakapāśi yathaiva kapi /
SA11sanssr_pu:1023_0: sabhayāḥ saraṇāḥ sada vairakarāḥ bahuśokopadrava kāmaguṇāḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1024_1: bhavatṛṣṇalatāya vivṛddhikarāḥ sabhayāḥ saraṇā sada kāmaguṇāḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1025_0: yatha agnikhadāḥ jvalitāḥ sabhayāḥ tatha kāma ime viditāryajanaiḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1026_0: yatha sarpaśiro yatha mīḍhaghaṭaḥ tatha kāma ime viditā viduṣām /
SA11sanssr_pu:1026_1: tatha śūlasāmā dvijapeśisamā yatha śvānakaraṃ kiśavaira tathodakacandranibhā imi kāmaguṇāḥ pratibimba ivā girighoṣa yathā /
SA11sanssr_pu:1027_0: kṣaṇikāvasikā imi kāmaguṇāḥ tatha māyamarīcisamā alikodakabudbudaphenasamā vitathāḥ parikalpasamutthita buddha budhaiḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1028_0: prathame vayase vararūpadharaḥ priya iṣṭamato iya bālacārī /
SA11sanssr_pu:1028_1: jaravyādhidukhair hatatejavapuṃ vijahanti mṛgā iva śuṣkanadīm /
SA11sanssr_pu:1029_0: dhanadhānyavaro bahudravyabalī priya iṣṭamato iya bālacārī /
SA11sanssr_pu:1029_1: parihīṇadhanaṃ puna kṛcchragataṃ vijahanti narā iva śūnyaṭavīm /
SA11sanssr_pu:1030_0: yatha puṣpadrumo saphalo va drumo narudānarataḥ tatha prītikaraḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1030_1: dhanahīnu jarārditu yācanako bhavate tada apriyagṛdhrasamaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1032_0: jarayā jaritaḥ samatītavayo druma vidyuhato va yathā bhavati /
SA11sanssr_pu:1032_1: jarajīrṇa agāra yathā sabhayo jaraniḥśaraṇaṃ laghu brūhi mune /
SA11sanssr_pu:1033_0: jara śoṣayate naranārigaṇaṃ yatha mālulatā ghana śālavanam /
SA11sanssr_pu:1033_1: jara vīryaparākramavegaharī jara paṅkanimagna yathā puruṣo /
SA11sanssr_pu:1034_0: jara rūpa surūpavirūpakarī jara tejaharī balasthāmaharī /
SA11sanssr_pu:1034_1: sada saukhyaharī paribhāvakarī jara mṛtyukarī jara ojaharī /
SA11sanssr_pu:1035_0: bahurogaśatair ghanavyādhidukhaiḥ upasṛṣṭu jagaj jvalaneva mṛgāḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1035_1: jara vyādhigataṃ prasamīkṣya jagat dukhaniḥśaraṇaṃ laghu deśaya hī /
SA11sanssr_pu:1036_0: śiśirehi yathā himadhātu mahaṃ tṛṇagulmavanauṣadhi ojaharo /
SA11sanssr_pu:1036_1: tatha ojaharo 'yu vyādhi jage parihīyati indriyarūpabalam /
SA11sanssr_pu:1037_1: pratighātakaraḥ priyadveṣakaraḥ paridāhakaro yatha sūryu nabhe /
SA11sanssr_pu:1038_0: maraṇaṃ cyavanaṃ cyuti kālakriyā priyadravyajanena viyogu sadā /
SA11sanssr_pu:1038_1: apunāgamanaṃ ca asaṃgamanaṃ drumapattraphalā nadiśrotu yathā /
SA11sanssr_pu:1039_0: maraṇaṃ vaśitān avaśīkurute maraṇaṃ harate nadi dāru yathā /
SA11sanssr_pu:1040_0: maraṇaṃ grasate bahu prāṇiśatān makaro va jalākari bhūtagaṇān /
SA11sanssr_pu:1040_1: garuḍo uragaṃ mṛgarāja gaja jvalano va tṛṇauṣadhibhūtagaṇam /
SA11sanssr_pu:1041_0: rājāvavādakasūtre 'py āha / tad yathā mahārāja catasṛbhyo digbhyaś catvāraḥ parvatā āgaccheyur dṛḍhāḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1041_1_0: sāravanto 'khaṇḍā acchidrā asuṣirāḥ susaṃvṛtā ekaghanā nabhaḥ spṛśantaḥ pṛthivīṃ collikhantaḥ sarvatṛṇakāṣṭhaśākhāparṇapalāśādi
SA11sanssr_pu:1041_1_1: sarvasatvaprāṇibhūtāni nirmathnantas tebhyo na sukaraṃ javena vā palāyituṃ balena vā dravyamantrauṣadhibhir vā nivartayitum /
SA11sanssr_pu:1041_2: evam eva mahārāja catvārīmāni mahābhayāny āgacchanti yeṣāṃ na sukaraṃ javena vā palāyituṃ balena dravyamantrauṣadhair vā nivartanaṃ kartum /
SA11sanssr_pu:1041_3: katamāni catvāri / jarā vyādhir maraṇaṃ vipattiś ca /
SA11sanssr_pu:1042_4: tat kasya hetoḥ / tad yathā mahārāja siṃho mṛgarājo rūpasaṃpanno javasaṃpannaḥ sujātanakhadaṃṣṭrākarālo mṛgagaṇam anupraviśya mṛgaṃ gṛhītvā yathākāmakaraṇīyaṃ karoti /
SA11sanssr_pu:1042_5: sa ca mṛgo 'tibalaṃ vyāḍamukham āsādya vivaśo bhavati /
SA11sanssr_pu:1042_6_0: evam eva mahārāja viddhasya mṛtyuśalyenāpagatamadasyāparāyaṇasya marmasu chidyamāneṣu mucyamāneṣu sandhiṣu māṃsaśoṇite pariśuṣyamāṇe
SA11sanssr_pu:1042_6_2: īṣajjīvitāvaśeṣasya karmabhavāt punar bhavam ālambānasya yamapuruṣabhayabhītasya kālarātrivaśagatasya caramāśvāsapraśvāseṣūparudhyamāneṣu
SA11sanssr_pu:1042_6_3: e kākino 'dvitīyasyāsahāyasyemaṃ lokaṃ jahataḥ paralokam ākrāmato mahāpathaṃ vrajato mahākāntāraṃ praviśato mahāgahanaṃ samavagāhamānasya
SA11sanssr_pu:1042_6_4: mahāndhakāraṃ pratipadyamānasya mahārṇavenorjyamānasya karmavāyunāhriyamāṇasyānimittīkṛtāṃ diśaṃ gacchato nānyat trāṇaṃ nānyac
SA11sanssr_pu:1042_7: dharmo hi mahārāja tasmin samaye trāṇaṃ layanaṃ śaraṇaṃ parāyaṇaṃ bhavati /
SA11sanssr_pu:1042_9: agnim apagatasyānirvāpaṇaṃ / uṣṇārttasya śaityaṃ / adhvānaṃ pratipannasya śītalaṃ chāyopavanaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1042_10: pipāsitasya śītalajalaṃ / bubhukṣitasya vā praṇītam annaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1042_14: evam eva mahārāja viddhasya mṛtyuśalyenāpagatamadasyātrāṇasyāśaraṇasyāparāyaṇasya nānyat trāṇaṃ nānyat parāyaṇam anyatra dharmāt /
SA11sanssr_pu:1042_15: tasmāt tarhi te mahārājānityatānudarśinā bhavitavyaṃ kṣayavyayānudarśinā bhavitavyaṃ maraṇabhayabhītena /
SA11sanssr_pu:1042_16: dharmeṇaiva te mahārāja rājyaṃ kārayitavyaṃ nādharmeṇa /
SA11sanssr_pu:1042_17: tat kasya hetoḥ / asyāpi te mahārājātmabhāvasyaivaṃ suciram api parirakṣitasya suciram api śucinā praṇītena khādanīyabhojanīyāsvādanīyena saṃtarpitasya saṃpravāritasya /
SA11sanssr_pu:1042_19: evaṃ kāśikauśeyadūkūlapattrorṇākṣaumādibhir vastraviśeṣair ācchāditasya caramaśayanāvasthitasya vividhasvedāmbuklinnamalinavasanāvṛtasya kālakriyā bhaviṣyati /
SA11sanssr_pu:1042_20: evam api te mahārāja snānānulepanavāsadhūpapuṣpasurabhigandhasyātmabhāvasya na cireṇa durgandhatā bhaviṣyati /
SA11sanssr_pu:1042_21_0: evaṃ stryāgāramadhyagatasyāpi te strīgaṇaparivṛtasya nānāvādyagītatūryanādyair upagīyamānasya sumanasaḥ krīḍato ramamāṇasya
SA11sanssr_pu:1042_22_0: evam api te mahārāja gṛheṣūpalepanopalipteṣu susthāpitārgaleṣu supihitavātāyaneṣu bahugandhadhūpapuṣpatailavartiprajvāliteṣv
SA11sanssr_pu:1042_23: punaś ca śṛgālakākagṛdhramṛtakaḍevaramāṃsāsthikeśarudhiravaśākule paramabībhatse śmaśāne gataceṣṭasyātmabhāvaḥ pṛthivyām avaśaḥ śeṣyate /
SA11sanssr_pu:1042_24_0: evam api te mahārāja gajaskandhāśvapṛṣṭharathābhirūḍhasya śaṅkhapaṭaheṣv āhanyamāneṣu chatreṇa dhāryamāṇena bālavyajanena
SA11sanssr_pu:1042_25_0: nirgamanam anubhūya na cirān niśceṣṭasya mṛtaśayanābhirūḍhasya caturbhiḥ puruṣair utkṣiptasya dakṣiṇena nagaradvāreṇa nirṇītasya
SA11sanssr_pu:1042_26_0: hā putra hā nātha hā tāta hā svāminn ity ākrandamānaiḥ paurajānapadaiḥ saparibhāvadṛśyamānasya śmaśānaṃ nītasya punaḥ kākagṛdhraśvaśṛgālādibhir
SA11sanssr_pu:1042_26_1: bhakṣitasya tāny asthīny agninā vā dagdhāni pṛthivyāṃ vā nikhānitāni adbhir vā klinnāni vātātāpavarṣair vā cūrṇīkṛtāni digvidikṣu
SA11sanssr_pu:1042_27: evam anityāḥ sarvasaṃskārā evam adhruvā iti vistaraḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1043_0: tatra kleśāḥ prādhānyena rāgadveṣamohā yasyaiṣām ekatarasya tāvat pratipakṣam ādau bhāvayet tannidānaṃ ca varjayet /
SA11sanssr_pu:1044_7: katamā ca sāśubhābhāvanā / yad uta santy asmin kāye keśā romāṇi nakhā dantā rajo malaṃ tvak māṃsāsthi snāyuḥ śirā vṛkkā hṛdayaṃ plīhakaḥ klomakaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1044_9: audaryakaṃ yakṛt purīṣam aśru svedaḥ kheṭaḥ siṅghāṇakaṃ vasā lasikā majjā medaḥ pittaṃ śleśmā pūyaṃ śoṇitaṃ mastakaṃ mastakaluṅgaṃ prasrāvaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1044_10: eṣu ca vastuṣu bodhisatva upaparīkṣaṇajātīyo bhavati /
SA11sanssr_pu:1044_12: yo 'pi tāvat syād bālo mūḍhaḥ abhavyo 'kuśalaḥ so 'pi tāvad etāni vastūni jñātvā rāgacittaṃ notpādayet /
SA11sanssr_pu:1044_13: prāg eva saprajñajātīyaḥ / evaṃ hi bodhisatvo 'śubhābhāvanābahulo bhavatīti /
SA11sanssr_pu:1045_0: bhagavatyām apy uktaṃ / punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann imam evaṃ kāyaṃ yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
SA11sanssr_pu:1045_1: tad yathāpi nāma subhūte goghātako vā goghātakāntevāsī vā gāṃ hatvā tīkṣṇena śastreṇa catvāri phalakāni kṛtvā pratyavekṣate sthito 'thavā niṣaṇṇaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1045_2: evam eva subhūte bodhisatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann imam eva kāyaṃ dhātuśo yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
SA11sanssr_pu:1045_3: asty asmin kāye pṛthivīdhātur abdhātur api tejodhātur api vāyudhātur apīti /
SA11sanssr_pu:1046_0: punar apy āha / tad yathāpi subhūte karṣakasya mūtoḍī pūrṇā nānādhānyānāṃ śālīnāṃ vrīhīṇāṃ tilānāṃ taṇḍulānāṃ mudrānāṃ māṣāṇāṃ yavānāṃ godhūmānāṃ maśūrāṇāṃ sarṣapāṇāṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1046_2: evaṃjātīyād ayaṃ śālir ayaṃ vrīhir amī tilā amī taṇḍulā amī mudrā amī māṣā yavā amī godhūmā amī maśūrā amī sarṣapā iti /
SA11sanssr_pu:1047_0_0: evam eva bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann imam eva kāyam ūrddhvaṃ pādatalād adhaḥ keśamastakanakharomatvak
SA11sanssr_pu:1047_1: santy asmin kāye keśā romāṇi nakhā yāvan mastakaṃ mastakaluṅgam akṣigūthaṃ karṇagūtham iti /
SA11sanssr_pu:1048_0_0: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisatvaḥ śmaśānagataḥ paśyati nānārūpāṇi mṛtaśarīrāṇi śmaśāne 'paviddhāni śavaśayane ujjhitāni ekāhamṛtāni
SA11sanssr_pu:1048_0_1: vā dvyahamṛtāni vā tryahamṛtāni vā caturahamṛtāni vā pañcāhamṛtāni vā vyādhmātakāni vinīlakāni vipūyakāni vipaṭhyakāni /
SA11sanssr_pu:1049_0: evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran bahirdhā kāye kāyānudarśī viharati /
SA11sanssr_pu:1050_0: punar aparaṃ yadā mṛtaśarīrāṇi śmaśāne utsṛṣṭāni paśyati /
SA11sanssr_pu:1050_1: ṣaḍrātramṛtāni kākair vā khādyamānāni kurarair vā gṛdhrair vā śvabhir vā śṛgālair vā tato 'nyair vā nānāvidhaiḥ prāṇakajātaiḥ khādyamānāni sa imam eva kāyaṃ tatropasaṃharati /
SA11sanssr_pu:1051_0: punar aparaṃ yadā mṛtaśarīrāṇi paśyati śmaśāne utsṛṣṭāni vikhāditāny aśucīni durgandhāni /
SA11sanssr_pu:1051_1: sa imam eva kāyaṃ tatropasaṃharatīti pūrvavat /
SA11sanssr_pu:1052_0: punar aparaṃ yadā paśyati mṛtaśarīrāṇi śivapathikāyām asthisaṃkalikāṃ māṃsaśoṇitamrakṣitāṃ snāyuvinibaddhāṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1052_1: sa tatremam eva kāyam iti pūrvavat /
SA11sanssr_pu:1053_0: punar aparaṃ yadā mṛtaśarīrāṇi paśyati śivapathikāyām asthisaṃkalībhūtāni apagatamāṃsaśoṇitasnāyubandhanāni /
SA11sanssr_pu:1053_1: sa imam eva kāyam iti pūrvavat /
SA11sanssr_pu:1054_0: punar aparaṃ yadā paśyati śivapathikāyām asthīni digvidikṣu kṣiptāni /
SA11sanssr_pu:1054_1: yad utānyena pādāsthīni / anyena jaṅghāsthīni / anyena corvasthīni / anyena śroṇikaṭāhakaṃ / anyena pṛṣṭhavaṃśam anyena pārśvakāsthīni /
SA11sanssr_pu:1054_2: anyena grīvāsthīni / anyena bāhvasthīni / sa imam eva kāyam upasaṃharatīti pūrvavat /
SA11sanssr_pu:1055_0: punar aparaṃ yadā paśyati śivapathikāyām asthīny annekavārṣikāṇi vātānupariśoṣitāni śaṅkhasannibhāni /
SA11sanssr_pu:1055_2: ayam api kāya evaṃdharmā evaṃsvabhāva etāṃ dharmatāṃ na vyativṛttae iti /
SA11sanssr_pu:1056_0_0: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran yadā paśyati śivapathikāyām asthīny annekavārṣikāṇi tirobhūtāni
SA11sanssr_pu:1056_0_1: nīlāni kapotavarṇāni pūtīni cūrṇakajātāni pṛthivyāṃ pāṃsunā asamasamībhūtāni sa imam eva kāyaṃ tatropasaṃharati ayam api
SA11sanssr_pu:1057_2: apriyasatvādarśanaṃ ca / tena vā saha bhojanādyekārthatayāprītyutpādanaṃ tatra parasukhasyāśaṃsā prārthanā tṛṣṇābhinandanaṃ maitrī /
SA11sanssr_pu:1059_0: punar buddhārambaṇā bodhisatvārambaṇā śrāvakapratyekabuddhārambaṇā satvārambaṇā ca /
SA11sanssr_pu:1059_1: tatra satvārambaṇāyāḥ pūrvaṃ priye satve hitasukhopasaṃhārān na dhyānam abhyasya /
SA11sanssr_pu:1059_3: tataḥ pariciteṣu / tata udāsīneṣu / tataḥ samīpavāsiṣu / tataḥ svagrāmavāsiṣu / evaṃ paragrāme ca / evaṃ yāvad ekāṃ diśam adhimucya spharitvopasaṃpadya viharati /
SA11sanssr_pu:1059_4: evaṃ daśasu dikṣu / buddhādyārambaṇāyās tv ayaṃ prayāso nāsti /
SA11sanssr_pu:1060_1: sa bodhisatvacaryāyāṃ caran yāvanti kānicid dṛśyante rūpāṇi manojñāni vā pratikūlāni vā /
SA11sanssr_pu:1060_2: evaṃ śabdā gandhā rasā spraṣṭavyā dharmā manojñā vā pratikūlā vā /
SA11sanssr_pu:1060_3: annavadyā viśuddhāḥ kalyāṇodāraprabhāsvarā vā yena saumanasyaṃ jāyate /
SA11sanssr_pu:1060_4_0: sukham avakrāmati / prasādo jāyate / prītiḥ saṃbhavati / prāmodyaṃ saṃtiṣṭhate / harṣaḥ prādurbhavati / daurmanasyaṃ nivartate /
SA11sanssr_pu:1060_4_1: cittakalyatā prādurbhavati / cittaṃ karmaṇyaṃ bhavati / āśayo mṛdubhavati / indriyāṇi prahlādaṃ gacchanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:1060_6_0: sarvabuddhānām etayā pariṇāmanayā bhūyasyā mātrayā te buddhā bhagavanto 'cintyena buddhavihārasukhena samanvāgatā bhavantv
SA11sanssr_pu:1060_6_1: atulyena buddhasamādhisukhena susaṃgṛhītā bhavantv annantasukhena bhūyasyā mātrayopastabdhā bhavantu /
SA11sanssr_pu:1061_0: evaṃ bodhisatvas tatkuśalamūlaṃ tathāgateṣu pariṇamayya bodhisatveṣu pariṇamayati /
SA11sanssr_pu:1061_1: yad idam aparipūrṇānām abhiprāyāṇāṃ paripūrṇāya pariṇamayati /
SA11sanssr_pu:1062_0: sa evaṃ tatkuśalamūlaṃ bodhisatvānām arthāya pariṇamayya buddhaśāsanāvacareṣu sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddheṣu tatkuśalamūlam evaṃ pariṇāmayati /
SA11sanssr_pu:1062_1: te kecit satvā ekācchaṭāsaṃhātamātram api buddhaśabdaṃ sṛṇvati /
SA11sanssr_pu:1062_2: dharmaśabdaṃ vāryasaṃghaparyupāsanaṃ vā kurvanti teṣāṃ tatkuśalamūlam annuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmayati buddhānusmṛtiparipūryai pariṇāmayati /
SA11sanssr_pu:1062_12: śrāvakapratyekabuddheṣu ca tathā bodhisatvaḥ sarvasatveṣu tatkuśalamūlaṃ pariṇāmayati /
SA11sanssr_pu:1065_0_1: īryāpathādhiṣṭhānam īryāpathasyāvikopanaṃ kāyakarma vākkarma manaḥkarma sacuritaṃ ṣaṇṇām indriyāṇāṃ saṃvaraḥ svaśarīrāchādanamardanasnānakarma /
SA11sanssr_pu:1069_0: antaśaḥ śvasv api tad anyeṣv api tiryagyonigateṣv ekaudanonmiñjitam ekālopaṃ vā parityajati /
SA11sanssr_pu:1069_1: sugatāv upapattiṣu tat sarvaṃ teṣām eva hitāya teṣām eva parimocanāya pariṇāmayati /
SA11sanssr_pu:1069_2: tasyās tiryagyones tasmād duṣkhārṇavāt tasmād duṣkhopādānāt tasmād duṣkhaskandhāt tasmād duṣkhāvedanāyāḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1069_3_0: tasmād duṣkhopacayāt tasmād duṣkhābhisaṃskārāt tasmād duṣkhanidānāt tato duṣkhamūlāt tasmād duṣkhāyatanāt teṣāṃ satvānāṃ
SA11sanssr_pu:1069_3_1: vinivartanāya pariṇāmayati tadārambaṇena ca sarvasatvārambaṇīkaroti manasikaroti /
SA11sanssr_pu:1069_10: saṃsārasāgarād unmajjayati / buddhadharmaprayuktāya maitryā spharatīty ādi /
SA11sanssr_pu:1070_0: imāś ca suvarṇabhāsoktā maitrīkaruṇāgarbhā gāthāḥ sarvā ādarataḥ samanvāhṛtya bhāvayitavyā antaśo vacasāpi /
SA11sanssr_pu:1071_1: apāyaduṣkhā yamalokaduṣkhā dāridryaduṣkhāś ca iha triloke /
SA11sanssr_pu:1072_0: anena co dundubhighoṣanādinā śāmyantu sarvavyasanāni loke /
SA11sanssr_pu:1072_1: bhavantu satvā hy abhayāhatā tathā yathābhayāḥ śāntabhayāḥ munīndrāḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1073_1: tathaiva bhontū guṇasāgarāḥ prajāḥ samādhibodhyaṅgaguṇair upetāḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1074_0: anena co dundubhighoṣanādinā bhavantu brahmasvara sarvasatvāḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1075_0: tiṣṭhantu kalpāni acintiyāni deśentu dharmaṃ jagato hitāya /
SA11sanssr_pu:1075_1: hanantu kleśān vidhamantu duṣkhān samentu rāgaṃ tatha doṣa moham /
SA11sanssr_pu:1076_1: śṛṇvantu te dundubhisaṃpravāditaṃ namo 'stu buddhāya bhaṇantu vācam /
SA11sanssr_pu:1077_0: jātismarāḥ satvā bhavantu sarve jātīśataṃ jātisahasrakoṭyaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1077_1: anusmarantū satataṃ munīndrān śṛṇvantu teṣāṃ vacanaṃ hy udāraṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1078_0: anena co dundubhighoṣanādinā labhantu buddhehi samāgamaṃ sadā /
SA11sanssr_pu:1078_1: vivarjayantū khalu pāpakarma carantu kuśalāni śubhakriyāṇi /
SA11sanssr_pu:1079_0: sarvatra kṣetreṣu ca sarvaprāṇināṃ sarve ca duṣkhāḥ praśamantu loke /
SA11sanssr_pu:1079_1: ye satva vikalendriya aṅgahīnāḥ te sarvi sakalendriya bhontu sāṃpratam /
SA11sanssr_pu:1080_0: ye vyādhitā durbalakṣīṇagātrā nistrāṇabhūtāḥ śayitā diśāsu /
SA11sanssr_pu:1080_1: te sarvi mucyantu ca vyādhito laghu labhantu cārogya balendriyāṇi /
SA11sanssr_pu:1081_0: ye rājacaurabhaṭa tarjita vadhyaprāptā nānāvidhair bhayaśatair vyasanopapannāḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1081_1: te sarvi satva vyasanāgataduṣkhitā hi mucyantu tair bhayaśataiḥ paramaiḥ sughoraiḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1082_0: ye tāḍitā bandhanabaddhapīḍitā vividheṣu vyasaneṣu ca saṃsthitāhi /
SA11sanssr_pu:1083_0: te sarvi mucyantv iha bandhanebhyaḥ saṃtāḍitā mucyiṣu tāḍanebhyaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1083_1: vadhyāś ca saṃyujyiṣu jīvitena vyasanāgatā nirbhaya bhontu sarve /
SA11sanssr_pu:1084_0: ye satva kṣuttarṣapipāsapīḍitā labhantu te bhojanapānacitram /
SA11sanssr_pu:1084_1: andhāś ca paśyantu vicitrarūpāṃ badhirāś ca śṛṇvantu manojñaghoṣān /
SA11sanssr_pu:1085_0: nagnāś ca vastrāṇi labhantu citrāṃ daridrasatvāś ca nidhiṃ labhantu /
SA11sanssr_pu:1085_1: prabhūtadhanadhānyavicitraratnaiḥ sarve ca satvāḥ sukhino bhavantu /

SA11sanssr_pu:1098_1: ṣaṇṇāṃ dhātūnāṃ samavāyāt / katam eṣāṃ ṣaṇṇāṃ dhātūnāṃ samavāyāt /
SA11sanssr_pu:1098_2: yad idaṃ pṛthivyaptejovāyvākāśavijñānadhātūnāṃ samavāyād ādhyātmikasya pratītyasamutpādasya pratyayopanibandho draṣṭavyaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1099_1: yo 'yaṃ kāyasya saṃśleṣataḥ kaṭhinabhāvam abhinirvartayaty ayam ucyate pṛthivīdhātuḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1099_2: yaḥ kāyasyānuparigrahaṃ kṛtyaṃ karoti ayam ucyate 'bdhātuḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1099_3: yaḥ kāyasyāśitapītabhakṣitaṃ paripācayati ayam ucyate tejodhātuḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1099_4: yaḥ kāyasyāśvāsapraśvāsakṛtyaṃ karoty ayam ucyate vāyudhātuḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1099_5: yaḥ kāyasyāntaḥsauṣiryabhāvam abhinirvartayaty ayam ucyate ākāśadhātuḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1099_6: yo nāmarūpam abhinirvartayati naḍakalāpayogena pañcavijñānakāyasaṃprayuktaṃ sāsravaṃ ca manovijñānam ayam ucyate vijñānadhātuḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1100_1: yadādhyātmikaḥ pṛthivīdhātur avikalo bhavaty evam aptejovāyvākāśavijñānadhātavaś cāvikalā bhavanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:1101_2: abdhātor naivaṃ bhavati / ahaṃ kāyasyānuparigrahakṛtyaṃ karomīti /
SA11sanssr_pu:1101_3: tejodhātor naivaṃ bhavati / ahaṃ kāyasyāśitapītakhāditaṃ paripācayāmīti /
SA11sanssr_pu:1101_4: vāyudhātor naivaṃ bhavati / ahaṃ kāyasyāśvāsapraśvāsakṛtyaṃ karomīti /
SA11sanssr_pu:1101_5: ākāśadhātor naivaṃ bhavati / ahaṃ kāyasyāntaḥ saurṣiryaṃ karomīti /
SA11sanssr_pu:1101_8: atha ca satsv eṣu pratyayeṣu kāyasyotpattir bhavati /
SA11sanssr_pu:1101_9: tatra pṛthivīdhātur nātmā na satvo na jīvo na jantur na manujo na mānavo na strī na pumān na napuṃsakaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1101_10_0: na cāhaṃ / na mama / na ca apy anyasya kasyacit / evam abdhātus tejodhātur vāyudhātur ākāśadhātur vijñānadhātur na satvo
SA11sanssr_pu:1101_10_1: na jīvo na jantur na manujo na mānavo na strī na pumān na napuṃsakaṃ na cāhaṃ na mama na cāpy anyasya kasyacit /
SA11sanssr_pu:1102_0: tatrāvidyā katamā / yā eṣv eva ṣaṭsu dhātuṣv ekasaṃjñā piṇḍasaṃjñā nityasaṃjñā dhruvasaṃjñā śāśvatasaṃjñā sukhasaṃjñā ātmasaṃjñā satvajīvamanujamānavasaṃjñā /
SA11sanssr_pu:1102_1: ahaṃkāramamakārasaṃjñā / evamādi vividham ajñānam iyam ucyate 'vidyeti /
SA11sanssr_pu:1102_2: evam avidyāyāṃ satyāṃ viṣayeṣu rāgadveṣamohāḥ pravartante /
SA11sanssr_pu:1102_3: tatra ye rāgadveṣamohā viṣayeṣv amī ucyante saṃskārā iti /
SA11sanssr_pu:1102_6: catvāri ca mahābhūtāni copādāya upādāya r ūpam aikadhyam abhisaṃkṣipya tan nāmarūpaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1102_9: sparśānubhavanā vedanā / vedanādhyavasānaṃ tṛṣṇā / tṛṣṇā vaipulyam upādānaṃ / upādānanirjātaṃ punarbhavajanakaṃ karma /
SA11sanssr_pu:1102_15: ye cānyae evamādaya upakleśās tae upāyāsāḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1103_0: punar aparaṃ tatve 'pratipattiḥ mithyā pratipattiḥ ajñānam avidyā /
SA11sanssr_pu:1103_1: evam avidyāyāṃ satyāṃ trividhāḥ saṃskārāḥ abhinirvartante /
SA11sanssr_pu:1103_2: puṇyopagā apuṇyopagā āniñjyopagāś cemae ucyante 'vidyāpratyayāḥ saṃskārā iti /
SA11sanssr_pu:1103_3: puṇyopagānāṃ saṃskārāṇāṃ puṇyopagam eva vijñānaṃ bhavati /
SA11sanssr_pu:1103_4: apuṇyopagānāṃ saṃskārāṇām apuṇyopagam eva vijñānaṃ bhavati /
SA11sanssr_pu:1103_5: āniñjyopagānāṃ saṃskārāṇām āniñjyopagam eva vijñānaṃ bhavati /
SA11sanssr_pu:1103_7: evaṃ nāmarūpaṃ / nāmarūpavivṛddhyā ṣaḍbhir āyatanadvāraiḥ kṛtyakriyāḥ pravartante /
SA11sanssr_pu:1103_9: ṣaḍbhya āyatanebhyaḥ ṣaṭ sparśakāyāḥ pravartante 'yaṃ ṣaḍāyatanapratyayaḥ sparśa ity ucyate /
SA11sanssr_pu:1103_10: yajjātīyaḥ sparśo bhavati tajjātīyā vedanā pravartate /
SA11sanssr_pu:1103_16: mā me priyarūpaśātarūpair viyogo bhavatv iti /
SA11sanssr_pu:1103_19: evaṃ prārthayamānaḥ punarbhavajanakaṃ karma samutthāpayati kāyena vācā manasā /
SA11sanssr_pu:1103_21: yā karmanirjātānāṃ skandhānām abhinirvṛttiḥ sā bhavapratyayā jātir ity ucyate /
SA11sanssr_pu:1103_22: yo jātyabhinirvṛttānāṃ skandhānām upacayaparipākād vināśo bhavati /
SA11sanssr_pu:1104_1: naivānityo na nityo / na saṃskṛto nāsaṃskṛto / na vedayitā / na kṣayadharmo na nirodhadharmo /
SA11sanssr_pu:1105_0: atha cemāny asya dvādaśāṅgasya pratītyasamutpādasya catvāri aṅgāni saṃghātakriyāyai hetutvena pravartante /
SA11sanssr_pu:1105_1: katamāni catvāri / yad uta / avidyā tṛṣṇā karma vijñānaṃ ca /
SA11sanssr_pu:1105_9: asatāṃ yeṣāṃ pratyayānāṃ bījasyābhinirvṛttir na bhavati /
SA11sanssr_pu:1106_2: tṛṣṇāyā api naivaṃ bhavati /ahaṃ vijñānabījaṃ snehayāmīti /

SA11sanssr_pu:1106_6: api tu vijñānabīje karmakṣetrapratiṣṭhite tṛṣṇāsnehābhiṣyandite 'vidyāvakīrṇe tatra tatrotpattyāyatanasandhau mātuḥ kukṣau virohati /
SA11sanssr_pu:1106_8: sa ca nāmarūpāṅkuro na svayaṃkṛto na parakṛto nobhayakṛto neśvarādinirmito na kālapariṇāmito na caikakāraṇādhīno nāpy ahetusamutpannaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1106_9: atha ca mātāpitṛsaṃyogād ṛtusamavāyād anyeṣāṃ ca pratyayānāṃ samavāyād āsvādānupraviddhaṃ vijñānabījaṃ mātuḥ kukṣau nāmarūpāṅkurabījam abhinirvartayati /
SA11sanssr_pu:1106_10: asvāmikeṣu dharmeṣv amameṣv aparigraheṣv apratyarthikeṣv ākāśasameṣu māyālakṣaṇasvabhāveṣu hetupratyayānām avaikalyāt /
SA11sanssr_pu:1107_0: tad yathā pañcabhiḥ kāraṇaiś cakṣurvijñānam utpadyate / katamaiḥ pañcabhiḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:1108_0: cakṣuś ca pratītya rūpaṃ cālokaṃ cākāśaṃ tajjaṃ ca manasikāraṃ ca pratītyotpadyate cakṣurvijñānaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1110_0: yadā cakṣur ādhyātmikam āyatanam avikalaṃ bhavati /

SA11sanssr_pu:1111_3: ālokasyāpi naivaṃ bhavati / aham avabhāsakṛtyaṃ karomīti /

SA11sanssr_pu:1111_9: atha ca punaḥ satsv eṣu pratyayeṣu cakṣurvijñānasyotpattir bhavati prādurbhāvaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1112_0: tatra na kaścid dharmo 'smāl lokāt paraṃ lokaṃ saṃkrāmati /
SA11sanssr_pu:1112_2: hetupratyayānām avaikalyāt / yathāgnir upādānavaikalyān na jvalati /
SA11sanssr_pu:1112_3: evam eva karmakleśajanitaṃ vijñānabījaṃ tatra tatrotpattyāyatanapratisandhau mātuḥ kukṣau nāmarūpāṅkuram abhinirvartayati /
SA11sanssr_pu:1112_4: asvāmikeṣu dharmeṣv amameṣv aparigraheṣv apratyarthikeṣv ākāśasameṣu māyālakṣaṇasvabhāveṣu hetupratyayānām avaikalyāt /
SA11sanssr_pu:1113_0: tan nādhyātmikaḥ pratītyasamutpādaḥ pañcabhiḥ kāraṇair draṣṭavyaḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:1114_0: katamaiḥ pañcabhiḥ / na śāśvatato nocchedato na saṃkrāntitaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1115_0: kathaṃ na śāśvatataḥ / yasmād anye māraṇāntikāḥ skandhā anyae aupapattyaṃśikāḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1115_1: na tu yae eva māraṇāntikāḥ skandhās tae evaupapattyaṃśikāḥ skandhā /
SA11sanssr_pu:1115_2: api tu māraṇāntikāś ca skandhā nirudhyamānā aupapattyaṃśikāḥ skandhāś ca prādurbhavanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:1116_0: kathaṃ nocchedataḥ / na ca niruddheṣu skandheṣu aupapattyaṃśikāḥ skandhāḥ prādurbhavanti nāpy aniruddheṣu /
SA11sanssr_pu:1116_1: api tu māraṇāntikāś ca skandhā nirudhyante aupapattyaṃśikāś ca prādurbhavanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:1117_0: kathaṃ na saṃtrāntitaḥ / visadṛśāt satvanikāyād dhi sabhāgāḥ skandhā jātyantare 'bhinirvartante /
SA11sanssr_pu:1118_0: kathaṃ parīttahetuto vipulaphalābhinirvṛttitaḥ parīttaṃ karma kriyate /
SA11sanssr_pu:1120_0_0: yaḥ kaścid bhadanta śāriputremaṃ pratītyasamutpādaṃ bhagavatā samyakpraṇītam evaṃ yathābhūtaṃ samyakprajñayā satatasamitam
SA11sanssr_pu:1120_0_1: ajīvaṃ nirjīvaṃ yathāvad aviparītam ajātam abhūtam akṛtam asaṃskṛtam apratigham annāvaraṇaṃ śivam abhayam ahāryam avyayam
SA11sanssr_pu:1120_1: asatyatas tucchata ṛktato 'sārato 'ghato 'nityato duṣkhataḥ śūnyato 'nnātmanaś ca samanupaśyati /
SA11sanssr_pu:1120_3: kim aham abhūvam atīte 'dhvany āho svin nābhūvam atīte 'dhvani /
SA11sanssr_pu:1121_1: kiṃ nu bhaviṣyāmy annāgate 'dhvany āho svin na bhaviṣyāmy annāgate 'dhvani /
SA11sanssr_pu:1121_2: ko nu bhaviṣyāmīti / pratyutpannaṃ vā punar na pratisarati /
SA11sanssr_pu:1121_3: kiṃ svid idaṃ kathaṃ svid idaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1122_3: api tu khalu punar yad ucyate 'vidyāpratyayāḥ saṃskārā iti /
SA11sanssr_pu:1123_0: vijñānaṃ yāvad vedaneti / eṣā pratyutpannāpekṣā / tṛṣṇā yāvad bhava iti / eṣāparāntiky apekṣāta ūrddhvam asy pravṛttir iti /
SA11sanssr_pu:1124_1: visaṃyogān na pravartate / sāmagryāḥ saṃskṛtaṃ pravartate /
SA11sanssr_pu:1124_2: visāmagryā na pravartate / hanta vayam evaṃ bahudoṣaduṣṭaṃ saṃskṛtaṃ viditvāsya saṃyogasyāsyāś ca sāmagryā vyavacchedaṃ kariṣyāmo /
SA11sanssr_pu:1128_0: smṛtyupasthānaparicchedaḥ trayodaśaḥ / evaṃ karmaṇyacittaḥ smṛtyupasthānāny avataret //
SA11sanssr_pu:1130_1: punar aparaṃ kulaputra bodhisatva evaṃ kāye smṛtim upasthāpayati /
SA11sanssr_pu:1130_5: evam bahudravyasamūhaḥ / tat ko 'tra kāyaḥ / tasya pratyavekṣamāṇasyaivaṃ bhavati /
SA11sanssr_pu:1130_6: ākāśasamo 'yaṃ kāyaḥ / sa ākāśavat kāye smṛtim upasthāpayati /
SA11sanssr_pu:1130_8: tasya kāyaparijñānahetor na bhūyaḥ kvacit smṛtiḥ prasarati /
SA11sanssr_pu:1131_0: punar uktaṃ / ayaṃ kāyo na pūrvāntād āgato /
SA11sanssr_pu:1131_1: na parānte saṃkrānto na pūrvāntāparāntāvasthito 'nyatrāsadviparyāsasaṃbhūtaḥ kārakavedakarahito nādyantamadhye pratiṣṭhitamūlaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1131_2: asvāmikaḥ / amamaḥ / aparigrahaḥ / āgantukair vyavahārair vyavahriyate kāya iti deha iti bhoga iti āśraya iti śarīram iti kuṇapa iti āyatanam iti /
SA11sanssr_pu:1132_0: āryaratnacūḍe 'py āha / anityo vatāyaṃ kāyo 'cirasthitiko maraṇaparyavasāna iti jñātvā na kāyahetor viṣamayā jīvati /
SA11sanssr_pu:1132_1: sāraṃ caivādatte / sa trīṇi sārāṇy ādatte /katamāni trīṇi / kāyasāraṃ bhogasāraṃ jīvitasāraṃ ca /
SA11sanssr_pu:1132_2: so 'nityaḥ kāya iti sarvasatvānāṃ dāsatvaśiṣyatvam abhyupagamya kiṅkaraṇīyatāyai utsuko bhavati /
SA11sanssr_pu:1132_3: anityaḥ kāya iti sarvakāya doṣavaṅkaśāṭhyakuhanāṃ na karoti /
SA11sanssr_pu:1132_4: anityaḥ kāya iti jīvitenāśvāsaprāpto jīvitahetor api pāpaṃ karma na karoti /
SA11sanssr_pu:1132_5: anityaḥ kāya iti bhogeṣu tṛṣṇādhyavasānaṃ na karoti /
SA11sanssr_pu:1133_0: punar aparaṃ kulaputra bodhisatvaḥ kāye kāyānudarśanasmṛtyupasthānaṃ bhāvayan sarvasatvakāyāṃs tatra svakāyae upanibadhnāti /
SA11sanssr_pu:1133_1: evaṃ cāsya bhavati / sarvasatvakāyā mayā buddhakāyapratiṣṭhānapratiṣṭhitāḥ kartavyāḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1133_2: yathā ca tathāgatakāye nāśravas tathā svakāyadharmatāṃ pratyavekṣate /
SA11sanssr_pu:1133_3: so nāśravadharmatākuśalaḥ sarvasatvakāyān api tallakṣaṇān eva prajānātīty ādi /
SA11sanssr_pu:1134_1: yad utāyaṃ kāyo 'nupūrvasamudāgato 'nupūrvavināśo paramāṇusaṃcayaḥ śuṣira unnāmāvanāmau navavraṇamukharomakūpasrāvī valmīkavadāsīviṣanivāsaḥ [doubtful] /
SA11sanssr_pu:1134_7: māyāvad vañcanātmakaḥ / rājavad ājñābahulaḥ / śatruvad avatāraprekṣī / coravad aviśvasanīyaḥ / vadhyaghātakavad annanuvītaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1135_0: vraṇavad ghaṭṭanāsahiṣṇuḥ / śalyavat tudanātmakaḥ / jīrṇagṛhavat pratisaṃskāradhāryaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1138_2: prajñāyamānaḥ sa hi bālabuddhiḥ viṣṭhāghaṭaṃ yāti vahan vicetāḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1140_0: aṅgāram ādāya yathā hi bālo / ghṛṣyed ayaṃ yāsyati śuklabhāvam /
SA11sanssr_pu:1140_1: yāti kṣayaṃ naiva tu śuklabhāvaṃ bālasya buddhir vitathābhimānā /
SA11sanssr_pu:1141_0: evaṃ hi yaḥ caukṣamatir manuṣyaḥ caukṣaṃ kariṣye 'ham idaṃ śarīram /
SA11sanssr_pu:1141_1: sūdvartitaṃ tīrthaśatābhiṣiktaṃ yāti kṣayaṃ mṛtyuvaśād acaukṣam /
SA11sanssr_pu:1142_0: tathā prabhaṅguraḥ / prasravan bodhisatvena kāyaḥ pratyavekṣitavyo nava vraṇamukhair yāvat /
SA11sanssr_pu:1143_3: asvādhīno bodhisatvena kāyaḥ pratyavekṣitavyaḥ annapānasaṃbhūta iti vistaraḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1144_0: tatraiva jñeyaṃ / vedanā smṛtyupasthānaṃ tu yathā tāvad āryaratnacūḍasūtre /
SA11sanssr_pu:1144_1: iha kulaputra bodhisatvo vedanāsu vedanānupaśyanāsmṛtyupasthānaṃ bhāvayan veditasukhāśriteṣu satveṣu mahākaruṇāṃ pratilabhate /
SA11sanssr_pu:1144_2: evaṃ ca pratisaṃśikṣate / tat sukhaṃ yatra veditaṃ nāsti sa sarvasatvaveditaprahāṇāya vedanāsu vedanāsmṛtyupasthānaṃ bhāvayati /
SA11sanssr_pu:1144_5: sa yāṃ kāṃcid vedanāṃ vedayate tāṃ sarvāṃ mahākaruṇāparigṛhītāṃ vedayate /
SA11sanssr_pu:1144_6: sa yadā sukhāṃ vedanāṃ vedayate tadā rāgacariteṣu satveṣu mahākaruṇāṃ pratilabhate ātmanaś ca rāgānuśayaṃ pratijahāti /
SA11sanssr_pu:1144_7: yadā duṣkhāṃ vedanāṃ vedayate tadā dveṣacariteṣu satveṣu mahākaruṇāṃ pratilabhate ātmanaś ca doṣānuśayaṃ prajahāti /
SA11sanssr_pu:1144_8: yadāduṣkhāsukhāṃ vedanāṃ mohacariteṣu satyeṣu mahākaruṇāṃ pratilabhate /
SA11sanssr_pu:1144_12: duṣkhāyāṃ vedanāyāṃ na pratihanyate pratighasamudghātaṃ cārjayati /
SA11sanssr_pu:1144_15: sa yāṃ kāñcid vedanāṃ vetti sarvāṃ tām anityaveditāṃ vetti /
SA11sanssr_pu:1144_17: annātmaveditāṃ vetti / sa sukhāyāṃ vedanāyām anityavedito bhavati /
SA11sanssr_pu:1144_20: iti hi yat sukhaṃ tad anityaṃ yad duṣkhaṃ sukham eva tat /
SA11sanssr_pu:1144_21: yad aduṣkhāsukhaṃ tad annātmakam ity ādi /
SA11sanssr_pu:1145_1: duṣkhayā vedanayā spṛṣṭaḥ sarvapāpākṣaṇopapanneṣu satveṣu mahākaruṇām utpādayati /
SA11sanssr_pu:1146_0: api tu khalu punar abhiniveśo vedanā parigraho vedanopādānaṃ vedanopalambho vedanā viparyāso vedanā vikalpo vedanety ādi /
SA11sanssr_pu:1148_0: vedanānubhavaḥ proktaḥ / kenāsāv anubhūyate / vedako vedanād anyaḥ pṛthagbhūto na vidyate //
SA11sanssr_pu:1149_0: evaṃ smṛtir upastheyā vedanāyāṃ vicakṣaṇaiḥ / yathā bodhis tathā hy eṣā śāntā śuddhā prabhāsvarā //
SA11sanssr_pu:1151_2: katarat tu cittaṃ / rajyati vā duṣyati vā muhyati vā /
SA11sanssr_pu:1151_7: cittaṃ hi kāśyapa nādhyātmaṃ na bahirdhā nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate /
SA11sanssr_pu:1151_8: cittaṃ hi kāśyapārūpam anidarśanam apratigham avijñaptikam apratiṣṭham aniketaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1151_9: cittaṃ hi kāśyapa sarvabuddhair na dṛṣṭaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1151_10: na paśyanti na drakṣyanti yat sarvabuddhair na dṛṣṭaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1151_11: na paśyanti na drakṣyanti / kīdṛśas tasya pracāro draṣṭavyaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1151_13: cittaṃ hi kāśyapa māyāsadṛśam abhūtaparikalpanayā vividhām upapattiṃ parigṛhṇāti /
SA11sanssr_pu:1152_0: cittaṃ hi kāśyapa nadīsrotaḥsadṛśam annavasthitam utpannabhagnavilīnaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1152_1: cittaṃ hi kāśyapa dīpārcciḥsadṛśaṃ hetupratyayatayā pravartate /
SA11sanssr_pu:1152_3: cittaṃ hi kāśyapākāśasadṛśam āgantukaiḥ kleśair upakliśyate /
SA11sanssr_pu:1153_1: pe / cittaṃ hi kāśyapa matsyabaḍiśasadṛśaṃ duṣkhe sukhasaṃjñayā /
SA11sanssr_pu:1153_8: cittaṃ hi kāśyapa gandhārāmaṃ varāha ivāśucimadhye /
SA11sanssr_pu:1153_10: cittaṃ hi kāśyapa sparśārāmaṃ makṣikeva tailapātre /
SA11sanssr_pu:1153_11: cittaṃ hi kāśyapa parigaveṣyamāṇaṃ na labhyate /
SA11sanssr_pu:1153_13: yan nopalabhyate tan naivātītaṃ nānnāgataṃ na pratyutpannaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1153_14: yan naivātītaṃ nānnāgataṃ na pratyutpannaṃ tat tryadhvasamatikrāntaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1153_15: yat tryadhvasamatikrāntaṃ tan nevāsti na nāstīty ādi /
SA11sanssr_pu:1154_0: āryaratnacūḍasūtre 'py āha / sa cittaṃ parigaveṣamāṇo nādhyātmaṃ cittaṃ samanupaśyati /
SA11sanssr_pu:1154_6: kutaḥ cittasyotpattir iti / tasyaivaṃ bhavati ālambane sati cittam utpadyate /
SA11sanssr_pu:1154_7: tat kim anyad ālambanam / atha yad evālambanaṃ tad eva cittaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1154_8: yadi tāvad anyad ālambanam anyac cittaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1154_9: tad dvicittatā bhaviṣyati / atha yad evālambanaṃ tad eva cittaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1154_12: tad yathā na tayaivāsidhārayā saivāsidhārā śakyate chettum /
SA11sanssr_pu:1154_13: na tenaivāṅgulyagreṇa tad evāṅgulyagraṃ spraṣṭuṃ śakyate /
SA11sanssr_pu:1154_14: naiva cittena tad eva cittaṃ śakyate draṣṭum /
SA11sanssr_pu:1155_0: punar aparaṃ kulaputra yad upadrutapradrutānavasthitapracārasya vānaramārutasadṛśasya /
SA11sanssr_pu:1155_1_0: pe / dūraṃgamacāriṇo 'śarīrasya laghuparivartino viṣayalolasya ṣaḍāyatanagocarasyāparāparasaṃprayuktasya cittasyāvasthānām
SA11sanssr_pu:1155_1_1: ekāgratāśaraṇam aviśaraṇaṃ śamathaikāgratāvikṣepa ity ucyate cittasya smṛtir iti /
SA11sanssr_pu:1156_3: tatra katamā cittadharmatā / katamā viṭhapanā / māyopamaṃ cittam iyam ucyate cittadharmatā /
SA11sanssr_pu:1156_4: yat punaḥ sarvasvaṃ parityajya sarvabuddhakṣetrapariśuddhaye pariṇāmayatītīyam ucyate viṭhapanety ādi /
SA11sanssr_pu:1158_0: yathā tāvad atrāha / dharme dharmānudarśī viharan bodhisatvo na kañcid dharmaṃ samanupaśyati /
SA11sanssr_pu:1158_1: yato na buddhadharmā yato na bodhiḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1158_2: yato na mārgo yato na niḥsaraṇaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1158_3: sa sarvadharmāniḥsaraṇam iti viditvānnāvaraṇaṃ nāma mahākaruṇāsamādhiṃ samāpadyate /
SA11sanssr_pu:1158_4: sa sarvadharmeṣu sarvakleśeṣu ca kṛtrimasaṃjñāṃ pratilabhate /
SA11sanssr_pu:1158_5: niḥkleśā ete dharmā / naite sakleśāḥ / tat kasya hetoḥ / tathā hy ete nītārthe samavasaranti /
SA11sanssr_pu:1158_6: nāsti kleśānāṃ saṃcayo / na rāśībhāvaḥ / na rāgabhāvo na dveṣabhāvo na mohabhāva /
SA11sanssr_pu:1158_8: yat svabhāvāś ca kleśās tat svabhāvā bodhir ity evaṃ smṛtim upasthāpayatīti /
SA11sanssr_pu:1159_0: āryaratnacūḍe 'py uktam / iha kulaputra bodhisatvasya dharme dharmānupaśyanā smṛtyupasthānena viharata evaṃ bhavati /
SA11sanssr_pu:1160_0: na punar atra kaścid ātmabhāve satvo vā jīvo vā jantur vā poṣo vā puruṣo vā pudgalo vā manujo vā yo jāyate vā jīryate vā cyavate votpadyate vā /
SA11sanssr_pu:1160_1: eṣā dharmāṇāṃ dharmatā / yadi samudānīyante / samudāgacchanti / atha na samudānīyante na samudāgacchanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:1160_2: yādṛśāḥ samudānīyante tādṛśāḥ samudāgacchanti kuśalā vākuśalā vā aniñjyā vā /
SA11sanssr_pu:1160_3: nāsti dharmāṇāṃ samudānetā / na cāhetukānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ kācid utpattir ity ādi /
SA11sanssr_pu:1161_0: tatraivāha / sa kiyadgambhīrān api dharmān pratyavekṣamāṇas tāṃ sarvajñatābodhicittānusmṛtiṃ na vijahāti /
SA11sanssr_pu:1163_0: saṃskāra pralopa dharmime varṣakāli calitaṃ vilepanaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1166_0: hetūbhi ca pratyayebhi vā sarva saṃskāragataṃ pravartate /
SA11sanssr_pu:1166_1: anyonyapratītyahetutaḥ tad idaṃ bālajano na budhyate /
SA11sanssr_pu:1167_0: yathā muñja pratītya balbajaṃ rajju vyāyāmabalena vartitā /
SA11sanssr_pu:1167_1: ghaṭiyantra sacakra vartate teṣv ekaikaśu nāsti vartanā /
SA11sanssr_pu:1169_0: bījasya sato yathāṅkuro na ca yo bīja sa caiva aṅkuro /
SA11sanssr_pu:1169_1: na ca anya tato na caiva tat /
SA11sanssr_pu:1170_0: saṃskāra avidyapratyayāḥ te ca saṃskāra na santi tatvataḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1170_1: saṃskāra avidya caiva hi śūnya ete prakṛtī nirīhakāḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1171_0: mudrāt pratimudra dṛśyate mudrasaṃkrānti na copalabhyate /
SA11sanssr_pu:1171_1: na ca tatra na caiva sānyato evaṃ saṃskārannucchedaśāśvatāḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1172_0: cakṣuś ca pratītya rūpataḥ cakṣu vijñānam ihopajāyate /
SA11sanssr_pu:1172_1: na ca cakṣuṣi rūpaniśritaṃ rūpasaṃkrānti na caiva cakṣuṣi /
SA11sanssr_pu:1173_0: nairātmyaśubhāś ca dharmime te punar ātmeti śubhāś ca kalpitāḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1174_1: akahiñci gatam annāgataṃ śūnya māyopama yogi paśyati /
SA11sanssr_pu:1175_1: iti pratyayato 'gni jāyate jātu kṛtukāryu laghū nirudhyate /
SA11sanssr_pu:1176_0: atha paṇḍitu kaści mārgate kuta yam āgatu kutra yāti vā /
SA11sanssr_pu:1176_1: vidiśo diśi sarva mārgato na gatir nāpy agatiś ca labhyate /
SA11sanssr_pu:1177_0: skandhāyatanāni dhātavaḥ tṛṣṇa avidyā iti karmapratyayāḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1177_1: sāmagri tu satvasūcanā sā ca paramārthatu nopalabhyate /
SA11sanssr_pu:1178_0: kaṇṭhauṣṭha pratītya tālukaṃ jihva parivartir avarti akṣarā /
SA11sanssr_pu:1178_1: na ca kaṇṭhagatā na tālukaiḥ akṣaraikaika tu nopalabhyate /
SA11sanssr_pu:1179_0: sāmagripratītyaś ca sā vācam anubudhivaśena niścarī /
SA11sanssr_pu:1180_1: kṣaṇikāṃ vaśikāṃ tad īdṛśīṃ sarvavācaḥ pratiśrutakopamāḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1181_0: yatha tantri pratītya dāru ca hastavyāyāmatrayebhi saṃgatim /
SA11sanssr_pu:1182_0: atha paṇḍitu kaści mārgate kuto 'yam āgatu kutra yāti vā /
SA11sanssr_pu:1182_1: vidiśo diśa sarvamārgataḥ śabdam annāgamanaṃ na labhyate /
SA11sanssr_pu:1183_0: tatha hetubhi pratyayebhi ca sarvasaṃskāragataṃ pravartate /
SA11sanssr_pu:1183_1: yogī puna bhūtadarśanāt śūnya saṃskāra nirīha paśyati /
SA11sanssr_pu:1186_0: śūnyā anāmakā dharmāḥ nāma kiṃ paripṛcchasi / śūnyatā na kvacid devā na nāgā nāpi rākṣasāḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:1187_0: manuṣyā vāmanuṣyā vā sarve tu eṣa vidyate / nāmnā hi nāmatā śūnyā nāmni nāma na vidyate //
SA11sanssr_pu:1188_0: anāmakāḥ sarve dharmāḥ nāmnā tu paridīpitāḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:1189_0: yo hi svabhāvo nāmno vai na sa dṛṣṭo na ca śrutaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1189_1: na cotpanno niruddho vā kasya nāmeha pṛcchasi /
SA11sanssr_pu:1190_0: vyavahārakṛtaṃ nāma prajñaptir nāmadarśitā / ratnacitro hy ayaṃ nāmnā ratnottamapara iti //
SA11sanssr_pu:1194_0_0: uktāni smṛtyupasthānāni / evaṃ yogyacitto daśasu dikṣu śeṣasya jagato duṣkhasāgaroddharaṇābhisaṃbodhyupāyo vyomaparyantatraikālyasarvadharmavaśavartitvāyaiva
SA11sanssr_pu:1194_2: tataś ca chinnamūlatvāt kleśā na samudācaranti /
SA11sanssr_pu:1195_1: tad yathāpi nāma śāntamate vṛkṣasya mūlachinnasya sarvaśākhā patrapalāśāḥ śuṣyanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:1195_2: evam eva śāntamate satkāyadṛṣṭyupaśamāt sarvakleśā upaśāmyantīti /
SA11sanssr_pu:1197_1: so 'sau śikṣa na jātu traśatī sugatānāṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1197_2: so 'sau śūru na jātu istriṇāṃ vaśam etī /
SA11sanssr_pu:1199_1: so 'sau loṣṭakadaṇḍa tāḍito na ca kupyī /
SA11sanssr_pu:1199_2: so 'sau chidyati aṅgam aṅgaśo na ca kṣubhyo /
SA11sanssr_pu:1200_2: pañcyo tasya abhijña bhāvitā ima nityaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1200_3: purataḥ so sugatāna sthāsyatī sa ca śūra /
SA11sanssr_pu:1201_0_0: bhagavatyām apy uktaṃ / punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisatvena mahāsatvena buddhakāyaṃ niṣpādayitukāmena dvātriṃśanmahāpuruṣalakṣaṇāny
SA11sanssr_pu:1201_0_1: aśītiṃ cānuvyañjanāni pratilabdhukāmena sarvatra jātau jātismaratāṃ bodhicittāvipraṇāśatāṃ bodhisatvacaryāsaṃpramoṣatāṃ pratilabdhukāmena
SA11sanssr_pu:1201_0_3: sarvāvaraṇī yāni śodhayitukāmena sarvadharmānāvaraṇatāṃ pratilabdhukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1201_1: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisatvena mahāsatvena ye daśasu dikṣu buddhā bhagavantas tiṣṭhanti te me varṇaṃ bhāṣerann iti prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1201_2: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisatvena mahāsatvenaikacittotpādena pūrvasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopamān lokadhātūn samatikramitukāmena /
SA11sanssr_pu:1201_3: pe / evaṃ sarvadikṣu prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam ity ādy iti [doubtful] vistaraḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1202_1: karmaphalasaṃbandhāvirodhaś ca niḥsvabhāvatā ca yathādṛṣṭasarvadharmāvirodhaś ca /
SA11sanssr_pu:1202_4: aṣṭādaśamanopavicāraḥ / ṣaḍdhātur ayaṃ mahārāja puruṣa iti /
SA11sanssr_pu:1202_5: na khalu punar etad yuktaṃ / kiṃ vaitad pratītyoktaṃ ṣaḍ ime mahārāja dhātavaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1202_6: katame ṣaṭ / tad yathā pṛthivīdhātur abdhātus tejodhātur vāyudhātur ākāśadhātur vijñānadhātuś ca /
SA11sanssr_pu:1203_1: katamāni ṣaṭ / cakṣuḥ sparśāyatanaṃ rūpāṇāṃ darśanāya /
SA11sanssr_pu:1204_1: katame 'ṣṭādaśa / iha puruṣaś cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi dṛṣṭvā /
SA11sanssr_pu:1204_3: evaṃ śrotrādiṣu vācyaṃ / tena pratyekam indriyaṣaṭkena saumanasyāditrayāṇāṃ bhedād aṣṭādaśa manopavicārā bhavanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:1204_5: yat kiñcid asmin kāye 'dhyātmaṃ kakkhaṭatvaṃ kharagatam upāttaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1204_6: tat punaḥ katamat / tad yathā / keśā romāṇi nakhā dantā ity ādi /
SA11sanssr_pu:1205_1: yat kiñcid bāhyaṃ kakkhaṭvaṃ kharagatam anupāttam ayam ucyate bāhyaḥ pṛthivīdhātuḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1205_2: tatra mahārājādhyātmikaḥ pṛthivīdhātur utpadyamāno na kutaścid āgacchati nirudhyamāno na kvacit saṃnicayaṃ gacchati /
SA11sanssr_pu:1205_3: bhavati mahārāja sa samayo yat strī adhyātmam ahaṃ strīti kalpayati /
SA11sanssr_pu:1205_4: sādhyātmam ahaṃ strīti kalpayitvā bahirdhā puruṣaṃ puruṣa iti kalpayati /
SA11sanssr_pu:1205_5: sā bahirdhā puruṣaṃ puruṣa iti kalpayitvā saṃraktā satī bahirdhā puruṣeṇa sārdhaṃ saṃyogam ākāṅkṣate /
SA11sanssr_pu:1205_9: tatra mahārāja yaś ca saṃkalpo yaś ca saṃkalpayitā /
SA11sanssr_pu:1205_10: ubhayam etan na saṃvidyate / striyāṃ strī na saṃvidyate / puruṣe puruṣo na saṃvidyate /
SA11sanssr_pu:1205_11: iti hy asann asadbhūtaḥ saṃkalpo jātaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1205_13: yathā saṃkalpas tathā saṃyogo 'pi kalalam api svabhāvena na saṃvidyate /
SA11sanssr_pu:1205_14: yaś ca svabhāvato na saṃvidyate tat kathaṃ kakkhaṭatvaṃ janayiṣyati /
SA11sanssr_pu:1205_15: iti hi mahārāja saṃkalpaṃ jñātvā kakkhaṭatvaṃ veditavyaṃ yathā kakkhaṭatvam utpadyamānaṃ na kutaścid āgacchati /
SA11sanssr_pu:1205_17: bhavati mahārāja samayo yad ayaṃ kāyaḥ śmaśānaparyavasāno bhavati /
SA11sanssr_pu:1205_18: tasya tat kakkhaṭatvaṃ saṃklidyamānaṃ nirudhyamānaṃ na pūrvāṃ diśaṃ gacchati /
SA11sanssr_pu:1205_19: na dakṣiṇāṃ / na paścimāṃ / nottarāṃ / nordhvaṃ / nādho / na tu vidiśaṃ gacchati / evaṃ mahārājādhyātmikaḥ pṛthivīdhātur draṣṭavyaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1205_20: bhavati mahārāja sa samayo yadākāśībhūte lokasaṃniveśe brāhmaṃ vimānaṃ saṃtiṣṭhate mahāratnamayaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1205_21: tan mahārāja kakkhaṭatvam utpadyamānaṃ na kutaścid āgacchati /
SA11sanssr_pu:1205_22: cakravāḍamahācakravāḍāḥ saṃtiṣṭhante dṛḍhāḥ sārā ekaghanā vajramayās teṣām api kakkhaṭatvam utpadyamānaṃ na kutaścid āgacchati /
SA11sanssr_pu:1205_23: sumeravaḥ parvatarājāno yugaṃdharā nimiṃdharā īśādharā yāvat kālaparvatāḥ saṃtiṣṭhante /
SA11sanssr_pu:1205_27: tad api mahārāja kakkhaṭatvaṃ samudāgacchat kutaścid āgacchati /
SA11sanssr_pu:1205_28: bhavati mahārāja sa samayo yadāyaṃ lokaḥ saṃvartate /
SA11sanssr_pu:1205_29: tadeyaṃ mahāpṛthivī agninā vā dahyate 'dbhir vā klidyate vāyunā vā vikīryate /
SA11sanssr_pu:1205_30_0: tasyā agninā dahyamānāyā maṣir api na prajāyate tad yathāpi nāma sarpiṣo vā tailasya vāgninā dahyamānasya na maṣir na chāyikā
SA11sanssr_pu:1205_30_1: prajñāyate evam evāsyās trisāhasramahāsāhasrāyā lokadhātor agninā dahyamānāyā naiva maṣir na chāyikāvaśiṣṭā prajñāyate /
SA11sanssr_pu:1205_31: evam adbhir lavaṇavilayavad vāyunā vairambhavātābhihataśakuntavat pṛthivyāṃ na kiñcid avaśiṣṭaṃ prajñāyatae iti paṭhyate /
SA11sanssr_pu:1205_32: tatra mahārāja pṛthivīdhātor utpādo 'pi śūnyaḥ vyayo 'pi śūnya utpanno 'pi pṛthivīdhātuḥ svabhāvaśūnya /
SA11sanssr_pu:1205_33: iti hi mahārāja pṛthivīdhātuḥ pṛthivīdhātutvena nopalabhyate 'nyatra vyavahārāt /
SA11sanssr_pu:1205_34: so 'pi vyavahāro na strī na puruṣaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1205_35: evam evaitan mahārāja yathābhūtaṃ samyakprajñayā draṣṭavyaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1205_36: tatra katamo 'bdhātuḥ / yad idam asmin kāye 'dhyātmaṃ pratyātmam āpaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1205_37: abgataṃ / aptvaṃ snehaḥ / snehagataṃ snehatvaṃ dravatvam upagatam upāttaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1206_0: tat punaḥ katamat / tad yathā / aśru svedaḥ kheṭaḥ siṅghāṇakaṃ vaśā lasikā majjā medaḥ pittaṃ śleṣmā pūyaḥ śoṇitaṃ kṣīraṃ prasrāva ity ādir ayam ucyante ādhyātmiko 'bdhātuḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1207_0: bhavati mahārāja sa samayo yat priyaṃ dṛṣṭvāśru pravartate /
SA11sanssr_pu:1207_2: vātena vākṣi prasyandate / yāvat sa mahārājābdhātur na kutaścid āgacchati /
SA11sanssr_pu:1207_3: bhavati mahārāja sa samayo yadādhyātmiko 'bdhātuḥ pariśuṣyati /
SA11sanssr_pu:1207_4: sa pariśuṣyan nirudhyamāno na kvacid gacchati /
SA11sanssr_pu:1207_5: pe / vivartamāne khalu punar loke samantād dvātriṃśat paṭalā abhraghanāḥ saṃtiṣṭhante saṃsthāya sarvāvantaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1207_9: pañcācchinnadhāraḥ /pañca sthūlabindukaḥ / tata iyaṃ mahāpṛthivī yāvad brahmalokād udakena sphuṭā bhavati /
SA11sanssr_pu:1207_10: sa mahārāja tāvan mahān abdhātur utpadyamāno na kutaścid āgacchati /
SA11sanssr_pu:1207_11: bhavati mahārāja sa samayo yad ayaṃ lokaḥ saṃvartate /
SA11sanssr_pu:1207_12: saṃvartamāne khalu punar loke dvitīyasya sūryasya prādurbhāvo bhavati /
SA11sanssr_pu:1207_13: dvitīyasya sūryasa loke prādurbhāvād utsāḥ sarāṃsi kunadyaś ca śuṣyanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:1207_16: caturthasya sūryasya prādurbhāvān mahāsamudrasya yojanikam apy udakaṃ parikṣayaṃ paryādānaṃ gacchati /
SA11sanssr_pu:1207_17: dviyojanikam api tricatuḥpañcadaśaviṃśatitriṃśaccatvāriṃśatpañcāśadyojanikam api yāvac catvāriṃśadyojanasahasram udakam avaśiṣṭaṃ bhavati /
SA11sanssr_pu:1207_18: yāvad dvitālamātraṃ /yāvat kaṇṭhamātraṃ / yāvad goṣpadamātram udakam avaśiṣṭaṃ bhavati /
SA11sanssr_pu:1207_19: bhavati mahārāja sa samayo yan mahāsamudre pṛthitapṛthitāny avaśiṣṭāni bhavanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:1208_0: bhavati mahārāja sa samayo yan mahāsamudre 'ṅgulisnehamātram apy udakaṃ nāvaśiṣṭaṃ bhavati /
SA11sanssr_pu:1208_1: sa mahārāja tāvān abdhātur nirudhyamāno na kvacid gacchati /
SA11sanssr_pu:1208_2: pe / tasya khalu punar mahārājābdhātor utpādo 'pi śūnyaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1208_3: vyayo 'pi śūnyaḥ tiṣṭhann api so 'bdhātuḥ svabhāvaśūnya iti hi mahārājābdhātur abdhātutvenopalabhyate 'nyatra vyavahāramātrāt /
SA11sanssr_pu:1208_4: so 'pi vyavahāro na strī na puruṣaḥ pūrvavat /
SA11sanssr_pu:1210_0: yat kiñcid asmin kāye tejas tejogatam ūṣmagatam upagatam upāttaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1210_1: tat punaḥ katamat / yenāyaṃ kāya ātapyate saṃtapyate /
SA11sanssr_pu:1210_3: yasya cotsadatvāj jvarito jvarita iti saṃkhyāṃ gacchati /
SA11sanssr_pu:1211_0: bāhyas tejodhātuḥ katamaḥ / yad bāhyaṃ tejas tejogatam ūṣmagatam upagatam upāttaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1211_1_0: tat punaḥ katamat / yan manuṣyā araṇīsahagatebhyo garbhalasahagatebhyo vā gomayacūrṇena vā kārpāsapicunāvāsam anveṣante yad
SA11sanssr_pu:1211_1_1: utpannaṃ grāmam api dahati grāmapradeśam api dahati yāvad dvīpaṃ vā kakṣaṃ tṛṇānāṃ vā dāvaṃ vā kāṣṭhaṃ vā yāvad dahan paraitīty
SA11sanssr_pu:1211_2: tatra mahārājādhyātmikas tejodhātur utpadyate na kutaścid āgacchati nirudhyamāno na kvacit saṃnicayaṃ gacchati /
SA11sanssr_pu:1211_3: iti hy abhūtvā bhavati bhūtvā ca prativigacchati svabhāvarahitatvāt /
SA11sanssr_pu:1212_0: evaṃ yat kiñcid asmin kāye vāyur vāyugataṃ laghutvaṃ samudīraṇatvaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1212_1_0: tat punaḥ katamat / tad yathā ūrdhvagamā vāyavo 'dhogamāḥ pārśvāśrayāḥ pṛṣṭhāśrayāḥ kukṣigamāḥ śastrakāḥ kṣurakāḥ sūcakāḥ
SA11sanssr_pu:1212_1_1: pippalakā vātāṣṭhīlā vātagulmā āśvāsapraśvāsā aṅgānusāriṇo vāyava ity ādi /
SA11sanssr_pu:1212_2: santi bahirdhā pūrve vāyavo dakṣiṇāḥ paścimā uttarā vāyavaḥ sarajasaḥ arajasaḥ parīttā mahadgatā vāyava iti /
SA11sanssr_pu:1212_3: bhavati mahārāja sa samayo yan mahāvāyuskandhaḥ samudāgataḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1212_4: vṛkṣāgrān api pātayati / kuḍyān api parvatāgrān api pātayati /
SA11sanssr_pu:1212_6: yaṃ satvāś cīvarakarṇikena vā vidhamanakena vātānuvṛttena vā paryeṣyante /
SA11sanssr_pu:1213_1: yat kiñcid asmin kāye 'dhyātmaṃ pratyātmam upagatam upāttam ākāśagatam ihābhyantarasaṃkhyābhūtaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1213_3: tat punaḥ katamat / yad asmin kāye cakṣuḥ suṣiram iti vā yāvan mukhaṃ vā mukhadvāraṃ vā kaṇṭhaṃ vā kaṇṭhanāḍyā vā yena cābhyavaharati yatra cāvatiṣṭhate /
SA11sanssr_pu:1213_6: evaṃ bāhye 'pi yad asphuṭam aspharaṇīyaṃ rūpagatenāpaliguddhaṃ suṣirabhāvaś chidraṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1214_0: bhavati mahārāja sa samayo yat karmapratyayād āyatanāni prādurbhavanti tāny ākāśadhātuṃ paricārayanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:1214_1: tatra saṃkhyā bhavaty ādhyātmika ākāśadhātur iti /
SA11sanssr_pu:1214_2: sa na kutaścid āgacchati / bhavati samayo yad rūpaṃ bibharti sarvam ākāśībhavati /
SA11sanssr_pu:1214_3: tat kasya hetoḥ / akṣayo hy ākāśadhātuḥ sthiro 'calaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1214_6: tad yathāpi nāma mahārāja puruṣa utthale deśe udapānaṃ vā kuṭakaṃ vā kūpaṃ vā puṣkariṇīṃ vā khānayet /
SA11sanssr_pu:1214_7: tat kiṃ manyase mahārāja yat tatrākāśaḥ kutas tad āgatam iti /
SA11sanssr_pu:1214_8: āha / na kutaścid bhagavan / bhagavān āha / tad yathāpi nāma mahārāja sa puruṣaḥ punar eva tad udapānaṃ vā yāvat puṣkariṇīṃ vā pūrayet /
SA11sanssr_pu:1214_9: tat kiṃ manyase mahārāja yat tad ākāśaṃ kvacid gatam iti /
SA11sanssr_pu:1214_10: āha / na kvacid gataṃ bhagavan / tat kasya hetoḥ / na hy ākāśadhātur gamane vā āgamane vā pratyupasthitaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1214_12: bhagavān āha / iti hi mahārāja bāhyākāśadhātur acalaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1214_13: avikāraḥ /tat kasya hetoḥ / śūnyo hy ākāśadhātur ākāśadhātutvena /
SA11sanssr_pu:1215_1: rūpārambaṇaprativijñaptiḥ / yāvad iti hi mahārāja yā kācid varṇasaṃsthānaprativijñaptir ayam ucyate cakṣurvijñānadhātuḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1215_2: pe / iti hi yā ṣaḍindriyādhipateyā ṣaḍviṣayārambaṇā viṣayavijñaptir ayam ucyate vijñānadhātuḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1215_3: sa khalu punar ayaṃ mahārāja vijñānadhātur nendriyaniśrito na viṣayebhya āgato na madhye 'ntarasthāyī sa nādhyātma bahirdhā nobhayam antareṇa /
SA11sanssr_pu:1215_4: sa khalu punar ayaṃ mahārāja vijñānadhātur vastu prativijñapya niruddhaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1215_5: sa utpadyamāno na kutaścid āgacchati nirudhyamāno na kvacid gacchati /
SA11sanssr_pu:1215_6: tasya khalu punar vijñānadhātor utpādo 'pi śūnyaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1215_8: iti mahārāja vijñānadhātur vijñānadhātutvena śūnyo nopalabhyate 'nyatra vyavahārāt /
SA11sanssr_pu:1215_9: so 'pi vyavahāro na strī na puruṣaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1216_2: tad yathā pṛthivīdhātor abdhātos tejodhātor vāyudhātor yāvat /
SA11sanssr_pu:1216_3: tatra pṛthivīdhātuprasādaś cakṣurāyatanaṃ nābdhātuprasādo na tejodhātuprasādo na vāyudhātuprasādaś cakṣurāyatanaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1216_4: tat kasya hetoḥ / na hi pṛthivīdhātuprasādaḥ kasyacid dharmāyatanaṃ vā āyatanapratilambhena vā pratyupasthitaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1216_5: evaṃ yāvan na vāyudhātuprasādaḥ kasyacid dharmasyāyatanaṃ vā āyatanapratilambhena vā pratyupasthitaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1216_6: tat kasya hetoḥ / niśceṣṭā hy ete dharmā niṣṭhāpārā nirvāṇasamā /
SA11sanssr_pu:1216_7: iti hi mahārāja ekaikato dharmān mṛgyamāṇān cakṣurāyatanaṃ nopalabhate 'nyatra vyavahārāt /
SA11sanssr_pu:1216_8: tat kasya hetoḥ / śūnyo hi pṛthivīdhātuprasādaḥ pṛthivīdhātuprasādena /
SA11sanssr_pu:1216_10: ye ca dharmāḥ svabhāvena śūnyāḥ kas teṣāṃ prasādo vā kṣobho vā /
SA11sanssr_pu:1216_11: yeṣāṃ na prasādo na kṣobha upalabhyate /
SA11sanssr_pu:1216_12: kathaṃ te rūpaṃ drakṣyanti / iti hy atyantatayā cakṣurāyatanaṃ śūnyaṃ cakṣurāyatanasvabhāvena tat pūrvāntato nopalabhyate /
SA11sanssr_pu:1217_0: aparāntato 'pi nopalabhyate / annāgamanatāṃ gamanatāṃ copādāya sthānam apy asya nopalabhyate svabhāvavirahitatvāt /
SA11sanssr_pu:1217_2: na tat strī na puruṣaḥ / tena kā manyanā / manyanā ca nāma mahārāja māragocaraḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1217_3: amanyanā buddhagocaraḥ / tat kasya hetoḥ / manyanāpagatā hi sarvadharmāḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1217_6: yāvad iti hi mahārāja sarvadharmā vimokṣābhimukhā dharmadhātuniyatā ākāśadhātuparyavasānā aprāptikā avyavahārā annabhilāpyā annabhilapanīyāḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1217_7: yatra mahārāja indriyāṇi pratihanyante te viṣayā ity ucyante /
SA11sanssr_pu:1217_8: cakṣur hi rūpe pratihanyate tasmād rūpāṇi cakṣurviṣayā ity ucyante /
SA11sanssr_pu:1217_10: tatra cakṣū rūpe pratihanyata iti nipātaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1217_12: tathā hi cakṣū rūpeṣu trividhaṃ nipatatīti /
SA11sanssr_pu:1217_15: evaṃ mano dharmeṣv ity ādi / tae ime viṣayā manogocarā ity ucyante /
SA11sanssr_pu:1217_16: atra hi manaś carati / upavicarati / tasmān manogocarā ity ucyante /
SA11sanssr_pu:1217_17: yad etan mahārāja mano 'pratikūleṣu rūpeṣv anunītaṃ carati /
SA11sanssr_pu:1217_18: tenāsya rāga utpadyate / pratikūleṣu rūpeṣu pratihataṃ carati tenāsya dveṣa utpadyate /
SA11sanssr_pu:1217_20: tenāsya moha utpadyate / evaṃ śabdādiṣv api trividham ārambaṇam anubhavati pūrvavat /
SA11sanssr_pu:1218_1: svapnopamā viṣayāḥ / tad yathāpi nāma mahārāja puruṣaḥ suptaḥ svapnāntare janapadakalyāṇyā striyā sārdhaṃ paricaret /
SA11sanssr_pu:1218_3: tat kiṃ manyase mahārāja saṃvidyate svapnāntare janapadakalyāṇī strī /
SA11sanssr_pu:1218_4: āha / no hīdaṃ bhagavan / bhagavān āha / tat kiṃ manyase mahārājāpi nu sa puruṣaḥ paṇḍitajātīyo bhavet /
SA11sanssr_pu:1218_7: āha / no hīdaṃ bhagavan / tat kasya hetoḥ / atyantatayā hi bhagavan svapnāntare janapadakalyāṇī na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate /
SA11sanssr_pu:1218_9: anyatra yāvad eva sa puruṣo vighātasya klamathasya bhāgī syāt /
SA11sanssr_pu:1219_0: bhagavān āha / evam eva mahārāja bālo 'śrutavān pṛthagjanaś cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi dṛṣṭvā saumanasyasthānīyāny abhiniviśet /
SA11sanssr_pu:1219_3: trividhaṃ kāyena caturvidhaṃ vācā trividhaṃ manasā /
SA11sanssr_pu:1219_4: tac ca karmābhisaṃskṛtam ādita eva kṣīṇaṃ niruddhaṃ vigataṃ vipariṇataṃ na pūrvāṃ diśaṃ niśritya tiṣṭhati /
SA11sanssr_pu:1219_5: na dakṣiṇāṃ na paścimāṃ nottarāṃ nordhvaṃ nādho nānuvidiśaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1219_6: neha na tiryak / na ubhayam antarā / tat punaḥ kālāntareṇa maraṇakālasamaye pratyupasthite /
SA11sanssr_pu:1219_7: jīvitendriyanirodhe āyuṣaḥ parikṣayāt tatsabhāgasya karmaṇaḥ kṣīṇatvāc caramavijñānasya nirudhyamānasya manasa ārambaṇībhavati /
SA11sanssr_pu:1219_8: tad yathāpi nāma śayitavibuddhasya janapadakalyāṇīti manasa ārambaṇaṃ bhavati /
SA11sanssr_pu:1219_9: iti hi mahārāja caramavijñānenādhipatinā tena ca karmaṇā ārambaṇenaupapattyaṃśikadvayapratyayaṃ prathamavijñānam utpadyate /
SA11sanssr_pu:1219_10: yadi vā narakeṣu yadi vā tiryagyonau yadi vā yamaloke yadi vā āsure kāye yadi vā manuṣyeṣu yadi vā deveṣu /
SA11sanssr_pu:1219_11: tasya ca prathamavijñānasya aupapattyaṃśikasya samanantaraniruddhasyānnantarasabhāgā cittasaṃtatiḥ pravartate /
SA11sanssr_pu:1219_13: tatra yaś caramavijñānasya nirodhas tatra cyutir iti saṃkhyāṃ gacchati /
SA11sanssr_pu:1219_15: iti hi mahārāja na kaścid dharmo 'smāl lokāt paraṃ lokaṃ gacchati /
SA11sanssr_pu:1219_16: cyutyupapattī ca prajāyete / tatra mahārāja caramavijñānam utpadyamānaṃ na kutaścid āgacchati /
SA11sanssr_pu:1220_3: prathamavijñānam apy utpadyamānaṃ na kutaścid āgacchati /
SA11sanssr_pu:1220_5: tat kasya hetoḥ / svabhāvavirahitatvāt / caramavijñānaṃ caramavijñānena śūnyaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1220_6: karma karmaṇā śūnyaṃ / prathamavijñānaṃ prathamavijñānena śūnyaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1220_7: cyutiś cyutyā śūnyā / upapattir upapattyā śūnyā / karmaṇāṃ cābandhyatā prajāyate vipākasya ca pratisaṃvedanā na cātra kaścit kartā na bhoktānyatra nāmasaṃketāt /
SA11sanssr_pu:1220_8: tad yathāpi nāma mahārāja puruṣaḥ suptaḥ svapnāntare śatruṇā sārdhaṃ saṃgrāmayet /
SA11sanssr_pu:1220_9: sa śayitavibuddhaḥ / tam evānusmaret / tat kiṃ manyase mahārāja saṃvidyate svapnāntare śatruḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1220_11: āha / no hīdaṃ bhagavan / bhagavān āha / tat kiṃ manyase mahārājāpi nu sa puruṣaḥ paṇḍitajātīyo bhavet /
SA11sanssr_pu:1220_14: āha / no hīdaṃ bhagavan / tat kasya hetoḥ / atyantatayā hi bhagavan svapne śatrur na saṃvidyate kutaḥ punas tena sārdhaṃ saṃgrāmaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1220_15: anyatra yāvad eva sa puruṣo vighātasya klamathasya ca bhāgī syāt yas tam abhiniviśet /
SA11sanssr_pu:1220_16: bhagavān āha / evam eva mahārāja bālo 'śrutavān pṛthagjanaś cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi dṛṣṭvā daurmanasyāsthānīyāny abhiniviśate 'bhiniviṣṭaḥ san pratihanyate /
SA11sanssr_pu:1220_17: pratihataḥ saṃtuṣyati / duṣṭo doṣajaṃ karmābhisaṃskarotīti pūrvavat /
SA11sanssr_pu:1220_18: tad yathāpi nāma mahārāja puruṣah suptaḥ svapnāntare piśācena paripātyamāno bhītaḥ saṃoham āpadyate /
SA11sanssr_pu:1220_19: sa śayitavibuddhas taṃ piśācaṃ taṃ ca saṃmoham anusmaret /
SA11sanssr_pu:1220_20: tat kiṃ manyase mahārāja saṃvidyante svapne piśācaḥ saṃmoho vā /
SA11sanssr_pu:1220_21: yāvad evam eva mahārāja bālo 'śrutavān pṛthagjanaś cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi dṛṣṭvā upekṣāsthānīyāny abhiniviśate 'bhiniviṣṭaḥ san muhyati mūḍho mohajaṃ karmābhisaṃskarotīti pūrvavat /
SA11sanssr_pu:1220_22: tad yathāpi nāma mahārāja puruṣaḥ suptaḥ svapnāntare janapadakalyāṇyā gāyantyā madhuraṃ gītasvaraṃ madhuraṃ ca tantrīsvaraṃ ca śṛṇuyāt /
SA11sanssr_pu:1220_24: sa śayitavibuddhas tad eva gītavāditam anusmaret /
SA11sanssr_pu:1220_25: tat kiṃ manyase mahārājāpi nu sa puruṣaḥ paṇḍitajātīyaḥ svapnāntare janapadakalyāṇyā gītavāditam abhiniviśet /
SA11sanssr_pu:1220_26: āha / no hīdaṃ bhagavan / bhagavān āha / tat kasya hetoḥ / atyantatayā hi bhagavan svapnāntare janapadakalyāṇī strī na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate /
SA11sanssr_pu:1220_28: anyatra yāvad eva sa puruṣo vighātasya klamathasya ca bhāgī syāt /
SA11sanssr_pu:1220_29: yas tad abhiniviśet / bhagavān āha / evam eva mahārāja bālo 'śrutavān pṛthagjanaḥ śrotreṇa śabdān śrutvā saumanasyasthānīyāny abhiniviśate /
SA11sanssr_pu:1220_30: iti pūrvavat / evaṃ gandhādiṣu tridhā tridhā veditavyam /
SA11sanssr_pu:1221_1: kim ity ahaṃ sadevakasya lokasya cakṣur bhaveyaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1221_2: ulkā pradīpa ālokabhūtaḥ / kūlaṃ naus tīrthaṃ / nāyakaḥ pariṇāyakaḥ daiśikaḥ sārthavāhaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1221_3: puro javeyaṃ / mukto mocayeyam āśvasta āśvāsayeyaṃ parinirvṛttaḥ parinirvāpayeyam iti /
SA11sanssr_pu:1221_4: pūrvā hi koṭir mahārāja na prajñāyate aiśvaryādhipatyānām anubhūya mānānāṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1221_5: iti hi mahārāja māyopamānīndriyāṇy atṛptāny atarṣaṇīyāni /
SA11sanssr_pu:1222_0: atrānnantayaśaścakravartinaḥ kathā svargāc ca patite tasmin sarājakaiḥ pauraiḥ parivṛta evaṃ paṭhyate /
SA11sanssr_pu:1222_1: tad yathāpi nāma mahārāja sarpirmaṇḍo vā navanītamaṇḍo vā taptāyāṃ vālukāyām upanikṣipto 'vasīdati /
SA11sanssr_pu:1222_2: na saṃtiṣṭhate / evam eva mahārājānnantayaśā avasīdati na saṃtiṣṭhate /
SA11sanssr_pu:1222_3: atha rājā priyaṃkaro rājānam annantayaśasaṃ tathāvasīdantaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1222_4: upasaṃkramyaitad avocat / kiṃ vayaṃ mahārāja lokasya vyākuryāmaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1222_6_0: sa āha / vaktavyaṃ / mahārājānantayaśāś caturdvīpeṣu rājyaiśvaryaṃ kārayitvābandhyamanorathatām anubhūya sarvadrumākālaphalatāṃ
SA11sanssr_pu:1222_6_2: caturo mahādvīpān adhyāvasitvā śakrasyārdhāsanam ākramyātīcchayā na mukto 'tṛpta eva kāmaiḥ kālagata iti /
SA11sanssr_pu:1222_7: evaṃ tvaṃ mahārāja vyākuryā ity evam uktvā ca rājānnantayaśāḥ kālam akārṣīt /
SA11sanssr_pu:1223_0: tasmāt tarhi te mahārāja marīcikāyām udakasvabhāvo nābhūn na bhaviṣyati na caitarhi vidyate /
SA11sanssr_pu:1223_1: evam eva mahārāja rūpavedanāsaṃjñā saṃskāravijñanāṃ svabhāvo nābhūn na bhaviṣyati na caitarhi vidyatae ity ādi /
SA11sanssr_pu:1224_0: punar apy uktaṃ / etāvac caitat jñeyam / yad uta saṃvṛtiḥ paramārthaś ca /
SA11sanssr_pu:1224_1: tac ca bhagavatā śūnyataḥ sudṛṣṭaṃ suviditaṃ susākṣātkṛtaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1224_5: annājñeyo 'vijñeyo 'deśito 'prakāśito yāvad akriyo yāvan na lābho nālābho na sukhaṃ na duṣkhaṃ na yaśo nāyaśaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1225_0: tatra jinena jagasya kṛtena saṃvṛti deśita lokahitāya /
SA11sanssr_pu:1225_1: yena jagat sugatasya sakāśe saṃjanayīha prasādasukhārthe /
SA11sanssr_pu:1226_0: saṃvṛti prajñamayī narasiṃhaḥ ṣaḍgatayo bhaṇi satvagaṇānāṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1226_1: narakatiraś ca tathaiva ca pretān āsurakāya narāṃś ca marūṃś ca /
SA11sanssr_pu:1227_0: nīcakulāṃs tatha uccakulāṃś ca āḍhyakulāṃś ca daridrakulāṃś cety ādi //
SA11sanssr_pu:1228_0: punaś coktaṃ / katama eṣa dharmo yo bhagavatā vyākṛto 'nnuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau /
SA11sanssr_pu:1228_1: kiṃ rūpam uta vedanā āho śvit saṃjñā utāho saṃskārā atha vijñānaṃ bhagavatā vyākṛtam annuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhāv iti /
SA11sanssr_pu:1228_2: teṣām etad abhūt / na rūpaṃ yāvan na vijñānaṃ bhagavatā vyākṛtam annuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau /
SA11sanssr_pu:1228_3: tat kasya hetoḥ / annutpādo hi rūpam annutpādo bodhiḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1229_0: tad evam annupalabhyamāneṣu sarvadharmeṣu katamo 'tra buddhaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1229_1: katamā bodhiḥ / katamo bodhisatvaḥ / katamad vyākaraṇam / śūnyaṃ hi rūpaṃ rūpeṇa yāvad vijñānaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1230_2: nālam atra paṇḍitair abhiniveśa utpādayitavya iti /
SA11sanssr_pu:1231_0: tathātraivāhuḥ / nirmāṇaratayo devā yathā vayaṃ bhagavan /
SA11sanssr_pu:1231_2: sarvadharmā bhūtakoṭir annantakoṭir annāvaraṇakoṭir apratiṣṭhitakoṭir ity ādi /
SA11sanssr_pu:1232_2: tat kasya hetoḥ / aprakṛtikā hi bhagavan bodhir aprakṛtikāni ca pañcānantaryāṇi /
SA11sanssr_pu:1232_4: tathā vihasyante bhagavan ye kecit parinirvātukāmāḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1232_5: tat kasya hetoḥ / yadi kaścit saṃsārapratipanno bhavet /
SA11sanssr_pu:1233_0: punar uktaṃ / bhūtakoṭir iti bhagavan yad uktaṃ nirmāṇaratibhir devais tatra vayaṃ bhūtam api nopalabhāmahe /
SA11sanssr_pu:1233_1: kiṃ punar asya koṭim / tat kasya hetoḥ / yo hi kaścid bhagavan bhūtam upalabhate /
SA11sanssr_pu:1233_2: koṭim api sa tasyopalabhate dvaye cāsau caratīti /
SA11sanssr_pu:1235_0: supiti yatha naraḥ kṣudhābhibhūtaḥ śatarasabhojanabhuñjino ca tṛptaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1235_1: na pi ca kṣudha na bhojanaṃ na satvaḥ supina yathaiva nidṛṣṭa sarvadharmāḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1236_0: bhaṇi naru paṭhane manojñavācaṃ priyu bhavatī na ca saṃkramo 'sti vācaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1236_1: na ca vacana cāsya rakta vācām upalabhase na ca tatra saṃśayo 'sti /
SA11sanssr_pu:1237_0: śruṇati yatha manojña vīṇaśabdaṃ madhura na cāsti svabhāvataḥ sa śabdaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1237_1: tatha imi vidu skandha prekṣamāṇo na labhati bhāvu svabhāvataḥ sumedhāḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1238_0: yatha naru iha śaṅkhaśabda śrutvā vimṛśati vidva kuto ya prādubhūtaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1238_1: na ca labhati svabhāva śūnyabhāvaṃ tatha tv aya dṛṣṭa narendra sarvadharmāḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1239_0: yatha naru iha bhojanaṃ praṇītaṃ vimṛśati aṅgaśu siddham asvabhāvam /
SA11sanssr_pu:1239_1: yatha rasu tatha te 'ṅga tatsvabhāvās tatha tv aya dṛṣṭa maharṣi sarvadharmāḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1240_0: yatha naru iha indrayaṣṭi dṛṣṭvā vimṛśati aṅgaśu niḥsvabhāva śūnyam /
SA11sanssr_pu:1240_1: vimṛśatu yatha yaṣṭi te 'ṅga śūnyās tatha tv aya dṛṣṭa maharṣi sarvadharmāḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1241_0: puravara yatha aṅgaśo vibhajya nagaru svabhāvatu nāmato na labdham /
SA11sanssr_pu:1241_1: yatha nagara tathāṅga sarvaśūnyās tatha tv aya dṛṣṭa narendra sarvadharmāḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1242_0: mudita yatha narāga mukta bherī harṣa janeti svabhāvaśūnyaśabdā /
SA11sanssr_pu:1242_1: svaru yatha tatha te 'ṅga tatsvabhāvaṃ tatha tv aya dṛṣṭa maharṣi sarvadharmāḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1243_0: ... ... hanatu yatha narasya tāṃ hi bherīṃ pratighu na vidyati nāpi snehadhātuḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1243_1: vimṛśatu bherīva te 'ṅga tatsvabhāvās tatha tv aya dṛṣṭa narendra sarvadharmāḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1244_0: hanatu yatha narasya tāṃ hi bherīṃ svaru na sa manyati rāmayāmi lokam /
SA11sanssr_pu:1244_1: svaru yatha tatha te 'ṅga tatsvabhāvāḥ tatha tv aya dṛṣṭa narendra sarvadharmāḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1245_0: hanatu yatha narasya tasya bheryāṃ na pi svaru aṅgaśu nāpi sa svatantraḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1245_1: svaru yatha tatha te 'ṅga tatsvabhāvās tatha tv aya dṛṣṭa maharṣi sarvadharmāḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1246_0: punaś coktaṃ / satvārambaṇanāyakena kathitā maitrī śubhābhāvanā /
SA11sanssr_pu:1246_1: satvaś cāsya vibhāvitaḥ suviditaṃ niḥsatva sarvaṃ jagat /
SA11sanssr_pu:1246_3: tena tvā sugataṃ vibhāvitamatiṃ pūjema pūjāriham /
SA11sanssr_pu:1247_0: duṣkhaṃ cā sugatā [doubtful] daśaddiśigataṃ naivaṃ parīdṛśyate /
SA11sanssr_pu:1247_1: satveṣū karuṇā ca nāma bhaṇitā devātideva tvayā /
SA11sanssr_pu:1247_2: evaṃ bho jinapuṅgavā jinamataṃ ajñāta yathāvataḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1247_3: tena tvāṃ dvipadottamā naravarāḥ pūjema pūjāriham /
SA11sanssr_pu:1248_0: satvānaiva na duṣkhaṃ śākyamuninā yasyāpanītaṃ dukhaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1248_1: jātās te muditāś ca hṛṣṭamanaso 'ratīś ca tair noditāḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1249_1: tasmāt pūjiya tvāṃ narāṇa pravaraṃ prāyema prāptaṃ phalaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1250_1: naivaṃ te smṛtināyakā na bhaṇitā naiva pramuṣṭā smṛtiḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1251_0: uktaṃ co sugatena bhāvapathimāḥ kāyaṃ gatā bhāvanāḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1251_1: evaṃ buddhanayaṃ viditva sugatā pūjā kṛtā tāyinaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1252_0: bhāvethaḥ śamathaṃ vipaśyanam ayaṃ mārgaṃ dukhā śāntaye /
SA11sanssr_pu:1252_1: śāntās te bhagavan savāsanamalā yehī jagat kliṣyate /
SA11sanssr_pu:1253_0: śamathaś cātha vipaśyanā na ca malā sarve 'ti śūnyā mune /
SA11sanssr_pu:1253_1: asmin devagaṇā na kāṅkṣa kvacanā pūjentu tvāṃ nāyakaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1254_0: punar uktaṃ / śūnyaṃ hi cakṣuś cakṣuḥsvabhāvena /
SA11sanssr_pu:1254_1: yasya ca dharmasya svabhāvo na vidyate so 'vastukaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1254_2: yo 'vastukaḥ so 'pariniṣpannaḥ yo 'pariniṣpannaḥ sa notpadyate na nirudhyate /
SA11sanssr_pu:1255_0: yat triṣv apy adhvasu nopalabhyate na tac cakṣur nendriyaṃ kathaṃ tasya vyavahāro jñeyaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1255_2: yāvad eva nāmamātraṃ no tu khalu paramārthato riktam upalabhyate na muṣṭiḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1255_3: evaṃ cakṣuś cendriyaṃ ca rikte muṣṭisadṛśam alīkam asadbhūtaṃ tucchaṃ mṛṣāmoṣadharme bālopalāpanaṃ mūrkhasaṃmohanam yāvad eva nāmamātram /
SA11sanssr_pu:1256_0: punar atraivāha / svapnāntare mahāvṛṣṭir āsravāṇāṃ pravartanā /
SA11sanssr_pu:1257_0: svapne yathā śiraśchedo dṛṣṭas te āsravakṣayaḥ / darśitaḥ sarvavijñānāṃ sarvadarśin namo 'stu te //
SA11sanssr_pu:1258_0: atraiva ca drumeṇa kinnararājena bhagavān pṛṣṭaḥ pratyāha /
SA11sanssr_pu:1258_2: cāpy ahaṃ na jānāmi / syād yadi kiṃcid aśūnyaṃ na bhavej jinenāsya vyākaraṇam /
SA11sanssr_pu:1259_0: kiṃkāraṇaṃ / tathā hi / sthitaṃ bhavet tat svake bhave /
SA11sanssr_pu:1259_1: kūṭasthanirvikāraṃ / na tasya vṛddhir na parihāṇiḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1259_2: na kriyā na ca kāraṇaṃ / yat svabhāvaśūnyam ādarśamaṇḍale supariśuddhe saṃdṛśyate pratibimbam /
SA11sanssr_pu:1259_4: avikāraṃ dharmadhātum imāṃ ca pūjāṃ drumāṅgaśo vicārayasi /
SA11sanssr_pu:1260_0: yad api ca nirīhakatvaṃ kriyāṃ ca na jānase mayā proktaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1260_1: śakaṭāṅga saṃnipātaṃ nirīkṣva śakaṭasya caiva kriyāṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1261_0: karma ca me ākhyātaṃ kartā na vidyate daśasu dikṣu /
SA11sanssr_pu:1261_1: vāteritād iva taror yathā hi nivartate vahniḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1262_0: na ca māruto na ca taruś cetayati hutāśanaṃ ca yajane /
SA11sanssr_pu:1262_1: na nivartate vahnis tathaiva karmasya kartāraḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1263_0: yad api vadase na ca saṃcaya puṇyasya hi vidyate /
SA11sanssr_pu:1263_1: sucaritasya samudāgamaś ca / bodhis tasyāpi śṛṇu kramanta tvaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1263_2: yathā bhaṇasi manuṣyāṇām āyuḥparimāṇaṃ varṣaśataṃ jīvin /
SA11sanssr_pu:1263_3: na cāsti varṣapuñjī / ayam api samudāgamas tadvad iti /
SA11sanssr_pu:1264_0: bhagavatyām apy uktaṃ / kiṃ punar āyuṣman subhūte utpanno dharma utpadyate utānnutpannaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1264_1: subhūtir āha / nāham āyuṣman śāriputra utpannasya dharmasyotpattim icchāmi na cānnutpannasyeti /
SA11sanssr_pu:1265_0: dharmasaṃgītyām apy uktaṃ / tathatā tathateti kulaputra śūnyatāyā etad adhivacanaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1265_1: sā ca śūnyatā notpadyate na nirudhyate /
SA11sanssr_pu:1265_2: āha / yady evaṃ dharmāḥ śūnyā uktā bhagavatā tasmāt sarvadharmā notpatsyante na nirotsyante /
SA11sanssr_pu:1265_3: nirārambho bodhisatvaḥ / āha / evam eva kulaputra tathā yathābhisaṃbudhyase sarvadharmā notpadyante na nirudhyante /
SA11sanssr_pu:1265_4: āha / yad etad uktaṃ bhagavatā / saṃskṛtā dharmā utpadyante nirudhyante cety asya tathāgatabhāṣitasya ko 'bhiprāyaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1265_6: tatra tathāgato mahākāruṇiko lokasyottrāsapadaparihārārthaṃ vyavahāravaśād uktavān utpadyante nirudhyante ceti /
SA11sanssr_pu:1265_7: na cātra kasyacid dharmasyotpādo na nirodha iti /
SA11sanssr_pu:1266_0: punar atraivoktaṃ / tatra bhagavaṃś cakṣūrūpeṣu na raṇati śrotraṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1266_2: sa dharmaḥ / tatra kathaṃ cakṣūrūpeṣu na raṇati /
SA11sanssr_pu:1266_5: yan na saṃsṛjyate tan na raṇati /
SA11sanssr_pu:1266_7: advitīyāś ca bhagavan sarvadharmāḥ paraḥparaṃ na jānanti na vijānanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:1266_10: na hīyante na varddhante / na rajyanti / na virajyanti / na saṃsaranti na parinirvānti naite kasyacit /
SA11sanssr_pu:1266_11: naiṣāṃ kaścit / naite bhagavan dharmā udvijante na saṃkliśyante na vyavadāyante /
SA11sanssr_pu:1266_12: evam ahaṃ bhagavan jānāmy evam avabudhye /
SA11sanssr_pu:1266_13: yad apy ahaṃ / bhagavann evaṃ vadāmi / evam ahaṃ jānāmy evam ahaṃ budhyāmīti /
SA11sanssr_pu:1266_14: āyatanānām eṣa vikāraḥ / na ca bhagavann āyatanānām evaṃ bhavati /
SA11sanssr_pu:1266_15: asmākam eṣa vikāra iti / yo hy evaṃ jānāti sa na kenacit sārddhaṃ vivadati /
SA11sanssr_pu:1266_16: yan na vivadati tac chramaṇadharmam anusaratīti /
SA11sanssr_pu:1266_17: tathā dharmadarśanaṃ buddhadarśanaṃ sarvasatvadarśanaṃ sarvasatvahetupratyayadarśanaṃ śūnyatādarśanaṃ śūnyatādarśanam adarśanaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1266_18: adarśanaṃ bhagavan sarvadharmāṇāṃ darśanaṃ samyagdarśanam iti /
SA11sanssr_pu:1267_1: kathaṃ punar ayuktā / yathāsati sthāṇau puruṣabhrāntiḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1267_2: kasya punaḥ śūnyatāvādinaḥ paramārthataḥ sthāṇuḥ siddho yadāśrayāt puruṣabhrāntiḥ syād /
SA11sanssr_pu:1267_3: amūlā eva ca sarvadharmās tatvato mūlānupapatteḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1268_2: āha / viparyastā saṃjñā mūlaṃ / āha / viparyastāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ kiṃ mūlaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1268_3: apratiṣṭhānaṃ mūlaṃ / āha / apratiṣṭhāyāḥ kiṃ mūlaṃ / āha / yan mañjuśrīr apratiṣṭhānaṃ na tasya kiñcin mūlam iti hy apratiṣṭhānamūlapratiṣṭhitāḥ sarvadharmā iti /
SA11sanssr_pu:1270_2: na sa lābhena saṃhṛṣyāti / alābhena na vimanā bhavati / yaśasā na vismayate 'yaśasā na saṃkucati /
SA11sanssr_pu:1270_3: nindayā nāvalīyate / praśaṃsayā nānunīyate / sukhena na rajyate duṣkhena na virajyate /
SA11sanssr_pu:1270_4: yo hy evaṃ lokadharmair na saṃhriyate sa śūnyatāṃ jānītae iti /
SA11sanssr_pu:1271_0: tathā śūnyatāvādino na kvacid anurāgo na virāgaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1271_1: yasmin rajyeta tac chūnyam eva jānīte /
SA11sanssr_pu:1271_2_0: śūnyam eva paśyati / nāsau śūnyatāṃ jānīte yaḥ kvacid dharme rajyate vā virajyate vā tathā nāsau śūnyatāṃ jānīte yaḥ kenacit
SA11sanssr_pu:1271_2_1: sārddhaṃ vigrahaṃ vivādaṃ vā kuryāc chūnyam eva jānīte tac chūnyam eva paśyatīty ādi /
SA11sanssr_pu:1273_1: iha pañcakaṣāyasaṃkliṣṭasya kalyāṇamitrāvasāditasya vā saṃkṣepeṇa tāvat kutra yatnaṃ kṛtvā śīghraṃ cittaśuddhir bhavati /
SA11sanssr_pu:1273_3: sā caitadabhyāsāt sukaraṃ prahīyatae iti paragauravam ātmāvajñā caivaṃ bhāvanīyā /

SA11sanssr_pu:1342_10: tat kasya hetoḥ / varaṃ khalu punar aham eko duṣkhitaḥ syāṃ na ceme sarvasatvāḥ apāyabhūmiprapatitāḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1342_12: sarvajagac ca niḥkretavyaṃ narakatiryagyoniyamalokakāntārād ahaṃ ca sarvasatvānām arthāya sarvaduṣkhavedanāskandham anena svakena śarīreṇānubhaveyam /

SA11sanssr_pu:1342_15: tat kasya hetoḥ / sarvasatvārambaṇo mama sarvajñatācittotpāda utpanno yad uta sarvajagatparimocanāya /

SA11sanssr_pu:1342_18: tat kasya hetoḥ / aratayo hy eṣā sarvalokaratayaḥ /

SA11sanssr_pu:1342_23: kalahabhaṇḍanavivādakṣobhāś ca satvānām ata eva prādurbhavanti /

SA11sanssr_pu:1342_27: so 'ham evam apramāṇadoṣān kāmānāṃ paśyan parīttān ādīptāṃs tasmād aham etan nidānam acaraṇatāyāṃ pratipatsye /
SA11sanssr_pu:1343_0: tathā tathaiva mayā kuśalamūlaṃ pariṇāmayitavyaṃ yathā yathaiva sarvasatvā atyantasukham aveditasukhaṃ yāvat sarvajñatāsukhaṃ pratilabheran /
