SA11sanssr_pu:1399_0: ścyuta/ cāsmād gataḥ svargaṃ prasanno jinaśāsane / śakro bhavati devendraḥ īśvaro marumūrddhani //
SA11sanssr_pu:1400_0: na śakyaṃ bhāṣatā varṇaṃ kṣapayituṃ kalpakoṭibhiḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1400_1: ya stūpaṃ lokanāthasya naraḥ kuryāt pradakṣiṇam /
SA11sanssr_pu:1401_0: na jātu so 'ndhaḥ khañjo vā kalpānām api koṭibhiḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1401_1: utpādya bodhicittaṃ yaḥ śāstu stūpaṃ hi vandate /
SA11sanssr_pu:1403_0: yo buddhakoṭiniyutaśatasahasrān kalpān koṭī ca tuliya satkarayā /
SA11sanssr_pu:1403_1: yaś ceha kalpe caramaka ghorakāle vandeya stūpaṃ bahutara tasya puṇyam /
SA11sanssr_pu:1404_0: agro hi buddho 'tuliya dakṣiṇīyo 'grāṃ caritvā cariyaviśeṣa prāptaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1404_1: tasyeha pūjāṃ karia narariṣabhasya vipāka śreṣṭho bhavati atulyarūpaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1405_0: itaś cyutvā manuṣyebhyas trāyastriṃśeṣu gacchati / vimānaṃ labhate tatra vicitraṃ ratanām ayam //
SA11sanssr_pu:1406_0: kūṭāgāraṃ svayaṃ datvā apsarogaṇasevitaḥ / mālāṃ stūpe saṃpradāya trāyastriṃśeṣu jāyate //
SA11sanssr_pu:1407_0: aṣṭāṅgajalasaṃpūrṇāṃ suvarṇasikatāstritām / vaiḍūryasphaṭikaiś caiva divyāṃ puṣkariṇīṃ labhet //
SA11sanssr_pu:1408_0: bhuktvā ca tāṃ ratiṃ divyāṃ āyuḥ saṃpūrya paṇḍitaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1408_1: cyutvā ca devalokāt sa manuṣyo bhavati bhogavān /
SA11sanssr_pu:1409_0: jātikoṭisahasraṇi śatāni niyutāni ca / satkṛtaḥ syāc ca sarvatra caitye mālāṃ pradāya ca //
SA11sanssr_pu:1410_0: cakravartī ca rājāsau śakraś ca bhavatīśvaraḥ / brahmā ca brahmalokasmin caitye mālāṃ pradāya ca //
SA11sanssr_pu:1411_0: paṭṭapradāna datvā tu lokanāthasya tāyinaḥ / sarve 'syārthāḥ samṛdhyanti ye divyā ye ca mānuṣāḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:1412_0: tyajed dhīnān akuśalān na sa tatropapadyate /
SA11sanssr_pu:1413_0: priyaḥ sadayitaś cāsau satkṛtaś ca praśaṃsitaḥ / davānām atha nāgānāṃ ye lokesmiṃś ca paṇḍitāḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:1414_0: yatrāsau jāyate vīraḥ puṇyatejaḥsudīpitaḥ / te kulāḥ satkṛtā bhonti rāṣṭrāṇi nagarāṇi ca //
SA11sanssr_pu:1415_0: yaḥ sarṣapāt sūkṣmataraṃ gṛhītvā dhūpeya dhūpaṃ bhagavati caityakeṣu /
SA11sanssr_pu:1415_1: tasyānuśaṃsān śṛṇuta prabhāṣato me prasannacittā jahiya khilāṃ malāṃś ca /
SA11sanssr_pu:1416_0: sa puṇyavāṃś carati diśaḥ samantād ārogyaprāpto dṛḍhamatir apramattaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1416_1: vineti śokaṃ vicarati cārikāyāṃ priyo manāpo bhavati mahājanasya /
SA11sanssr_pu:1417_0: rājyaṃ ca labdhvā jina varu satkarotī mahānubhāvo vidu cakravartī /
SA11sanssr_pu:1417_1: suvarṇavarṇo vicitralakṣaṇaiḥ sa manojñagandhān labhi sarvaloke /
SA11sanssr_pu:1418_2: yaś cīvareṇa caityeṣu kuryāt pūjām atulāṃ nāyakānāṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1418_3: tasyeha bhotī asadṛśu ātmabhāvo dvātriṃśatībhiḥ kavacita lakṣaṇebhiḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1418_4: pāṇītaleṣu suruciru muktahārāḥ prādurbhavantī vividha annantakalpāḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1418_5: siṃhalatāḥ suruciravarṇasūtrā veṭhitva stūpaṃ bhagavata cīvarebhiḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1419_0: datvā patākāṃ bhagavata cetikeṣū chandaṃ janitvā tatha siya buddhaloke /
SA11sanssr_pu:1419_1: sa pūjanīyo bhavati mahājanasya carantu śreṣṭho jinacārikāye /
SA11sanssr_pu:1420_0: suvarṇavarṇo bhavati si ātmabhāvo lābhī sa bhotī suruciracīvarāṇāṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1420_1: karpāsikānāṃ susahita kambalānāṃ dukūlakānāṃ tatha varakauśakānāṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1421_0: dhvajaṃ daditvā hataraji satvasāre dhanaṃ prabhūtaṃ pratilabhi na cireṇa /
SA11sanssr_pu:1421_1: prabhūtakoṣo bhavati annantaprajño paricāru tasya bhavaty adīnacittaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1421_2: na cittaśūlaṃ janayati so parasya prasādacittaḥ sada apramattaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1421_3: na tasya agniḥ kramati viṣannaśastraṃ udvīkṣaṇīyo bhavati mahājanasya /
SA11sanssr_pu:1422_0: adho upādāya ca vibhavāgru yāvat jāmbūnadaṃ tena bhavati buddhakṣetraṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1422_1: śakyaṃ kṣayetuṃ āyuśriya evarūpā na buddhastūpe dharayata eka dīpam /
SA11sanssr_pu:1423_0: na tasya kāyo bhavati avarṇitāṅgo dṛḍhāsu bhotī parighabhujo 'chambhī /
SA11sanssr_pu:1423_1: ālokaprāpto [doubtful] vicarati sarvaloke daditva dīpaṃ bhagavata cetikeṣu /
SA11sanssr_pu:1424_0: yadi buddhakṣetrā niyutaśatā sahasrā bhaveyu pūrṇā śikhagatasarṣapebhiḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1424_1: śakyaṃ gaṇetuṃ tulayitu bhāṣituṃ vā na tathāgateṣū dharayitu ekadīpam /
SA11sanssr_pu:1425_0: alaṅkaritvā suruciradarśanīyaṃ yo deti chatraṃ bhagavata cetikeṣu /
SA11sanssr_pu:1425_1: tasyeha bhoty asadṛśa ātmabhāvo dvātriṃśatībhiḥ kavacita lakṣaṇebhiḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1426_0: yebhir jinasya pratapata ātmabhāvo rūpaṃ viśiṣṭaṃ yathariva [doubtful] kāñcanasya /
SA11sanssr_pu:1427_1: na bhogahānir bhavati kadācid asya devāna bhoti gurukṛta pūjitaś ca /
SA11sanssr_pu:1428_0: na kāmabhogau ramati kadāci dhīro viśuddhaśīlaḥ sakuśalabrahmacaryaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1429_0: na jñānahānir bhavati kadācid asya na bodhicittaṃ vijahati so kathañcit /
SA11sanssr_pu:1429_1: maitrīvihārī bhavati adīnacitto datveha chattraṃ bhagavatacetikeṣu /
SA11sanssr_pu:1430_0: vādyena pūjāṃ naravṛṣabhasya kṛtvā na śoka śalyavaśa jātu bhoti /
SA11sanssr_pu:1430_1: manojñaghoṣo bhavati manuṣyaloke svarāṅgu tasyāvikala viśuddha bhoti /
SA11sanssr_pu:1431_0: viśuddhacakṣur bhavati sa saṃprajanyo viśuddhaśrotro bhavati udagracittaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1431_1: ghraṇendriyaṃ parama uttapta bhoti vāditva vādyaṃ bhagavata cetikeṣu /
SA11sanssr_pu:1432_0: jihvāsya bhoti surucira darśanīyā susūkṣma mṛdvī rucira manojña ghoṣā /
SA11sanssr_pu:1432_1: raktā pravālā yathariva [doubtful] devatānāṃ svarāṅga koṭīvara sṛjate 'prameyāṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1433_0: na jātu bhotī uragu ajihvako vā na khañjakubjo nāpi ca nāmitāṅgaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1433_1: viśiṣṭa bhotī surucira ātmabhāvo vāditva vādyaṃ bhagavata cetikeṣu /
SA11sanssr_pu:1434_0: na jātu kaścij janaye prasādaṃ devo ca nāgo manuja mahorago vā /
SA11sanssr_pu:1434_1: āśvāsaprāpto vicarati sarvaloke vāditva vādyaṃ bhagavata cetikeṣu /
SA11sanssr_pu:1435_0: kalpāna koṭīniyutaśatā sahasraṃ viśiṣṭakāyo bhavati aninditāṅgaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1435_1: prāsādiko 'sau kavacita lakṣaṇebhiḥ saṃśodhya stūpaṃ bhagavata nirvṛtasya /
SA11sanssr_pu:1436_0: vimānaśreṣṭhaṃ labhati manojñagandhaṃ divyaṃ viśiṣṭaṃ suruciracandanasya /
SA11sanssr_pu:1436_1: na jātu tṛṣṇāṃ janayati so kadācit saṃśodhya stūpaṃ bhagavata nirvṛtasya /
SA11sanssr_pu:1437_0: pralopakāle jinavaraśāsanasmin na jātu bhotī upagata jambudvīpe /
SA11sanssr_pu:1437_1: svarge sa bhoti pratiṣṭhita tasmi kāle gandhānulepaṃ dadiya jinasya stūpe /
SA11sanssr_pu:1438_0: durgandhikāmān aśucijugupsanīyān varjeti nityaṃ pratiṣṭhita śīlaskandhe /
SA11sanssr_pu:1438_1: carī sa nityam imu vara brahmacaryaṃ gandhānulepaṃ kariya jinasya stūpe /
SA11sanssr_pu:1439_0: itaś cyuto 'sau marupati svargaloke arthaṃ sahasrā tulayati no cireṇa /
SA11sanssr_pu:1439_1: karoti cārthaṃ suvipuladevatānāṃ gandhānulepaṃ kariya jinasya stūpe /
SA11sanssr_pu:1440_0: viśiṣṭavākyo bhavati manojñaghoṣaḥ priyo manāpo bahujanasatkṛtaś ca /
SA11sanssr_pu:1440_1: sukhaṃ ca tasya bhavati sadā prasannaṃ gandhānulepaṃ kariya jinasya stūpe /
SA11sanssr_pu:1441_0: apāyabhūmiṃ ... vijahāty aśeṣāṃ āsannako bhavati tathāgatānāṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1441_1: prasādalabdhaḥ sada sukhi premaṇīyo gandhānulepaṃ kariya jinasya stūpe /
SA11sanssr_pu:1442_0: so 'kṣaṇaṃ vai vijahāti sarvaṃ aṣṭa kṣaṇāś cāsya viśiṣṭa bhonti /
SA11sanssr_pu:1442_1: buddhāna pūjām atuliya so karoti choritva jālaṃ bhagavata cetikeṣu /
SA11sanssr_pu:1443_0: śūraś ca bhoti dṛḍhamatir apramatto na kāmabhoge 'bhiratiṃ janeti /
SA11sanssr_pu:1443_1: naiṣkramyaprāptau ca adīnacittaḥ choritva jālaṃ bhagavata cetikeṣu /
SA11sanssr_pu:1444_0: na bodhicittaṃ pramuṣyati tasya jātu akhaṇḍaśīlo 'sti susaṃvṛtaś ca /
SA11sanssr_pu:1444_1: dharmaṃ virāgaṃ labhate viśuddhaṃ upanīya jālaṃ bhagavata cetikeṣu /
SA11sanssr_pu:1445_0: durvācatāṃ vijahati sarvakālaṃ prajñābhāvaṃ ca jahāty aśeṣam /
SA11sanssr_pu:1445_1: viśālaprajño viharati cārikāyāṃ upanīya jālaṃ bhagavata cetikeṣu /
SA11sanssr_pu:1446_0: lābhī ca bhotī śucibhojanānāṃ vastrān viśiṣṭān labhate suvarṇān /
SA11sanssr_pu:1448_1: na tasya rājāpi praduṣṭacittaḥ yo jīrṇapuṣpān apaneya caitye /
SA11sanssr_pu:1449_0: kumārga sarvaṃ pithita apāyabhūmiḥ sa śīlaskandhe sthita bodhisatvaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1449_1: avatārayitvā jinacetikebhyaḥ puṣpaṃ ca prāg anyanaraiḥ pradattaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1450_0: śokāṃś ca doṣān vijahāty amatto rogān aśeṣān vijahāty annekān /
SA11sanssr_pu:1450_1: āśvāsaprāptaś ca annantakalpān yo jīrṇapuṣpān apaneti caitye /
SA11sanssr_pu:1451_1: alaṃkṛto bhavati viśuddhakāyaḥ yo jīrṇapuṣpān apaneti caitye /
SA11sanssr_pu:1452_0: dadyāc ca yaḥ suruciradivya puṣpaṃ māndāravān apy atha pāṭalaṃ vā /
SA11sanssr_pu:1452_1: nirmālyakaṃ yo 'panayeta caitye vipāka śreṣṭho 'sya bhaved atulyaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1453_0: yaḥ prāñjaliḥ praṇamati nāthastūpaṃ chandaṃ janitvā ca sabuddhaloke /
SA11sanssr_pu:1453_1: so bhoti loke gurukṛtu satkṛtaś ca prāsādiko bhavati sudarśanīyaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1454_0: tasyeha rājyaṃ nipatati sarvaloko devāsurā nāgamanuṣyakāś ca /
SA11sanssr_pu:1454_1: sarvāḥ sahasrāḥ kusumita lokadhātuḥ praśāsti rājño vaśa īśvarāṃś ca /
SA11sanssr_pu:1455_0: ye tasya rājye sthita bhonti satvāḥ sthāpeya sarvān akaluṣabuddhajñāne /
SA11sanssr_pu:1455_1: apāyabhūmyas tyaktā bhavanti karoti caiṣāṃ paramasuśreṣṭham artham /
SA11sanssr_pu:1456_0: paricāro 'sya bhavati manojñaghoṣaḥ puṇyair upetaḥ smṛtimatipūjanīyaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1456_1: āśvāsaprāpto vicarati jīvaloke sadābhiprāyaṃ janayati śreṣṭhaprītiṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1457_0: paricāra bhoty asya svarāṅga śuddhaḥ jñāyeta satvair madhurapraśāntavākyo /
SA11sanssr_pu:1457_1: na tasya kaścij janayati ceśvaratvaṃ vilokanīyo bhavati mahājanasya /
SA11sanssr_pu:1457_3: ākruṣṭaḥ san nājanayeta roṣaṃ yaḥ prāñjaliḥ praṇamati buddhastūpaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1458_0: devendra bhoty upagatasvargaloke manuṣyako bhavati narasya rājā /
SA11sanssr_pu:1458_1: na pārihāṇir bhavati kadācid asya yo 'ñjalībhir namatīha stūpaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1459_0: nāsāv apāye prapateta jātu hīnāṃś ca varjeta sa kāma loke /
SA11sanssr_pu:1459_1: āḍhyo dhanī bhoti prabhūtakoṣo yo 'ñjalībhir namati buddhastūpam /
SA11sanssr_pu:1460_0: sūtrāntacaryā na kadācid asya nāsthānakopaṃ kurute nṛloke /
SA11sanssr_pu:1460_1: satvāś ca tṛptā muditāsya bhonti yaḥ saṃpramuñcī guṇavati ekavācaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1461_1: sa puṇyavān bhavati manuṣyaloke rākṣe ca sthitvā jina satkaroti /
SA11sanssr_pu:1462_0: śokā na doṣāḥ khilamala nāsya bhonti atulyatāptaś ca susaṃsthitāṅgaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1462_1: ālokanīyaś ca mahājanasya vrajeta kāmāna bhayakaravairaghorān /
SA11sanssr_pu:1463_1: tiṣṭhatu tāvad ānanda yo māṃ saṃmukhaṃ satkuryāt /
SA11sanssr_pu:1463_2: tiṣṭhatu me śarīrasya pūjā sarṣapaphalamatreṣu dhātuṣu /
SA11sanssr_pu:1463_3: tiṣṭhatu mām uddiśya kṛteṣu stūpeṣu satkāraḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1463_4: ye kecid ānanda buddham ālambyāntaśa ekapuṣpam apy ākāśe kṣepsyanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:1463_5: tasya puṇyaskandhasya yo vipākaḥ saced yāvān annādiḥ saṃsāro yasya pūrvā koṭir na prajñāyate /
SA11sanssr_pu:1463_6: tāvataḥ kalpān saṃsaratāṃ teṣāṃ śakratvaṃ brahmatvaṃ cakravartitvaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1463_9: saced antaśaḥ svapnāntaragatā api satvā buddham ālambyākāśe ekapuṣpam api kṣepsyanti tad apy ahaṃ kuśalamūlaṃ nirvāṇaparyavasānaṃ vadāmīti /
SA11sanssr_pu:1464_1: aṣṭābhir bhujagādhipate dharmaiḥ samanvāgatā bodhisatvāḥ satatasamitaṃ buddhasamavadhānaṃ pratilabhante /
SA11sanssr_pu:1464_6: yatra ca buddhakṣetre tathāgataśravaṃ śṛṇvanti tatra praṇidhānam utpādayanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:1467_0: sudṛṣṭo lokapradyotaḥ sarvadharmagatiṃ gataḥ / puṇyatīrthaṃ trailokasya sarvasatvaviśodhanam //
SA11sanssr_pu:1468_0: mahat puṇyam ayaṃ kṣetraṃ muditaṃ jñānamaṇḍalaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1469_0: chedano duṣkhajālasya jñānaskandhaviśodhanaḥ / na durgatibhayaṃ teṣāṃ yair ihārāgito jinaḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:1470_0: vipulaṃ jāyate cittaṃ paśyatāṃ dvipadottamaṃ / prajñābalam asaṃkhyeyaṃ jāyate ca prabhāsvaraṃ //
SA11sanssr_pu:1471_0: punar atraivāha / arthāya sarvasatvānām utpadyante tathāgatāḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1472_0: pratikartuṃ kathaṃ śakyaṃ buddhānāṃ sarvedehibhiḥ / satvārtheṣv abhiyuktānāṃ kalpakoṭiśatair api //
SA11sanssr_pu:1473_0: kalpakoṭiṃ varaṃ paktuṃ tryapāye bhṛśadāruṇe / na tv evādarśanaṃ śāstuḥ sarvasarganivartinaḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:1474_0: yāvantaḥ sarvalokasminn apāyagatayaḥ pṛthak / varaṃ tatra ciraṃ vāso buddhānām aśrutir na ca //
SA11sanssr_pu:1475_0: kiṃ kāraṇam apāyeṣu nivāsaś ciram iṣyate / yatkāraṇaṃ jinendrasya darśanaṃ jñānavardhanam //
SA11sanssr_pu:1476_0: chidyante sarvaduṣkhāṇi dṛṣṭvā lokeśvaraṃ jinaṃ / saṃbhavaty avatāraś ca jñāne saṃbuddhagocare //
SA11sanssr_pu:1477_0: kṣapayaty āvṛtīḥ sarvā dṛṣṭvā buddhaṃ narottamam /
SA11sanssr_pu:1477_1: vardhayaty amitaṃ puṇyaṃ yena bodhir avāpyatae /
SA11sanssr_pu:1478_0: tad evam asti puṇyavṛddhau buddhasamavadhānena prayojanaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1478_1: api ca pratimāmātradarśanam api tāvad aparimitaphalaṃ tathāgatānāṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1479_1: yaḥ kaścin mañjuśrīḥ kulaputraḥ kuladuhitā vā sarvalokadhāturajopamānāṃ pratyekabuddhānāṃ dine dine śatarasam āhāraṃ dadyāt divyāni ca vastrāṇi /
SA11sanssr_pu:1479_3: yaś cānyo mañjuśrīḥ kulaputraḥ kuladuhitā vā citrakarmalikhitaṃ vā pustakakarmakṛtaṃ vā buddhaṃ paśyed /
SA11sanssr_pu:1479_5: kaḥ punar vādo yo 'ñjalipragrahaṃ vā kuryāt puṣpaṃ vā dadyāt dhūpaṃ vā gandhaṃ vā dīpaṃ vā dadyād /
SA11sanssr_pu:1480_1: yas tathāgatacaityaṃ śodhayati sa catasro 'grāḥ praṇidhānaviśuddhīr anuprāpnoti /
SA11sanssr_pu:1481_0: punar atraivākhyātaṃ / tathāgatacaityeṣu puṣpāvaropaṇaṃ gandhānulepanaṃ kṛtvāṣṭāv avikalatā anuprāpnoti /
SA11sanssr_pu:1481_1: katamā aṣṭau / na rūpavikalo bhavati / na bhogavikalaḥ / na parivāravikalaḥ / na śīlavikalaḥ / na samādhivikalaḥ / na śrutavikalo na prajñāvikalo na praṇidhānavikala iti /
SA11sanssr_pu:1482_0: uktaṃ cāryaratnarāśisūtre / ye tribhavaparyāpannāḥ satvās te sarve pratyekaṃ tathāgatastūpān kārayeyur evaṃrūpān uccaistvena /
SA11sanssr_pu:1482_2: tāṃś ca gaṅgānadīvālikāsamān kalpān pratyekaṃ sarvasatkāraiḥ satkuryuḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1482_4: ayaṃ tasmāt pūrvakāt puṇyaskandhād bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet /
SA11sanssr_pu:1483_0: atraivoktaṃ / ye khalu punas trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau satvās te sarve mahāyānasaṃprasthitā bhaveyuḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1483_1: sarve ca cakravartirājyasamanvāgatā bhaveyur ekaikaś ca rājā cakravartī mahāsamudrapramāṇadīpasthālīṃ kṛtvā /
SA11sanssr_pu:1483_2: sumerumātrāṃ vartīm ādīpya pratyekam evaṃrūpāṃ dīpapūjāṃ tathāgatacaityeṣu pravartayet /
SA11sanssr_pu:1483_3: yaś cābhiniṣkrāntagṛhāvāso bodhisatvas tailaprakṣiptāṃ vartīṃ kṛtvādīpya tathāgatacaitye dhārayet /
SA11sanssr_pu:1483_4: asyās tailaprakṣiptāyā varter etat pūrvakaṃ pradīpadānaṃ śatatamīm api kalāṃ nopaiti /
SA11sanssr_pu:1483_5: yāvad upaniṣadam api na kṣamatae iti /
SA11sanssr_pu:1484_0_0: ye ca khalu punas te rājānaś cakravartino buddhapramukhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghaṃ sarvasukhopadhānaiḥ satkuryuḥ yaś cābhiniṣkrāntagṛhāvāso
SA11sanssr_pu:1484_0_1: bodhisatvaḥ piṇḍapātraṃ caritvā pātraparyāpannaṃ pareṣāṃ saṃvibhajya paribhuñjīta /
SA11sanssr_pu:1484_1: idaṃ tato bahutaraṃ ca mahārghataraṃ ca /
SA11sanssr_pu:1484_2: yac ca te rājānaś cakravartinaḥ sumerumātraṃ cīvararāśiṃ buddhapramukhāya bhikṣusaṃghāya dadyuḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1484_3: yac cābhiniṣkrāntagṛhāvāso bodhisatvas tricīvaraṃ bahirdhā mahāyānasaṃprasthitāya buddhapramukhāya bhikṣusaṃghāya vā tathāgatacaitye vā dadyād /
SA11sanssr_pu:1484_4: idaṃ bhikṣoś cīvaradānam etat pūrvakacīvararāśim abhibhavati /
SA11sanssr_pu:1484_5: yac ca te rājānaḥ pratyekaṃ sarvaṃ jambūdvīpaṃ puṣpasaṃstṛtaṃ kṛtvā tathāgatacaitye niryātayet /
SA11sanssr_pu:1484_6: yac cābhiniṣkrāntagṛhāvāso bodhisatvaḥ antaśa ekapuṣpam api tathāgatacaitye āropayet /
SA11sanssr_pu:1484_7: asya dānasyaitat pūrvakaṃ dānaṃ śatatamīm api kalāṃ nopaiti /
SA11sanssr_pu:1485_1: catura imān bhadrānuśaṃsān paśyan bodhisatvas tathāgatapūjāyām utsuko bhavati /
SA11sanssr_pu:1485_2: katamāṃś caturaḥ / agraś ca me dakṣiṇīyaḥ pūjito bhaviṣyati māṃ ca dṛṣṭvānye 'pi tathā śikṣiṣyanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:1485_3: tathāgataṃ ca pūjayitvā bodhicittaṃ dṛḍhaṃ bhaviṣyati /
SA11sanssr_pu:1485_4: dvātriṃśatāṃ ca mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇānāṃ saṃmukhadarśanena kuśalamūlam upacitaṃ bhaviṣyati /
SA11sanssr_pu:1486_3: katamāni trīṇi / yac ca bodhicittam utpādayati /
SA11sanssr_pu:1487_1: daśabhiḥ kulaputra dharmaiḥ samanvāgatā bodhisatvā annanuliptā garbhamalena jāyante /
SA11sanssr_pu:1487_2: katamair daśabhiḥ / yad uta / tathāgatapratimākaraṇatayā / jīrṇacaityasaṃskaraṇatayā / tathāgatacaityeṣu gandhavilepanānupradānena /
SA11sanssr_pu:1487_7: tac ca nirāmiṣeṇa cittena na sāmiṣeṇa /
SA11sanssr_pu:1487_9: anena kuśalamūlena sarvasatvā nirupaliptā garbhamalena jāyantām iti /
SA11sanssr_pu:1488_1: yaḥ prathamayānasaṃprasthitānāṃ bodhisatvānāṃ mahāsatvānāṃ tāṃś cittotpādān anumodate /
SA11sanssr_pu:1488_2: caratām api bodhisatvacaryāṃ tāṃś cittotpādān anumodate /
SA11sanssr_pu:1488_3: avinivartanīyām api avinivartanīyadharmatām anumodate bodhisatvānāṃ mahāsatvānāṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1488_4: kiyantaṃ sa bhagavan kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaskandhaṃ prasavati /
SA11sanssr_pu:1489_0: evam ukte bhagavān śakraṃ devānām indram etad avocat /
SA11sanssr_pu:1489_1: pe / syāt khalu punaḥ kauśika trisāhasramahāsāhasrasya lokadhātoḥ palāgreṇa tulyamānasasya pramāṇam udgrahītuṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1489_2: na tv eva kauśika bodhisatvasya mahāsatvasya teṣām anumodanāsahagatānāṃ cittotpādānāṃ puṇyapramāṇaṃ grahītuṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1490_0: evam ukte śakro devānām indro bhagavantam etad avocat /
SA11sanssr_pu:1490_2: ye bodhisatvānāṃ mahāsatvānāṃ prathamacittotpādam upādāya yāvad annuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhānām evam aprameyam anumodanāsahagataṃ puṇyam iti na śṛṇvanti na jānanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:1491_0: bhagavān āha / pe / yaiḥ kauśika kulaputraiḥ kuladuhitṛbhiś ceme cittotpādā anumoditā bodhisatvayānikair vā pratyekabuddhayānikair vā śrāvakayānikair vā /
SA11sanssr_pu:1491_1: te kṣipraṃ tathāgatān arhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhān ārāgayiṣyanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:1493_0_0: evaṃ tair anumodanāsahagataiś cittotpādakuśalamūlair yatra yatropapatsyante tatra tatra satkṛtāś ca bhaviṣyanti gurukṛtāś
SA11sanssr_pu:1493_0_1: ca mānitāś ca pūjitāś ca arcitāś ca apacāyitāś ca bhaviṣyanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:1493_3: evaṃ na gandhān na rasān na spraṣṭavyān sprakṣyanti na ca teṣām apāyeṣūpapattiḥ pratikāṅkṣitavyā svargopapattis teṣāṃ pratikāṅkṣitavyā /
SA11sanssr_pu:1493_4_0: tat kasya hetoḥ / tathā hi taiḥ satvaiḥ sarvasatvasukhāvahanāni asaṃkhyeyānāṃ satvānāṃ kuśalamūlāny anumoditāni yāvad annuttarāṃ
SA11sanssr_pu:1494_0_0: punar atraivāha / ye subhūte gaṅgānadīvālikopameṣu trisāhasramahāsāhasreṣu lokadhātuṣu sarvasatvās te sarve 'nnuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ
SA11sanssr_pu:1494_0_1: pratitiṣṭheyur annuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ pratiṣṭhāya gaṅgānadīvālikāsamān kalpān upalambhasaṃjñinaś catvāri dhyānāni samāpadyeran /
SA11sanssr_pu:1494_1: yaś ca bodhisatvo mahāsatvo 'nayā prajñāpāramitayā upāyakauśalyena ca parigṛhītātītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ śīlasamādhiprajñāvimuktivimuktijñānadarśanaskandhaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1494_2_0: śrāvakānāṃ pratyekabuddhānām api śīlasamādhiprajñāvimuktivimuktijñānadarśanaskandhaṃ sarvam ekato 'bhisaṃkṣipya piṇḍayitvā
SA11sanssr_pu:1494_2_1: tulayitvā niravaśeṣam anumodetāgrayānumodanayā jyeṣṭhayā śreṣṭhayā varayā pravarayā praṇītayā uttarayā niruttarayā uttarottarayā
SA11sanssr_pu:1494_3_0: asya subhūte 'numodanāsahagatasya puṇyakriyāvastuno 'sau pūrvaka aupalambhikānāṃ bodhisatvānāṃ caturdhyānamayaḥ puṇyābhisaṃskāraḥ
SA11sanssr_pu:1494_3_1: śatatamīm api kalāṃ nopaiti yāvad upaniṣadam api na kṣamatae iti /
SA11sanssr_pu:1495_1: athavāgrapariṇāmanayā pariṇāmitatvāt sarvapuṇyānām asya buddhatvāya satkṛtapraṇidhibuddhatvam eva syāt /
SA11sanssr_pu:1495_2: ataḥ kā parā puṇyavṛddhiḥ / tad dhy aśeṣasatvamokṣakṛtapuṇyajñānopetaṃ nirvikalpaṃ ca /
SA11sanssr_pu:1496_0: adhyeṣaṇāyās tv anuśaṃsā āryograparipṛcchāyām uktā dharmagrāhyatām upādāyāprameyāsaṃkhyeyeṣu buddhakṣetreṣv āyuḥ parirakṣaṇāyeti /
SA11sanssr_pu:1500_1: asyāś cāyam aparo hetuḥ / yo 'yaṃ śraddhādīnāṃ sadābhyāsaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1501_1: catvāra ime mahārāja dharmā mahāyānasaṃprasthitānāṃ viśeṣagāmitāyai saṃvartante 'parihāṇāya ca /
SA11sanssr_pu:1501_2: katame catvāraḥ / śraddhā mahārāja viśeṣagāmitāyai saṃvartate 'parihāṇāya /
SA11sanssr_pu:1501_3: tatra katamā śraddhā / yayā śraddhayā āryān upasaṃkrāmati /
SA11sanssr_pu:1502_1: yena gauraveṇa subhāṣitaṃ śṛṇoti śuśrūṣate 'virahitaśrotraś ca dharmaṃ śṛṇoti /
SA11sanssr_pu:1503_1: yayā nirmānatayā āryāṇām abhinamati praṇamati namasyati /
SA11sanssr_pu:1504_1: yena vīryeṇa kāyalaghutāṃ cittalaghutāṃ ca pratilabhate sarvakāryāṇi cottārayati /
SA11sanssr_pu:1506_0: eṣāṃ śraddhādīnāṃ sadābhyāsaḥ kāryaḥ / athavānyeṣāṃ śraddhādīnāṃ //
SA11sanssr_pu:1507_1: katamāni pañca / śraddhendriyaṃ vīryendriyaṃ smṛtīndriyaṃ samādhīndriyaṃ prajñendriyam iti /
SA11sanssr_pu:1508_0: tatra katamā śraddhā / yathā śraddhāyāś caturo dharmān abhiśraddadhāti /
SA11sanssr_pu:1508_1: katamāṃś caturaḥ / saṃsārāvacarīṃ laukikīṃ samyagdṛṣṭiṃ śraddadhāti /
SA11sanssr_pu:1508_3: yad yat karma kariṣyāmi tasya tasya karmaṇaḥ phalavipākaṃ pratyanubhaviṣyāmīti /
SA11sanssr_pu:1508_4: sa jīvitahetor api pāpaṃ karma na karoti /
SA11sanssr_pu:1508_8: sarvadṛṣṭikṛtāni ca nānuśete sarvabuddhadharmān balavaiśāradyaprabhṛtīṃś ca śraddadhāti /
SA11sanssr_pu:1508_9: śraddhāya ca vigatakathaṃkathas tān buddhadharmān samudānayati /
SA11sanssr_pu:1509_0: tatra katamad vīryendriyaṃ / yān dharmān śraddhendriyeṇa śraddadhāti tān dharmān vīryendriyeṇa samudānayatīdam ucyate vīryendriyaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1510_0: tatra katamat smṛtīndriyaṃ / yān dharmān vīryendriyeṇa samudānayati tān dharmān smṛtīndriyeṇa na vipraṇāśayati /
SA11sanssr_pu:1511_1: yān dharmān smṛtīndriyeṇa na vipraṇāśayati tān samādhīndriyeṇaikāgrīkarotīdam ucyate samādhīndriyaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1512_0: tatra katamat prajñendriyam /yān dharmān samādhīndriyeṇaikāgrīkaroti tān prajñendriyeṇa pratyavekṣate pratividhyati /
SA11sanssr_pu:1512_1: yad eteṣu dharmeṣu pratyātmajñānam aparapratyayajñānam idam ucyate prajñendriyaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1513_0: evam imāni pañcendriyāṇi sahitāny anuprabaddhāni sarvabuddhadharmān paripūrayanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:1514_3: yad ebhir evendriyair upastabdho 'nnavamardyo bhavati sarvamāraiḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1514_8: tṛpto bhavati cittena / balavān bhavati kāyena / gupto bhavatīndriyaiḥ / duḥparājayo bhavati tīrthikaraiḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1517_0: yathāha candrapradīpasūtre / yāvanti pūjā bahuvidha aprameyā yā kṣetrakoṭīn ayutabimbareṣu /
SA11sanssr_pu:1517_1: tāṃ pūjakṛtvā puruṣavareṣu nityaṃ saṃkhyākalāpo na bhavati maitracitta /
SA11sanssr_pu:1519_2: vandāmi te asamajñānaparā sadṛśo na te 'sti tribhave virajā /
SA11sanssr_pu:1520_0: mṛdu cāru snigdha śubha keśa nakhā girirājatulya tava coṣṇir iha /
SA11sanssr_pu:1520_1: noṣnīṣam īkṣitu tavāsti samo vibhrājate bhruvi tavorṇa mune /
SA11sanssr_pu:1521_1: kṛpayekṣase jagad idaṃ hi yayā vandāmi te vimalanetra jina /
SA11sanssr_pu:1522_0: jihvā prabhūta tanu tāmranibhā vadanaṃ ca chādayasi yena svakaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1522_1: dharmaṃ vadan vinayase ca jagat vandāmi te madhurasnigdhagirā /
SA11sanssr_pu:1523_0: daśanāḥ śubhāḥ sudṛḍha vajranibhāḥ triṃśaddaśāpy aviralāḥ sahitāḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1523_1: kurvan smitaṃ vinayase ca jagat vandāmi te madhurasatyakathā /
SA11sanssr_pu:1524_0: rūpeṇa cāpratisamo 'si jinaḥ prabhayā ca bhāsayasi kṣetraśatān /
SA11sanssr_pu:1524_1: brahmendrapālajagato bhagavan jihmībhavanti tava te prabhayā /
SA11sanssr_pu:1525_1: īkṣan vrajasy api yugaṃ bhagavan saṃkampayan dharaṇiśailataṭān /
SA11sanssr_pu:1526_0: kāyaś ca lakṣaṇacito bhagavan sūkṣma chavī kanakavarṇanibhā /
SA11sanssr_pu:1526_1: nekṣañ jagad vrajati tṛptim idaṃ rūpaṃ tavāpratimarūpadhara /
SA11sanssr_pu:1528_0: tvaṃ dānaśīlanirataḥ satataṃ tvaṃ kṣāntivīryanirataḥ sudṛḍhaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1529_0: tvaṃ vādisūra kugaṇapramathī tvaṃ siṃhavan nadasi parṣadi ca /
SA11sanssr_pu:1529_1: tvaṃ vaidyarāja trimalāntakaro vandāmi te paramaprītikara /
SA11sanssr_pu:1531_0: māyopamaṃ jagad imaṃ bhavatā naṭaraṅgasvapnasadṛśaṃ viditaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1531_1: nātmā na satva na ca jīvagatī dharmā marīcidakacandrasamāḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1532_0: śūnyāś ca śānta annutpādanayaṃ avijānad eva jagad udbhramati /
SA11sanssr_pu:1533_0: rāgādibhiś ca bahurāgaśataiḥ saṃbhrāmitaṃ satata vīkṣya jagat /
SA11sanssr_pu:1534_1: satatāturaṃ jagad avekṣya mune parimocayan vicarase kṛpayā /
SA11sanssr_pu:1535_0: rathacakravad bhramati sarvajagat tiryakṣu pretaniraye sugatau /
SA11sanssr_pu:1535_1: mūḍhā adeśika anāthagatāḥ tasya pradarśayasi mārgavaraṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1536_0: ye te babhūvu purimāś ca jināḥ dharmeśvarā jagati cārthakarāḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1536_1: ayam eva taiḥ prakathitāryapatho yad deśayasy api vibho 'pratimaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1537_0: snigdhaṃ hy akarkaśa manojña varaṃ brahmādhikaṃ paramaprītikaraṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1538_1: śrutvā hi yāṃ niyutasatvaśatāḥ yānatrayeṇa janayanti śamam /
SA11sanssr_pu:1539_0: tava pūjayā sukham annekavidham divyaṃ labhanti manujeṣu tathā /
SA11sanssr_pu:1539_1: āḍhyo mahādhana mahāvibhavo bhavate jagaddhitakaro nṛpatiḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1540_0: balacakravarty api ca dvīpapatiḥ jagad āvṛṇoti daśabhiḥ kuśalaiḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1540_1: ratnāni sapta labhate suśubhā tvayi saṃprasādajanako 'pratimaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1541_0: brahmāpi śakra api lokapatiḥ bhavate ca saṃtuṣiṭa devapatiḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1541_1: paranirmito 'pi ca sa yāmapatiḥ tvatpūjayā bhavati cāpi jinaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1542_0: evaṃ hy amogha tava pūjā kṛtā saṃdarśanaṃ śravaṇam apy asamaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1542_1: bhavate jagad vividhaduḥkhaharaṃ spṛśate padaṃ ca paramaṃ virajaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1543_0: mārgajña mārgakuśalā bhagavan kupathān nivārayasi lokam imaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1543_1: kṣeme śive viraji āryapathe pratiṣṭhāpayasi jagad bhagavan /
SA11sanssr_pu:1544_0: puṇyārthikasya tava puṇyanidhe satatākṣayā bhavati puṇyakriyā /
SA11sanssr_pu:1544_1: bahukalpakoṭiṣu na yāti kṣayaṃ yāvad dhi na spṛśati bodhi varāṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1545_0: pariśuddhakṣetra labhate ruciraṃ parinirmitābha sada prītikaraṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1545_1: śuddhāś ca kāyavacasā manasā satvā bhavanty api ca kṣetravare /
SA11sanssr_pu:1546_0: ity evam ādiguṇa naikavidhān labhate jinārcanakṛtān manujaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1546_1: svargāpavarga manujeṣu sukhaṃ labhate ca puṇyanidhi sarvajage /
SA11sanssr_pu:1547_0: kīrtiyaśaś ca prasṛtaṃ vipulaṃ tava sarvadikṣu bahukṣetraśatān /
SA11sanssr_pu:1547_1: saṃkīrtayanti sugatāḥ satataṃ tava varṇamāla pariṣatsu jināḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1548_1: śāntendriyā śamaratā bhagavan vandāmi te naravarapravara /
SA11sanssr_pu:1549_0: labdhā abhijña jina pañca mayā gagane sthitena te niśamya giram /
SA11sanssr_pu:1549_1: bhavitāsmi vīra sugatapratimo vibhajiṣya dharmam amalaṃ jagataḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1550_1: puṇyaṃ yad arjitam idaṃ vipulaṃ jagad āpnuyād api ca buddhapadam /
SA11sanssr_pu:1551_1_0: punar aparaṃ buddhā bhagavanto mahāpuṇyajñānasaṃbhārā mahāmaitrīmahākaruṇāgocarā mahāsatvarāśeḥ trāṇabhūtā mahābhaiṣajyaśalyahartāraḥ
SA11sanssr_pu:1551_1_1: sarvasatvasamacittānityasamādhigocarāḥ saṃsāranirvāṇavimuktā yāvat satvānāṃ mātāpitṛkalpāḥ samānamaitracittāḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1552_0_0: sarvalokānabhibhūtāḥ sarvalokasyālokabhūtā mahāyogayogino mahātmāno mahājanaparivārā viśiṣṭajanaparivārā anivāritadarśanaśravaṇaparyupāsanāḥ
SA11sanssr_pu:1552_0_1: svasukhanirapekṣāḥ paraduṣkhapraśamanapriyā dharmapriyā dharmadharā dharmāhārā dharmabhiṣajo dharmeśvarā dharmasvāmino dharmadānapatayo
SA11sanssr_pu:1552_0_2: nityatyāgābhiratā nityāpramattā nityavivekābhiratāḥ sarvatra tīrthasetubhūtā mahārājamārgaprakhyā yāvad asecanakadarśanā

SA11sanssr_pu:1762_1: punar aparaṃ śāriputra vyāḍakāntāramadhyagatena bodhisatvena mahāsatvena nottrasitavyaṃ na saṃtrasitavyam na saṃtrāsam āpattavyam /

SA11sanssr_pu:1762_4: sacen māṃ vyāḍā bhakṣayeyus tebhya eva tad dānaṃ dattaṃ bhavatu /
SA11sanssr_pu:1762_6_0: abhyāsannā ca bhaviṣyati / tathā ca kariṣyāmi yathā me 'nnuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisambuddhasya satas tatra buddhakṣetre
SA11sanssr_pu:1762_6_1: tiryagyonigatāḥ satvāḥ sarveṇa sarvaṃ na bhaviṣyanti na prajñāsyante /
SA11sanssr_pu:1763_0: corakāntāramadhyagatena śāriputra bodhisatvena mahāsatvena nottrasitavyaṃ na saṃtrasitavyaṃ na saṃtrāsam āpattavyaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1763_1: tat kasmād dhetoḥ / sarvasvaparityāgakuśalā hi te bodhisatvā mahāsatvā utsṛṣṭakāyenāpi ca bodhisatvena bhavitavyaṃ parityaktapariṣkāropakaraṇena ca /
SA11sanssr_pu:1763_3: te cen me satvāḥ pariṣkāropakaraṇāni haranti tebhya evaitad dānaṃ dattaṃ bhavatu /
SA11sanssr_pu:1763_4: sacen māṃ kecij jīvitād vyaparopayeyuḥ tatra mayā na dveṣo na krodha utpādayitavyaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1763_5: teṣām api mayā na kāyena na vacasā na manasāparāddhavyaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1763_6: evaṃ ca me tasmin samaye dānapāramitā ca śīlapāramitā ca kṣāntipāramitā ca paripūriṃ gamiṣyati /
SA11sanssr_pu:1763_7: annuttarā ca me samyaksaṃbodhir abhyāsannā bhaviṣyati /
SA11sanssr_pu:1763_8: tathā ca kariṣyāmi tathā pratipatsye yathā me 'nnuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhasya satas tatra buddhakṣetre /
SA11sanssr_pu:1763_9: ete cānye ca doṣāḥ sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvaṃ na bhaviṣyanti na prajñāsyante /
SA11sanssr_pu:1764_0: pānīyakāntāramadhyagatena śāriputra bodhisatvena mahāsatvena nottrasitavyaṃ na saṃtrasitavyaṃ na saṃtrāsam āpattavyaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1764_1: tat kasmād dhetoḥ / asaṃtrastadharmāṇo hi bodhisatvā mahāsatvā bhavanti /

SA11sanssr_pu:1837_1: pratikṣaṇaṃ hi yāty eva kāyaś cittaṃ ca me yataḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1838_0: yadi nityāpy anityena nirmalā malavāhinā / bodhiḥ kāyena labhyeta nanu labdhā mayaiva sā //
SA11sanssr_pu:1839_0: evam ātmānam utsṛjya sarvasatvārtham ācaret / bhaiṣajyapratimākalpo lokadharmeṣv acintakaḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:1840_0: sarvasatvārthamantritve svaprajñāṃ viniyojayet / yuktyā saṃrakṣya tu dravyaṃ satveṣu vopayojayet //
SA11sanssr_pu:1841_0: svakāye parakāye vā yad duṣkhaṃ neha duṣkhakṛt /
SA11sanssr_pu:1842_0: puṇyakṣetram idaṃ śuddhaṃ saṃpatsasyamahāphalaṃ / sukhadurbhikṣasaṃtaptaṃ jagat saṃtarpayiṣyati //
SA11sanssr_pu:1843_1: kopaḥ kasyārtham adyāpi mṛṣā vā tan mayoditam /
SA11sanssr_pu:1844_0: svārthaghneṣu yadi dveṣaḥ kṛpā kutra bhaviṣyati / nirdayasyāpi kaḥ kopaḥ parārtho yadi naśyati //
SA11sanssr_pu:1845_0: ākrośādikṣamāḥ satyam ikṣukas tūrikādayaḥ / svāmyasanena durnyastā nopabhogyā bhavanti te //
SA11sanssr_pu:1846_0: cintayati pratīkāraṃ na ca svāmihitecchayā / nāpi saṃcodayaty enaṃ bhogārthaṃ nopayāti ca //
SA11sanssr_pu:1849_0: dhātavaḥ pañca bhūvāritejo 'nilakhasaṃjñitāḥ / yāvat satvāḥ sthitās tāvat sarveṣām arthakāriṇaḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:1850_0: sarvaduścaritenaiṣāṃ satvārthād vinivartanaṃ / evam etān karomy eṣa dhātūn ṣaḍ api nirvyathān //
SA11sanssr_pu:1851_0: yāvad ākāśaniṣṭasya niṣṭhā lokasya saṃbhavet / tāvat sthāsyāmi lokārthaṃ kurvan jñānapuraḥsaraḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:1852_0: ātmācāryo 'nuśiyaṣyād dhi sadātmānaṃ suśiṣyavat / apṛṣṭvā cātmanātmānaṃ balenārakṣitakriyaḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:1853_0: ka eva mama duṣkhena duṣkhī syān me bhayād bhayī / taddoṣānuśayajño vā yathātmagurur ātmanaḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:1854_0: avirāgy apalāyī ca karuṇāviṣayo 'pi vā / nityasaṃnihitaś cāpi śiṣya ātmasamaḥ kutaḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:1855_0: kleśonmatto 'tha mohāndhaḥ prapātabahule pathi / skhalan pade pade śocyaḥ para ātmā ca sarvadā //
SA11sanssr_pu:1856_1: na yuktaṃ yujyate tv atra guṇān dṛṣṭvādbhutaṃ mahat /
SA11sanssr_pu:1857_0: naikena śakyam ādātuṃ mayā doṣamahodadhiḥ / kṛtyam anyair mamaivātra ko 'nyadoṣeṣu mekṣaṇaḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:1858_0: paracodanadakṣāṇām annadhīṣṭopakāriṇāṃ / vākyaṃ mūrdhnā pratīcchāmi sarvaśiṣyo bhavāmy ahaṃ //
SA11sanssr_pu:1859_0: saṃgrāmo hi mamaikasya bahubhiḥ kleśaśatrubhiḥ / tatraikena raṇāsaktam anye nighnanti māṃ sukham //
SA11sanssr_pu:1860_0: tatra yaḥ pṛṣṭhato bhītiṃ śrāvayed anyato 'pi vā /
SA11sanssr_pu:1860_1: pradviṣṭo vā prasanno vā same prāṇapradaḥ suhṛt /
SA11sanssr_pu:1865_0: mañjuśrī saṃjñakaṃ yat tat piṇḍībhūtaṃ jagaddhitaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1868_0: vismayodgataromāñcair bodhisatvaśataiḥ stutam / mañjuśriyaṃ namasyāmi praṇāmair uttarottaraiḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:1869_0: niḥśeṣaduṣkhavaidyāya sukhasattrapradāyine / sarvākāropajīvyāya mañjughoṣāya te namaḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:1870_0: iti jinatanayānāṃ sarvathātyadbhutānāṃ caritam upanibdhyopārjitaṃ yac chubhaṃ me /
SA11sanssr_pu:1870_1: bhavatu sukham annantaṃ dehināṃ tena yāvat sugatapadam annantavyomasīmādhipatyaṃ /
